3. Current Source mode (Constant Current). Both current &
column2: voltage is limited. VoltBot will ramp up the voltage slowly to match the current to the limited current and damp down the voltage quickly if the current is beyond the limit.

column1: The current mode suits to board debugging, Li+ battery charging and LED testing.
USB ports are mature and can be converted into various output forms.
The Dual-Screw converter enables VoltBot to be used like common SMPS.
The USB to DC5.5 cable enables VoltBot to be used as a common adapter.
The Banana Jacks converter and Banana Kit enable VoltBot to be used like common laboratory DC power supply.
There are 4 touch-keys on the upper edge of the body, for manual configuration.
An App (VoltBot) provide the most pleasant user experience and the most abundant functionalities. Google Play &
VoltBot embeds a page server inside. It could be accessed by any web-browser. You could write your program to do data acquisition and control with HTTP requests.
VoltBot has an external UART port. There are many devices that VoltBot could communicate with, such as Arduino, Raspberry Pi, PLC, and FPGA.

with PD Kit:
PD 2.0 - 5V3A 9V2A 12V1.5A
PD 3.0 - Role negotiation, No PPS
VoltBot could be the best charger for iPhone X because it could support 4 ports to do 9V/2A USB-PD charging simultaneously and deliver sufficient power 9V×2A×4=72W.
VoltBot has 4 independent high-speed digital power engines.
Digital power engines provide low ripples and fast transitions.
Digital power engines make it possible to implement complex feedback using both integration and differential functions and takes both voltage and current as variable elements.
Digital power engines could extend the analog precision by oversampling and in-field calibration.
VoltBot has its memory to store history data to help you to diagnose &
It could display the data as curves. Current/Voltage/Power of one second/minute/hour/day (12 curves in total) could be displayed on App or Web Page.
Statistics data such as capacity, energy could be shown on the App.
You could also download the raw data as an Excel file.
High-quality components enable high efficiency to minimize heats and size. No fan inside, neither active heat sinks.

column6:

We provide warranty for 5 years. Because every VoltBot is carefully tested, we have great confidence in its quality.
column11:

In order not to bring in light pollution into the room, we developed auto backlight control.
column16:
>

VoltBot saves 96% space out from traditional adjustable DC power supply.

column1: VoltBot origins from a crowdfunding project (on Kickstarter). And it has been reviewed by more than 550 backers.

Our team spends more than two years to build this single product. We are dedicated and we published more than 15 firmware updates over the last year to fix bugs, optimize for convenience and unlock new features.
A nice desktop stand will be shipped with VoltBot.

And two gadgets will also be shipped:
1. A TTL level shifter to connect Arduino.
2. A USB lighter.
You could download the user manual at our official site: https://www. sillycomm.com/voltbot/documents/
The manual includes quick-start, detailed parameters and demos to show you how to operate.
VoltBot is a compact, versatile, and precise power supply.
It can be used as a quick charger, a flexible SMPS, a universal adapter and an adjustable laboratory power supply.
Tech Fans could use VoltBot to replace various adapters.
Repairmen could repair multiple devices and save workspace.
Children could do physics experiment with more safety because VoltBot is powered with DC.
Researchers could customize their project to interact with VoltBot.
There are multiple accessories to unlock full functions and capacities.
1. Engineer Kit is to unlock the convenience to use VoltBot as an SMPS and an adapter.
2. Banana Kit is to fully utilize the convenience of the banana jack. It makes VoltBot as laboratory power supply.
3. Mount Kit is to unlock wall mounting and car mounting.
4. PD Kit is to unlock type-C output and Power Delivery 3/2 (PD), and input of type-C.
5. Traveler Adapter is to replace the large adapter of VoltBot.

column6:
>

It consists of:
4 * Dual Screw Converter,
4 * DC5.5 cables,
1 * Banana Converter,
1 * DC5.5 converter pack,
1 * USB meter.
column19:
>

It consist of:
2 * Banana Jack Converter
1 * Banana to Hooks Cable
1 * Banana to Pens Cable
1 * Banana to Alligator Clips Cable

column1: Mount Kit consists of a series of mounts to mount VoltBot firmly and decently in a car.
These mounts are the newest advanced prototypes so you will never worry about dropping easily anymore.
1. Vertical Air Vent Mount with a hook. It suits the vertically aligned air vent beside the front panel.
2. Headrest mount. It suits the stud beneath the headrest, which would be a perfect place to host charging service for rare-seat passengers.
3. Horizontal Air Vent Mount. It suits the horizontally aligned air vent in the front panel.
4. Magnet Cardan Joint. It could adjust and lock the facing angle (i.e. normal angle in physics).

5. A backplate of VoltBot bound with an iron plate. You could exchange the backplate of VoltBot, and mount it as soon as you opened the box. Of course, we will ship you with other 2 individual iron plates to let your all 3 mounts available.
6. A high-quality cigarette plug to DC5.5 cable. It has a 5A fuse inside. The cable is made of 20AWG wires. 1.6m in length.
PD Kit is an accessory for VoltBot, to enable PD support by convert USB A output into USB C output.
This Kit consists of 4 Type A-to-C converters and Type-C to DC5.5 cable *1.
The A-to-C converter can convert USB-PD3/2 request into QC3/QC2 request.

It supports the output of 5V/3A 9V2A 12V1.5A, and maybe the best iPhone charger to unlock the potential 9V quick charge ability for iPhone 8+/9+/X/XR/Xmax. Compatible for other PD devices such as iPhone Xs/Max/XR/X/8 Plus/8,iPad Pro 12.9,iPad Air 3 10.5,iPad mini 5
The Type-C to DC5.5 cable has embedded chip to request 20V out from a PD adapter. Cable Length: 1m, 20AWG, 5A rated.

It supports the output of 5V5A 9V5A 12V5A 15V5A 20V5A. It will try to negotiate the highest voltage out from a Type-C PD adapter. It could deliver max overall power of 100W, to fully support VoltBot to quick charge 4 iPhone X simultaneously.
We provide different solutions for different users.

VoltBot is for individual users.
VoltBot Industrial is for industrial users.

A conventional 90W adapter will arrive with the machine.
It has the advantage that it could wire the GND to EARTH as standard electronics instruments.

A 45W PD adapter is cheap and mini.
A 65W adapter is expensive but ultra tiny.
SillyComm is a manufacturer of electronics instruments, established in 2012.
We want to express the meaning ""Even silly could communicate and be happy"". We have offices in both Beijing and Shenzhen.

We are dedicated to convenient scientific instruments, home appliances, and innovative power supplies. We are an entity owned by 100% private shareholders and we have absolutely no contracts with any government or its agencies.

Based on abundant highly-educated human resources and strong manufacturing workforce, we believe in freedom could help the improvement of technology and we confidently provide noble, decent, stable and reliable products for customers in the world.

I came about this project during my travels to different states that I am unfamiliar with the local traffic laws and not wanting to inadvertently put myself into a position of being stopped by the police.
By having the local traffic laws within easy reference, I can quickly study and become familiar with the laws of the state that I am visiting.
Then realizing that each state has place their laws on their state websites and all that I need to do is translate them into a format that can be readable by the iPhone?

Here's why. Each state has broken their laws down differently, while some state have define  their laws as title-chapters-sections, others have defined as titles-article-chapters-sections, and others as article-titles-chapters-sections, and it becomes endless.
Being tenacious as I am, I did work out a format a feasible format storing the V&
column2: T laws that can be easily referenced by the iPhone using the navigation that you are most comfortable with.

column1: I have already started the imported of the state law data, but is taking longer than expected. Here is where I need your help. Through this crowd funding activity, I will be able to successfully add resources to help speed up the importing of data to the format needed.
There are different levels for your participation and rewards, from a big thank you to receiving the source code of the xcode project.
By the way, I have to tell you, that I am not an attorney and this app does not give nor offer any form of legal advice or interpretation. You must seek out a qualified, licensed attorney for that.

","I came about this project during my travels to different states that I am unfamiliar with the local traffic laws and not wanting to inadvertently put myself into a position of being stopped by the police.
By having the local traffic laws within easy reference, I can quickly study and become familiar with the laws of the state that I am visiting.
Then realizing that each state has place their laws on their state websites and all that I need to do is translate them into a format that can be readable by the iPhone?

Here's why. Each state has broken their laws down differently, while some state have define  their laws as title-chapters-sections, others have defined as titles-article-chapters-sections, and others as article-titles-chapters-sections, and it becomes endless.
Being tenacious as I am, I did work out a format a feasible format storing the V&T laws that can be easily referenced by the iPhone using the navigation that you are most comfortable with.

I have already started the imported of the state law data, but is taking longer than expected. Here is where I need your help. Through this crowd funding activity, I will be able to successfully add resources to help speed up the importing of data to the format needed.
There are different levels for your participation and rewards, from a big thank you to receiving the source code of the xcode project.
By the way, I have to tell you, that I am not an attorney and this app does not give nor offer any form of legal advice or interpretation. You must seek out a qualified, licensed attorney for that.
(If the video is showing above, you can view at this link, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SArqezawBcw&feature=share&list=UUBUj5JD9a_0wvv6pz_qdohg)",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Fast charge every device you have no matter which fast-charging protocols you need -- PD3.0 (with Programmable Power Supply), Apple 2.4A, Samsung Adaptive Fast Charge, Huawei SuperCharge/ FCP/ MediaTek Pump Express, Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 / 3.0 ...
With 3 ports, you only need 1 outlet and 1 charger to charge all your devices together. Eliminating the struggle with finding enough outlets to charge your devices.

column2: USB-C devices/laptops under 65W power rating. If your laptop uses non Type-C power adapters, all you need is a converter cable and it’ll charge just as well.

column1: Good news is, whether you own a USB-C laptop or non USB-C laptop, we provide the cables as well. For USB-C's, you can get Charby Edge (our USB-C to C 100W 2m/6.5ft cable)
column2:
for non USB-C's, our USB-C to laptop tip converter cable, which you can specify via the Backer Form.

Both are available via the USB-C cable perk and the add-on cable perks.

column1: 15 different laptop tips to choose from. There's about 1 for every laptop manufacturer out there. (More details in converter cable's specs further below). If you doubt we have the right type for yours, ask us at team@charbycharge.com.
No matter the devices -- laptops, smartphones, game consoles, camera, or headphones -- Charby Pico charges them all.

Charby Pico comes in either the U.S. (usable in Japan and China) or EU native plug. We'll give you a free UK/AU outlet converter for each Pico depending on your shipping country. Regardless, it's usable in every country as it supports universal 100 - 240V voltage suitable for all outlets.
*EU plug version is now only available in Gold Edition.
Charby Pico is not only small and light, but its prong is also foldable.
You can use up all 3 ports when all your devices’ batteries are running low. It’s 2019, you should be able to keep your multiple devices running without having anxiety about it.
Using the successor to silicon (Gallium Nitride), we can provide everyone with an advanced power adapter that’s much smaller and power efficient. Not to mention generates far less heat too.
For you who used to carry the brick we called laptop adapter around, enjoy a charger that feels almost like nothing in your bag and of course -- the abundant of available space.

Charby Pico will not only take away your mess and travel burden, but also your worry for safety. And should your Charby Pico shows any sign of defect within the warranty period, you will get a replacement with zero extra fee on your part. We will take care of everything.
Get Free Nylon Hard Case(s) to store your wall charger and cables when you:
add-on a Charby Pico with the perk ""Add-on special"" before checking out.
•  get 4 free cases with the standard perk ""Early Bird Bundle"".
Note: add-on perks can be found below the ""Checkout"" button after selecting any perk.

Can't find the right one for your laptop? Send your laptop's original adapter's maximum power output (W) and a photo of the laptop tip to team@charbycharge.com, and we'll tell which laptop tip you should pick in the Backer Form.

Thanks to the support from the Indiegogo community, the campaign is a resounding success! Charby Pico is now being shipped out to our customers regularly. If you are looking to get one, visit our official web store HERE.

For Desktop: scroll up and down to find your desirable perk.
For Mobile: swipe left and right to choose your perk.
*Each comes with different quantity and price.

Step 2: Getting your perk
Click/Tap “Get this perk” and a window will pop up showing you what you’re getting. Make sure it’s the option that you want and click/tap “continue to payment.

Bonus Step: How to add-on converter cables/Charby Edge
After Step 2 and before you click/tap ""checkout"", scroll to the bottom ""Perks you may also like"" and click/tap ""Add Perk"" then ""Save Option"".

Step 3: Checkout
Click/tap “checkout” and fill in all the required information. Make sure to input your full address and full name to prevent any delivery error. After filling everything, click/tap “submit payment”.
Step 4: We will ship what you’d ordered starting from March 2020.
The estimated shipping time is March 2020. Though it may delay or hasten due to unforeseen factors. Regardless, we will see to it that you will get the products you have ordered.

We ship internationally. However, if your country does incur import taxes, customs duties, or other fees, we will not bear these charges for you. Should customs clearance is required upon reaching your country, you shall be responsible to work with the customs and/or shipping company to ensure the delivery of your order.

There will be a reshipping fee if our courier service provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons: your location provided is not accessible, no-one is available to receive the package, you've provided the wrong address or you’ve moved without notifying us before your package is dispatched.
All delivery issues need to be reported within 1 month after the tracking number is provided. Otherwise, we won't be able to trace the delivery and any loss won't be covered.
All our products are covered under a 1-Year Zero-fee Warranty. Should you need our assistance, reach us out at team@charbycharge.com.

There will be no returns or exchanges for change of mind. If there is any manufacturing defect, please email us on team@charbycharge.com and our team will arrange an assessment and replacement if deemed defective.
Let us all move toward a world where charging is effortless, starting with Charby Pico today.  So everyone can commute or travel with their handy devices with as little weight as possible.

We have poured all of our heart and energy in to developing the most unique vaporizer on the market place! For nearly a year we have carefully studied all of the feedback from our customers and the vaporizer community to produce the worlds first dry herb vaporizer which is also compatible with e-liquid and wax/oil tanks.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

At its core The Guru is a premium loose leaf vaporizer that has all the makings of a high quality unit and features an all glass vapor pathway and a ceramic heating chamber. The Guru incorporates some of the most advanced heating technology which results in a very pure and flavorful vapor without any exposure to plastics or metals. The Guru heats incredibly fast in most cases within 30 seconds in comparison with many other portable vaporizers that can take several minutes to heat.

The Guru uses Pulse-Width modulation technology to maintain precise control of the units heating chamber while receiving feedback from a temperature sensor installed directly on the ceramic heating element. This ensures very accurate temperature control and also extends battery life.

The most exciting thing about The Guru is that it is compatible with all of your standard e-liquid, wax and concentrate cartridges. The amazing design of The Guru allows you to use and adapter to connect any cartridge or atomizer you choose! This feature is what truly sets The Guru apart from any other unit on the market and is why we can confidently call this vaporizer universal!

column2:
>http://iuf.partidopirata.org

[en] We're organizing the Internet Ungovernance Forum on November 2015, for everyone who demands that fundamental freedoms, openness, unity and net neutrality remain the building blocks of the Internet.

[pt] Organizaremos o Fórum de Desgovernança da Internet em Novembro de 2015, para todas as pessoas que demandam por liberdade de expressão, transparência, privacidade e neutralidade de rede como pilares fundamentais da Internet.

[fr] Organiser le Forum de disgovernance l'Internet en Novembre 2015, pour tout le monde que la demande pour la liberté d'expression, la transparence, la confidentialité et la neutralité du réseau en tant que piliers fondamentaux d'Internet.

[es] Organizar el Foro de Internet Disgovernance en noviembre de 2015, para todos los que la demanda de la libertad de expresión, la transparencia, la privacidad y la neutralidad de la red como pilares fundamentales de Internet.


Internet Freedom

Our forum will be in parallel to the Internet Governance Forum (IGF) 2015 which will also be held in João Pessoa in November. Interested parties all around the world will join and follow this important event. However, we see that at IGF the most urgent problems of the Internet do not get proper attention.

Due to its format, the main perpetrators of many of the Internet's problems, i.e., the governments and corporations, are getting representation in IGF that they don’t deserve.

Given these circumstances, we decided to take initiative to defend the Internet as we know it and to create a parallel space to raise the voices of civil society initiatives, activists and common people.

Our Guests

>

AMELIA ANDERSDOTTER

Swedish activist, member of the European Parliament from 2011-2014 for the Piratpartiet.

BIRGITTA JÓNSDÓTTIR

Activist, writer, poet and member of the Parliament of Iceland for the Pirate Party in Iceland.

FABIANE BOGDANOVICZ

Intersectional feminist, activist for Animal Rights, works with Solidarity Economy and former General Secretary of the Pirate Party in Brazil.

JULIA REDA

German, member of the European Parliament for the Pirate Party in Germany and Vice President of the Greens / Europe Free Alliance.


What We Need

Our main focus on this crowdfunding is:

column1: • infrastructure for live streaming and remote worldwide participation
We also intend to use up leftover money to organize a hackathon and make a documentary film. All expenses will be published transparently on our site.

Internet Ungovernance Forum

The most vital problems today are censorship and freedom of speech
column4: protective, prohibitionist and conservative governance approaches
column5:
awful governance examples as in the case of Brasil and the list goes on. Further, we do not see any of these problems independent of the greater political, social and economic contexts in which the Internet and related digital infrastructures are embedded in.

We want to reclaim the Internet as a fundamental infrastructure of our societies, cities, education, health, work, media, communications, culture and everyday activities.

column1: We call on our participants to resist seeing the problems of the Internet as only technological and void of its materiality.

column2: >Sitting all day is bad for our health - excessive sitting is
column4: > with obesity, heart problems, diabetes and some cancers. And traditional standing desks are ineffective, because when we get busy, we forget to stand.

column1: Aspirus is a revolutionary smart standing workstation that fits on your existing desk. Press one button and it rises to your height, sitting or standing. Turn on the app to set sit-stand goals and reminders. Track your real-time data and keep yourself motivated.
Improve your health, reduce back pain and stay in shape. With one simple step.
""Aspirus might be the most technological standing desk yet"" Tech.Co
""... what really distinguishes the Aspirus from other desks is the inclusion of a small sensor array that communicates with your smartphone via Bluetooth"" Gizmag

""...its unique selling point is the fact that it can be paired with a smartphone to allow you to set goals and reminders. This allows you to stay on top of how long you've been sitting or standing, and change up your position accordingly"" Trend Hunter

""...The rig tracks how long you have been sitting there and uses a handy notification light in the shape of the Aspirus logo to let you know it’s time to stand up. It can also tell when you’re not at your desk, so it tracks your sitting/standing time more accurately... Effectively, the app helps turn the workstation into a kind of life coach for your workplace behavior."" Tech In Asia
""The Aspirus smart workstation can save you a trip to the chiropractor"" e27
""Aspirus is a smart standing workstation that is automated, customisable and offers healthcare motivation."" The Straits Times

Experts have recommended we stand for at least 2 hours a day - and work our way towards 4. But sitting is unavoidable, especially at work. Aspirus eases you into a healthier routine - without requiring you to change a beat.

column4: >Aspirus is a sleek and smart adjustable workstation packed with features you'd expect in standing desks costing $2000 or more.
>With Aspirus, moving between sitting and standing couldn't be easier. Press one button and it
column7: >automatically elevates to your pre-set height, sitting or standing

column4: >Use the Aspirus app to set daily stand goals, sit-stand reminders, and personalise Aspirus to your height. Get real-time reports with sit-stand data, trends, progress report, and more. Make Aspirus your personal health coach in the workplace.

>We all know it's really important to move during our workday. But the reality is that we spend 77% of our time at work sitting. So we made it extremely easy for you to know when it's time to move - just heed the gentle glow of the Aspirus icon.

column1: Aspirus uses an innovative multi-sensor technology to accurately track when you are sitting or standing in front of the desk and excludes the time you are away. Stay motivated with real-time data, every single day.

You need your laptop and phone within close reach. That's why we've included a sleek metal laptop and phone stand with every Aspirus. Cradle your favourite hardware in this efficient stand and free up space on your workspace.

Aspirus was designed for ergonomics. Every Aspirus comes with independent monitor screen adjustment. Adjust it once at set up, and always achieve the correct posture, sitting or standing. Back pain be gone.

column4: >Aspirus provides the ultimate flexibility. It can be used on top of any table or bay window. And with modular mounts, switch between laptop, monitor or dual-monitors configurations, without ever changing your base unit.

column1: We all know how it feels to be interrupted when you are trying to meet a deadline. Aspirus has a built-in do-not-disturb light that you can turn on to indicate that you are busy and turn it off when you are available. Now let's get some real work done.
Explore Aspirus from any angle with this 3D Interactive Model.
These users have just experienced Aspirus. Here's what they have to say.
Aspirus combines the flexibility of workstations with the intelligence of smart standing desks. Get ready to meet the workspace of the 21st century.

Aspirus is proud to partner with Tutudesk. Conceived by Archbishop Desmond Tutu, a Tutudesk provides a comfortable surface to read and write on, and is designed to be portable for kids to take home for homework.

Modern technology has advanced to the point of smart desks like Aspirus. But for children who lack any desk at all, learning to read and write functionally is almost impossible - they have to write on the floor or use a classmate’s back. Sub-Saharan Africa has a shortage of 95 million school desks.

The Tutudesk is made from polymer, and offers a school desk that is sustainable, portable, low cost and effective. Over 5 years, a Tutudesk costs less than $0.02 per school day while providing an essential platform supporting literacy.

1.3 million Tutudesks have been deployed in more than 3,000 schools across Africa, with a goal of 20 million Tutudesks to 20 million children by 2020.

Help change these children’s prospects forever.

STEP 1: Ensure Aspirus fits your workspace


STEP 2: Decide whether you need an add-on attachment

All Aspirus comes with a VESA bracket to mount your monitor on. 

If you use a laptop or dual monitors and are purchasing:
• Aspirus Standard, please include a Laptop/Monitor Platform ($29) or Dual-Monitor Bar ($59).
• Aspirus Ultimate, we will email you for your choice of add-on attachment after the campaign ends.
STEP 3: Check whether your monitor can be mounted

Aspirus follows the VESA industry standard - these are ""hole patterns"" at the back of monitor displays for mounting purposes. Many monitors are VESA compliant, but some are not. <span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >Look for 4 mounting holes on the back of your monitor and check that they fit the 75x75mm or 100x100mm hole pattern in the diagram below. This is sometimes hidden under the monitor stand. Or, check your monitor manual or contact us at hello@aspirus.co (with your monitor model number).
column3: >For iMacs, refer to the FAQ and for non-VESA monitors, you can use the Laptop/Monitor platform.

column1: Aspirus Ultimate purchasers can select between Matte Black (left) and Pearl White (right). We will email you for your colour preference after the campaign.
STEP 5: Decide on your customised laser-engraved panel (Aspirus Ultimate)

Aspirus Ultimate purchasers will receive a stainless steel panel, 2.65"" x 2"", laser-cut with their favourite inspirational quote or photograph. Place it on your Aspirus for daily inspiration. We will email you for your preferred design after the campaign.

column2: >We have had back pain for years, due to long hours in front of computers. Though using standing desks helped, the solution was inadequate - when we got busy, we simply forgot to stand.

>Determined to make a change, we started an ergonomics furniture company and spent 1.5 years developing a solution. We worked with more than 50 clients to understand their pain points, and used these insights to create Aspirus. After several rounds of testing, Aspirus is now ready.

column1: Our Indiegogo campaign is a chance to reach out to people who spend hours in front of their desks, and wish to use technology to improve their health while working. By helping you keep active, reduce back pain and improve focus, we want to enable you to do what you are doing better, With your support, we can bring Aspirus to market much faster and together, change work forever.

column2: >We are a team of entrepreneurs, industrial designers, electrical and firmware engineers who have experienced the very problems Aspirus was created to solve. We're thrilled to be working on a product that can change the way you work, for the better.

column1: We've spent 1.5 years developing Aspirus and getting it ready for production. Manufacturing a hardware product is complex. That's why we've planned out in detail the steps for manufacturing, certification, and fulfilment.
We have selected a manufacturing partner in Taiwan with decades of experience in producing high-quality metal parts, who will work closely with us through the production process.

The board and firmware are functional and we are in the process of building a final, optimised version. Development work sometimes take longer than expected, but our engineers have a lot of experience in this area.
The product also requires certification for certain countries. To tackle this, we've consulted certification agencies from the start when we developed Aspirus.
Our priority is to deliver a product that will exceed your expectations, on time.
We have been very fortunate to have partners who believe in our vision and supported us in every way imaginable.

We have had back pain for years, due to long hours in front of computers. Though using standing desks helped, the solution was inadequate - when we got busy, we simply forgot to stand.

Determined to make a change, we started an ergonomics furniture company and spent 1.5 years developing a solution. We worked with more than 50 clients to understand their pain points, and used these insights to create Aspirus. After several rounds of testing, Aspirus is now ready.

Our Indiegogo campaign is a chance to reach out to people who spend hours in front of their desks, and wish to use technology to improve their health while working. By helping you keep active, reduce back pain and improve focus, we want to enable you to do what you are doing better, With your support, we can bring Aspirus to market much faster and together, change work forever.

We are a team of entrepreneurs, industrial designers, electrical and firmware engineers who have experienced the very problems Aspirus was created to solve. We're thrilled to be working on a product that can change the way you work, for the better.

We've spent 1.5 years developing Aspirus and getting it ready for production. Manufacturing a hardware product is complex. That's why we've planned out in detail the steps for manufacturing, certification, and fulfilment.
We have selected a manufacturing partner in Taiwan with decades of experience in producing high-quality metal parts, who will work closely with us through the production process.

The board and firmware are functional and we are in the process of building a final, optimised version. Development work sometimes take longer than expected, but our engineers have a lot of experience in this area.
The product also requires certification for certain countries. To tackle this, we've consulted certification agencies from the start when we developed Aspirus.
Our priority is to deliver a product that will exceed your expectations, on time.
We have been very fortunate to have partners who believe in our vision and supported us in every way imaginable.

column3: >With a simple laser spot, iPin Spatial Ruler makes your iPhone into a quick measuring tool. No complicated calibration for every measurement
column4: get the distance or length wherever the laser dot locates in a single shot
column5: measurement has never been easier than ever.
column6: >Don't want to carry a tape measure in your pocket? You bet! iPin Spatial Ruler still utilizes patented ""hybrid earphone plug"" for keeping it inside iPhone's earphone jack without affecting phone functions. Measure whenever you need it with no burden at all.
column23:
> 

iPin Spatial Ruler is the communication tool enhancing people’s spatial recognition. It enables instant measurement and laser-guided photo recording on dimensions of a given space or object. Plugged inside the earphone jack, the phone-powered iPin Spatial Ruler enables users to take, save and share space dimension-embossed pictures with friends.

The proprietary hybrid design allows the iPin Spatial Ruler to stay plugged in without affecting phone speaker functions. When turning on the laser, the cap of the Ruler will display the brand logo for aesthetuc appreciation.

It is pioneering product which integrates the ultimate portability, energy-saving and authenticity into one smart tool that enhances communication about visualized space dimensions between people for everyday use.
column47: >
column48: >Download our Press Kit
column49:
>FAQ

Can I use it with my Android phone?
As of now, iPin Spatial Ruler only works with iPhones. We are currently exploring the possibility of building an app for Android and we will sure to let our backers know first when it happens.

What's the minimum system requirement?
The app is available on all iPhone 5 or later, with iOS 8.0 or later. 

What unit of measurement does it use?
It records measurement in centimeters, meters, inches, and feet. 

How accurate is the iPin Spatial Ruler? 
The iPin Spatial Ruler has an accuracy rating of +-3% error range for both distance and length measurements. We are continuously working on improving our products with accuracy as our top priority. As we make improvements, we will be sure to inform our backers on our progress.

How will my order be shipped?
We will ship your perk using the most suitable premium courier which will vary by location. We will make sure that all shipment will have tracking emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped. 

How do I contact customer support if I need to?
Send us an email at crowdfunding@ipinlaser.com. We will respond to you as soon as possible!
column50:
>RISKS AND CHALLENGES

After working hard in the semiconductor industry for many years, most of the members in our team not only have a deep understanding of the technology, but through years of accumulated experience have become captivated by this wonderful piece of technology - the laser.

In our first product - the iPin Laser Presenter for smartphones, we have delivered an exceptional product beyond imagination. This has also set the tone for iPin’s future development.

Even for a team with a lot of experience, we are aware that we could be faced with unexpected situations along the way such as delays. That being said, our team’s experience and confidence in our manufacturer makes us confident that we can deliver the iPin Spatial Ruler to you on time. We will continuously inform our backers throughout the whole process. 

Should you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact us anytime.

column1: For every contribution you make, we’ll donate a license of the Super Braille Keyboard to a blind person on your behalf.
An invisible innovative keyboard which for the first time enables touch typing and Braille typing on the touch screen itself!
for both sighted and visually impaired users.
Braille typing for the visually impaired.
would happen if you couldn't see your tablet or smartphone screen?

100% of the funds  we raise on Indiegogo will be used to

complete the first commercial version of the UpSense Super Keyboard. 

All commercial software apps require the highest standards in order to succeed in a very competitive marketplace. This is doubly so when working with the visually impaired community, as they can't just check out a video, rely on visual cues on the screen or flick through a user guide.

So to reach our goal we need to consult with expert user experience advocates, work with top notch developers and run really rigorous QA testing in order to deliver an experience that exceeds our users' expectations. We need to provide them with a seamless transition from legacy Braille products to the UpSense Super Braille Keyboard on their tablet devices.

These extra development requirements are why we need a final $50,000 of your support in order to make our dream a reality and boost the quality of life for so many millions of people around the globe.
4-6 months: launching UpSense Super Keyboard for
With your support we can make the keyboard fully accessible to both the
visually impaired and sighted communities, and make it possible to type whole

sentences using intuitive gestures.

0,"

 

What is mylifePERX™ doing?

 

Put a veteran healthcare professional together with a world-class tech geek and what do you get?  One of the most innovative, exciting and revolutionary concepts in healthcare.

Just imagine having a video conference on your smart phone, tablet or computer with a top notch local physician whenever you have a medical issue.  And imagine you can get diagnosed and treated and have a prescription sent to your local pharmacy—all in under an hour.

It’s not the future.  It’s here today and it’s about to grow exponentially.


 

We solve the problems we all experience with our inefficient and antiquated healthcare system by giving you affordable access to doctors 24/7—anytime, anywhere.

 

We are developing a software technology that connects all the dots.  We already have providers nationwide but we want your help and support to make this happen.  Be part of a grassroots movement to make healthcare accessible to everyone efficiently and more affordable.

NOTE:  It doesn’t matter what kind of insurance you have.  No one wants to go to a doctors office and sit in a waiting room with a bunch of sick people or go to an emergency room Saturday night if they can be treated right away by a doctor on a video conference.

If you think going to a doctor’s is better than consulting with the same doctor via video, you are mistaken.  We can treat over 90% of all medical issues by phone or video, and that’s a fact.

 

 

 

 

 

 

What can they treat?  The same things they treat day in and day out.

• Cold and flu symptoms

• Bronchitis

• Allergies

• Poison ivy

• Pink eye

• Urinary tract infection

• Respiratory infection

• Sinus problems

• Ear infection

• and more!

 

Our solution can also be used for dermatology, psychology, counseling and many other medical specialists.

 

Milestones – 50,000 Patients 

 

 

 

Currently we support more than 50,000 patients across the country. We currently have more families waiting to be on board. Automating the software through our web application will allow us to offer healthcare solutions to all Americans anytime, anywhere.

Testimonials from some of the 50,000 patients and their families have said about us since the process began:

"" I Love mylifePERX. Yesterday morning I called in at 7:45am. At 7:50am the doctor called me and by 8am he had concluded I had respiratory infection and sent script to my local Public pharmacy. By 9am I was on my medication. No visit to the doctor, no waiting with a bunch of sick people, no co-pay and no time away from the office--and no cost. That's what I'm talking about.”

 

 

"" I was not feeling well and decided to call mylifePERX. It was a wonderful experience. The doctor called me back within 30 minutes. I spoke with him for about 15 minutes and he wrote me a prescription that I picked up at my local pharmacy. It was very convenient and saved me time and money.""

"" My daughter and son-in-law left the kids with my husband and I for the weekend. They told us that if any of the kids got sick to call mylifePERX. Sure enough, my granddaughter woke up late Sunday night with a bad earache. I told my husband I was taking her to the emergency room and he told me to try mylifePERX first. I wasn’t that comfortable with that idea but I called. A doctor called us back in 5 minutes, calmed me down and prescribed some ear drops that we were able to get at an all-night pharmacy. It didn’t cost a penny to talk to the doctor. From the time we called the doctor until my granddaughter was on her medication was less than an hour. Grandma was very happy."" 

 

 

 

 

How Does it Work?
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

 

Imagine this…

You wake up one morning with sudden cold-like symptoms: stuffy nose, cough, congestion. You have trouble getting an appointment with your existing doctor and you don’t want to miss time at work by sitting in an urgent care or ER waiting room. What to do?

 

Step 1. Fill out your Health Questionnaire.

Step 2. Request a consult
Request a phone or online video consult with a doctor. The average doctor call back time is 24 minutes.

Step 3. Talk with a doctor
A U.S. board-certified doctor or pediatrician licensed in your state reviews your Personal Electronic Health Records, then contacts you, listens to your concerns and asks questions. It’s just like an in-person consult. There is no time limit to the consult.

Step 4. Resolve your issue
The doctor recommends the right treatment for your medical issue. If a prescription is necessary, it’s sent to the pharmacy of your choice. Over 90% of all medical issues are resolved.  Over 97% of members were happy with their consult.

Step 5. Smile
At the end of every call, the doctor will ask if he’s answered all of your questions, and will follow up to make sure you’re delighted with the service. On your request, they can even send a record of your encounter to your current doctor.

column1: Why are we raising funds on Indiegogo?
The funds you CONTRIBUTE will go directly to the development and creation of the web application and to operate the website and hire Patient Advocates for the first six months.

We are expanding our software solution into the private sector along with our new telehealth kiosks. This will allow us to reach people all over the country including those in rural areas. With this software, hospitals, ER's, urgent care centers and family doctors will be able to expand their reach and take care of their patients without the necessity of as many office visits..

This is about CHANGING the way we all get healthcare.  This is about creating something far more efficient than what has been the norm for 100 years.  We invite you to contribute and be part the change!
If you can’t contribute financially, there are several other meaningful ways you can help us:
Share mylifePERX's Indiegogo Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page :) It makes it quick and easy!
Email friends and family to request their support

Just plug in and start creating your IOT application in seconds.
>Zero+: A powerful and smart WiFi development board.

>ZERO+ is an open-source wifi module for smart devices development. it has powerful spec, various interfaces and its easy to code, all of which makes ZERO+ a highly flexible platform for smart devices development.

column1: Another Internet of Things Board (But This One Has Lisp))
""the interesting part is that it can be programmed and debugged from a WebIDE o
column4: >r a Cloud service using a Lisp programming language called Lambda, and there’s no need to build the code, or load the firmware as the Lisp interpreter will handle your                                    project, a bit like if your programmed with Python or JavaScript.""

column3: target=""_blank"">Zero+ IoT Wi-Fi Board is Programmable with Lisp (Crowdfunding)

column1:
We believe ZERO+ can turn great ideas into reality because with ZERO+, you can develop your smart device including hardware, cloud service and user application within just one hour.

Traditionally, to develop your own smart device, you would need to go through hardware, embedded system, could service and mobile application development. This not only is time and resource consuming but also often needs a huge team to achieve. However, with zero+ now everything is changed. ZERO+ offers an all in one solution that includes hardware, embedded system, cloud service and user application. Now, you can truly bring your imagination to life within only one hour.

ZERO+ is designed for both individuals and teams, so anyone from makers to startup companies can join in this family of hardware development. Any prototype made with ZERO+ can easily be manufactured in large scale. We are looking forward to seeing lives with all sorts of connected hardwares we develop because it is going to make the world a smarter, healthier and more convenient place.
column5: >The only limit is up  to  your imagination.

column2: >ZERO+ , a smart open-source wifi module that you can use it in :

column1: Security alert/thermostat/door lock/control of light, irrigation system and any type of home automation from daily application to industrial use.

Chipduino  is an expansion module for Zero+. It is a modified edition of arduino. it's designed for miniaturize the arduino uno but with all the functionality of arduino. Chipduino removes the redundant components and covers with long Female Header for inserting into the Bread Board conveniently. chipduino can be experimented via many expansion modules like how arduino-uno is.
Digital I/O Pins ：             14 (of which 6 provide PWM output)
Flash Memory：                 32 KB (ATmega328) of which 0.5 KB used by bootloader
Powerful cloud service: Cloud Storage, Web IDE, IFTTT rules.

How does it work

When you have an idea in mind, you will only need our ZERO+ and the sensor you needed to have everything ready. then you can code on WEB-IDE to  achieve  whatever  interaction you wanted with your own devices.

Supported sensor: 640P webcam, temperture and humidity sensor, light sensor, LED lights, gyroscope, TFT and OLED screen, PM 2.5 air quality detector, infrared module and microphone, arduino module supported via extension.

ZERO+ has openwrt linux, python and our own light-weight virtual machine gemini  pre-installed to reduce the need to translate coding language from platform to platform. You only need to write in Lisp on cloud to seamlessly connect different interfaces of different devices through gemini virtual machine. No need to translate languages between platform! The Lisp interpreter is designed by our team. The interpreter runs both at Zero+ and Zero+ cloud service.You can define the execution logic both in Cloud and in HW(Zero+) by writing code in Zero+ Web IDE. By using customized Lisp language, you can set breakpoints then run your code step by step and even define your own program syntax.

Smartmatrix is a young startup team based in Hangzhou, China. We devote ourselves to building a healthier, smarter and more convenient life using technology in creative applications. In SmartMatirx, we provide solutions to the development of smart devices and hope that by bringing more and more people into the revolution of a future life,we can change the world around us.We believe our society and human civilization are  moving toward a smarter and more technological than ever before.
We're a team of Designers,Cloud/Soft/Embedded system/Hardware engineers and makers who want to help other creators to develop their products faster,cheaper and better user experience with No Barrier.
Many people have been involved in different ways, but  the core team is here ：

In the past six month of our development, weve been listening to what our users said to us and for all the aspects of this porject including hardware, embeded system, software and cloud service, we developed with users' voice in mind. to achiece a product of perfection, weve done numerous changes through time to minimize our user experience and lower the cost. now its time when you can help us. by supporting smartmatrix on indiegogo, you can help us to bring products from its womb to birth. we believe the hurdle of a revolutionary change in connected hardware is within its software and hardware development and if we can accelerate the development of connected hardware and shorten the development period, we can expect to see more and more connected devices coming to our lives and that is when life is redefined.
","Just plug in and start creating your IOT application in seconds.
Zero+: A powerful and smart WiFi development board.

ZERO+ is an open-source wifi module for smart devices development. it has powerful spec, various interfaces and its easy to code, all of which makes ZERO+ a highly flexible platform for smart devices development.
Another Internet of Things Board (But This One Has Lisp))

the interesting part is that it can be programmed and debugged from a WebIDE or a Cloud service using a Lisp programming language called Lambda, and there’s no need to build the code, or load the firmware as the Lisp interpreter will handle your                                    project, a bit like if your programmed with Python or JavaScript.""
Zero+ IoT Wi-Fi Board is Programmable with Lisp (Crowdfunding)

We believe ZERO+ can turn great ideas into reality because with ZERO+, you can develop your smart device including hardware, cloud service and user application within just one hour.Traditionally, to develop your own smart device, you would need to go through hardware, embedded system, could service and mobile application development. This not only is time and resource consuming but also often needs a huge team to achieve. However, with zero+ now everything is changed. ZERO+ offers an all in one solution that includes hardware, embedded system, cloud service and user application. Now, you can truly bring your imagination to life within only one hour.ZERO+ is designed for both individuals and teams, so anyone from makers to startup companies can join in this family of hardware development. Any prototype made with ZERO+ can easily be manufactured in large scale. We are looking forward to seeing lives with all sorts of connected hardwares we develop because it is going to make the world a smarter, healthier and more convenient place. The only limit is up  to  your imagination.
ZERO+ , a smart open-source wifi module that you can use it in :
Security alert/thermostat/door lock/control of light, irrigation system and any type of home automation from daily application to industrial use.

Chipduino  is an expansion module for Zero+. It is a modified edition of arduino. it's designed for miniaturize the arduino uno but with all the functionality of arduino. Chipduino removes the redundant components and covers with long Female Header for inserting into the Bread Board conveniently. chipduino can be experimented via many expansion modules like how arduino-uno is.
Digital I/O Pins ：             14 (of which 6 provide PWM output)
DC Current per I/O Pin：40 mA
Flash Memory：                 32 KB (ATmega328) of which 0.5 KB used by bootloader
Powerful cloud service: Cloud Storage, Web IDE, IFTTT rules.

How does it workWhen you have an idea in mind, you will only need our ZERO+ and the sensor you needed to have everything ready. then you can code on WEB-IDE to  achieve  whatever  interaction you wanted with your own devices.Supported sensor: 640P webcam, temperture and humidity sensor, light sensor, LED lights, gyroscope, TFT and OLED screen, PM 2.5 air quality detector, infrared module and microphone, arduino module supported via extension.

ZERO+ has openwrt linux, python and our own light-weight virtual machine gemini  pre-installed to reduce the need to translate coding language from platform to platform. You only need to write in Lisp on cloud to seamlessly connect different interfaces of different devices through gemini virtual machine. No need to translate languages between platform! The Lisp interpreter is designed by our team. The interpreter runs both at Zero+ and Zero+ cloud service.You can define the execution logic both in Cloud and in HW(Zero+) by writing code in Zero+ Web IDE. By using customized Lisp language, you can set breakpoints then run your code step by step and even define your own program syntax.
(dev.gpio 0 ""out"" 1)gemini DSL(domain-specific languages) or Natural language programmingDefinition conversion

Burn code:        local                                           cloud and remote update
IDE debug:        not support(print code)        cloud debug(single-step execution)
These tips can help you to understand Zero+ a little more.
1. Use Lisp(It's more like human language, commonly used in the field of artificial intelligence), you can define program syntax and form your own unique language. (This point makes Zero+ so Geek!)
2. The Zero+ WebIDE provides some debug methods, such like debug print, breakpoint, single-step execution, view code, view variable data.

3. No need compile, no need flash, no need reboot. The Lisp interpreter designed by SmartMatrix team runs both at Zero+ and Zero+ Cloud service.You can define the execution logic both in Cloud and in Zero+ by writing code in Zero+ Web IDE. Here the execution logic in Cloud means the Zero+ platform leverages the computing power of the Cloud. This point is not like other IOT platforms, most of them just only provide storage and push service.
4. Connect Zero+ to the internet, open the WebIDE, you can program and debug your Zero+ from anywhere in the world.

Nothing.

It's just not fair. Nothing can be downloaded for Android and people love it. More than two thousand Android users rate it 4.5 out of 5 stars leaving tons of awesome comments. But what if you own an iOS, Windows Phone, Blackberry, Firefox OS or Ubuntu device? You will get nothing. 

Nothing for everyone!

Why isn't nothing available for your platform? Well, that's easy. I can't afford licenses and time for all the other operating systems.

What?

Some mobile stores want a specific fee for publishing an app. Here is a listing of the price for each store:

Also, every operating system is written in another programming language. That's like if you are fluent in English but you don't know a word Chinese and suddenly you have to talk Chinese to get your app done. Even if nothing does nothing it's still hard to do nothing.

So.. 500 USD? Are you insane?

Maybe. I wanted to start with the 100 USD for iOS and Windows Phone to cover my outgoings but it looks like indiegogo isn't good with it. To start a project you must request at least 500 USD. So, to make it fair, I decided to implement a special easter egg to each nothing App I'm developing and submitting.
Oh my god, that's awesome! Will it be Open Source?

Press!

Nothing is great, so some bigger people talk about it. Check them out:
AndroidPIT wrote about it. (German)
iBlali made a YouTube-Video about it with more than 1.5 million views. (German)
• Many people like it and write reviews about it.

An european startup based in Barcelona and Brussels who is working with the purpose that you can throw your wallet to the bin.
We are convinced that is time to put all your cards and tickets in one smart App.
We believe a lot in us and we are pretty sure than Klotilde is a very Smart, Complete, Simple and Pragmatic App.
We have not the potencial of big corporations as Google, Apple, Microsoft or Yahoo.
We have not enough money to launch a significant campaign to compete with them or other partial solutions.
Indeed, this could be compared like the history between David and Goliat.
This is the reason we have created an Indiegogo campaign. We need funds for our marketing campaign and for launch our App, and we'd need all your support to get it.
Please, help us to success. Make it happen.
With your support we are totally convinced that we can transform Klotilde in a very nice sucessful history.
Thanks a lot in advance and welcome to Klotilde.
I love you. You are what I’ve always wanted.
You have it all. There is no other like you.
Two days ago, the access to the concert, yesterday in the gym, this morning paying in the stores and later in the restaurant.
This afternoon the tickets in the cinema and this evening the discounts in the fast-food.
Of course, I can not forget what you have done in the ATM.
By the way, I’ve already returned the books to the library and thank you very much for remind me that I have to go to the dentist next Tuesday.
I wait you in the subway entrance. You pay
Being part of Klotilde only has advantages.
You don't need to spend money on plastic cards or on renewal processes.
With CMS Website for Companies, you can design your cards, define the security level, the type of code (QR or bar) and choose the set of clients you want to offer your cards.
Communication with customers is very easy. Notify, advice, inform, remind, ...
Klotilde is free and we will support you in the onboarding process.
Klotilde is totally free. So, we cannot offer the App as reward.
What do you think about a romantic weekend in Barcelona or Brussels?
Maybe you are in love and you would you like to send flowers and chocolate to your couple
Do you need some of our pragmatic gadgets or do you prefer our cool merchandising?
Just take a look to our amazing rewards and choose your favorites.
Klotilde is a senior business development manager with over 17 years of sucessful experience in the IT arena and financial industry in international environments.
The team is also composed for the following 3 members:

- Financial and Controlling Manager

Welcome to Weave!

Do you know, that right now, as your reading this webpage, your computer is not living up to it's full potential?

For most of the day, your computer sits idle, waiting for you to click a button, wasting energy...without getting anything done.

Worse, this problem affects nearly every computer in the world. (40%-85% idle time/day)

Weave puts that waste to work!

Weave is an application that sells excess capacity of your desktop, laptop, game console or smartphone into the $100B cloud computing marketplace.

What is the status of the project?

Weave is live now and generated it's first paid work last year on October 11th, 2012.  and over the last year it has completed over a million work units.

There is a web based client, as well as a 'build your own' version that runs without a browser. It runs on: Windows, OSX and Linux
column2:
Desktops, Laptops and even a $35 computer called the Raspberry Pi.

Why are you crowdfunding?

1) I am raising funds to accelerate development of a secure, easily installable package (allowing you to participate in the grid)

2) To raise awareness of the problems and the opportunities that this mashup can provide.

3) To be able to setup the business structure necessary to pay you as a service provider.

Right now, there are two ways to join the grid.

A) Go to http://beta.weave.sh with a java enabled browser, sign up and leave the webpage open in the background.**

B) Follow a set of technical instructions that ask you to install some software packages, download the weave source code and then compile for your computer.

Neither of these options are suitable for non-technical people as turning Java on in your browser can increase your security risk if you do it incorrectly (which is why Java now defaults to off in most new systems)

Where does the money go?

The primary goal of this campaign is to help get over the next critical hurdle.  Having an easily installable client will allow the network to finally grow to it's full potential.

Security is a major theme in this environment and that means I need to have some third party assistance to help make sure this portion is solved correctly.  I want to make sure this stays safe on my non-technical parents computers.

How much money can this generate?

Right now it takes usually 15-60 seconds to complete 1 work unit.
1000 work units currently is equal to $.01
The most I've earned in one day is $.14

Does that break even?

The only computer tested so far that has exceed energy costs over time has been the $35 computer ""Raspberry Pi"". http://www.raspberrypi.org

It is not the intention (After the crowdfunding is over, heh) that you leave computers running if the only thing they do is run weave.  Please power down your computers if they will be unused for a significant period of time, unless the power usage is break-even. (metrics coming soon)  Right now that is only the previously mentioned Raspberry Pi or computers that can run solar powered.

However, whenever your using your computer, you likely have at least 10% of your computer power that you can allocate to weave.

Why is this campaign so basic?

Because today was my deadline for the campaign to launch.  And getting things done is what this is all about!

Updates will be happening daily, video coming, probably in stages.

(40%-85% idle time/day)Weave puts that waste to work!Weave is an application that sells excess capacity of your desktop, laptop, game console or smartphone into the $100B cloud computing marketplace.What is the status of the project?Weave is live now and generated it's first paid work last year on October 11th, 2012.  and over the last year it has completed over a million work units.There is a web based client, as well as a 'build your own' version that runs without a browser. column1:
0,"

Cloop® is an elegant magnetic cable keeper, which serves as a cable management solution for people on-the-go. We are back with the new Cloop XL! which is specifically designed to help you keep your medium to large sized cables neat and tangle free. Patent Pending. USPTO application 14/611,254, and PCT International application PCT/US16/12538. US priority date of February 10, 2014.

Cloop® keeps your cables quickly organized and ready to go!
• Keep your cables tidy to easily access them
• Always have your cables ready to use
• Simply snap to keep your cables untangled and organized
• No more cables going to that dark place behind your desk

Visit us at www.cloopband.com

Cloop XL lets you stay organized so you can quickly retrieve the cable you need. We all have busy lives so don't waste it untangling.

We have listened to our previous backers and have created  Cloop XL with new and improved features designed especially for larger cables.

So what’s new about Cloop XL? 

Cloop® is easy, convenient and fast! Save time, get organized and stay on-the-go! 

                        CLOOP XL - New elegant design for those larger cables

Hate having to wrap Velcro around too many times? With Cloop you only have to tie it around once and hear that snap!
column3:
showinfo=0"" width=""680"">
                                       CLOOP XL - Quick and easy magnetic closure

column1:
We have carefully designed  Cloop XL to offer you more capabilities to tackle your larger cables. We have given  Cloop XL an elegant and more powerful closure mechanism with stronger Neodymium magnets. This, together with a high-quality silicone that is more elastic, will allow  Cloop XL to fit many cable profiles. The silicone material makes Cloop safe, durable and very resistant to frequent use. Also, the silicone will not stain your cables.  

The magnets are embedded to avoid scratching your other accessories and to prevent them from coming out. Nonetheless, this doesn’t prevent you from attachingCloop to your bag, clothes or anchoring it to a metallic surface.

The cable passage keeps your Cloop attached at all times so you don't have to worry about losing it. It also facilitates easier cable wrapping.  Patent Pending

Cloop XL uses strong neodymium magnets and a new closure design. See below, it holds up to 4.9 lbs (2.2 kg) weight before opening.

We have done numerous prototypes and testing using our own 3D printed molds to optimize the new Cloop XL design.

Cloop XL’s new design is not only elegant but also includes detailed features optimal for its purpose. 

Our earliest priority date for our U.S. nonprovisional patent application (14/611,254) is February 10th, 2014. And our invention was conceived of even before that priority date. We also have a PCT international patent application (PCT/US16/12538).

Cloop XL is the perfect organization companion for your bathroom accessories!
column2: >CLOOP XL for your hair dryer
column3: >CLOOP XL for your hair iron
column5:
bathroom drawer

Cloop XL Tackles Those Power Cords
column6: >Cloop XL for Mac's power cords
column7: >CLOOP XL for your extension cord
column8: >CLOOP XL - Elastic so you can wrap around twice when needed
column9:
>

 

We didn’t forget about  Cloop XL’s younger siblings. Now Cloop Small and Large 2.0 come with a more elastic silicone and we have also updated the Cloop Large profile for more enclosure capability.

Now, with the complete  Cloop® family you have three different sizes and a numerous range of applications. Your imagination is the limit!

Now, with the complete Cloop® family you have three different sizes and a numerous range of applications. Your imagination is the limit!

Cloop Family Size Comparison

With its 115 mm of length Cloop XL is 155% larger than Cloop Large and 213% than its youngest sibling Cloop Small.

Cloop is compact, but it elongates to wrap differents cables profiles!

Cloop Large for Work or the Office
column11:
ethernet cable anchored to a metallic object

Thanks to the magnets you can anchor your cable to a metallic object. 

Cloop Small for Travel and Commute
column12:
>CLOOP SMALL for your earbuds to make travel easier

                                           CLOOP SMALL Quickly put away your earbuds

Cloop Small at your Desk
column15:
USB cables

Cloop Small to Attach your Earbuds to your Shirt while on-the-go!
column16:
>CLOOP SMALL - keeping your earbuds in check while on a call or working out

                                              CLOOP SMALL - quick snap closure

 

Do you ever find yourself looking for your cell phone cables behind your desk or nightstand?  With the Cloop Base you can easily attach your Cloop and cables to the side of your desk/table so you always have them within reach!

The base 100% stainless steel, comes with a new stronger and removable micro suction silicone so you can attach it to any flat/smooth surface. It can be reused and attached to another place over and over. The micro suction does not use glue so it won’t damage your furniture.
column17:
>Cloop Base for your night table or desk

Cloop Small and Large with the Base. Always have your cables within reach and avoid having them fall on the floor!
column18:
>CLOOP SMALL with base for your nightstand or desk

Wouldn't it be great to have all of your cables kitted and organized together in one bag during your commute and travels? We have the perfect solution for you!
column19:
>CLOOP BAG - fully loaded

 

                                                 

 

We started Cloop as an idea in 2013  to remedy a common daily problem we encountered while traveling for business - messy cables that we had to sit and untangle before the plane even touched up off the ground, etc. We realized we had a similar problem at home with cables and cords that took up far too much drawer space, chargers that we had to sidestep and constantly pick up off the floor. We launched a successful crowdfunding campaign in April 2015. We surpassed our goal by 180%, which helped us open our online store to reach the online market. 

It has been an amazing journey and we're committed to the evolution of this product! We received amazing feedback from our backers last year for our small and large Cloops. But we've heard your requests to develop an even larger Cloop for those even larger cables you have around the house.  

Cloop is Patent Pending and International PCT registered.
column21:
>

Risks and challenges

Rewards &
column22:
Shipping:

All shipping in the US is included (First-Class-Mail, USPS) and 
international shipping is $11 (First-Class-Mail, USPS). Please be sure to check the shipping cost when you select your reward. If it doesn't match correctly, send a message for an adjustment.

International Shipping Risk:

Please make sure that your country is on the USPS international shipping list.

Note that we'll use First-Class Mail® International Large Envelope, which gets handed over to your local post office organization, the transit is non-guaranteed delivery. For most countries, this is not an issue. However, if you feel your local post office is not reliable, takes too long in transit, or if you don't see your country on the list please message us to try a different delivery method.

I'm available if you want to review this over email cloopteam@cloopband.com.

Thank you!

column10: >POCKET CABLES : A PORTABLE CHARGING CABLE.
column14:
>Short Summary

Have you got an iphone 5 charger?, is the repetitive question that forced Jason Mainella to develop a simple, and functional product, Pocketcables.

“The amount of times I’ve ended up asking someone for a cable is embarrassing. Now I have one on me at all times.” - Jason

Pocketcables are small charging cables that can fit literally anywhere, your keys, your bag, even your pocket. 

Who are we?

We are a small team of problem solvers and entrepreneurs working inside the wonderful city of Montreal, Canda. We have created a product that is functional and fulfills its purpose and thanks to IndieGoGo we are bringing it to the world!

We’ve had great support and feedback so far and with your contributions we can finally begin production and distribution. 

What we need &
column15:
what you get

We need to raise $1,000 in order to begin our first line of production for Pocketcables. All the donations we receive will go towards production, packaging, and shipping.

In order to thank you for your contribution you will receive one of our Pocketcables , PURSE or ZIP-O, with the customized functions you choose for them.

column1: However that’s not all! By contributing to our campaign you
will enable us to grow as a company and continue to make products that suit

HOW DOES IT WORK?

OPEN + PLUG + CHARGE

The Impact
We are a small business and are working very hard to provide
a quality product. With your help we can finally introduce Pocketcables as the
simplest solution to charging problems when in need.
Supporting Pocketcables in any way you can is valuable to
us. If you cannot financially contribute you can always support us through
Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets. Thank you in advance for all
