column4:
>What is One-Tap?

The One-Tap Phone Case is uniquely designed to make your smartphone life more convenient. The designer created this case to optimize smartphone abilities while keeping the design simple and easy to use. With one tap of your finger, the tab pops out and works as a multi-functional case.
column7: >The case is designed to protect your phone without the excessive weight.
column8: >The slim design is simple, yet elegant.
column9: >The face is in a modern metallic style with the sides trimmed in a matte finish. The feel is smooth but it is durable enough to protect your phone from excessive wear and scratching.
column12:
>



The One-Tap case has a built-in stand that easily pops in and out with one tap of a finger. It is simple, and can be used both horizontally and vertically. Through this function, you can watch movies, play games or keep the screen open as you multitask.


An Optional Car-Mount.
column14:
>

The case can be mounted into the air vent or a CD player slot to provide hands free navigation, phone calls or just simply to place the phone somewhere on day to day trips.


An Additional Feature: The One-Tap (Adhesive).
column19:
>The One-Tap also comes in a separate adhesive so that it can be used on other smartphone devices, phone cases, or tablets. 


Rather than buying a case, a separate stand AND a car-mount, the One-Tap case delivers all these functions as one.
column21:
>With Your Help

We will be able to increase production and distribution so that more of these cases can be put out into the market.

column2: >We want to implement the One-Tap concept to other smartphone makes and models to accommodate most of their users.
>We are hoping to add more colors to suit individual tastes and personal styles.
>We are seeking to create cases in a variety of different materials.

column1: • We want to create a larger version of our One-Tap to use on tablets and eBooks.

*If we do not reach our intended goal, you will still receive your perks for your donation. 


Color Options:
column2: >

column4: >Mohanii is acting as a distributor for the Korean inventor who owns the patent. He wants to expand his market overseas and asked us to represent his design.

column3: >smartphone case - protection, kickstand and car mount (CD player slot or air vent - most cars)
>The device comes in a separate adhesive so that it can be used on other smartphone devices, phone cases, or tablets.
>We want to expand the One-Tap design to other smartphones, eBooks, small tablets, and other mobile devices. We are also seeking to add more color variety and implement other materials.

column11:
>Additional Information

The One-Tap Case does not protect your screen. The One-Tap Case also fits in most, but not all cars - the air ventilation has to be wider than one inch - but it fits in all CD player slots. 

The One-Tap Case applies to iPhone 5 and 5s Only. 5c not available at the moment.

iPhone is a trademark of Apple Inc. We are not endorsing Apple or Apple products. 

Like us on Facebook.

Follow us on Twitter.

column1: ","What is One-Tap?The One-Tap Phone Case is uniquely designed to make your smartphone life more convenient. The designer created this case to optimize smartphone abilities while keeping the design simple and easy to use. With one tap of your finger, the tab pops out and works as a multi-functional case. The case is designed to protect your phone without the excessive weight. The slim design is simple, yet elegant. The face is in a modern metallic style with the sides trimmed in a matte finish. The feel is smooth but it is durable enough to protect your phone from excessive wear and scratching.The One-Tap case has a built-in stand that easily pops in and out with one tap of a finger. It is simple, and can be used both horizontally and vertically. Through this function, you can watch movies, play games or keep the screen open as you multitask.An Optional Car-Mount.The case can be mounted into the air vent or a CD player slot to provide hands free navigation, phone calls or just simply to place the phone somewhere on day to day trips.An Additional Feature: The One-Tap (Adhesive).The One-Tap also comes in a separate adhesive so that it can be used on other smartphone devices, phone cases, or tablets. Rather than buying a case, a separate stand AND a car-mount, the One-Tap case delivers all these functions as one.With Your HelpWe will be able to increase production and distribution so that more of these cases can be put out into the market.
We want to implement the One-Tap concept to other smartphone makes and models to accommodate most of their users.
We are hoping to add more colors to suit individual tastes and personal styles.
We are seeking to create cases in a variety of different materials.
We want to create a larger version of our One-Tap to use on tablets and eBooks.
*If we do not reach our intended goal, you will still receive your perks for your donation. Color Options:FAQs
Who made this product? Mohanii is acting as a distributor for the Korean inventor who owns the patent. He wants to expand his market overseas and asked us to represent his design.
One-Tap Case: smartphone case - protection, kickstand and car mount (CD player slot or air vent - most cars)
One-Tap: The device comes in a separate adhesive so that it can be used on other smartphone devices, phone cases, or tablets.

What is our future plan? We want to expand the One-Tap design to other smartphones, eBooks, small tablets, and other mobile devices. We are also seeking to add more color variety and implement other materials.

Additional InformationThe One-Tap Case does not protect your screen. The One-Tap Case also fits in most, but not all cars - the air ventilation has to be wider than one inch - but it fits in all CD player slots. The One-Tap Case applies to iPhone 5 and 5s Only. 5c not available at the moment.iPhone is a trademark of Apple Inc. We are not endorsing Apple or Apple products. Like us on Facebook.Follow us on Twitter.",10.0,3,"1 Campaign
ColorSeek app is developed by Designcraft.hu, a small graphic design and webdesign studio in Hungary, with 15 years experience in graphic design and web development.
We like to take pictures on the go, and if we need some inspiration later, we use the pictures to get interesting colors and graphic design ideas.

To collect colors and color harmonies is always a good chance for a designer who wants fresh ideas for new projects. Take your Android smartphone and go hunting for beautiful color harmonies of nature, or find pleasing color schemes in cities, in your home, at the office or anywhere instead of using the boring ""factory preset"" colors found in graphic design programs.
The smartphone is always with us, so it seemed a good idea to create an app for color collecting and editing in one place:
• you can pick one color and create a color scheme from that (the app automatically add harmonies: analogous, complementaries, triads, tetrads etc.)
edit and save the palette for later use (to SD card, or cloud storage)
share your palettes (on ColorSeek website, Facebook, Twitter or Flickr) with your friends or colleagues
export the swatches to ASE (Adobe Swatch Exchange) format
By exporting to ASE (Adobe Swatch Exchange) file format, you can import the swatches to popular graphic design programs (Photoshop, Illustrator, Fireworks, etc.).
The ColorSeek app is a must-have if you are search for inspiration and you are
The app supports devices (smartphones and tablets) with a camera, an SD card for saving palettes and Android OS 2.3.3 to the latest Android 4.2.

The precision of color rendering will depend on your hardware in your device. You will be able to improve the color fidelity by manualy adjusting the exposure, and the white balance before you take the shot.
You will be able to make some corrections on the palette too after it is saved.
We spent many hours on brainstorming, designing the app screens, and we have already made a functional version of the app.
Since we are a small design studio, we need your support to finish our product, and release it to the Creatives.
The money should cover the following fields:
• building a decent homepage for the app

The app will be released in two versions: free and PRO. The free version will be limited: you can try the app features, but for example you can't save or share the palettes. The PRO version will offer the full feature set, and the price will depend on how much fund we collect.
If we reach $2000 the PRO app's price will be lower, and the app will be done for the deadline.

If we reach $5000 we made an iOS version too! In this case every supporter ($50 or more) and sponsor ($100 or more) will be able to get the iOS version too! (This will be available at the end of 2013.)

If we do not reach $2000 than all the money raised until the end of the campaign will go to the development of the ColorSeek App. In this case, the development will be slower, and the PRO version will cost higher.
You will get the following for your perks:
$10: You will receive our color schemer app when it will be available.
$15: Be the first who can use our color schemer app to find interesting colors on the go! Your opinions count, we will like to hear your thoughts about the app.
$50: You will receive the ColorSeek App, and an e-book about color schemes and creative use of color in design.
• 1x We thank you for your support on social media
$100: You will receive the ColorSeek App, an e-book about color schemes and creative use of color in design, and a link to your website on colorseek.com.
• 1x link/banner to your website (on sponsors section on colorseek.com)
• 1x We thank you for your support on social media

$1000: You will receive the ColorSeek App, an e-book about color schemes and creative use of color in design, a link to your website on every page of colorseek.com, and a blog post featuring your site/product!
• 1x link/banner to your website (will be visible on every page on colorseek.com)
• 1x blog post featuring you/your site/your product
• 1x We thank you for your support on social media
The project is expected to be finished in September, 2013.
Some people just can’t contribute, but it doesn’t mean they can’t help.
Please help us to share our project!
Use Facebook, Twitter, or just tell your friends about ColorSeek!
Thank you very much for your contributing!
If you have questions, please ask at: app@colorseek.com

column36: > 4.4 KitKat LTE ultra rugged Smartphone. It was built for extreme use and to handle extreme conditions.

column1:
For over nine years, we at Sonim Technologies have been making the world's most rugged and durable mobile phones for first responders, construction workers and the military.

With our first Android LTE Smartphone, Sonim is looking for active sports consumers to be ""Sonim Explorers"" and come along with us to make Sonim smartphones part of an active lifestyle.  

A fully water submersible Sonim XP7 Extreme smartphone is perfect for Boaters,Fishing Enthusiasts, Kayakers, Rafters, Stand Up Paddleboarders,and anyone else who spends time on open water.  You can even snap video of sea turtles passing by.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

The Sonim XP7 Extreme’s powerful battery will outlast even the longest and coldest trails.  With 2-3x the battery life (4800mAh) of most other smartphones, you'll never be sitting there at the end of a long day, unable to use your phone. 

The Sonim XP7 Extreme smartphone, which uses Corning Gorilla Glass, has been specifically designed to be shock and impact resistance above military specs.
column11: >Phone fell out of your pocket while on your bike or your motorcycle? No problem.

column1:
For sailors, boaters and anyone who spends time on the water, there has never been a better phone to take to sea than the Sonim XP7. 

For a full technical specifications sheet, click here.

Running on an Android 4.4.2 KitKat, the XP7 can handle any data, messaging, or voice application you can think of offered by lesser smartphones
column2:
the major difference is that this smartphone can take extreme use and keep on talking, posting, and surfing the web without any damage. 

The Sonim XP7 Extreme makes a perfect holiday gift for the outdoor enthusiast in your life.  Drop us an email at hello@sonimextreme.com after you buy your Sonim XP7 Extreme, tell us that the phone is a gift and who it is for, and we'll mail you a really cool Extreme Gift Certificate showing your Giftee that their XP7 is coming!

column1: • If you are active, a wheels, water, snow, and outdoor sort of person
• You believe in having the right equipment and tools for your Active pursuits
• You want a smartphone that’s amazingly durable, water/salt/snow/rain/mud/2 meter drop/shock/pressure resistant, with a three year comprehensive warranty to back it up
• You want a smartphone with twice the battery life for those long rides and hikes
• You want a smartphone you can use with gloves, or with a hugely loud speaker phone, and that has a unique screen for outdoor readability
• The right smartphone to leave on the boat, or to take on weekend motorcycle rides.  The right phone for when you are out in the uncontrollable elements and are going to get dirty

column1: Sonim Technologies has been making virtually indestructible cell phones for years. Military grade rugged phones built and used by the toughest professionals on the planet from firefighters, policemen, construction workers, to first responders and more. The Sonim XP7 is the introduction into the consumer market for people like you that work hard, but play harder, and need a phone that can keep up.
Where can I use the Sonim XP7 Extreme?

The Sonim XP7 Extreme can go anywhere you can go, and handle anything you can handle.  If your activities are hard on you, if you’re hard on your equipment, if you've ever broken phones, or feared for the safety of your delicate phone, the Sonim XP7 Extreme is the Android LTE Smartphone for you.
Does the Sonim XP7 Extreme need a case?
The Sonim XP7 Extreme has no need for a protective case. It is the world’s most ruggedized smartphone available on the market today.
What are some of the use cases for the XP7 Extreme for the active sports crowd?

We expect that the XP7 Extreme will be either a second phone for Active Sports participants, or a primary Android phone for those who work and play in the outdoors, and need a smartphone as rugged as they are.

Is this an unlocked phone? Yes. The Sonim XP7 Extreme is an Unlocked smartphone that works on any GSM/3G/4G LTE carrier around the world---this means that you don’t need a contract for the  phone, and can use the XP7 Extreme with any compatible carrier and switch anytime.
What is the trial service from Ultra Mobile?

We’ve included a Trial Service period (US Customers Only) of mobile service:  The XP7 Extreme ships activated with a SIM (Subscriber Identity Module) and Trial Service from Ultra Mobile.  This means your first month’s service is compliments of Ultra Mobile, and includes Unlimited Nationwide &
column2: International Talk, Unlimited Global Text, Unlimited Data (1st GB at 4G LTE speed) and $10 of international call credit.

column1: What happens after my first month’s credit expires?

Once the balance included for the Trial Service has been depleted, you will need to refill the balance with Ultra Mobile, or switch to service from a compatible carrier. This means that you need to take the phone to a compatible operator, and to sign up for service to have a SIM (Subscriber Identity Module) installed.  Sonim supplies a tool and detailed instruction for safe installation of a SIM card into the XP7.

Is this compatible with my existing cell phone carrier?

Maybe. The Sonim XP7 Extreme is compatible with any North American GSM/HSPA/LTE operator.  This includes noted operators such as AT&
column2: T Wireless, and T-Mobile, and the new and improved Metro PCS, or Canadian operators like Bell Mobility or Telus, as well as Mobile Virtual Network Operators such as Ultra, H20 Wireless, StraightTalk, Net 10 and others.

column1: ***This Sonim XP7 Extreme model is NOT compatible with CDMA/LTE operators such as Sprint or Verizon Wireless.***

What if I’m a Verizon or Sprint subscriber? Can I use the Sonim XP7 Extreme with them?

If you’re a current Verizon Wireless and Sprint Customers your Sonim XP7 Extreme will ship with the Ultra Mobile Trial Service detailed above.  Following your trial service, we highly recommend that you continue service with Ultra Mobile. Your phone is unlocked, so if you choose to continue to use Ultra Mobile, you are all set, or you can choose any other compatible wireless operator.
What happens if my Sonim XP7 Extreme Gets Damaged?
We don’t think it will, but if it does Sonim provides an industry leading 3-Year Comprehensive Warranty:  This includes Accidental Breakage. See here for detailed terms and conditions.
What makes Sonim the right company to bring this type of smartphone to this market segment?

Sonim Technologies has been making virtually indestructible cell phones for nine years. These are the military grade ruggedized phones built and used by the toughest professionals on the planet from firefighters, policemen, construction workers, to the military and more.
Why are you selling the Sonim XP7 Extreme to consumers?

The Sonim XP7 Extreme is the introduction into the consumer market for people that work hard, but play harder, and need a phone that can keep up. We believe it’s time for a change. If you are a person that works and plays in the outdoors, then the Sonim XP7 Extreme may be the first phone that matches your toughness, and will be your only phone.
How is it different than the XP7 currently offered in Canada by Telus and Bell?

The XP7 Extreme edition is the active sports variation of the XP7 currently being offered.  The housing is all black, versus the industrial black/yellow motif of the commercial/industrial edition. Additionally, we plan to offer preloaded apps targeted to the Active Sports users, and with some models, sports specific accessories.
Who will like the Sonim XP7 Extreme?

If you’re a person that spends your weekdays in an office, but spends your weekends on the slopes, on the mountains, in the desert, on the road, at the beach, or in the water...then the Sonim XP7 will be the right smartphone and the the right tool for your second life...where you really live.
Why will this be my second phone?

People today love their smartphones. They are an indispensable tool for our work lives, our family lives, and our play lives. But today’s smartphones are expensive and delicate, and simply not the right tool for outdoor activities. How many times have we dropped our cell phone from our pocket and been frozen with fear as it falls a mere 3 feet to the ground? How can we expect phones like that to endure extreme use for those of us who live our lives outside the office and when we are off of the couch?
What apps and accessories make this a viable choice for the active sports crowd?
We are working with a number of companies whose outdoor related applications will be pre-loaded prior to shipment of your XP7 Extreme. We will update details as campaign evolves.
We expect other apps may be evaluated and added during the course of the campaign, as companies discover the campaign and the value of the Sonim XP7 Extreme.
Does the Sonim XP7 Extreme really have a 3-year warranty?
The Sonim XP7 includes an industry leading three-year comprehensive warranty---including Accidental Breakage. See here for detailed terms and conditions.
What type of SIM card does the Sonim XP7 Extreme use?
The Sonim XP7 uses a Micro SIM card slot.

Military grade rugged phones built and used by the toughest professionals on the planet from firefighters, policemen, construction workers, to first responders and more. The Sonim XP7 is the introduction into the consumer market for people like you that work hard, but play harder, and need a phone that can keep up.
Where can I use the Sonim XP7 Extreme?

The Sonim XP7 Extreme can go anywhere you can go, and handle anything you can handle.  If your activities are hard on you, if you’re hard on your equipment, if you've ever broken phones, or feared for the safety of your delicate phone, the Sonim XP7 Extreme is the Android LTE Smartphone for you.
Does the Sonim XP7 Extreme need a case?
The Sonim XP7 Extreme has no need for a protective case. It is the world’s most ruggedized smartphone available on the market today.
What are some of the use cases for the XP7 Extreme for the active sports crowd?

We expect that the XP7 Extreme will be either a second phone for Active Sports participants, or a primary Android phone for those who work and play in the outdoors, and need a smartphone as rugged as they are.

Is this an unlocked phone? Yes. The Sonim XP7 Extreme is an Unlocked smartphone that works on any GSM/3G/4G LTE carrier around the world---this means that you don’t need a contract for the  phone, and can use the XP7 Extreme with any compatible carrier and switch anytime.
What is the trial service from Ultra Mobile?

We’ve included a Trial Service period (US Customers Only) of mobile service:  The XP7 Extreme ships activated with a SIM (Subscriber Identity Module) and Trial Service from Ultra Mobile.  This means your first month’s service is compliments of Ultra Mobile, and includes Unlimited Nationwide & International Talk, Unlimited Global Text, Unlimited Data (1st GB at 4G LTE speed) and $10 of international call credit.
What happens after my first month’s credit expires?

Once the balance included for the Trial Service has been depleted, you will need to refill the balance with Ultra Mobile, or switch to service from a compatible carrier. This means that you need to take the phone to a compatible operator, and to sign up for service to have a SIM (Subscriber Identity Module) installed.  Sonim supplies a tool and detailed instruction for safe installation of a SIM card into the XP7.

Is this compatible with my existing cell phone carrier?Maybe. The Sonim XP7 Extreme is compatible with any North American GSM/HSPA/LTE operator.  This includes noted operators such as AT&T Wireless, and T-Mobile, and the new and improved Metro PCS, or Canadian operators like Bell Mobility or Telus, as well as Mobile Virtual Network Operators such as Ultra, H20 Wireless, StraightTalk, Net 10 and others.
***This Sonim XP7 Extreme model is NOT compatible with CDMA/LTE operators such as Sprint or Verizon Wireless.***

What if I’m a Verizon or Sprint subscriber? Can I use the Sonim XP7 Extreme with them?If you’re a current Verizon Wireless and Sprint Customers your Sonim XP7 Extreme will ship with the Ultra Mobile Trial Service detailed above.  Following your trial service, we highly recommend that you continue service with Ultra Mobile. Your phone is unlocked, so if you choose to continue to use Ultra Mobile, you are all set, or you can choose any other compatible wireless operator.
What happens if my Sonim XP7 Extreme Gets Damaged?
We don’t think it will, but if it does Sonim provides an industry leading 3-Year Comprehensive Warranty:  This includes Accidental Breakage. See here for detailed terms and conditions.
What makes Sonim the right company to bring this type of smartphone to this market segment?

Sonim Technologies has been making virtually indestructible cell phones for nine years. These are the military grade ruggedized phones built and used by the toughest professionals on the planet from firefighters, policemen, construction workers, to the military and more.
Why are you selling the Sonim XP7 Extreme to consumers?

The Sonim XP7 Extreme is the introduction into the consumer market for people that work hard, but play harder, and need a phone that can keep up. We believe it’s time for a change. If you are a person that works and plays in the outdoors, then the Sonim XP7 Extreme may be the first phone that matches your toughness, and will be your only phone.
How is it different than the XP7 currently offered in Canada by Telus and Bell?

The XP7 Extreme edition is the active sports variation of the XP7 currently being offered.  The housing is all black, versus the industrial black/yellow motif of the commercial/industrial edition. Additionally, we plan to offer preloaded apps targeted to the Active Sports users, and with some models, sports specific accessories.
Who will like the Sonim XP7 Extreme?

If you’re a person that spends your weekdays in an office, but spends your weekends on the slopes, on the mountains, in the desert, on the road, at the beach, or in the water...then the Sonim XP7 will be the right smartphone and the the right tool for your second life...where you really live.
Why will this be my second phone?

People today love their smartphones. They are an indispensable tool for our work lives, our family lives, and our play lives. But today’s smartphones are expensive and delicate, and simply not the right tool for outdoor activities. How many times have we dropped our cell phone from our pocket and been frozen with fear as it falls a mere 3 feet to the ground? How can we expect phones like that to endure extreme use for those of us who live our lives outside the office and when we are off of the couch?
What apps and accessories make this a viable choice for the active sports crowd?
We are working with a number of companies whose outdoor related applications will be pre-loaded prior to shipment of your XP7 Extreme. We will update details as campaign evolves.
We expect other apps may be evaluated and added during the course of the campaign, as companies discover the campaign and the value of the Sonim XP7 Extreme.
Does the Sonim XP7 Extreme really have a 3-year warranty?
The Sonim XP7 includes an industry leading three-year comprehensive warranty---including Accidental Breakage. See here for detailed terms and conditions.
What type of SIM card does the Sonim XP7 Extreme use?
The Sonim XP7 uses a Micro SIM card slot.",19.0,2,"2 Campaigns

My rights were trampled on. Will you be next?

Hi, my name is Joe Nelson. I'm 36 years old, single, and have been medically unable to perform my job in full for the last two years. I've been using cannabis to alleviate the chronic pain and illness I suffer with. Not being able to work much, I grew my own medicine to save money.  Seven months ago my private property was raided by local sheriffs with a warrant, that stated incorrectly, the private property was Cleveland National Forest. They also state they are using Google maps as their source of the information.

If you are someone, or know someone, who uses Marijuana for medical purposes, you or they could be next. Help me fight this gross negligence of misinformation and word play used against us, to get judges to sign warrants and ultimately compromise our rights.

My lawyer has expressed to me that ""this is the type of case that could be law changing!"" Help me create a precedence in the matter of Medical Marijuana laws in California, and for 4th amendment rights everywhere!

I spent my entire savings bailing out of jail.

My lawyer has already cut his cost in half because he is excited to be a part of this case. I have no savings left and no time to save more. I need your help. I want to pay this amazing lawyer an incredibly fair fee to help me, and the Medical Marijuana community in the process. The money will go to pay his fees and expert witnesses to appear if necessary.
If the entire amount is not reached the remainder will be paid by me in payments to the lawyer.
If the amount exceeds my needs, I will donate the money back to organizations such as Americans for Safe Access, NORML, or other marijuana law changing charities.

This is exciting! You can be a part of a law changing, precedence setting, defense campaign. If this fund skyrockets, I will be hiring a team of lawyers to counter suit on the agencies involved, and try to force by judgement: law change, precedence and clarification of standing Prop 215 medical marijuana laws.

Other Ways You Can Help

    Thank you all for reading and understanding my situation. If you can't help with a contribution that is fine
column2: I appreciate that you read and understand there is a fight going on out there and we are here to fight it! Please spread the word about this campaign to family and friends and hopefully we'll can be a part in defining these horrible gray areas of law and initiating real change.

column1: Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to share this with your friends!

column1:
UPDATE 1: FOBO Bike

We have received many requests and suggestions to provide for 2-wheelers and 3-wheelers. After detailed and in-depth consideration, we are proud to announce FOBO Bike, the all Bluetooth Smart tire pressure  monitoring system catered for motorcycles and bicycles (maximum pressure up to 600kPa / 87psi). With FOBO Bike, you will enjoy the same features and convenience including the 24/7 monitoring, multi-vehicle monitoring, multi-user sharing and theft deterrent features like FOBO Tire.

FOBO Bike is slated for an estimated delivery date in March 2015. The sensors for FOBO Bike and FOBO Tire are not cross compatible and uses different hardware, apps and software to function. You cannot monitor FOBO Tire sensors and FOBO Bike sensors within the same app. We do not recommend using FOBO Bike for 4 wheel vehicles.
What you get with your order of FOBO Bike
Each set of FOBO Bike will come with:-
b) Free ""FOBO Bike"" app to be downloaded from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store
FOBO Bike will be manufactured to the same high standards and quality as FOBO Tire.
• Operational pressure range: 0 to 600 kPa (0 to 87 psi)
• Tire sensor battery life: up to 2 years (at 25°C rated temperature)
• Sensor structural threshold: 350N ball pressure intensity test

column1: Tire or FOBO Bike work with?
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike only work with Android and iOS smartphones with Bluetooth 4.0.
Please ensure you update to latest OS, at least Android 4.3 and iOS7.1.
FOBO Tire uses 2xAA batteries for In-Car unit and a single CR2032 battery for each sensor unit. These batteries are easily available from local stores and would
last up to 2 years on normal operating temperature. Operating in extremely cold or hot climate may reduce the battery operating life.

FOBO Bike uses a  single CR2032 battery for each sensor unit. These batteries are easily available from local stores and would last up to 2 years on normal operating temperature. Operating in extremely cold or hot climate may reduce the battery operating life.
Tire or FOBO Bike sensors are not stolen?
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike comes with a theft deterrent feature. FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike sensor units are not
re-usable if stolen, thus discouraging potential theft. There are similar
products in the market using anti-theft nut and a small wrench to mechanically
lock the sensors from being stolen. However it will be a disaster if the small
wrench goes missing. You will not be able to remove the sensor from your tire

(Update: FOBO Tire package will come with 4 lock nuts (FOBO Bike will come with 2 lock nuts), one wrench with key chain and a spare wrench. The use of these lock nuts is optional depending on the level of theft deterrent required. Please chain the wrench together with your key to avoid losing it.)
5. Can FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike work
You will need a smartphone in order to install FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike and to change
settings. Once installed, FOBO Tire will work even without a smartphone, in
case your smartphone is not with you. The In-Car unit will alert with different
alert tones in the event of a tire pressure or tire temperature danger. However, please note that FOBO Bike will not work without a smartphone as it does not come with an In-Car unit.
6. Can FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike work in
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike are designed to operate under extreme cold and hot climate. And
it is tested for water proof (IP57) and is able to sustain high impact (350N
spot pressure intensity) to ensure long durability and reliability.
7. What if I subsequently rotate the
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike app are so easy to use. To identify position of FOBO Tire
sensors installed in your car, just walk around your car and place the
smartphone close to each FOBO Tire sensor according to the instructions in FOBO
Tire app. It is just that easy. For FOBO Bike, just follow the simple instructions on the FOBO Bike app.
than one person using my car / motorcycle / bicycle? Can they use the FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike that is already installed on the tires?

FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike uses Bluetooth low energy (Bluetooth 4.0) to send out signals.
Typical range of Bluetooth 4.0 is 30 meters line of sight without signal interference.
FOBO Tire works on four wheel vehicles with tire pressures below 50psi
11. Will FOBO Bike work on road bicycles?
FOBO Bike works on 2-wheeler or 3-wheeler which uses tire pressure below 600kPA (87 psi). We do not recommend using it for tires above this pressure.
work when my car's ignition is switched off?
Your smartphone will pick up signals from FOBO Tire
sensors via Bluetooth 4.0. You can check your car tire pressures any time
knowing that they are working 24x7 round the clock continuously monitoring the

tires for you.

13. How does FOBO Bike work when my motorcycle's ignition is switched off?
Your smartphone will pick up signals from FOBO Bike sensors via Bluetooth 4.0. You can check your motorcycle or bike tire pressures any time knowing that they are working 24x7 round the clock continuously monitoring the tires for you.

Share FOBO Tire - to allow family & friends (up to 100 smart phone users) to receive information from the same FOBO Tire in your car. Sharing has never been easier with our app's intuitive quick sharing feature.

You do not need to change or modify your tire's existing pressure valve. Just screw on the FOBO Tire sensors and you are good to go.

Theft deterrent - so stolen FOBO Tire sensors and In-Car unit cannot be reused. Each FOBO Tire is locked to a specific owner's FOBO cloud account. Replacement sensors will be available for purchase separately. You will also be notified by the FOBO Tire app in the event any tire sensor is missing.

With FOBO Bike, you will enjoy the same features and convenience including the 24/7 monitoring, multi-vehicle monitoring, multi-user sharing and theft deterrent features like FOBO Tire.

FOBO Bike is slated for an estimated delivery date in March 2015. The sensors for FOBO Bike and FOBO Tire are not cross compatible and uses different hardware, apps and software to function. You cannot monitor FOBO Tire sensors and FOBO Bike sensors within the same app. We do not recommend using FOBO Bike for 4 wheel vehicles.

You together with FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike can change the following statistics:-
injuries, and 78,392 crashes occurred ANNUALLY in the US due to flat tires or blowouts before tire pressure monitoring
systems were installed in vehicles (ref. NHTSA. (2003, June). “FMVSS No. 139, New Pneumatic Tires for Light Vehicles”, Docket No.
If the tire remained under-inflated by 1 psi over its lifetime, its tread life would decrease by about 800 miles / 1280 km (ref. NHTSA Docket No. NHTSA-2000-8572-26).

NCSA tire pressure survey indicate that 26% of passenger cars had at least one tire that was under-inflated by at least 25% (approx. 6.8 psi under inflation)  Thus, on average, these passenger cars could lose about 5,440 miles / 8,704 km of tread life due to under-inflation, if their tires were under-inflated to that extent throughout the life of the tires (ref. NHTSA Docket No. NHTSA 2000-8572).

Recent data provided by Goodyear indicate that fuel efficiency is reduced by 1% for every 2.96 psi of under-inflation (ref. NHTSA Docket No. NHTSA-2000-8572-26). Therefore, a typical 25 percent under-inflated tire would increase fuel consumption by approximately 2.3%. Hence with proper inflated tires, it would translate into a saving of approximately US$11 billion in the US alone (using 2013 data from US Energy Information Administration).

This will be given free to all contributors (including those of you who have contributed earlier). You will not need to worry about choosing the color of your tire sensors for your order. Please help to spread this news for us to achieve our stretched goal.

lock the sensors from being stolen. However it will be a disaster if the small
wrench goes missing. You will not be able to remove the sensor from your tire

(Update: FOBO Tire package will come with 4 lock nuts (FOBO Bike will come with 2 lock nuts), one wrench with key chain and a spare wrench. The use of these lock nuts is optional depending on the level of theft deterrent required. Please chain the wrench together with your key to avoid losing it.)
5. Can FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike work
You will need a smartphone in order to install FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike and to change
settings. Once installed, FOBO Tire will work even without a smartphone, in
case your smartphone is not with you. The In-Car unit will alert with different
alert tones in the event of a tire pressure or tire temperature danger. However, please note that FOBO Bike will not work without a smartphone as it does not come with an In-Car unit.
6. Can FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike work in
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike are designed to operate under extreme cold and hot climate. And
it is tested for water proof (IP57) and is able to sustain high impact (350N
spot pressure intensity) to ensure long durability and reliability.
7. What if I subsequently rotate the
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike app are so easy to use. To identify position of FOBO Tire
sensors installed in your car, just walk around your car and place the
smartphone close to each FOBO Tire sensor according to the instructions in FOBO
Tire app. It is just that easy. For FOBO Bike, just follow the simple instructions on the FOBO Bike app.
than one person using my car / motorcycle / bicycle? Can they use the FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike that is already installed on the tires?
You can share FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike installed on your tires with family and friends (up to 100
smartphone users). Key in their e-mail address that will be used to login to
their FOBO account and it will be synchronized with FOBO cloud via our
detect FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike readings?
FOBO Tire and FOBO Bike uses Bluetooth low energy (Bluetooth 4.0) to send out signals.
Typical range of Bluetooth 4.0 is 30 meters line of sight without signal interference.
FOBO Tire works on four wheel vehicles with tire pressures below 50psi
11. Will FOBO Bike work on road bicycles?
FOBO Bike works on 2-wheeler or 3-wheeler which uses tire pressure below 600kPA (87 psi). We do not recommend using it for tires above this pressure.
work when my car's ignition is switched off?
Your smartphone will pick up signals from FOBO Tire
sensors via Bluetooth 4.0. You can check your car tire pressures any time
knowing that they are working 24x7 round the clock continuously monitoring the

tires for you.13. How does FOBO Bike work when my motorcycle's ignition is switched off?Your smartphone will pick up signals from FOBO Bike sensors via Bluetooth 4.0. You can check your motorcycle or bike tire pressures any time knowing that they are working 24x7 round the clock continuously monitoring the tires for you.
Please help spread to all your family and friends. And let them be among the first to experience peace of mind driving experience with FOBO Tire or FOBO Bike...
To contact us directly, you can write to us at fobo@salutica.com.my.",8.0,0,"3 Campaigns
Hello, I’m an iPhone and I want to show you what I get up to when I’m left to my own devices.

Apple made me and sure, look at me, they did a pretty fine job, if I do say so myself. “But how do you improve on perfection?” I hear you ask. Easy, add more! Thanks to my owner Steven, I now have a new, vastly improved data cable.
SmileNoodle is a colorful iPhone data cable which is always smiling. Even if you call it names or fool around with its girlfriend, it will literally never stop beaming.

The goal of the SmileNoodle was to make a cable that was good enough for us iPhones, because we are pretty awesome and we don’t just hang out with anybody (apart from the iPhone 2, he’s got some weird friends).
So how is it so good? Let me give you the 411

The first goal of the SmileNoodle is to add a sprinkle of joy to the charging process. With the lovely LED smiley face indicator, SmileNoodle glows when plugged in, making it easy to locate and letting you know that your phone is okay because I know you worry when you’re apart.
That not enough for you? Fine, here’s some more.

You know that brilliant game you play at 1AM where you look at the nest of snakes that your lamp chord, laptop cable, shoe laces and charger wire have made and you try 17 times to plug your phone in? You remember that game? Yeah… you don’t have to play that game anymore.
The SmileNoodle has a flat cable so it won’t tie itself into impossible knots.

Also, since Steven is a good guy and cares about the planet and all that stuff, he built the SmileNoodle with TPE material which is much more eco-friendly and durable. It’s smooth, wear-resistant, flame-retardant and non-discolouring.
Steven also appreciates diversity so there are plenty of colours to choose from.  Once the project is completed, Steven will send all the backers whatever color cable their hearts desire.
Different colors ( from left to right):  orange, hermosa pink, pink, light blue, black, white, purple ,blue,  red and green (and there’s yellow too, it’s hiding out of shot).
Check out the compatibility of the SmileNoodle for iPhone 4&
and the compatibility of the SmileNoodle for iPhone 5.

Right now, Steven is working hard on communicating with the Chinese manufacturers to ensure the consistent quality of the products. Both the USB and terminal of plug are guaranteed to be tested with a 48hour salt mist test and friction test to ensure that data transmission is smooth and speedy. If this Kickstarter project succeeds, Steven will continue improving the design of SmileNoodle. I gave him a few ideas about making the terminal of the 2rd generation SmileNoodle from aluminium. I’m full of great ideas.
We’re just starting out but you can help us kick this bad boy up a notch and keep smiling all the way.

Our Indiegogo campaign has ended but you can
pre-order BiiSafe Buddy

column8: >BiiSafe Buddy brings you peace of mind

column1: Biisafe Buddy is an accessory for personal safety, enabling you to share your location with ""check in "" messages and send alerts to selected contacts with just one press of a button without even touching or opening the phone. It also tracks your keys or phone, making sure you never lose them again by reminding you about it with a sound if you about to do so. In case of loss, location is marked on a map.
Biisafe Buddy works with smartphones, iPhone and Android, over Bluetooth 4.0.
• Get reminded with a sound if you are about to leave your phone behind.
• Share your location with ""check in"" message and your contacts will see your whereabouts in a map view from their mobile.
• Make an alert in unexpected situations to selected contacts without even touching or opening the phone.
Location check in or alert is sent through a free cloud service.
column8:
>Quick and easy location sharing

Press the BiiSafe Buddy once and your location is shared with your contacts. They can see your whereabouts on their mobile in a map view.

On top of sharing your location with your selected contacts, you can also share your location to Facebook.
column9: >This is a much faster way compared to Facebook's own location sharing option. You can set this feature on or off in the BiiSafe Buddy app settings.
column16:
>BiiSafe Buddy Application



Screenshots from iOS application UI
column17: >Main view of the application includes only the essentials. Connect your BiiSafe Buddy by pressing the '+' button. Search for your BiiSafe Buddy by pressing the 'Search' button. The image of the BiiSafe Buddy on the screen behaves like the real one. With a short press you can 'Check in' and  send a message that you can freely define. With a long press it makes an alert and sends another message.
column18: >You can define the behaviour of the BiiSafe Buddy and your messages in the 'Settings' view.
column20: >Screenshots from Android application UI
column21: >With the free version of the application you can link up to four persons into the same account.
column22: >""You can choose different operating modes for your BiiSafe Buddy - a total stealth mode so that BiiSafe Buddy doesn't make any sounds or a loud one and clear mode with full sounds and lights!""
column30:
>

You can carry Biisafe Buddy in multiple ways
column31: attach it to your keychain, wear it as a necklace or on your wrist. There are currently four colors available with a variety of fabrics to choose from.
column32:
>

Multiple ways to carry BiiSafe Buddy
column41: >How to take BiiSafe Buddy into use?

column1: It's never been easier. Just show the QR code at the backplate of the BiiSafe Buddy to your phone and they will connect automatically. Once you have paired your mobile and BiiSafe Buddy, you don't need to worry about it again. The operating range with the mobile and BiiSafe Buddy is up to 50 meters. If they disconnect, you will be notified and they will connect automatically again when being back in the operating range.
""A full metal battery cover with sealed bayonet locking. Just show the  QR code to the BiiSafe App and you are connected.""
You can choose from two basic colors, a white or a black BiiSafe Buddy with either a silver or a glorious gold plated rim.

column4: >""BiiSafe Buddy - Simple functionality meets timeless design""

column2: >Battery life 3-12 months, depending on the use
>Up to 50 meters operating range between the phone and BiiSafe Buddy
>As you can see from the picture below, we have done a lot of work in product development with different prototypes.
>We need your support to finalize the product and bring it to the market. We are ready to start mass production in January 2014. Shipping will start in February 2014.

column1: We are currently well on track. We have also paid much attention when selecting partners that we can trust to deliver on time and that are geographically close to ensure smooth operations.

Q: What phone do I need to have to take BiiSafe Buddy into use?
A: There is both an iOS and an Android version available. BiiSafe Buddy works with i
column2: >Phone 4S, iPhone5 and iPhone 5S/5C as well as w
column3: >ith Android 4.3 or higher version in devices equipped with Bluetooth 4.0.

column2:
>Q: Is there a Windows phone version available?
A: Currently Windows lacks the support for Bluetooth 4.0. We are considering developing the Windows version in the future when the support is available in Windows.

column1:
Q: Will the product have any warranty?
A: All BiiSafe Buddies come with one year warranty.

Q: Does the BiiSafe Buddy break if it accidentally drops on the floor?
A: No. BiiSafe Buddy is made of high quality durable materials that don't break easily. It has a solid metal rim and backplate.

Q: Is BiiSafe Buddy compatible with tablets?
A: Yes. It will work with all the iPad models, except iPad 1 &
column2: 2, which do not have Bluetooth 4.0. We have tested it also with Nexus 7. It should also work with all the Android tablets running Android 4.3 or higher and having Bluetooth 4.0.

column1:
Q: Can I run the BiiSafe Buddy application without the actual Buddy?
A: Yes. You can login to your account and make checkins from the virtual Buddy on the screen as well receive messages and alerts with devices running iOS7 or Android  4.1.

Q: Do I need to purchase a BiiSafe Buddy to everyone in the family in order to be connected?
A: All family members need to have the BiiSafe Buddy mobile app. It is free. Only those members, who send location updates or alerts, need to carry a BiiSafe Buddy with them. For example if a child is expected to “check-in” regularly, he/she carries the BiiSafe Buddy. Parents or other family members will receive messages and updates on their phones, but do not need to have a BiiSafe Buddy on them.

Q: What do I do when the battery runs out?
A: BiiSafe Buddy has a long battery life time, 3-12 months depending on the usage. It uses a standard CR2032 battery that is inexpensive and widely available. The battery is easy to change yourself as the package will contain a backplate opener for battery changing.

BiiSafe is founded in 2011. It develops mobile based safety systems and related accessories for consumer and corporate use. BiiSafe's first app, launched in 2012, is meant for home monitoring. Now BiiSafe is broadening its portfolio into personal safety with BiiSafe Buddy.

As you can see from the picture below, we have done a lot of work in product development with different prototypes.
We need your support to finalize the product and bring it to the market. We are ready to start mass production in January 2014. Shipping will start in February 2014.
We are currently well on track. We have also paid much attention when selecting partners that we can trust to deliver on time and that are geographically close to ensure smooth operations.

Q: What phone do I need to have to take BiiSafe Buddy into use?A: There is both an iOS and an Android version available. BiiSafe Buddy works with iPhone 4S, iPhone5 and iPhone 5S/5C as well as with Android 4.3 or higher version in devices equipped with Bluetooth 4.0.

Q: Is there a Windows phone version available?A: Currently Windows lacks the support for Bluetooth 4.0. We are considering developing the Windows version in the future when the support is available in Windows.
Q: Will the product have any warranty?A: All BiiSafe Buddies come with one year warranty.
Q: Does the BiiSafe Buddy break if it accidentally drops on the floor?A: No. BiiSafe Buddy is made of high quality durable materials that don't break easily. It has a solid metal rim and backplate.

Q: Is BiiSafe Buddy compatible with tablets?A: Yes. It will work with all the iPad models, except iPad 1 & 2, which do not have Bluetooth 4.0. We have tested it also with Nexus 7. It should also work with all the Android tablets running Android 4.3 or higher and having Bluetooth 4.0.

Q: Can I run the BiiSafe Buddy application without the actual Buddy?A: Yes. You can login to your account and make checkins from the virtual Buddy on the screen as well receive messages and alerts with devices running iOS7 or Android  4.1.

Q: Do I need to purchase a BiiSafe Buddy to everyone in the family in order to be connected?A: All family members need to have the BiiSafe Buddy mobile app. It is free. Only those members, who send location updates or alerts, need to carry a BiiSafe Buddy with them. For example if a child is expected to “check-in” regularly, he/she carries the BiiSafe Buddy. Parents or other family members will receive messages and updates on their phones, but do not need to have a BiiSafe Buddy on them.

Q: What do I do when the battery runs out?A: BiiSafe Buddy has a long battery life time, 3-12 months depending on the usage. It uses a standard CR2032 battery that is inexpensive and widely available. The battery is easy to change yourself as the package will contain a backplate opener for battery changing.

BiiSafe is founded in 2011. It develops mobile based safety systems and related accessories for consumer and corporate use. BiiSafe's first app, launched in 2012, is meant for home monitoring. Now BiiSafe is broadening its portfolio into personal safety with BiiSafe Buddy.

Introducing the Impact Gel Xtreme Armour Customizable Phone Case

We are very excited to announce our new product, the transformable and protective Xtreme Armour phone case! We realize that everyone has their own personality, style, and taste. That's what makes you UNIQUE and we don't want to change that! For that reason, we believe it is important for everyone to have a phone case that expresses their own interests and personality.

Impact Gel XTREME ARMOUR provides your phone with protection against accidental drops and falls using 2mm of eco-friendly gel. The innovative gel absorbs kinetic energy during impact by dissipating shock and vibration away from the phone. Now combine that with the ability to customize your case, and you'll get a really cool, totally YOU phone. Talk about a win-win situation!

Currently, we have transformer cases for the Samsung Galaxy S4, but we are working on developing these customizable cases for the iPhone 4/4S, 5/5S, and 5c, along with the Samsung Galaxy S3. That's where you come in. There are so many mobile phones out on the market, and while we are unable to produce cases for each of these, we would like to try. BUT, we need your help to enable us to provide protective and customizable phone cases for a broader audience.

Since we are in the process of designing and manufacturing these cases, we will strive to post images so that you can stay in the loop and current on the whole process. Please check back for updates on the development and designs of these cases!

The Impact Gel office and manufacturing facility is located in Ettrick, Wisconsin. Although we are a relatively small company in size, we always think about the big picture and new, innovative ways to use Impact Gel. We are working on developing many types of products using environmentally-friendly gel made from soybean oil. Along with phone cases, Impact Gel's products include saddle pads, equine leg care, shoe insoles, sticky pads for your vehicle dashboard, and motorcycle seat savers.

Impact Gel is a natural based green product derived from soy and other natural oils. The manufacturing process requires no application of temperature or pressure change. The gel is polymerized into one long, loosely cross-linked, flexible molecule that is folded back on it self many times. These sections can easily slide past each other but still remain connected thereby absorbing and dissipating unprecedented amounts of kinetic energy. Our gel is all natural, sustainable and environmentally-safe. Impact Gel's patents cover a wide range of mixtures that enable us to tailor the product's physical properties to match requirements. This opens up numerous opportunities for our gel application.
Your contribution will go towards a number of awesome things:
Expanding the Product Line - We would like everyone to have the opportunity to transform and protect their phones. Your money will go towards helping create cases for a greater variety of phones.
Future Products - We are always looking for new innovative ways to use our shock-absorbing Impact Gel. With your contribution, we will be able to make some of those dreams a reality.

Growing Our Company - Impact Gel has been developing and manufacturing some great products for the past 11 years, but now we are looking to take our company to the next level. We believe Impact Gel has some great products and your contribution will open up opportunities for us to share them with as many people as possible.
Even if you can’t contribute, we still need your help! Please spread the word:

• Social Media Shout Out! Share the link to our campaign on Facebook, tweet it to your followers, email it to your friends, tell your friends, family and everyone you know about the new Impact Gel Xtreme Armour transformer phone cases. Anything and everything helps! Indiegogo has a number of built-in tools to make this easy.
• Stay in the Loop. We want you to share in the excitement as we expand. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube so you can be with us every step of the way.

• Give Us Feedback. Let us know what you think about the product and what you are looking for in a phone case. There is always room for improvement and we would like you to get involved - just please be considerate and keep it to constructive criticism!

column3: >Keep in touch with other people without giving your phone number.

column1: Sbizzy is the disposable number suitable for your needs, both for your private life and for your business. This number will be yours until you want. Do you need more than one number, maybe two or three? Do you need a disposable email as well? With Sbizzy everything is possible, and it is also easy! Soon it will become an App, ready to keep your privacy safe in time of need.

How many times you wanted to publish an ad online or on a newspaper and you did not want to leave your number because you were afraid of being called by a call centre? Now you can avoid it with a disposable Sbizzy number.

Are you tired of your job? Do you want to look for a new one without letting your boss know? With Sbizzy it is also possible to set your account and know which ad they are calling you from. Just select your privacy level so as to be called showing the associated Sbizzy number.

Do you want to get to know new people, have new adventures? Or maybe even meet your soul mate? Why not! Not always everything works as planned. Often we have to deal with insistent people, stalkers and dangerous situations. Sbizzy will keep your life confidential, without sharing your personal data with strangers.

When you register for the first time a Sbizzy number will be created and will be linked to your number. Each Sbizzy number has its own call list, customizable voice mail and the possibility to record incoming calls. Together with the number a disposable email will be given. Sbizzy numbers expire after 30 days, but if you want it is possible to renew them. It is also possible to delete Sbizzy before the expiring date.

In addition to the phone number, Sbizzy will let you link your email to a new Sbizzy email address. This new address is associated by default to your new Sbizzy number. In this way your inbox won’t be exposed to the spam.
Firstly, Sbizzy is very flexible because it allows the users recharge their number with Sbizzy credits, this system can satisfy all kinds of necessities. Secondly, a temporary email will be created
column2: it can be used instead of your personal address in order to keep a higher level of privacy. In addition it is possible to activate the “do not disturb” mode and add a customizable voice mail. It is also possible to record the calls and download the mp3 file later.

column1: Sbizzy is service already accessible for everybody and fully functional. We realized this web app without asking for help and we are proud of our results. Now we would like to make Sbizzy available as native Android and iOS App but to do it we need some help…yours!
Thanks to you Sbizzy will grow and become the best App for all the people who want to keep their life - and their contacts – private. Become one of our supporters!

column3: >If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

column2: >Sbizzy: più privacy con i numeri temporanei

column3: >Resta in contatto con altre persone senza dare il tuo numero di telefono personale.

column1: Sbizzy è il numero di telefono temporaneo che si adatta alle tue esigenze, che siano di carattere personale o di business. Il numero Sbizzy rimarrà in tuo possesso fino a che ne avrai bisogno. Ti servono due, tre o più numeri Sbizzy? Hai bisogno di un'email tempoarena da usare per le tue esigenze? Con Sbizzy tutto questo è possibile e soprattutto facile. Diventerà presto un'App indispensabile che ti verrà in soccorso nel momento del bisogno e ti permetterà di mantenere al sicuro la tua privacy.
Visita il nostro sito web:

Quante volte ti è capitato di voler inserire un annuncio online o sul giornale con l'angoscia di dover fornire un tuo recapito personale e la paura di essere contattato dai classici perditempo o dalle insistenti agenzie di telemarketing? Ora puoi evitare tutto questo creando un numero di telefono temporaneo.

Sei stanco del tuo attuale lavoro e vuoi dare una svolta alla tua vita senza far sapere nulla al capo? Con Sbizzy è inoltre possibile impostare l'account per sapere esattamente a che annuncio stai rispondendo. Basta selezionare il livello di privacy in modo da farti chiamare visualizzando il numero Sbizzy associato.

Vuoi conoscere nuove persone, avere nuove avventure o persino incontrare la tua anima gemella? Perché no! Non sempre però le cose vanno come speriamo. Spesso potremmo avere a che fare con persone insistenti, stalker e situazioni pericolose. Sbizzy ti da la possibilità di mantenere la tua vita riservata, senza fornire i tuoi dati personali a chi ancora non conosci.

Registrandosi al servizio verrà creato un numero di telefono Sbizzy che si aggancerà al tuo numero di telefono personale o comunque al numero fornito in fase di registrazione. Ogni numero Sbizzy creato avrà un elenco chiamate, una casella vocale personalizzata e la possibilità di registrare le chiamate. Verrà inoltre fornito un indirizzo email usa e getta associato al numero Sbizzy. I numeri Sbizzy hanno una validità di 30 giorni, che si potrà rinnovare di volta in volta a seconda delle proprie esigenze e preferenze. È anche possibile eliminare Sbizzy prima del termine della scadenza.

Sbizzy è un'applicazione già perfettamente funzionante e a disposizione di tutti. Abbiamo realizzato l'applicazione senza chiedere aiuti esterni e siamo felici del risultato ottenuto. Ora vorremmo portare Sbizzy anche su dispositivi Android e iOS ma per farlo ci serve un piccolo aiuto...il tuo!

Grazie al tuo sostegno Sbizzy potrà crescere ulteriormente e diventare un'App di riferimento per tutte quelle persone che vogliono mantenere la propria vita - e i propri contatti - privati. Diventa anche tu un sostenitore di Sbizzy!

column1: Keep in touch with other people without giving your phone number.
A number for all the occasions""

Sbizzy is the disposable number suitable for your needs, both for your private life and for your business. This number will be yours until you want. Do you need more than one number, maybe two or three? Do you need a disposable email as well? With Sbizzy everything is possible, and it is also easy! Soon it will become an App, ready to keep your privacy safe in time of need.

How many times you wanted to publish an ad online or on a newspaper and you did not want to leave your number because you were afraid of being called by a call centre? Now you can avoid it with a disposable Sbizzy number.

Are you tired of your job? Do you want to look for a new one without letting your boss know? With Sbizzy it is also possible to set your account and know which ad they are calling you from. Just select your privacy level so as to be called showing the associated Sbizzy number.

Do you want to get to know new people, have new adventures? Or maybe even meet your soul mate? Why not! Not always everything works as planned. Often we have to deal with insistent people, stalkers and dangerous situations. Sbizzy will keep your life confidential, without sharing your personal data with strangers.

When you register for the first time a Sbizzy number will be created and will be linked to your number. Each Sbizzy number has its own call list, customizable voice mail and the possibility to record incoming calls. Together with the number a disposable email will be given. Sbizzy numbers expire after 30 days, but if you want it is possible to renew them. It is also possible to delete Sbizzy before the expiring date.

In addition to the phone number, Sbizzy will let you link your email to a new Sbizzy email address. This new address is associated by default to your new Sbizzy number. In this way your inbox won’t be exposed to the spam.
Firstly, Sbizzy is very flexible because it allows the users recharge their number with Sbizzy credits, this system can satisfy all kinds of necessities. Secondly, a temporary email will be created
column2: it can be used instead of your personal address in order to keep a higher level of privacy. In addition it is possible to activate the “do not disturb” mode and add a customizable voice mail. It is also possible to record the calls and download the mp3 file later.

More than ever before, it has become common for people to carry and use more than one device throughout the day. Most people now have a laptop and a smartphone, spreading their tasks across these devices, using each one for different things: social media on their phones and work on their laptops. This is a wonderful part of our lives in the digital area, but it also brings about a new set of problems, problems that we never needed to face before. Namely – how do you keep both of these devices charged and safe?
Until now, it has been been tough to answer this question, forcing people to purchase multiple accessories and add-ons to do everything that they need to do.

Our solution is called LapZap, and it is going to set a new standard for laptop cases and wireless chargers. Instead of splitting these functions into multiple products, we have created an all-in-one, comprehensive case that features a wireless charger built-in. This means you can protect your laptop and carry it around wherever you go, all the while charging your smartphone. Forget about second-rate chargers and over-priced cases: this case does it all, saving you money and keeping you on the move.

LapZap draws power directly from your laptop's internal battery so that you do not need to worry about charging it up before you head out for the day. You can transport your laptop confidently and efficiently, knowing that whenever your smartphone starts to run low, you can let it ""borrow"" a little juice from your laptop. While this is already a popular concept for smartphone chargers, there is no such laptop case/wireless charging combo on the market yet. We have obtained a patent for our innovative design, and we are going to follow through on it properly, adhering to world-class craftsmanship standards.

Although we have priced LapZap affordably, we also think that it is important to keep the ongoing costs low, which is why there are no extras needed for our laptop case/wireless charging product. When you purchase LapZap, you receive everything that you need in a single package. That is the convenience and brilliance behind our design: we have left nothing out, integrating every part that you need to go about your device-enabled day!
Use Your Devices on Your Own Terms

When we applied for the LapZap patent, the process went smoothly because there is nothing else like this out there. This is an impressive stride for the laptop case market, enabling you to share power from your laptop to your smartphone so that you never end up with a low battery. Whichever of the two devices you need throughout the day, you can use them as much as you want to – ready for a recharge anytime and anywhere.

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute LapZap on a large scale. We also need to incorporate our company so that we can operate as a real business. To do all this, we are looking to raise ${42,000}, which will cover all the start-up costs that we are up against.

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering some exciting rewards, including discounts on LapZap – plus larger discounts on orders of two, three, five, and ten units.
Make your contribution now and help us bring our laptop case/wireless charging combo to people all around the world!

We are aware of how important manufacturing is for this product. Nothing short of perfection will do if we are going to make this the reliable, groundbreaking laptop case/wireless charging combo that we know it can be. We have already selected a manufacturing partner, and once we hit our minimum order levels, we will be able to move forward immediately. If we run into any logistical challenges along the way, we will be sure to keep all our contributors updated, sending out regular notes about the progress that we are making.

We will produce LapZap to support Macbook first, but in the long run, we would like to support any laptops that our customers use. If you need a case for your laptop, we want you to feel like LapZap has you covered. This is the first of many innovative products that we have planned, and if you contribute to this campaign, you will receive news any time we start work on another one. Our dedication to moving technology is strong, and we want to include you every step of the way.

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for LapZap by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother this launch will go. If you use a Macbook and an iPhone every day or you know someone else who does, this product could be life-changing. Let's spread the word so that everyone knows about it!
We appreciate all your support, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

  • You don't have to wait for it to be opened.

column1: No motor noise, the noise that scratch my nerves...

There is only one goal to achieve through 1PICK project. It is to help creating a safe and comfortable driving environment.

It is very dangerous to pay attention to mounting the mobile phone to the holder under the inevitable situation while driving.

Now, you don't need to look at it, don't need to wait.

Just move it nearby! Enjoy your safe driving now!

So far, there's been a deadly problem for the magnetic holders.

 

 

We had to put a big, ugly iron plate on the phone, Many people want to use the magnetic holders, but they have given up on using the magnetic holders because they don't want to attach the ugly things to their smartphones.

 

 

 

Which one would you attach?

We thought carefully that... if the ugly iron plate is the problem, then why don't we use the pretty one?

Now 1PICK Plate!

 

 

 

 

 

 

The most important virtue of the smartphone accessory is ""must be pretty and cool"".

For most people, smartphones have become an inseparable part of their daily lives and a fashion item that expresses them.
column2:
id=1tf4JrZYQImdIc9d9VKXBAW9we6B3y8H2"" src=""""/>

 

What does a car mean to you?

It may be your dream, a medium to express you and a precious being that brings convenience. We don't think anyone would want to ruin the interior of such a precious vehicle.

We think that good design is the concise one which can harmonize the complex things.

Magnetic holders are the best fit for that design. Because you don't need hands and feet to hold your smartphone!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1PICK changes the driving environment like this:

When we are boarding a car or getting off, when a call comes in or we are making a call, when we are bored waiting for a signal, we repeatedly hold and unhold the smartphones in the car.

Compare now. How is it different from your appearance?
column4:
id=1a8LOcGW4hUDfapAcWXCWWdH5CZuDfqLV"" src=""""/>

 

 

 

The core of wireless charging is the wireless charging module. Module performance is all about charging performance, safety and failure. Most of the problems such as fire, charging error and slow charging during wireless charging are actually due to unstable modules.

 

 

 Module can be charged even at a distance of 7mm

 

 

 

1PICK supports up to 10W of wireless charging.

It requires 15W wireless charging functionality for both transmitter and receiver to be fully compatible for normal 15W wireless charging. The fact that the wireless charger supports 15W does not mean that all smartphones will be 15W wireless charging and even smartphones that support 15W wireless charging may vary depending on the 'standard' used. Even though the smartphone manufacture's 'original specification' has 15W fast wireless charging technology, most third-party wireless chargers do not charge 15W.

In short, most wireless charger specs you know and buy are 15W, but there is no difference in actual charging speed.
column10:
id=1znhjg9KiEoWTLXEIcU5qsZddXohZ99y0"" src=""""/>

 

 

 

 

We prepared the event!

Thanks for interest in our product! We prepared the event for early bird backers.

We will add a power outlet to your package if you help us to bring our product to more and more people. You can post our page link to your social media and send the link to at least 3 of your family/friends through any messaging apps (sms, messenger, whatsapp etc).

You can post the below content to your social media page and send it to at least 3 people of your family/friends.

 

""1PICK - The new fast magnetic wireless car phone charger.

https://bit.ly/2CCWrwV""

 

After that, please send us a message with the screenshots or social media link to let us confirm.  Thank you very much! (The post must be 'public', not 'private' or 'only to the friends')

 

 

 

 

 

 

","Simplicity and Objectivity.

column9: >Microscopy is one of most fundamental disciplines for exploring the incredible diversity of life from its very bottom. µPeek invites you to start discovering the fascinating microcosm in a uniquely simple, yet powerful way.
column15:
s=7ecdbd1de63f942c764fa248f1f95272"" src="""" style=""""/>

What is µPeek?
column21:
s=77bd7779e725373c9877713fa279ff83"" src="""" style=""""/>

µPeek is a sleek gadget that lets users perform microscopy with their smartphones in an equally abundant and artistic way as they do photography. µPeek is the first smartphone microscope that combines the functionality of a full-fledged microscope with pleasing aesthetics, true everyday portability and user-friendly operation via an Android/iOS App.
column22: >
column27:
s=10f5a56e7c5c4b8c8422e28bc745d8b2"" src="""" style=""""/>

The Swiss-Army Knife of Microscopes
column35: >Despite its sleek form factor µPeek is full of technology. A motorized 4-element lens creates undistorted high-quality images and sophisticated illumination optics put your specimen in the right light. Everything wirelessly controlled by the supplied App.
column41:
s=2df3f33848b7d1f4492112c5ac01cd89"" src="""" style=""""/>

For example, while focusing with competing products generally involves painful manual adjustments, µPeek lets the in-built motor do the job. Meanwhile, keep your device calm and take razor-sharp images that suffice both your scientific AND artistic curiosity.
column47:
s=cbf59cd8343a21a48bec540c38d31933"" src="""" style=""""/>

µPeek supports work with standardized microscope slides by providing a precision slide holder with every µPeek delivered. The holder fixes the slide in position and contains surface regions that improve the uniformity of specimen illumination in the different microscopy modes. With your µPeek you will receive a set of empty slides and a guide to easy specimen preparation.
column55:
>A Companion that Doesn't Fall Apart

Because portability is one of µPeek’s main deliverables, the slide holder has been designed to seamlessly merge with µPeek into a single device. Simply stick the slide holder to the sticky tape and hold both pieces in place. Conventiently, this also protects the sticky tape from collecting dirt.
column63: >
column68:
s=d5c92f5d1e5cd97d7308df3aa75c0714"" src="""" style=""""/>

Added Features

column1:
How Does it Work?

µPeek works in a simple and convenient way with almost any specimen that catches your attention. To get started it is suggested that you place µPeek straight onto your subject of interest. This way you create a stable platform and directly move into a good focus position. When working with a slide, you best place it into the slide holder first. µPeek can then be moved along the specimen without touching it.
column7: >Utilizing µPeek with a prepared microscope slide and neatly put it away after use.

column2:
>

International Shipping - EU-Friendly Fulfillment

We understand that high shipping costs can be a major concern on crowdfunding platforms. Especially EU citizens are often surprised by the duty to pay large sums for VAT and administrative charges at delivery of their much anticipated product
column3:
because it was not included in their pledge. The duty to pay VAT cannot be omitted. However, by importing products in a bulk shipment to the EU, we can save you excessive administrative charges as all VAT and customs are paid by us. Within the EU the parcels can be individually forwarded at low cost and arrive at your doorstep without any surprises. Pledged sums of EU citizens include VAT in the highlighted shipping costs!

For any shipments to the US or other international locations we have done our best to minimize shipping costs. Unfortunately we cannot take care of customs in countries outside the EU (despite Switzerland) but luckily the tax burden outside the EU is generally much lower. In the US, for example, there is a 200$ tax-free threshold that µPeek can slip through.
column4: >
column9:
s=ca6c1d305aaf8b8ee5eae4e34bbbe831"" src="""" style=""""/>

Size Matters

Not much larger than a credit card and about half the thickness of an average smartphone, µPeek comfortably disappears into any pocket and snugly fits into your wallet. Available whenever you find an opportunity to explore and capture your environment, µPeek opens up an entirely new way of satisfying your curiosity.
column11:
>

Attachment - Sleek and Simple

When designing µPeek, we deliberately decided against having a smartphone-specific attachment case. Instead, µPeek comes with a thin layer of carefully selected adhesive. The elastic sticky tape conforms to your smartphone and detaches again without leaving traces. This form of attachment is universally applicable, aesthetic and saves space. To check if your smartphone is compatible with µPeek, please visit this page. The list on this page is not final, and chances are good that a smartphone not yet listed there is still compatible with µPeek. 

Every µPeek will come with all three sticky pad types! Hence, you don't have to make up your head about which one is most suitable for you. Just try them as you get your device. And in order to provide best compatibility for today's and future phones of yours, the sticky pads are exchangeable.
column17: >Attaching µPeek to your smartphone and removing it again. All done in less than ten seconds.
column24:
>

The µPeek App 

µPeek was not made to be an unintelligent auxiliary device. It has been created to empower you with full control via our proprietary Android/iOS Apps. µPeek features a low-energy Bluetooth module for quick connection to your smartphone. Once connected, you can use the App to control light and focus, and of course take and share pictures and videos as you go.

µPeek’s innovative (patent-pending) illumination design allows performing several distinctive modes of microscopy. Besides standard bright-field microscopy, µPeek handles dark-field and fluorescence (only µPeek Blue) microscopy, as well as polarized illumination. These advanced techniques are used by experts to highlight different visual aspects, and in fact create beautiful variations of one and the same specimen. µPeek democratizes access to these techniques and lets users experience nature in all its facets.
