column1: At Scrona, the micro- and nanoworld fascinate us! And we want to share our enthusiasm with the world. Our vision is for µPeek to enable education at schools and for individuals. We plan to build a community where people share their pictures and exchange their findings on optimal illumination settings. We would be delighted if this could encourage remote diagnostics or simply introduce people to the full beauty of life.
Why we created µPeek - A Story of Opportunity

Scrona was initially founded to commercialize a novel 3D inkjet printing technology, which is the highest-resolution inkjet-based technology that exists to date. To showcase the printed nanoscale features, we needed a portable, yet powerful microscope. This simply didn’t exist at the time… and triggered the conception of µPeek.

To our great satisfaction, we found that early prototypes of µPeek not only solved our problems, but also generated overwhelming interest and fascination. We suddenly realized how cool our creation really was! The entrepreneurial mindset took its own course. We decided to improve this device and transform it into a stand-alone product.

After months of additional development, µPeek was released to the Kickstarter community, achieved almost 200% of its funding goal and is now available for pre-order on Indiegogo inDemand. We believe that crowdfunding platforms like indiegogo are ‘the‘ places where ideas and innovation are valued above all. Therefore, we not only want to sell a great product to you
column2: but involve you further. By pledging to our campaign, you will also support the further development of our 3D printing technology, helping us bring it from an early stage to a funding-ready technology platform, which can eventually hit the market, creating a strong impact. Scrona is currently also participating in a call for a European Project, with more than ten industrial partners throughout Europe and the US. For more information about our revolutionary printing technology – for example on how it could be used to manufacture flexible displays – visit www.scrona.com.

A Truly Unique Perk: Complement Your µPeek with Your Personal Microscopic Image

column1: You are looking for a really unique and beautiful perk to further expand the usefulness of your µPeek? Fresh from the lab you can now send your personal image into the realm of the microcosm.

Using a novel 3D nanoprinting technology we will create what even upscale computer chip fabrication processes wouldn’t realize. Your image will be condensed to the size of a single grain of salt, made of pure gold or fluorescent nanoparticles. Only visible as a blinking dot to the naked eye, you can use your µPeek to fully reveal the images and seriously impress your friends.

Micro Image Text: This perk features a text of up to 30 letters, made of gold. You can choose to have two text pieces printed on top of each other (e.g. the name of you and your spouse) and use the µPeek light polarization option to either show one or the other text piece (works by virtue of the internal nanostructure of the image).

Micro Image Gold: This perk features a brilliant image of your personal choice printed in pure gold. 256 brightness levels are achieved by printing fine gold lines and varying their average thickness with sub-nanometer accuracy. Absolutely unique!

Micro Image Record: Get your personalized World Record Image in color. Quite simply, no other manufacturing technology could do it! Three layers of red, green and blue fluorescent nanoparticles are aligned with highest precision to create a true-to-life color micro image.

Having first met during their PhD studies at ETH Zurich, Julian and Patrick created amazing technology already before conceiving µPeek. Their fascination for disrupting complex technology, particularly in micro- and nanotechnology, brought them together with ETH computer science graduate Martin Schmid with whom they founded Scrona. Besides counting on engineering knowledge from one of the world’s top10 engineering schools, Scrona’s founders are lucky to count on the experience of their close business advisors and board members, including Swiss entrepreneur of the Year Martin Ziehbrunner and serial entrepreneur Anil Sethi.

It certainly is most important to state that µPeek works! All exemplary pictures shown throughout this campaign have been taken with our most recent prototypes (besides the clown fishes of our world record), by use of the alpha version of our Android App.

We’ve put in lots of time, effort, and last but not the least, passion, into this project. Needless to say, we strongly believe in µPeek– and the fact that a lot of monetary investment has gone into product development and patents proves our faith and intent.

We are driven to get this product to you on time. However, not even our typically Swiss urge for punctuality can fully protect us from doing humanly mistakes or crashing into unforeseen difficulties, any of which could delay shipment. As much as we want to stand up to our promise, we realize it is a demanding hardware project and if anything goes haywire we will always keep you updated in a timely manner.

","Microscopy is one of most fundamental disciplines for exploring the incredible diversity of life from its very bottom. µPeek invites you to start discovering the fascinating microcosm in a uniquely simple, yet powerful way.What is µPeek?µPeek is a sleek gadget that lets users perform microscopy with their smartphones in an equally abundant and artistic way as they do photography. µPeek is the first smartphone microscope that combines the functionality of a full-fledged microscope with pleasing aesthetics, true everyday portability and user-friendly operation via an Android/iOS App.Magnification series using smartphone zoomThe Swiss-Army Knife of MicroscopesDespite its sleek form factor µPeek is full of technology. A motorized 4-element lens creates undistorted high-quality images and sophisticated illumination optics put your specimen in the right light. Everything wirelessly controlled by the supplied App.For example, while focusing with competing products generally involves painful manual adjustments, µPeek lets the in-built motor do the job. Meanwhile, keep your device calm and take razor-sharp images that suffice both your scientific AND artistic curiosity.µPeek supports work with standardized microscope slides by providing a precision slide holder with every µPeek delivered. The holder fixes the slide in position and contains surface regions that improve the uniformity of specimen illumination in the different microscopy modes. With your µPeek you will receive a set of empty slides and a guide to easy specimen preparation.A Companion that Doesn't Fall ApartBecause portability is one of µPeek’s main deliverables, the slide holder has been designed to seamlessly merge with µPeek into a single device. Simply stick the slide holder to the sticky tape and hold both pieces in place. Conventiently, this also protects the sticky tape from collecting dirt.µPeek PersonalizedDon’t like golden yellow? No problem! Choose from another four colors and give µPeek your personal touchAdded Features

How Does it Work?µPeek works in a simple and convenient way with almost any specimen that catches your attention. To get started it is suggested that you place µPeek straight onto your subject of interest. This way you create a stable platform and directly move into a good focus position. When working with a slide, you best place it into the slide holder first. µPeek can then be moved along the specimen without touching it.Utilizing µPeek with a prepared microscope slide and neatly put it away after use.Rewards

International Shipping - EU-Friendly FulfillmentWe understand that high shipping costs can be a major concern on crowdfunding platforms. Especially EU citizens are often surprised by the duty to pay large sums for VAT and administrative charges at delivery of their much anticipated product
column2: because it was not included in their pledge. The duty to pay VAT cannot be omitted. However, by importing products in a bulk shipment to the EU, we can save you excessive administrative charges as all VAT and customs are paid by us. Within the EU the parcels can be individually forwarded at low cost and arrive at your doorstep without any surprises. Pledged sums of EU citizens include VAT in the highlighted shipping costs!For any shipments to the US or other international locations we have done our best to minimize shipping costs. Unfortunately we cannot take care of customs in countries outside the EU (despite Switzerland) but luckily the tax burden outside the EU is generally much lower. In the US, for example, there is a 200$ tax-free threshold that µPeek can slip through.Micrographs of tissue sections and rock samples taken by µPeekSize MattersNot much larger than a credit card and about half the thickness of an average smartphone, µPeek comfortably disappears into any pocket and snugly fits into your wallet. Available whenever you find an opportunity to explore and capture your environment, µPeek opens up an entirely new way of satisfying your curiosity. Attachment - Sleek and SimpleWhen designing µPeek, we deliberately decided against having a smartphone-specific attachment case. Instead, µPeek comes with a thin layer of carefully selected adhesive. The elastic sticky tape conforms to your smartphone and detaches again without leaving traces. This form of attachment is universally applicable, aesthetic and saves space. To check if your smartphone is compatible with µPeek, please visit this page. The list on this page is not final, and chances are good that a smartphone not yet listed there is still compatible with µPeek. Every µPeek will come with all three sticky pad types! Hence, you don't have to make up your head about which one is most suitable for you. Just try them as you get your device. And in order to provide best compatibility for today's and future phones of yours, the sticky pads are exchangeable.Attaching µPeek to your smartphone and removing it again. All done in less than ten seconds.And what if the sticky pad loses grip? Rinse it under a stream of water, as µPeek is fully splash proof.The µPeek App µPeek was not made to be an unintelligent auxiliary device. It has been created to empower you with full control via our proprietary Android/iOS Apps. µPeek features a low-energy Bluetooth module for quick connection to your smartphone. Once connected, you can use the App to control light and focus, and of course take and share pictures and videos as you go.On the inside - LED dimming via µPeek App

One and the same specimen section imaged with different illumination modesBy selectively dimming µPeek’s light sources, you can individually tune any of the different microscopy modes separately with our App. Personalize the outcome of your observations by combining the information of all available microscopy modes into your favorite visual setting.
Plant leaf as seen with different illuminations
µPeek Blue - A True Expert Package

Equipped with UV lights and a UV cut-off filter µPeek Blue masters fluorescence microscopy. µPeek Blue integrates almost all professionally relevant microscopy modes. As an all-round tool µPeek Blue enhances laboratory environments or can be used for quality control in industry. To non-professional users µPeek Blue provides the ultimate exploratory experience. For example, investigate the fluorescent materials on bank notes, or those naturally found in plants or minerals.
Fluorescent micro beads in a liquid manipulated by a magnet

When combined with a smartphone µPeek offers magnification of approximately 30x – 300x, depending on the smartphone used and the chosen zoom factor. Courtesy of its high-quality optics images remain undistorted and sharp across the whole range of magnification. In terms of image quality µPeek closely aligns with the performance of professional microscopes but – at comparable resolution power – it can offer larger viewable areas (i.e. field-of view).

µPeek is the first platform that opens up the full diversity of microscopy at an affordable price tag. Compared to conventional microscopes with a similar breath of functionality, µPeek equips a whole classroom at the cost of a single device.
If you like µPeek as much as we do you may be interested in hearing that you can buy about two dozen of them at the price of a functionally similar lab microscope

At Scrona, the micro- and nanoworld fascinate us! And we want to share our enthusiasm with the world. Our vision is for µPeek to enable education at schools and for individuals. We plan to build a community where people share their pictures and exchange their findings on optimal illumination settings. We would be delighted if this could encourage remote diagnostics or simply introduce people to the full beauty of life.
Why we created µPeek - A Story of Opportunity

Scrona was initially founded to commercialize a novel 3D inkjet printing technology, which is the highest-resolution inkjet-based technology that exists to date. To showcase the printed nanoscale features, we needed a portable, yet powerful microscope. This simply didn’t exist at the time… and triggered the conception of µPeek.

To our great satisfaction, we found that early prototypes of µPeek not only solved our problems, but also generated overwhelming interest and fascination. We suddenly realized how cool our creation really was! The entrepreneurial mindset took its own course. We decided to improve this device and transform it into a stand-alone product.

After months of additional development, µPeek was released to the Kickstarter community, achieved almost 200% of its funding goal and is now available for pre-order on Indiegogo inDemand. We believe that crowdfunding platforms like indiegogo are ‘the‘ places where ideas and innovation are valued above all. Therefore, we not only want to sell a great product to you

For everyone who is pledging for the Zunion, will get the New model
On average we breathe around 26,000 times the whole day...
Every time we breathe, we don’t only absorb oxygen, but also pollutants. We tend to believe that indoor air is clean and safe but the truth is far from that.
We often spent our time in the living room, kitchen or bedroom

Indoor pollution can be two to five times higher than outdoor. These levels of contamination are alarming since we spend nearly 90% of our time inside rooms, whether at work or at home. Furniture, cigarettes, household appliances, and even textiles can spread harmful gasses that pollute indoors air. Even though you think your safe indoors, the truth is… that you’re not.
Ever bought an air purifier that left you feeling dissatisfied because you felt no difference? That confusion regarding air purifiers is exactly what we wanted to end.
After lots of research and testing, we finally designed the Zunion, a Modern Hybrid Air Purifier.
Zunion comes with a range of functionalities
Zunion is an air purifier, charger and has a smart USB port to connect an USB fan, USB humidifier and USB LED light.
Zunion removes 97% of ultra fine dust using HEFA Filter, a natural Anti-Allergy Filter.
It will release over 3 million negatively charged ions thanks to its Anion releaser. Normally found in nature, anions help clear harmful airborne particles.
Zunion purifies the surrounding air 100 times more than a forest and 60 times more than a waterfall.
Sterilization: Salmonella, Colon bacteria, Streptococcus, Pneumonia. MSR Anti-Allergy: Mite, pollen, suppress the allergy reaction. Deodorization: smoke, odor.

Silent Fan (Dual Level) 80mm

Zunion comes with a large fan that covers a large area of 25 square meters

 

Artificial intelligent mode

There are three different modes: Turbo Mode / Normal Mode / Sleep Mode (Silent Mode)

After 8 seconds without light, the illumination Sensor changes to Sleep Mode.

 

When there is no light, only Anions activate. When light returns, it goes back to the previous mode.
column2:
>

Smart USB Port

With the smart USB port, you can control the device on/off.

Connection possibilities: USB Mood LED, USB Fan, USB Portable Humidifier etc
column4:
>Old Version                                                         New Version

 

Power Supply (5V/9V)

Zunion can be used as a home charger, car charger, NoteBook, PC or backup battery.

2500mA Battery: Silent Mode-36 Hr, Normal Mode-16 Hr, Turbo Mode-14 Hr
column5:
>

Internal Wireless Charger (IA-350W)

The IA-350W comes with a Wireless Charger. 

It's possible to charge your mobile phone with the Wireless Charger support.

Supported devices: Qi type

Galaxy Note7/Note5/S8/S8Plus/S7/S7 Edge/S6/S6 Edge/S6 Edge+ 

Recommend over 2A
column6:
>

In-Vehicle Purifier

You can use Zunion everywhere, even in your car!

It filters odor, toxic substance and exhaust fume.
column7:
>

Kitchen Purifier

With Zunion you can eliminate the fine dust and germs while cooking.

FaQ

New Version Will Shipping  10 / 2017

Each Zunion include 1set Filter. (Not Replacement 5set)

Wireless Charging Support : Qi type.

column1: • It can be portable when connected with a micro 5 pin external battery.
• Does it produce ion in sleep mode?
• Yes, it does produce ion in sleep mode.
• It makes an electrifying sound. Is that ok?
• It's the sound of ionization. That 's quite normal.
• It may seem unstable when a proper port is not connected.
• Because this product ionizes, electric static may occur.
• It doesn't produce a lot of noise, so it is possible to use during sleep.
• It produces less than 0.05ppm. It's less than standard ozone allowance of 0.06ppm.
• Is it possible to use it in the living room?
• It is recommended to use a bigger Air Purifier for the living room.
• The Zunion Air Purifier covers a large area of 25 square meters.
• Is it possible to use washable filter or permanent filter?
• It is better not to use filter too long because it collect dust on daily basis.

It is better not to use filter too long because it collect dust on daily basis.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign
My name is Sian-Ee Goh and am an Electrical Engineer from Oklahoma State University,  USA.
It bugs me when I observe many unsurpulous manufacturers exploiting customers:

(1) There are many 3rd party  USB power adaptors that are poorly designed with over-exaggerated specification.   These adaptors run the risk of power overload which is extremely hazardous.   I have encountered an common 3rd party adaptor that is specified at 1.5A but is already overloaded at 0.5A!   Have you encountered adaptors that are hot to the touch?

(2) poor quality 3rd party Charging Cable.   Many charging cables in the market are largely plastic with little wire thus high impedence.  The high impedence cause the cable to charge slow, if at all.  Some of these poor quality cable even have the audacity to claim that they can charge 3X to 10X faster.   LMAO.
(3) Some 10,000mAh power banks are selling at half the price of others.  But wait, are they really 10,000mAh?
1. Checks Temperature of Both Power Adaptor and Phone

Prufen Cables contains 2 temperature sensors at both ends of the cable.  Now you can measure the temperature of your power adaptor as well as your phone.  Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when temperature reached 55 deg C for normal charging and 65 deg C for high power charging (eg. Fast Charge and iPad)
USB specification is 5V.   If the voltage of the adaptor is less than 4.5V,  it means the power adaptor is overloaded.  Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when the voltage goes below 4.5V.
Video Show Prufen Detects Power Adaptor Overload
Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when it detect Current goes beyond 2.4A
Video Showing Prufen Detecting Current Over Limit

Now you can measure the mAh specification of your powerbanks and mobiles.   The below 2 video clips show how you can use Prufen Smart Cable to validate the mAh of your power banks and also test the condition of your battery in your mobile.
Use Prufen to check mAh of Power Bank
Use Prufen to Check Condition of Battery in Phone
User can set Timer Shutdown ON or OFF.   Can set timer: 2,4,6,8,10 hours.

There cables that claim to auto-shut down when battery is charged.  These cables usually use ""low current"" to determine if the phone is charged.  Unfortunately not all ""low current"" of phones are the same.  Users may see that these cables stop prematurely or they may not stop at all.  Having a timer shutdown is a better solution.
Hear it from actual international Backers who have used the product.  Please visit:
(the website is still undergoing construction so not all buttons work).
Let's have none of those cheapie cables that are largely plastic and hardly cable.  Prufen wires are tin-plated to prevent corrosion and shielded to prevent EMI.
The connector at the bottom looks familiar?   Prufen wants to solve this problem by:
1. making whole connector molded as a single robust 1-piece
2.  making the the ""skin"" of the wire thicker.  (please see cross-section of Prufen Cable above).  Notice how thin is the ""skin"" of the bottom cable.
Type of display used.  Many of the copy product uses cheap out-dated LCD display.  Prufen uses expensive but superior OLED display. Google OLED if you want to know more about OLED.
Prufen Lightning Adapor is Apple MFI approved.  To validate this claim please go
11. Patents, FCC and CE Safety Conformity
Prufen filed patents in 2015 and currently they are patent pending.  Patent number pendings:  14/892.966  104136824  050401
Prufen conforms to CE (cert. no. CTL1610244101-EC) and FCC (cert. no. CTL1611184201-FC).

1. We would like to sell our product in Indiegogo to determine the potential demand in key markets. With this information and fund, we can then approach key physical and online retailers with our Indeigogo data.

2. Being a World's 1st category of product, it is absolutely critical to explain to potential customers of the product features. No customers will understand the product just by looking at it (unlike familiar products e.g. headphone, speaker, power bank...etc).  Indiegogo will allow us to test our existing marketing material (presented in this webpage).   When gaps are identified, we need funds to develop and invest in more marketing materials for both physical and online sales.

It bugs me when I observe many unsurpulous manufacturers exploiting customers:

(1) There are many 3rd party  USB power adaptors that are poorly designed with over-exaggerated specification.   These adaptors run the risk of power overload which is extremely hazardous.   I have encountered an common 3rd party adaptor that is specified at 1.5A but is already overloaded at 0.5A!   Have you encountered adaptors that are hot to the touch?

(2) poor quality 3rd party Charging Cable.   Many charging cables in the market are largely plastic with little wire thus high impedence.  The high impedence cause the cable to charge slow, if at all.  Some of these poor quality cable even have the audacity to claim that they can charge 3X to 10X faster.   LMAO.
(3) Some 10,000mAh power banks are selling at half the price of others.  But wait, are they really 10,000mAh?
1. Checks Temperature of Both Power Adaptor and Phone

Prufen Cables contains 2 temperature sensors at both ends of the cable.  Now you can measure the temperature of your power adaptor as well as your phone.  Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when temperature reached 55 deg C for normal charging and 65 deg C for high power charging (eg. Fast Charge and iPad)
Video Showing Prufen Detects Temperature Overheating
USB specification is 5V.   If the voltage of the adaptor is less than 4.5V,  it means the power adaptor is overloaded.  Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when the voltage goes below 4.5V.
Video Show Prufen Detects Power Adaptor Overload
Prufen Smart Cable automatically shuts down when it detect Current goes beyond 2.4A
Video Showing Prufen Detecting Current Over Limit

Now you can measure the mAh specification of your powerbanks and mobiles.   The below 2 video clips show how you can use Prufen Smart Cable to validate the mAh of your power banks and also test the condition of your battery in your mobile.
Use Prufen to check mAh of Power Bank
Use Prufen to Check Condition of Battery in Phone
User can set Timer Shutdown ON or OFF.   Can set timer: 2,4,6,8,10 hours.

There cables that claim to auto-shut down when battery is charged.  These cables usually use ""low current"" to determine if the phone is charged.  Unfortunately not all ""low current"" of phones are the same.  Users may see that these cables stop prematurely or they may not stop at all.  Having a timer shutdown is a better solution.
Hear it from actual international Backers who have used the product.  Please visit:
(the website is still undergoing construction so not all buttons work).
Let's have none of those cheapie cables that are largely plastic and hardly cable.  Prufen wires are tin-plated to prevent corrosion and shielded to prevent EMI.
The connector at the bottom looks familiar?   Prufen wants to solve this problem by:
1. making whole connector molded as a single robust 1-piece
2.  making the the ""skin"" of the wire thicker.  (please see cross-section of Prufen Cable above).  Notice how thin is the ""skin"" of the bottom cable.
Type of display used.  Many of the copy product uses cheap out-dated LCD display.  Prufen uses expensive but superior OLED display. Google OLED if you want to know more about OLED.
Prufen Lightning Adapor is Apple MFI approved.  To validate this claim please go
11. Patents, FCC and CE Safety Conformity
Prufen filed patents in 2015 and currently they are patent pending.  Patent number pendings:  14/892.966  104136824  050401
Prufen conforms to CE (cert. no. CTL1610244101-EC) and FCC (cert. no. CTL1611184201-FC).

1. We would like to sell our product in Indiegogo to determine the potential demand in key markets. With this information and fund, we can then approach key physical and online retailers with our Indeigogo data.

2. Being a World's 1st category of product, it is absolutely critical to explain to potential customers of the product features. No customers will understand the product just by looking at it (unlike familiar products e.g. headphone, speaker, power bank...etc).  Indiegogo will allow us to test our existing marketing material (presented in this webpage).   When gaps are identified, we need funds to develop and invest in more marketing materials for both physical and online sales.",15.0,5,"1 Campaign

Spilled a drink on your phone? Dropped it in the tub or even the toilet? No problem. WaterSeal’s revolutionary nano-technology process protects your phone and keeps it safe from accidental water damage- all without a case!

We all know someone that has lost a Smartphone due to water damage, from a drop in the tub or toilet, or even talking in the rain. Replacing your smartphone is expensive, time-consuming and frustrating
column2: the loss of your phone’s use is one of the biggest inconveniences.

column1: WaterSeal Technology was started when Craig Dunn's beloved iPhone accidentally plummeted to the bottom of a  hot tub- triggering the notion that we should be able to protect against this.  WaterSeal is very much a true start-up company
column2: bootstrap funded by two Calgarians, Craig Dunn and Mike Wellwood, who after a ton of research and development work, created a unique process that fully protects your smartphone from accidental water damage. This process is unique in the industry as we treat the inside of the
growing a microscopically thin layer of

column1: translucent, waterproof material, right onto the inside of the smartphone. The result: No bulky case & no loss of functionality. We guarantee that water protection for the life of your phone.

Our biggest challenge to date has been making sure we could do what we say we can do,  fully protect your smartphone from the accidental water damage that happen in daily life. Our early stage product was a straightforward technical solution to treatment but it offered very limited protection.  We had to go back to the drawing board and build a better treatment methodology and while MANY smartphones were gravely harmed in the perfecting of WaterSeal’s service, we’ve done it. All WaterSealed phones can survive a short submersion unharmed (we call it the toilet test: 30 seconds at 30 centimeters!).

WaterSeal has done extensive R&D and  has currently established a successful methodology for treating some of the best smartphones on the market, including iPhone 4, 4S & 5, and Samsung Galaxy and Discover and Blackberry Bold. We are continuing to add new phones (including the Q10 & Z10 Blackberries) to the list as our R&D and “Torture Testing“ continue.

The feedback to the initial product has been AMAZING, and we already have stories from our existing customers about how WaterSeal saved their phone from their adventures.  Our phones have survived fly-fishing adventures, swims with a goldfish, beer pint accidents, and even a swim in the Bow River in Calgary.  However, we want to be able to make WaterSeal Technology available across Canada, so that all Canadians can fearlessly take their smartphones on all their adventures.

We started this campaign to help fund our R&D program, to be able to add more devices to the list of smartphones we can protect and to help us to be able to provide our service nationally.  We hope to be able to build out our ""Ship to"" model for customers outside Calgary, and then to license our technology to cities across Canada and USA. We want to improve the turnaround time for getting customers' phones back to them so that they are only without their phones for hours and not days.

The first $5,000 in funds raised is going towards the integration of our shipping program and website integration to ensure that your phones are shipped safely and timely.  Any further funding will allow us to develop our licensing program and continue R&D on new models of phones. Every dollar counts and will allow us to add more devices to the mix (we are currently looking at Tablets and Point of Sale Devices). Your Smartphone is your Best Friend: Protect It!
A few interesting facts about smartphone damage: (by SquareTrade research)
Americans have spent $7.2 Billion on damaged Android phones & $5.9 billion spent on damaged iPhones.
As Americans integrate their phones into an increasing number of daily routines and habits, accidental damage is 10-13x more common than loss and theft.
Half of American parents say kids have damaged a mobile phone, laptop or tablet and 33% of kid-caused accidents involved food or drink.
30% of iPhone owners have experienced accidental damage in last year & 18% of those were immersed in liquid and 9% of those were a liquid spill.
Half of iPhone users under 35 have had an accident.
9% of iPhone owners have dropped their phone in the toilet & 5% in the washing machine.
The Team to take it to the Finish Line:

The co-founders Mike Wellwood and Craig Dunn are both serial entrepreneurs with a history of innovative start-ups in technology, energy and finance. We are very happy to be able to work together on this incredible project. We have also built an incredible support team of some of the brightest folks in
finance, marketing and technology and they have helped us get to where we are
today. We have been very lucky that many on our team strongly believed in the
potential of WaterSeal Technology. We are very excited to bring this service to market and appreciate any community support to make that happen.
Photo Courtesy of Calgary Herald: WaterSeal Technology - Startup of the Week, September 2013. WaterSeal News

Network is a mash-up of the best features from popular social media sites. Masego aims for the professionalism of LinkedIn, the trending influence of Twitter, the social interaction of Facebook,  the random discovery of Stumbled Upon and Chat Roulette, and the artistic touch of Instagram. Think of it as an Angie's List for the Arts.

Network uses detailed algorithms and pictorial analysis to scan a social media database for locally trending artists, entrepreneurs, businesses and events. If people are tweeting about talent, Network will find it.

>This is where the stumble upon element comes into play. Handpicked users and content on Network are thrown into one area and are randomly displayed for users. Discovering a new artist becomes an experience again. The content that appears on the Discover page will set the standard for content expected on Network.

column1: Network has it’s own search engine. The beauty of this lies in the database your search results are taken from. When you search for something, posts from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc, concerning your topic will be in your search results. Targeted, Personal and Innovative.

Talents and entrepreneurs are not easily found in a local area. They are hiding away in clicks of their own. Google has never heard of them but they have a fans on the social networks. They have happy customers or clients. Network will find the gems in the community and expose them to a fresh new audience.

Introducing the Stone, a smart remote for your phone and smart devices. It is a tiny device that controls any app on your smartphone with a single button and helps finds lost items. Simplify your life with one button for it all: take a selfie, upload it to Facebook, share your location, turn your lights off from bed, and much more.Smarten up your home, your keychain and your life with natural sleek Stones.
For those group pics when your arm isn't long enough.
Or, put it on anything to get alerted before you leave it behind like your re-usable grocery bags, umbrella,  jacket at a restaurant, or water bottle at the gym.
Set notifications for if things become too warm like your car, garage, or wine cellar.
Send pre-loaded texts like ""On my way"" or ""Running late"" without using your phone. It's safe, not to mention legal!
Ever feel uneasy on your walk home?
On your walk home, have the button set to let your friends or family know where you are or call 911. Have the peace of mind that help is only a discrete press away.
Misplacing your keys—or anything really—can quickly throw an unwanted kink in your day. With the Stone, you can prevent this from happening in the first place.
The Button can be set to 2 different control levels:
Manual - Use the app to manually select the TWO actions you want to happen when the button is pressed
column2: quickly press or hold the button down (2 seconds).

column1: Automatic - preset the action to auto-change based on the time of day.
In this example, we  change the Stone's Quick Press command from ordering a pizza to an S.O.S. Emergency.
(Left Image) Select the Edit Icon on the Main Screen. The Main Screen has two customizable options tied to the Stone's Press Types: Click and Hold.
(Right Image) Find the desired recipe and select it. Once the recipe is confirmed, your Stone will be set to command that action until you change it.

The Stone is powered by a Bluetooth Low Energy iBeacon, a standard certified by Apple, that allows your smart phone to natively detect your Stone without running the app at all! By pressing the button you activate the Stone's iBeacon communication which automatically interacts with any BLE platform nearby (your phone - iOS or Android), automatically letting them know its proximity and triggering the commands you pre-established.

The Shortcut button works by using IFTTT logic: If This Then That. IFTTT simply states that if circumstances are this, then the action desired will be that. That is called a recipe. For example, one recipe would be, ""If I am leaving my driveway and press my Stone's button, I want the house doors to lock."" There are a million things you can do with this. If you would like to learn more you can find the IFTTT explanation here. What you need to know is that the Stone can be an ingredient (channel) in any of those recipes you decide to create there.
from a rugged ABS material to make the Stone water resistant, yet still allow
you to replace the long lasting battery. Diameter: 28mm, Thickness: 10mm

2. PCBBluetooth low energy (BLE) microprocessor, a motion sensing switch, a momentary push button switch, an on-chip diode temperature sensor. The BLE microprocessor transmits within the advertisement band of the 40 BLE channels that span from 2.402 GHz to 2.480 GHz in 2 MHz spacing.
Lithium Ion CR2032 coin-cell battery for a long and extended life of 6 months or longer if you take off tracking mode.
Device Compatibility: iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, and Android devices with 4.4 or above.

We have been working on the Stone for the past few months and we've come a long way. The hardware is close to done with most of the DFM work already made. With a successful campaign we will start ordering the tools needed to initiate tooling and manufacturing. We will be working closely with our now tried-and-tested manufacturers to make sure that everything runs as smoothly as possible and you get your Stones on time. Thank you!

Our products are the simple fixes to problems in our own lives and we feel very blessed to be able to share them with you and hopefully make your lives a little easier as well. We design and build our products in house so that we can control every single aspect of product development and manufacturing as well as control the cost as best we can.

Carying power banks, cables and memory separately is outdated! 
We believe that every power bank should have integrated charge/sync cable and memory card reader. That is exact reason why we developed world's first smart multi-functional mobile phone gadget with integrated cable, memory card reader and smart power bank features.

Our customers worldwide are delighted with QIUB and you should check why! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Recommended by:

column6: >WHY HAVE WE DEVELOPED QIUB?

column1: As you can probably relate, carrying around big chargers, flash memory drives and cables every day can be a huge hassle.

column2: >What if there was one device that could hold it all?

column1: QIUB is a multi functional device with an integrated cable and memory card reader that replaces the need to carry multiple phone accessories.
Once you start using the QIUB you will never use any other cable or power bank!

column4: >QIUB WILL REPLACE THE NEED TO CARRY SEVERAL DEVICES!

column3: >With QIUB, we challenged our team to revolutionize
column4: > the functions of a regular power bank and re-think a way to replace the need to carry several devices.

column3: >Our goal is to revolutionize the way people use power banks and we believe that every power bank should have integrated cable, extra features and be small, practical and easy to use!

column4: >We developed a smart product that is multi functional, durable, compact, lightweight and, above all, practical.
>Here is the quote from friend that used QIUB for few weeks:
>QIUB is ""The Cool looking Swiss Army Knife"" of power banks!

column1: 1 - NEVER Run Out Of BATTERY Ever Again!

column4: >Is your phone begging for juice? Just plug in your QIUB. High capacity power on the go with up to 50% of battery charge for Iphone 6. With QIUB, make it through the day without worrying about your battery level.

column1: 2 - QIUB is ALWAYS with YOU!

The best part is, this entire powerhouse fits in your pocket. QIUB packs a significant battery capacity into a surprisingly small space. It’s compact enough to fit into your pocket or on your key ring so your power bank gives you maximum portability but never weighs you down.
Perfect at work, in the car or on a trip, there’s no need to carry around any other accessory.

column2: >3 - POWER UP Your QIUB And Phone Subsequently.

column1: Simply plug your QIUB into your phone and power source to start charging your phone. When your smartphone is fully charged, QIUB will redirect the charge to its own internal battery.

QIUB turns your power bank into a memory storage device. It can read any Micro-SD card up to 64GB and is compatible with any computer. QIUB is also perfect place to keep safe your Micro-SD memory card.

We all face messy cables that get easily tangled. QIUB cables fold neatly into the device avoiding cluttered and disordered cables. Our strong and durable custom-made cables are made out of a colorful, hard-wearing and resistant material.

column4: >QIUB is available in 2 vibrant colors - green MFI certified cable for Apple and blue cable for Android

column1: QIUB is not only a concept. We have working prototypes that passed rigorous quality testing and after good start of our Indiegogo campaign we just completed first production of 200 Apple and 200 Android QIUB.

column6:
/>

 

QIUB samples passed MFI and CE/FCC safety certification and we have completed pilot production run.

column4: >With your help we will be able to start mass production soon.

column1: As designers and engineers, we have been working hard on perfecting the technical development of the prototypes and the shape until we achieved an elegant, compact, and practical design.
Our team has been working for more than a year on creating this unique product.

One of the core challenges with the engineering process was being able to develop a smart device with multiple functions and significant battery capacity into a small, cool looking and functional design.

column4: >Combining all the features of QIUB, with a significant battery capacity, contained in a small and practical design has never been done before.
>While developing our product, our wish was to reduce the amount of components, packaging and waste by creating a product with multiple functions.

>Manufacturing and using one product instead of three will reduce our impact on the environment. While you are helping us to achieve our dream of launching this innovative product  we’re caring for our planet.

column2: >We are family owned and operated company and we have over 25  years of engineering and international business experience managing companies in Europe, Asia and Australasia. QIUB was developed together with our Engineering, Product Design and Supply Chain experts. Our teenage kids manage social media and contribute to the product styling and field product testing. We all have a strong passion for product development and innovation. Our mission is to make unique and original products that will simplify our daily lives.
>QIUB is the first of many ideas that we have and your support will help us bring this unique product to the market.

column4: > How Will We Use These Funds?
>Your generous funding will help us bring QIUB to the market. It will assist us with the cost of manufacturing and distribution.

column1:
QIUB is now  ready for delivery, all the engineering has been done, the pilot and pre-production run was successful, CE/FCC and other certifications are completed. QIUB for Apple is made from MFI certified components.

We need your funds to help us launch full production.
 

By supporting us, you will get the opportunity to be one of the first QIUB users.

We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign, and a huge thanks to everyone who contributed in any way and who helped us spread the word.  We have spent the last year working hard to bring our vision to life.  Be assured that your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.
You are a part of our QIUB family.
The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people to collaborate with and raise money in exchange for early access and rewards. We have developed QUIB for your benefit, so you should enjoy it!

How Can You Help?

 

If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on our social media pages (Facebook) and contribute to our Indiegogo campaign. We encourage you to ask questions about our product, donate and simply get involved. Please share this with your friends through social media and have them do the same. You are a world changer so why not start now? Help us spread the word and get things started!
To bring QIUB to life, we need your support!
From years of engineering experience across different industries we know what it takes to bring an innovative product to the market.
We've chosen to spend more than a year going through all the details and refused to start the campaign until everything was all set and ready to go.
We carefully selected a highly qualified manufacturing partner that has been manufacturing electronic products to many major retailers globally for many years.

Our manufacturing partner has demonstrated experience, attention to details and effective  management systems, when producing our working prototypes. We already completed initial certification process and pilot run with over 500 working prototypes and we are ready to start full production.
We're going to use the same manufacturer for the mass production and we will supervise the manufacturing and QC process.
This way, the project risks are minimized.
We'll keep you all informed with updates during the campaign as well as during the production!
LIST OF FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS ABOUT QIUB:
How do I select the right QIUB for my phone?
We have two different versions of the QIUB
column2: one for Apple with lightning connector and one for Android and all other phones with a micro USB charger. When selecting your perk, make sure you select the right option for your smartphone.

column1: Currently, we are planning to ship QIUB as soon as our campaign and production is over in November  2016.
We use major courier/post companies and will ship worldwide.
Worldwide Shipping is $13 per one Qiub and not included in the product price.  (Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own country)
Is there a warranty for the QIUB?
Yes, the Qiub comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

QIUB is world’s first compact and lightweight fast charging power bank  for smartphones with an integrated data/charge cable and memory card reader that works with your computer – all you need in one simple device.
HOW FAST WILL QIUB CHARGE MY SMARTPHONE?
QIUB is a fast charger and will typically charge the phone with approximate speed of up to 1% per minute (iPhone 6), but this will vary on the phone battery capacity and the battery age.
HOW MUCH OF MY SMART PHONE BATTERY CAN QIUB CHARGE?
QIUB will charge up to 50% of battery capacity of Iphone 6 and it will be similar for Android phones with similar battery capacity.  this could vary depending on the phone battery capacity and age.
QIUB was designed to help you if you run out of battery during the day. QIUB will give you more capacity than a similar sized power bank.
HOW TO USE QUIB AS A MEMORY CARD READER?

First insert SD (memory) card into the memory card slot.Then connect the QIUB into the computer via USB cable.The memory card function will only work with your computer and will NOT work with your mobile phone. Memory card is NOT supplied with the QIUB.
HOW TO TRANSFER AND SYNC DATA BETWEEN THE QIUB AND THE COMPUTER?

column2:
>Data transfer and Sync between the computer using windows operating system and QIUB works when QIUB is simultaneously connected to the phone and computer. To initiate data link, press the button on the QIUB for 3 seconds and after release wait for 5-10 seconds before data link between computer and phone is established. QIUB data transfer and sync works only with computers running Windows operating system.  

GENERAL INFORMATION AND BATTERY CAPACITY?

column1:
QIUB Apple Technical specification :

- battery capacity of 1500mAH with max output of 5V 1.2A 
- integrated high quality MFI certified data/charge yellow/green cable
- memory card reader up to 64 GB
- dimensions 67mm x 53.5mm x 15.5mm 
- weight 60g 
- Lightning connector


QIUB Android technical specification :

- battery capacity of 1500mAH with max output of 5V 1.2A 
- integrated high quality data/charge blue cable
- memory card reader up to 64 GB
- dimensions 67mm x 53.5mm x 15.5mm 
- weight 60g 
- micro USB connector
If you would like to discuss a campaign collaboration, QIUB distribution or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@myqiub.com

","Carying power banks, cables and memory separately is outdated! We believe that every power bank should have integrated charge/sync cable and memory card reader. That is exact reason why we developed world's first smart multi-functional mobile phone gadget with integrated cable, memory card reader and smart power bank features.Our customers worldwide are delighted with QIUB and you should check why!             Recommended by:
As you can probably relate, carrying around big chargers, flash memory drives and cables every day can be a huge hassle.
What if there was one device that could hold it all?
QIUB is a multi functional device with an integrated cable and memory card reader that replaces the need to carry multiple phone accessories.
Once you start using the QIUB you will never use any other cable or power bank!
QIUB WILL REPLACE THE NEED TO CARRY SEVERAL DEVICES!
With QIUB, we challenged our team to revolutionize the functions of a regular power bank and re-think a way to replace the need to carry several devices.
Our goal is to revolutionize the way people use power banks and we believe that every power bank should have integrated cable, extra features and be small, practical and easy to use!
We developed a smart product that is multi functional, durable, compact, lightweight and, above all, practical.
Here is the quote from friend that used QIUB for few weeks:
QIUB is ""The Cool looking Swiss Army Knife"" of power banks!
1 - NEVER Run Out Of BATTERY Ever Again!

Is your phone begging for juice? Just plug in your QIUB. High capacity power on the go with up to 50% of battery charge for Iphone 6. With QIUB, make it through the day without worrying about your battery level.

The best part is, this entire powerhouse fits in your pocket. QIUB packs a significant battery capacity into a surprisingly small space. It’s compact enough to fit into your pocket or on your key ring so your power bank gives you maximum portability but never weighs you down.
Perfect at work, in the car or on a trip, there’s no need to carry around any other accessory.
3 - POWER UP Your QIUB And Phone Subsequently.
Simply plug your QIUB into your phone and power source to start charging your phone. When your smartphone is fully charged, QIUB will redirect the charge to its own internal battery.

QIUB turns your power bank into a memory storage device. It can read any Micro-SD card up to 64GB and is compatible with any computer. QIUB is also perfect place to keep safe your Micro-SD memory card.

We all face messy cables that get easily tangled. QIUB cables fold neatly into the device avoiding cluttered and disordered cables. Our strong and durable custom-made cables are made out of a colorful, hard-wearing and resistant material.
QIUB is available in 2 vibrant colors - green MFI certified cable for Apple and blue cable for Android

QIUB is not only a concept. We have working prototypes that passed rigorous quality testing and after good start of our Indiegogo campaign we just completed first production of 200 Apple and 200 Android QIUB.
QIUB samples passed MFI and CE/FCC safety certification and we have completed pilot production run.
With your help we will be able to start mass production soon.
As designers and engineers, we have been working hard on perfecting the technical development of the prototypes and the shape until we achieved an elegant, compact, and practical design.
Our team has been working for more than a year on creating this unique product.

One of the core challenges with the engineering process was being able to develop a smart device with multiple functions and significant battery capacity into a small, cool looking and functional design.
Combining all the features of QIUB, with a significant battery capacity, contained in a small and practical design has never been done before.
While developing our product, our wish was to reduce the amount of components, packaging and waste by creating a product with multiple functions.

Manufacturing and using one product instead of three will reduce our impact on the environment. While you are helping us to achieve our dream of launching this innovative product  we’re caring for our planet.

We are family owned and operated company and we have over 25  years of engineering and international business experience managing companies in Europe, Asia and Australasia. QIUB was developed together with our Engineering, Product Design and Supply Chain experts. Our teenage kids manage social media and contribute to the product styling and field product testing. We all have a strong passion for product development and innovation. Our mission is to make unique and original products that will simplify our daily lives.
QIUB is the first of many ideas that we have and your support will help us bring this unique product to the market.
How Will We Use These Funds?
Your generous funding will help us bring QIUB to the market. It will assist us with the cost of manufacturing and distribution.

QIUB is now  ready for delivery, all the engineering has been done, the pilot and pre-production run was successful, CE/FCC and other certifications are completed. Hello my name is skyler I am 13 yrs old, and with the help of my uncle zack I am trying to start a campaign to replace or repair my broken laptop which a couple of weeks ago got broken when my brothers friend thought it would be funny to hide it under a reclining chair and has refused to take responsability and replace it. It started as a crack on the screen but, now it has been getting way worse as a liquid is now seeping in between my screen making my computer almost impossible to use and reducing my ability to complete schoolwork that relies on my computer. My uncle also feels that this will be a good learning experience and teach me a new skill so with his help and supervision I have created this to seek help for my problem.
With the money that is donated I will replace or repair my laptop. If my goal is met I will buy a replacment laptop and repair my old one and donate it to someone that needs it.
If you can't donate then I would appreciate if you could help make this a successfull first effort at creating a crowdfunding campaign. Thank you.
All the funding donated will be handled by my uncle because I am not 18 and don't have a paypal account, and remember that a dollar can count too. Thank you.
I am working on a series of books, so a new laptop would make it easier to write which i will have another campaign about if this one is succesful.

The MeterPlug campaign is finished!  Now accepting pre-orders at http://www.sticknfind.com/product/meterplug
Do you want to lower your electric bill?
MeterPlug will tell you how much ACTUAL MONEY an appliance is costing you when you run it, and when it's off (Standby).
Engadget: MeterPlug estimates electricity costs per device, aims to save you some cash
CNET: Phantom fighter: MeterPlug reports electric use in dollars
MeterPlug WILL HELP YOU LOWER YOUR ELECTRIC BILL!
MeterPlug plugs in between any appliance and the AC outlet. It measures your consumption and sends that information over Bluetooth to your smart phone, where the app displays your real costs.
MeterPlug can turn on or off any appliance connected to it.
Depending on your state and country of residence, the app displays your REAL electricity costs. It can even calculate costs of electricity for different times of day.

The MeterPlug App allows you to program an automatic ""Turn Off"" function to an appliance that is using power on standby, when it detects that the appliance is consuming power while sleeping (what we call Vampire power).
You can program it to turn Off when you walk away and turn back On when you return.
You can manually turn On or Off any appliance connected to MeterPlug within a 100 Foot range.

By using MeterPlug, you can identify the appliances that cost more to run than others and calculate when to run your appliances and for how long. Get a better understanding of what appliance is causing your electric bill to be so high, and where you can save.
Vampire power Shield and Proximity control features will help you greatly lower your bill.
Your appliances may be acting like vampires -sucking up and consuming energy even when the power is switched off, this is what we call Vampire Power.
If you leave your Xbox 360 or Playstation 3 on, it continues to consume roughly 170 watts of power 24/7, If you run the math, that's about $220 per year!
While testing MeterPlug, we found out that our 50"" Sony LED TV consumes $18.25 pear year on Standby.  See the Video on the Galery tab above...
• Common appliances that use power while on Standby: TVs, Game consoles, Microwave ovens, Printers, Routers, HiFi Receivers, Cable box, Chargers, DVD player etc...
Does your TV waste money on standby? Make it automatically turn off when you are not home with MeterPlug!
Setup an Alert or auto-off, when a specific device's running cost goes over a pre-selected amount.
Decide that you would like to use the heater for only $1.5 per day. Your phone will alert you when you have reached that cost, and MeterPlug will automatically turn off the heater.

The app downloads the actual costs of Electricity based on survey and average databases of the following Places: USA: Average cost per state updated regularly. European Union countries: Average cost per country updated regularly (Brazil, Russia, South Africa, Thailand etc.).
We are adding more automatic databases for countries now. You can always enter your local cost per KW/h manually in the settings menu.
North American Plug: Used in USA, Canada, most of Central and South America, Japan, Taiwan, the Philippines and Saudi Arabia.
European Plug: Most European Countries including eastern Europe, Chile, Indonesia, South Korea, Turkey,  Uruguay.
British Plug: United Kingdom, the Republic of Ireland, Hong Kong, Cyprus ,Malaysia and Singapore.

You can have 1 MeterPlug and move it around your house or have many units running at the same time. You can connect to different appliances simultaneously in your house or work and get all that information live on your Smart phone.
AUTO OFF WHEN NOT IN USE!

MeterPlug has a range of about 100 feet, so you can read the information from most places in your home. MeterPlug has also built-in memory, so it will measure and record the information even when you are not home. Once you are within range, you can download all the consumption history of that appliance.
You can connect a Power Strip to   the MeterPlug!
It will measure all devices               connected to it, and can even         turn them Off or On.
How does the app know the cost of my home’s Electricity?

• The app downloads the average cost of household Electricity cost of all USA States and European countries, updated every month. If you need more accurate numbers, you can always enter your electricity costs manually, in the app’s settings. You can even select different costs for different times of the day.
Can a MeterPlug be paired to multple phones or tablets?
• Yes, you can connect multiple phones and tablets to a Meterplug. Any device paired to a Meterplug can see consumption, and control it to turn On or Off.
• Each MeterPlug is designed to work universally from 100V to 240V AC. You could take a USA version, and use it in China, Europe, or Australia, with a simple local adapter.
• Remember that MeterPlug doesn’t convert Electricity. So if you use a USA version, and your country is 220V, don’t plug in 110V appliances.
What is the maximum Current MeterPlug can measure and handle?
• MeterPlug can measure and handle up to 16A, from 100V to 240V AC.
Are you planning on making plus for Australia, China and Israel?
At this moment we are concentrating on:
• North American plug: NEMA 5-15 (15 A/125 V grounded)
What if I use an appliance that has no ground pin (2-pin plug)?
• MeterPlug doesn’t require a ground pin to measure your consumption. You can even plug in a shaver, and it will still work!
• No, MeterPlug has no Surge Protection. If you live in an area with increased lighting strikes, it is recommended to plug MeterPlug after a socket or power strip with surge protection.
What is the power consumption of MeterPlug?
• 0.1Watts. That's about 1 Cent cost per year!
How does MeterPlug communicate with my Smartphone?
What Smartphones does the MeterPlug work with?

• MeterPlug works iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, the New iPad, iPad mini, and the New iPod touch. It also works on Android devices supporting Bluetooth 4.0, running Android 4.0 and newer. We have tested it on the Samsung Galaxy S3 and Note 2, and it works great on both devices! (Since the support for Bluetooth 4.0 on the Samsung S3 is bad, we wrote the Bluetooth drivers on our own)
Can more than one phone control a MeterPlug?
• Any Phone/Tablet paired with a MeterPlug, can communicate with it, get consumption readings, and turn it on or off.
How many MeterPlugs can be paired to my phone at the same time?
• In theory, you can add and pair as many MeterPlugs to your phone as you like. We recommend not pairing more than 100, as it might slow down the phone's database.
• Only one MeterPlug at a time can be accessed from your phone. When you want to use another MeterPlug, just swipe with your fingers on the app and select another MeterPlug.
Do I need a separate adapter on my phone or special case?
• No, you don't need any adapter or special case. MeterPlug will communicate directly with your Smartphone via Bluetooth 4.0.
What is the range of MeterPlug?

• When Activated, MeterPlug learns the regular consumption of your appliance. When the consumption goes down but remains ""On"" for more than a set time, MeterPlug will know this is vampire power, and cut off the power. When your phone is in range, it will turn the power back on. This will greatly help you lower your bill!
• There is a manual On/Off button on the side of MeterPlug, in case you're not home, and there is no device at home with Bluetooth 4.0 to turn it back on.
Can your phone turn the power On or Off while you are not home?
• Your paired phone must be within the 100 feet range of the MeterPlug to turn the power On/Off.
What if someone at home wants to turn on the MeterPlug, and there is no compatible phone or tablet to turn it on?
• MeterPlug comes with a small side button. Once pressed,  it will override and turn on the appliance.

column2: our app development is in beta phase now.

column1: We have identified all of the components to be used in mass production and built the latest samples using those components. We have started a pilot production of 100 units.
• Pre-production run of 100 samples will completed with T2 off-tooled by mid December.
• App Development: App Development will enter final beta phase in December for iOS.
• Android app is completed. Start Alpha phase testing in December.

• Product testing: We will start in middle of December an extensive 30 day product testing using beta testers. Product will be tested in USA (New York and Florida), Germany, Netherlands, Hong Kong, Japan and China.
• CES! We will be exhibiting the MeterPlug at CES in Las Vegas! Checkout real working units, and maybe win one!
• Early January Product will be submitted for FCC, CE, UL and TUV certifications.This can take about 6 weeks for completion.
• App submission to Apple Store for approval.
• Setup QC and assembly line in China.
• Final adjustment to Electric board, pending Certification results.

We have been designing, and managing the production of various products for many large companies for the last 12 years. We specialize in very small Bluetooth designs. Many Bluetooth solutions and Bluetooth gadgets sold for cars by large and very known companies in USA are our designs. We also have designed various Health and fitness Bluetooth products currently being sold in retail outlets worldwide. We also have designed and brought to production home environment sensors with Wifi that plug into AC outlets. We have great contacts with many factories in China, and have years of experience getting FCC, CE, Wifi, BT, etc Certifications.
We have a great team of embedded hardware engineers, RF engineers, embedded software engineers, and mechanical engineers.
We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put MeterPlug into production. We know what we’re doing
column2:
we've led the development and manufacturing of more than 2 dozen hardware products for many large companies, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early and receiving a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make MeterPlug a reality.

MeterPlug has a range of about 100 feet, so you can read the information from most places in your home. MeterPlug has also built-in memory, so it will measure and record the information even when you are not home. Once you are within range, you can download all the consumption history of that appliance.
You can connect a Power Strip to   the MeterPlug!
It will measure all devices               connected to it, and can even         turn them Off or On.
How does the app know the cost of my home’s Electricity?

The app downloads the average cost of household Electricity cost of all USA States and European countries, updated every month. If you need more accurate numbers, you can always enter your electricity costs manually, in the app’s settings. You can even select different costs for different times of the day.
Can a MeterPlug be paired to multple phones or tablets?
Yes, you can connect multiple phones and tablets to a Meterplug. Any device paired to a Meterplug can see consumption, and control it to turn On or Off.
Each MeterPlug is designed to work universally from 100V to 240V AC. You could take a USA version, and use it in China, Europe, or Australia, with a simple local adapter.
Remember that MeterPlug doesn’t convert Electricity. So if you use a USA version, and your country is 220V, don’t plug in 110V appliances.
What is the maximum Current MeterPlug can measure and handle?
MeterPlug can measure and handle up to 16A, from 100V to 240V AC.
Are you planning on making plus for Australia, China and Israel?
At this moment we are concentrating on:
North American plug: NEMA 5-15 (15 A/125 V grounded)
What if I use an appliance that has no ground pin (2-pin plug)?
MeterPlug doesn’t require a ground pin to measure your consumption. You can even plug in a shaver, and it will still work!
No, MeterPlug has no Surge Protection. If you live in an area with increased lighting strikes, it is recommended to plug MeterPlug after a socket or power strip with surge protection.
What is the power consumption of MeterPlug?
0.1Watts. That's about 1 Cent cost per year!
How does MeterPlug communicate with my Smartphone?
MeterPlug communicates via Bluetooth Low Energy (Bluetooth 4.0)
What Smartphones does the MeterPlug work with?

MeterPlug works iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, the New iPad, iPad mini, and the New iPod touch. It also works on Android devices supporting Bluetooth 4.0, running Android 4.0 and newer. We have tested it on the Samsung Galaxy S3 and Note 2, and it works great on both devices! (Since the support for Bluetooth 4.0 on the Samsung S3 is bad, we wrote the Bluetooth drivers on our own)
Can more than one phone control a MeterPlug?
Any Phone/Tablet paired with a MeterPlug, can communicate with it, get consumption readings, and turn it on or off.
How many MeterPlugs can be paired to my phone at the same time?
In theory, you can add and pair as many MeterPlugs to your phone as you like. We recommend not pairing more than 100, as it might slow down the phone's database.
Only one MeterPlug at a time can be accessed from your phone. When you want to use another MeterPlug, just swipe with your fingers on the app and select another MeterPlug.
Do I need a separate adapter on my phone or special case?
No, you don't need any adapter or special case. MeterPlug will communicate directly with your Smartphone via Bluetooth 4.0.
What is the range of MeterPlug?

When Activated, MeterPlug learns the regular consumption of your appliance. When the consumption goes down but remains ""On"" for more than a set time, MeterPlug will know this is vampire power, and cut off the power. When your phone is in range, it will turn the power back on. This will greatly help you lower your bill!
There is a manual On/Off button on the side of MeterPlug, in case you're not home, and there is no device at home with Bluetooth 4.0 to turn it back on.
Can your phone turn the power On or Off while you are not home?
Your paired phone must be within the 100 feet range of the MeterPlug to turn the power On/Off.
What if someone at home wants to turn on the MeterPlug, and there is no compatible phone or tablet to turn it on?
MeterPlug comes with a small side button. Once pressed,  it will override and turn on the appliance.
We currently have fully-working pre-production units.
Our hardware and software is finalized
column2: our app development is in beta phase now.

column1: We have identified all of the components to be used in mass production and built the latest samples using those components. We have started a pilot production of 100 units.
Pre-production run of 100 samples will completed with T2 off-tooled by mid December.
App Development: App Development will enter final beta phase in December for iOS.
Android app is completed. Start Alpha phase testing in December.

Product testing: We will start in middle of December an extensive 30 day product testing using beta testers. Product will be tested in USA (New York and Florida), Germany, Netherlands, Hong Kong, Japan and China.
Packaging: Retail Packaging will be finalized.
CES! We will be exhibiting the MeterPlug at CES in Las Vegas! Checkout real working units, and maybe win one!
Early January Product will be submitted for FCC, CE, UL and TUV certifications.This can take about 6 weeks for completion.
App submission to Apple Store for approval.
Setup QC and assembly line in China.
Final adjustment to Electric board, pending Certification results.

We have been designing, and managing the production of various products for many large companies for the last 12 years. We specialize in very small Bluetooth designs. Many Bluetooth solutions and Bluetooth gadgets sold for cars by large and very known companies in USA are our designs. We also have designed various Health and fitness Bluetooth products currently being sold in retail outlets worldwide. We also have designed and brought to production home environment sensors with Wifi that plug into AC outlets. We have great contacts with many factories in China, and have years of experience getting FCC, CE, Wifi, BT, etc Certifications.
We have a great team of embedded hardware engineers, RF engineers, embedded software engineers, and mechanical engineers.
We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put MeterPlug into production. We know what we’re doing
column2: we've led the development and manufacturing of more than 2 dozen hardware products for many large companies, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early and receiving a premium product ahead of everyone else.We’re asking you to help us make MeterPlug a reality.",17.0,0,"3 Campaigns

There is nothing quite so frustrating as discovering that your earbuds or charging cable has been lost or destroyed. Doesn’t it seem to happen when you are just getting ready to head out? We understand just what a pain this can be, which is why we are committed to making the situation better. With My Mobile Kit, we want to make sure that you always have the smart device accessories that you need – and have them in abundance! This way, you can have extra earbuds and cables on hand at all times. Keep them at home or stash them at work. You'll always be connected with My Mobile Kit.

Each month, you will get earbuds and a charger cable, and possibly other accessories delivered right to your door. Like clockwork, they will show up, and you never need to do anything after the initial sign-up. All stocked on earbuds and Charger cables? Great! Just choose from one of the many other smart device accessories that we offer. This is the simplest way to avoid the frustration of needing a specific smart device accessory and realizing at the last moment that you don’t have it!

 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $2500. At that funding level, we can cover all our production, marketing, and distribution costs, getting us to a comfortable place with My Mobile Kit to push forward into the future and expand aggressively. To thank you, we are offering a limited-time, Indiegogo, exclusive contributor phone stand with the My Mobile Kit packages.

column1:
Imagine never feeling the frustration of lost earbuds and broken charging cables. Imagine how many last-minute trips to the store you would avoid, how many excuses for being late you would never have to deliver, how great it will feel to be known as the hero who always has a spare cable around. Imagine the delight of discovering new accessories for your smart devices each and every month? We want to do that for you. Help us help you!

 

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

We have planned the My Mobile Kit launch extensively, and we do not foresee any delays in our schedule. If we do run into bumps in the road, though, we will keep all our contributors updated.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Spread the word! This is something that affects everyone, so it is something that everyone can appreciate. We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time!
