Turn your crummy photos into a work of art with Morph Cafe. Just upload or select your starting photo then pick from hundreds of dramatic backgrounds.  Presto, you’re placed within an attractive background scene.
TURN YOUR PHOTO INTO A WORK OF ART

The image processing software will detect and extract the person or people from the start photo. This is done hands-free for your convenience. You can then select from around a hundred background image scenes.  For example, if you selected a sunset from a Caribbean island, the photo would now look like this...

Send your morphed media to all your friends. They’ll be impressed with your work of art and think you’re a Rembrandt or professional photographer. You can also send your enhanced photo to one of the popular social networks.

Order prints for your custom work of art. Options available: prints 4×6 in, 5×7 in, 8×10 in, framed portrait 5x7in, 8×10 in, 11×14 in, mouse pad, greeting card, holiday card, coffee mug, keychain and much more.
Morph Cafe comes with about one hundred background images.  You can also get additional premium background image scenes. Here are just a few examples of attractive backgrounds.
You can also select a muslin background, just as a professional would use in a studio. Send your work of art to all your friends... Heck, send to your mom...

The Morph Cafe mobile app will launch first with Android. The user interface design has been documented and ready for a mobile programmer to start work. Here is a snapshot of how the mobile app will appear and function.

You can simply add a new photo into the workspace by selecting from your smart phone photo gallery. The image processing will go to work right away to extract the person or people from the original image.
Next pick one of the attractive background scenes available to you. These were provided to you when downloading Morph Cafe. More premium scenes will also be made available for an additional fee.
When your work of art is ready, simply buy a print. Your order and image are sent to the nearest Walgreen store for your convenience.  Ordering prints or commercial items has been made hassle free.
Share your morphed photo with your friends. Send the image through email or connect with Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. They'll be impressed!
You can also obtain a copy of the image for your personal use. Upload into a digital picture frame, use as your profile picture on a social network, add to your photo gallery on your PC...
There is also a built-in help function with Morph Cafe. A quick start tour is provided to help get you running faster.

column4: title=""brian adams""/>My name is Brian Adams. I'm a software engineer and entrepreneur. I have a long history of building software businesses.  I even have one successful software business running now - WebinarMax.

column1: My technical specialty is image and video processing. With my last software business, I've learned how to manage images and video on an enterprise level and to effectively use Amazon Web Services.

My college education was in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. My post graduate work dealt with image processing and color analysis. These studies have directly aided the Morph Cafe project.
WHAT DO I NEED WITH THE PROJECT FUNDING?

I'll be using the project funding to hire a mobile programmer to complete the Android user interface.  I'll be overseeing this programming effort. I'm fluent in Android and Java programming, so I can step in for any issues that may arise. The user interface design is documented, so the programmer just needs to follow the guide. The mobile programming effort will start in January and complete in April. There will be 1-2 months of quality assurance and system testing before first beta release of the software.

This funding will help to free my time to focus on project management and to add the image processing to the mobile app. If I don't reach the funding goal, I'll still conduct the project and do the mobile programming myself. It will just extend the project and with fewer features.
Your contribution will help greatly to get this project launched as a mobile app. The funds will smooth the remaining programming effort and make the scheduled release a reality.
Please note that support for iPad and iPhone will follow in Q3 of 2013. This funding project only deals with the Android programming however.

The image processing technology is the key to this mobile app. Most of the technology only exists in research papers found at universities. Total person extraction from an image has never been done in a hands-free automated fashion.

It's been around a year to get the image processing to work for this first use and application.  Now, I'm ready to go...  I have firsthand knowledge and ownership of the software, algorithms and intellectual property.
I'm anxious to put the image processing technology to its first use. Will you help to move this technology to reality? Just become a contributor...

You can contribute to the Morph Cafe project at several levels: $20, $50, $100 and $500.  I've worked these packages so that you get back more value than you contributed.  Besides getting your hands on a beta release, I'm providing download of additional premium background scenes. The amount of added backgrounds depends on your contribution level.  For senior contributors, you will be part of my inner circle and invited to a monthly project progress call.

In order to successfully reach the project funding goal, I need to reach a large number of people to be contributors.  You can help to spread the word with your circle of friends. This IndiGoGo site also has sharing tools for you to use..

Help me to move this new technology into a real work app for millions of tablet and smart phone users.

column2: >We have designed two types of devices - these are «Size S» and «Size M»

column1: Each device has four types of locks:
• Bluetooth lock. Access via Bluetooth using password

column2: >
column3: />

column1: A major goal is facing us to create the most simple and stylish design, and the need to keep minimum measurements  for usability,
for example, put it in your pants or shirt pocket, in your bag or just hold it in your hand.
We have already created an alpha version of the software for Windows 7 32bit, which allows you to change the password to the device «VZcase».
In the near future we plan to create software for Mac OS, Windows 8, Linux. Our major goal is to supply the security of password cracking by another person,

if the device is stolen or lost.

Android

And also we have software for android. To control the device with the type of bluetooth lock, ie open-close.

iOS
You will need Portable VZcase safes, while there isn’t an opportunity to use a fixed safe or you just want to hide your thing from extra view at hotels, beaches,
gyms, at the workplace or in any other case, where you need to leave your things unkept.
Case Material VZcase – Titanium grade VT8.
Why Titan? Our main goal is to create such a case, the access to the inner part of it will be very labour-intensive process without the opening code.
The device should be cheap, compact and easy to carrying. According to the following characteristics we chose to use Titanium.
Titanium is used in the military industry (bulletproof vests, armor and fire walls in aviation, Corps submarines),
as well as in the chemical industry and other important areas. Titanium is presented in various space objects.
Crowdfunding Platform and laser engraving
Our company on the indiegogo will last from November 1 to January 1.
On the device VZcase, ordered through indiegogo, we do laser engraving your text, it uses special application form in your account on our site.
Example of the text for laser engraving can be as follows: your initials, signature, home address, phone number, a love expression to your girl and another.
We have developed a special form to receive applications for laser engraving. It can be filled in the personal account of our website, in the application,
you can write your text and arrangement of the text directly on a portable VZcase safe. Use the special form on our website in your account.
See FAQ.
For a mass production starting, we need the amount of 30 000 $ (thirty thousand dollars),
for which we will be able to purchase Titanium, to make electric boards, molds, li-ion batteries and
other small elements. Also, this amount includes the development of software under various operating systems
(Mac OS, Windows 7/8, Linux) to work with the device (the password changing or resetting),
the website creation for device registration and technical support.
What we promise in return?
In return, we promise our device «VZcase» at a low price and possibility to be the first to use our product.
We do a 15% discount for all sponsors for one year, which will be linked to your email address.
You will be able to use the discount on buying on our website vzcase.com. Our range of devices «VZcase»
will constantly keep up to date

column1: The lock is opened by consequential pressing a combination of 5 numbers on the special button. After five unsuccessful attempts to enter the device is locked for 30 seconds.
Each button press followed by lighting the yellow LED. The maximum password length is 10 numbers.
The password can consist of numbers only from 1 up to 5.

column3: />

column1: Opening of the given lock type is set by a combination of five numbers, with the help of rotating discs. The amount of numbers on one disk is 10, from 0 up to 9,
in such case the number of combinations is equal to one hundred thousand (ten to the fifth power), which makes the
code fitting as an exhaustive search (brute force)and very labour-intensive process.
This variant is the most simple and cheap, since we do not use a variety of electrical schemes and power in it, moreover there is no need to use the software.

column1: Bluetooth lock. Access via Bluetooth using password
The opening of the lock through Bluetooth using a mobile phone, entering the appropriate password. 	It will be locked after mobile-disconnecting from the device.
There are only two buttons on the case, on-off button bluetooth module and the button for interfacing with other devices.

It is provided a protection from brute force password guessing (brute force), by blocking access for 30 seconds after five unsuccessful attempts to enter the password.

Where to buy?

column1:

column5: >Application for laser engraving

column1: Price 4$ for one block. Using the picture as an example link
Please do not forget to add the cost of engraving to the price of a perk.

Laser engraving will make the device «VZcase» unique for everybody. For instance: your initials, signature, home address, phone number, love expression to your girl and any other text. If you have the text that you would like to locate on the device VZcase by means of the laser engraving, this instruction is for you.
<li>Application forms on engraving are allowed only from the participants of crowdfunding platforms.
If you buy the device VZcase in a different way and you want to make an engraving, please contact private companies individually.
The application period for engraving is equal to the period of public company on the crowdfunding platform.
The application acceptance form will be closed on our website after  ending of the company.
Further on, we will not provide services on laser engraving application.
<li>Register on our website under «product Registration», using the e-mail address and password.
Your activation email account will be sent on your mail. To activate your account, just click on the link in the email.
Now you can log into your account using the username and password.
• In your account, go to the tab «Номе», you will see the application form for laser engraving.
• Enter your personal information as in your account at the platform indiegogo, for identification and we will process your request.
Using the picture as an example link, choose number of the block, which you want to put the text on.
In the field text “Text to engrave” we write the following example:
If you want to use two blocks and more, example below:
If you ordered more than one device use the example below:

In the «additional information» write any information, which will help us to identify you.
Press the button «Save».

Within 3-4 days, your application will be verified, following successful identification, status of the application changes to ""Checked"". You will receive an automatically email notification of status changes, to your email, specified during the registration process.

column1:
We are a team that involves not only creative but also whizzbang technicians who are focused on set tasks solving.

What we do?
We are the ones who care about protecting your personal things.
We produce modern, stylish and comfortable portable safes for keeping and protection of various small things: bank cards, money, jewelry, memory cards, keys, mobile phones and others.
We are actively working to improve the functionality and storage safety, it is our major goal.
We plan to look not only after the quality of production, but also to participate in the development of new models adjusted for your requirements,
to involve improvements, not only in the mode of additional functions, but also in design of portable VZcase safes.
We believe that only full trust between seller and buyer could provide the basis for long-term and high-quality relationships.
Therefore, we are completely open to debates, which statistics will help to enhance our product.

We plan to produce VZcase safes using the most advanced materials and technologies which are currently available. It will allow them to be of highly secure, the best value for money, gorgeous and stylish design.
We will be grateful for any given to us help, whether donations on indiegogo or assistance in an introduction of new technologies or simply useful advice that will help us to develop our project.

","VZcase - are stylish, portable safes, manufactured from titanium alloy
Box for the most popular phones
We have designed two types of devices -  these are «Size S» and «Size M»
Each device has four types of locks:
Bluetooth lock. Access via Bluetooth using password
Biometric lock. Fingerprint access. In development
A major goal is facing us to create the most simple and stylish design, and the need to keep minimum measurements  for usability,
for example, put it in your pants or shirt pocket, in your bag or just hold it in your hand.
We have already created an alpha version of the software for Windows 7 32bit, which allows you to change the password to the device «VZcase».
In the near future we plan to create software for Mac OS, Windows 8, Linux. Our major goal is to supply the security of password cracking by another person,
if the device is stolen or lost.Android
And also we have software for android. To control the device with the type of bluetooth lock, ie open-close.iOS
You will need Portable VZcase safes, while there isn’t an opportunity to use a fixed safe or you just want to hide your thing from extra view at hotels, beaches,
gyms, at the workplace or in any other case, where you need to leave your things unkept.
Case Material VZcase – Titanium grade VT8.
Why Titan? Our main goal is to create such a case, the access to the inner part of it will be very labour-intensive process without the opening code.
The device should be cheap, compact and easy to carrying. According to the following characteristics we chose to use Titanium.
Titanium is used in the military industry (bulletproof vests, armor and fire walls in aviation, Corps submarines),
as well as in the chemical industry and other important areas. Titanium is presented in various space objects.
Our company on the indiegogo will last from November 1 to January 1.
On the device VZcase, ordered through indiegogo, we do laser engraving your text, it uses special application form in your account on our site.
Example of the text for laser engraving can be as follows: your initials, signature, home address, phone number, a love expression to your girl and another.
We have developed a special form to receive applications for laser engraving. It can be filled in the personal account of our website, in the application,
you can write your text and arrangement of the text directly on a portable VZcase safe. Use the special form on our website in your account.
For a mass production starting, we need the amount of 30 000 $ (thirty thousand dollars),
for which we will be able to purchase Titanium, to make electric boards, molds, li-ion batteries and
other small elements. Also, this amount includes the development of software under various operating systems
(Mac OS, Windows 7/8, Linux) to work with the device (the password changing or resetting),
the website creation for device registration and technical support.
In return, we promise our device «VZcase» at a low price and possibility to be the first to use our product.
We do a 15% discount for all sponsors for one year, which will be linked to your email address.
You will be able to use the discount on buying on our website vzcase.com. Our range of devices «VZcase»
will constantly keep up to date

column1: And also thank you very much for your help in the development of our project.
1. Account creation on the website vzcase.com

4. Reset Forgotten Password - using our software and service code.
The lock is opened by consequential pressing a combination of 5 numbers on the special button. After five unsuccessful attempts to enter the device is locked for 30 seconds.
Each button press followed by lighting the yellow LED. The maximum password length is 10 numbers.
The password can consist of numbers only from 1 up to 5.
Opening of the given lock type is set by a combination of five numbers, with the help of rotating discs. The amount of numbers on one disk is 10, from 0 up to 9,
in such case the number of combinations is equal to one hundred thousand (ten to the fifth power), which makes the
code fitting as an exhaustive search (brute force)and very labour-intensive process.
This variant is the most simple and cheap, since we do not use a variety of electrical schemes and power in it, moreover there is no need to use the software.
Bluetooth lock. Access via Bluetooth using password
The opening of the lock through Bluetooth using a mobile phone, entering the appropriate password. 	It will be locked after mobile-disconnecting from the device.
There are only two buttons on the case, on-off button bluetooth module and the button for interfacing with other devices.
It is provided a protection from brute force password guessing (brute force), by blocking access for 30 seconds after five unsuccessful attempts to enter the password.update 1

Your activation email account will be sent on your mail. To activate your account, just click on the link in the email.
Now you can log into your account using the username and password.

Enter your personal information as in your account at the platform indiegogo, for identification and we will process your request.
Using the picture as an example link, choose number of the block, which you want to put the text on.
In the field text “Text to engrave” we write the following example:Block Number: 2.
If you want to use two blocks and more, example below:Block Number: 2, 3.
If you ordered more than one device use the example below:Device №1. Bluetooth lock
In the «additional information» write any information, which will help us to identify you.Press the button «Save».

Within 3-4 days, your application will be verified, following successful identification, status of the application changes to ""Checked"". You will receive an automatically email notification of status changes, to your email, specified during the registration process.
*Note. After changing the status of the application on the ""Check"", opportunity to edit a form will be closed.
Changing the password or reset a forgotten password

The process of password changing on the key-operated lock is very simple, use the special button on the case. In the open state, hold down the password changing button and set rotary discs in right position. The password will be changed.
It is necessary, in case of password forgetting, you will have to restore it only by all combinations’ searching one out of hundred thousand (ten to the fifth power).For electronic locks:
Download the program from the official website www.vzcase.com in the section «Download» and install on the computer. Run program.
Connect the device «VZcase» via a USB cable and press the «connect».
Go to «Change Password using» and use the current password to change to a new password. Attention, use only numbers in the password, otherwise the program will show you the error.

You can go through a confirmation process of purchased device
on the official site www.vzcase.com . In the menu select «product registration».
Create or log in with an existing account, using the email address and password.
Please enter your real information and save it.
Enter the serial number, specified on a box and click ""add"". Attention, anybody won't be able to add serial number any more, until you delete it from your account.
In Table, click the mouse on the serial number added, in section «Device information» find service code (28 characters).
Download the program from the official website www.vzcase.com in the section «Download» and install on the computer. Run program.
Connect the device «VZcase» via a USB cable and press the «connect».
Go to «Change Password using» and use the service code to change password.
Password is successfully changed, disconnect device.

column3:
soon, Design-Your-Own...

""Privacy is quickly becoming extremely-valued."" - Mitch Carley / creator-inventor of 'eLensDots family of brands'

Stop Spying-Eyes with, eLensDots they're simple non-gooey lens-cap-stickers for your phone, laptop, tablet, webcam and more.  For years I've tested tape, markers, posty-type notes and more, they all have their flaws.  I ultimately contracted a provider in high-grade stickers, manufacturers of soy based inks, water based adhesives and moisture proof material to introduce eLensDots.

column1: • I am the creator / inventor and concerned parent
• This campaign is very important for a variety of reasons, but, if we can simply provide the safety needed to help the privacy of one child we will all have done our job
• Your involvement will allow the average person to secure his or her own privacy while having fun - the magnitude of your contributions will be ever-lasting with this one...

Please contribute to a 'privacy movement' that is, cheap, non-confrontational and fun!

WHAT WE DESIRE / WHAT YOU GET

As simple as these look it has not been cheap to get us where we are, we have invested years and a substantial sum of investment to-date.  We now have a solid base to ask for the final-push in three main categories
• We will be investing the IP (Intelectual Property and Patent Properties)
• We will be investing in the final build of the website / API with design-your-own
• We will be investing in more printing / cutting equipment to supply the global demand
• If we do not meet our complete funding we will prioritize the investments to insure success / fulfillment for you...

THE IMPACT

As stated and as shown on the video, this is a global concern, please contribute to a 'privacy movement' that is, cheap, non-confrontational and fun!
• You can make privacy easier for you, your family and business
• We all know that the private-moments are getting fewer and fewer everyday
• Trust the video - these are opaque, fun and fool-proof...

coverage of the ez-on-off - ez-tab, here you simply peel, fold and stick-on
with the non-sticky tab.  In addition, we have complete Patent protection with a current related Patent owner.

B charged is the revolutionary battery management app
- Did you know that the daily consumption of all iOS devices is as big as the daily power consumption of New York?

- Did you know, that the use of B charged app can reduce your battery consumption by 37%?

Do you have the problem with the battery life on your iDevice?
The most bothering problem of iPhone users is their battery life. Many of you are turning to the forums requesting any advices from other iPhone users, how to increase the battery life. Many of these advices are not professional and are often misleading, or do not solve the real problem.

Since we specialise in the energy sector our whole professional life, we want to approach mainly with EXPERTISE and reality. As you may have noticed, mobile device market has grown enormously in the last 10 years. Phone technology has moved a big step forward. But despite of this huge progress, there is still something that grows in slower way - phone's battery. Modern technologies and apps discharge the battery so fast, that you even do not leave your house without taking your charger with you. That's why we have decided to do a detailed analysis of battery consumption of all available iPhones, iPods and iPads.
The core of B charged app is the detailed analysis of battery consumption of all functions and apps.
The most important functions of B charged app:

B prepared feature: how to increase the efficiency of the battery consumption on your iDevice

B prepared feature helps you to find out the current battery consumption of your iDevice. We decided to bring you some new units such as ""Watt-hours"" and ""% / hour"" in order to more accurately determine the consumption of your battery.
B prepared feature is a helper, which will show you what activities are loading your system the most and how you can effectively handle them.

The most common recommendation for increasing battery life on iPhones is to turn off functions. These advices are not supported by any real testing. For example, it is recommended to reduce the brightness from 100% to 80%. But how much do you really increase battery life? These questions can be answered by the B charged feature.
B Steady feature: Do not let your battery discharge

Another important feature of B charged app is the B Steady feature, the manager which will help you to plan a battery life during the day. This feature displays a daily graph of your battery consumption and activities.

column2:
we will focus on your battery.
Do you know the feeling when you have just 60% of your battery in the morning and you really do not know if your iPhone will last up to 4 PM? But you know that you will need to send approximately 20 emails, make 30 calls, use RSS and navigation for an hour and play some games.

column1: In that case, B steady feature is made just for you. The core of B steady feature are modes as “work”, “school”, “day off” etc. You can customise the applications you use the most in each mode. With this information we can calculate how long your battery will last. B steady feature makes sure your telephone will not go off.

Example: John wakes up at 8 AM. The “work” mode, he set up in the B steady feature starts at 9 AM. B charged app will evaluate the activities, which he normally does in “work” mode on his iPhone and finds out the expected battery condition at 4 PM – the end of “work” mode. The app will notify you that you can not forget to take your charger, because the expected condition of your iPhone battery at the end of the work will be at 7%.
B charged feature: Let your battery last longer
B charged feature brings you the best way of charging – whole-cycle charging system. Based on our research and statistics, we have upgraded it and we bring two charging modes in app:

- eCO mode is designed for daily charging of your iDevice to optimise your battery.
- eCO + mode is designed for whole-cycle charging to extend your battery life. It is recommended to use it at least 1 time per 2 weeks.

B charged feature will monitor all your charging and will always remind you to use the right charging mode.
B informed feature: Find out which activity is discharging your battery the most.

Using this feature you will find out, which activity is discharging your iDevice battery the most. We have had prepared dozens of activities and apps that are most commonly used on iDevices. Be informed.

Surely you can remember the recent problem with battery life of iPhone 4 and iPhone 4s when updated on iOS 5. There were many advices to extend battery life with iOS 5 but most of them were quite uncomfortable for users. Some tips were bit extreme - if you wanted the battery life you had with the iOS 4, you needed to turn off all new functions of iOS 5. Most of us were unhappy with the shortage of battery life in iOS 5. One of our goals is to draw the attention to the severity of the new iOS and give you the comparison to them. We want to inform you in advance whether it is worth to upgrade to the new operating system.

Our greatest commitment towards the future is to constantly research and improve the battery consumption and charging cycles to make your iDevice last longer. The philosophy of B charged app is the effective battery consumption optimised directly to your iDevice. We are working on new features that we will bring you in the next updates such as: setting and controlling the consumption of iDevice synchronised with your Mac, new charging cycles system, optimised directly to your iDevice, and other features that will make B charged app your daily helper.

B prepared, B steady, B charged, B informed

","B charged is the revolutionary battery management app
- Did you know that the daily consumption of all iOS devices is as big as the daily power consumption of New York?

- Did you know, that the use of B charged app can reduce your battery consumption by 37%?Do you have the problem with the battery life on your iDevice?The most bothering problem of iPhone users is their battery life. Many of you are turning to the forums requesting any advices from other iPhone users, how to increase the battery life. Many of these advices are not professional and are often misleading, or do not solve the real problem.Since we specialise in the energy sector our whole professional life, we want to approach mainly with EXPERTISE and reality. As you may have noticed, mobile device market has grown enormously in the last 10 years. Phone technology has moved a big step forward. But despite of this huge progress, there is still something that grows in slower way - phone's battery. Modern technologies and apps discharge the battery so fast, that you even do not leave your house without taking your charger with you. That's why we have decided to do a detailed analysis of battery consumption of all available iPhones, iPods and iPads.
The core of B charged app is the detailed analysis of battery consumption of all functions and apps.
The most important functions of B charged app:

B prepared feature: how to increase the efficiency of the battery consumption on your iDeviceB prepared feature helps you to find out the current battery consumption of your iDevice. We decided to bring you some new units such as ""Watt-hours"" and ""% / hour"" in order to more accurately determine the consumption of your battery.

These advices are not supported by any real testing. For example, it is recommended to reduce the brightness from 100% to 80%. But how much do you really increase battery life? These questions can be answered by the B charged feature.
B Steady feature: Do not let your battery discharge

Another important feature of B charged app is the B Steady feature, the manager which will help you to plan a battery life during the day. This feature displays a daily graph of your battery consumption and activities.
You can focus on your life

3D - The Future of the Photography.
If you have ever wanted a 3D photography now is your chance.
The time that you have spent in looking for the best birthday present is now over. The Christmas, mother/father’s day, Anniversary, Wedding, Company celebration or St. Valentine gift has one great solution now. One different way to impress someone, to leave some message, to memorize something special. Your couple, friends, family, business partners or customers will be fascinated.
By pledging support to this project, you can have your own 3D photo. This time it is not a hologram or some kind of light effect or trick as you have seen on the TV, this time the picture is in real 3D and is engraved in optical crystal. Laser subsurface engraving technology makes this possible and the picture lasts inside for the eternity! You can take it with you everywhere. This can be one different and unique present.
There are many design studios which can convert one photography to 3D, but our project doesn't end here. We would like to make this picture to be visible without some 3D screen and special 3D glasses. How to do that? Which technology and material to use? How to print the photo? We have got the solution – high quality 3D laser engraved crystal (not some plastics)!
To 3D is possible to convert only a human faces (sometimes cats or dogs). However if you need to have in crystal your car, yacht, house, company logo or some object we can engrave it in 2D (flat). If you want it in 3D, you have to provide the 3D point cloud file in .CAD or .DXF format.

Here is how it works:
First of all we import one usual 2D (flat) photography of our beautiful young model in the specially designed program for converting of human faces to 3D. It is necessary to mark the important points on the face and the hair and to transfer them to the “dolly”. That is the way to show to the computer what this is about. At the end of the converting process we have to set the real depth of the head. The result is one amazing 3D (ear to ear) portrait.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">
 Now the 3D image file is ready to be imported in the second special program. It will helps us to convert the file to format compatible with the laser machine. If it is necessary we can write some text (like name, date…) which gives to the picture one different view. The size of the crystal must be selected as well. Few steps later the point cloud shows how the picture is going to look after the engraving process.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

At the end we have to send the point cloud file to the special 3d subsurface laser engraving machine. After setting the right parameters of the crystal size, engraving area end the power of the laser we start the process. One minute later the final product is ready. One precious 3D picture engraved in optical crystal which can be always with you.
column16:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Even you already have one crystal with your photo in 3D, you can always check the 3D file on your computer with this 3D Viewer:
column21:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">It seems very easy, but actually it is not!
Like the movies also the photos has to get to 3D. That is the future actually. But the main question was how to do this? How to keep this picture to be visible with naked eye. It was necessary to think about all of the steps how to convert this idea to something real. We had to try many different programs, to look for file and format compatibility and also to combine all that in one good working mechanism. We had to use also the services of another companies that help us with the tests of the laser machine to get the process accomplished.


What We Need &
column22:
What You Get
So folks we need your help to get this fantastic project ready. Everything related with it is very expensive. The special 3D software, the optical crystals, hi-class computers and the most important think – the laser machine.
We cannot create one high class video presentation like professional movie director, we cannot talk like a Hollywood star, and even our English is not good enough. Anyway we are sure that many of you will like our great idea and unique product.
Please check out our unique perks. That is the way to own something different. That is the way to support our initiative.
If we don’t reach our entire goal, you will receive your orders anyway.


The Impact
This project is valuable to us, to you and to the world. It will be the next step in the process of 3D visualization. One more way to keep the photography for the eternity.


Other Ways You Can Help
We know that some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.


Questions or comments...

For anything you may want to know about 3D Laser Fotos or if you wish to get in touch with us, you can contact us at info@3dlaserfotos.com

Introducing U+： The Powerful Smallest Wireless USB Flash Drive.

column2: >4500mAh Power Source, Always Keep Your Devices Charged!
>One of the biggest challenges in using smart devices is power drain. With 4500 mAh power and 5V/2A output voltage, U+ acts as the perfect travel companion. No need to carry a separate power bank.
column3: >Even the longest trips are no problem: U+ has up to 20 hours standby time and up to
column4: >12 hours of continuous play/streaming time
column5: >! No matter how long the trip, U+ will be by your side.

column2: >U+ also integrates with your smart device's camera to create an easy to use selfie shutter. Just hold your phone out, and click the button on U+. Easy as ever!
>Smooth Video Play, Happy Travels.
>Virtually no buffer time: Streaming videos from U+ has never been easier. Play all your videos in
column4: >. Start, stop, fast forward, rewind…there is no waiting when streaming content from U+!
column5: >U+ supports MP4, MOV, AVI, RMVB, MKV mainstream video play and more

column3: > can view, store, save and stream data smoothly and directly from U+, at the same time.

column1: No internet connection or mobile data required! - U+ acts like a normal USB device in that you can save and transfer information, except, U+ does it all wirelessly. Think of U+ as a super USB. This is all done by an APP via Direct Wi-Fi (device to device wifi) connection.

What we've created in u+ is one step ahead – a device with more integration with you smart devices (iOS and Android). You can browse pictures in the app, sync pictures and documents with phone storage, and watch movies without downloading or opening video in another player. Plus:
U+ is social, you can instantly share content to your social media

Customize name of stored photos. All of us have experienced the troublesomeness of having to scroll from top to end to find your pictures on your iPhones. With U+, you can customize the name of the photos and find it right away
Easily transfer files between U+ and your smart devices. Just click, press, click and your file is transferred!
<ul><li><b>Take pictures and store the pictures directly &amp
•  Set password on U+ to protect your content and privacy
Use the removable wireless USB as a normal USB drive!

Copy, paste, delete. It cannot be easier! We designed U+ so the USB is removable and no cord required to connect U+ and computer. Just unplug the removable USB, plug into computer or any power source and the device works. U+ is designed for convenience, mobility and simplicity.

You can store your family’s favorite videos and multimedia content directly to U+. Through the U+ App, your entire family can watch their favorite content and enjoy the ride. You will never be asked “Are we there yet?”

Do you dread long business travels? Does your team need to share and collaborate at a client site? Do you want to leave your laptop at home? The answer: U+. With U+, store your business files directly on the device and you and your team can have access, anytime - anywhere. No internet connection required. Don’t need to worry about slow internet connections when meeting clients.
We use quality components to ensure U+ has great performance. Components include Qualcomm CPU, Samsung RAM, high speed flash memory

We are a group of designers and engineers with the desire to create a better consumer experience in electronics. Our team was officially founded in 2013 when we started noticing there was nothing on the market that could do what U+ can. There was not an easy way to store, access, and share videos, music, business documents and other content without access to the Internet. Thus, U+ was born out of the need to be able to share any content, anywhere, anytime.

U+ has been a labor of love for us and creating a positive user experience continues to drive our work. We have taken the time to build a product that is easy to carry everyday and an intuitive easy to use App.
Now, we are ready to present U+ to the market. We hope you join us in making this product a success. Thank You!

We are ready to take the leap and produce our product. We have researched and built the prototypes. We have tested and done our market research. Now, we need financial support for manufacturing. Manufacturing requires a significant investment especially for electrical devices.

We hope to raise enough funds to begin manufacturing our product. Your funding not only supports the manufacturing, but also helps cover our costs of applying for and passing the necessary quality control and certification processes. These mechanisms are expensive, but helps ensure the product you are receiving is of high quality and value.
","Introducing U+： The Powerful Smallest Wireless USB Flash Drive.
4500mAh Power Source, Always Keep Your Devices Charged!

One of the biggest challenges in using smart devices is power drain. With 4500 mAh power and 5V/2A output voltage, U+ acts as the perfect travel companion. No need to carry a separate power bank. Even the longest trips are no problem: U+ has up to 20 hours standby time and up to 12 hours of continuous play/streaming time! No matter how long the trip, U+ will be by your side.
U+ also integrates with your smart device's camera to create an easy to use selfie shutter. Just hold your phone out, and click the button on U+. Easy as ever!

Virtually no buffer time: Streaming videos from U+ has never been easier. Play all your videos in 1080P high definition. Start, stop, fast forward, rewind…there is no waiting when streaming content from U+!U+ supports MP4, MOV, AVI, RMVB, MKV mainstream video play and more
5 simultaneous users/devices can view, store, save and stream data smoothly and directly from U+, at the same time.

No internet connection or mobile data required! - U+ acts like a normal USB device in that you can save and transfer information, except, U+ does it all wirelessly. Think of U+ as a super USB. This is all done by an APP via Direct Wi-Fi (device to device wifi) connection.

What we've created in u+ is one step ahead – a device with more integration with you smart devices (iOS and Android). You can browse pictures in the app, sync pictures and documents with phone storage, and watch movies without downloading or opening video in another player. Plus:
U+ is social, you can instantly share content to your social media

Customize name of stored photos. All of us have experienced the troublesomeness of having to scroll from top to end to find your pictures on your iPhones. With U+, you can customize the name of the photos and find it right away
Easily transfer files between U+ and your smart devices. Just click, press, click and your file is transferred!
Take pictures and store the pictures directly & instantly to U+.
Set password on U+ to protect your content and privacy
Use the removable wireless USB as a normal USB drive!

Copy, paste, delete. It cannot be easier! We designed U+ so the USB is removable and no cord required to connect U+ and computer. Just unplug the removable USB, plug into computer or any power source and the device works. U+ is designed for convenience, mobility and simplicity.
What Can You Use U+ For?

You can store your family’s favorite videos and multimedia content directly to U+. Through the U+ App, your entire family can watch their favorite content and enjoy the ride. You will never be asked “Are we there yet?”

Do you dread long business travels? Does your team need to share and collaborate at a client site? Do you want to leave your laptop at home? The answer: U+. With U+, store your business files directly on the device and you and your team can have access, anytime - anywhere. No internet connection required. Don’t need to worry about slow internet connections when meeting clients.
We use quality components to ensure U+ has great performance. Components include Qualcomm CPU, Samsung RAM, high speed flash memory

We are a group of designers and engineers with the desire to create a better consumer experience in electronics. Our team was officially founded in 2013 when we started noticing there was nothing on the market that could do what U+ can. There was not an easy way to store, access, and share videos, music, business documents and other content without access to the Internet. Thus, U+ was born out of the need to be able to share any content, anywhere, anytime.

U+ has been a labor of love for us and creating a positive user experience continues to drive our work. We have taken the time to build a product that is easy to carry everyday and an intuitive easy to use App.
Now, we are ready to present U+ to the market. We hope you join us in making this product a success. Thank You!

We are ready to take the leap and produce our product. We have researched and built the prototypes. We have tested and done our market research. Now, we need financial support for manufacturing. Manufacturing requires a significant investment especially for electrical devices.

We hope to raise enough funds to begin manufacturing our product. Your funding not only supports the manufacturing, but also helps cover our costs of applying for and passing the necessary quality control and certification processes. These mechanisms are expensive, but helps ensure the product you are receiving is of high quality and value.",11.0,4,"1 Campaign

column3: >IntroFalls Ihnen der ariTag gefällt, können Sie auf der rechten Seite einen Perk auswählen.

column1: Dies ist eine Kampagne mit festem Zielbetrag. Daher erhalten Sie den geleisteten Betrag selbstverständlich von Indiegogo zurück, sollte der Zielbetrag von € 32.000 bis zum 1. Juni nicht erreicht werden. Besten Dank für Ihre Unterstützung!
column7:
>

Left your phone behind? You will be immediately alerted by ariTag's buzzer. This will also work the other way around. The phone will sound an alarm if your beloved ""ariTagged"" item is left behind. 


Der ariTag erinnert Sie

column1: Der ariTag alarmiert Sie sofort durch einen Piepston. Auch umgekehrt werden
Sie von Ihrem Smartphone erinnert, falls Sie einen „ariTagged“  Gegenstand wie beispielsweise den Schlüsselbund,
die Geldtasche oder die Handtasche zurückgelassen haben.

column12:
>

Searching for misplaced items? Not only can you make your ariTag beep from your phone, the ariTag also has its own button that allows you to make your phone ring, even if it's on silent.

column1: Ihr Smartphone ermöglicht Ihnen in Sekundenschnelle den Piepser des ariTags
zu aktivieren. Sollte Ihr Smartphone unauffindbar sein, können Sie es durch Betätigen des
ariTags klingeln lassen auch wenn es lautlos eingestellt ist.

column7:
>

Forget where you parked the car? Your phone keeps track of your ariTag. It automatically stores the last seen location and will guide you back there.

column1: Haben Sie vergessen, wo Sie Ihr Auto geparkt haben?
Sobald Sie das Auto verlassen, speichert Ihr Smartphone die GPS Position
automatisch ab und kann Ihnen somit den Weg zurück zu Ihrem abgestellten Auto
Folgende Smartphones sind für den ariTag geeignet:

Apple Smartphone mit iOS 7 :
- iPhone 4S
- iPhone 5
- iPhone 5C
- iPhone 5S

Android Smartphone 4.4 :
- Samsung Galaxy S3 / mini.
- andere Smartphones mit Bluetooth 4.0 sollten auch funktionieren, dies wurde aber noch nicht verifiziert.
column7:
>



Prototype Production
column14:
>Next Steps

After building the development prototypes for ariTag, we need your help. In order to offer the ariTag for a reasonable price we need a high volume production.

So the money raised during this funding is used to get all the tooling produced  for a nice casing and to build up the production line with test equipment. We also have to pass all the tests to get the needed certificates (CE, FCC, IC and Bluetooth SIG).

FAQ's

What type of smart phones are supported?

column1:
- Samsung Galaxy S3 / mini.
- any device with Bluetooth 4.0 might also work, but not tested.

How long will the battery of the ariTag last?

Under normal circumstances and usage conditions, the battery will last for 3 years.
No, but for a small fee and shipping cost, we’ll change it for you. Due to vibrations and low current consumption, soldered batteries are much more reliable.
The app is free and can be installed from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store.
Founder of aritec gmbh, Maienfeld. Specialized in firmware and hardware development for wireless communication system since 2005.
Founder of Gantner Microelectronic e.U., Bludenz. Expert on ultra low power systems and high frequency communication. Inventor of several patents for wireless identification systems.

Der ariTag weist Ihnen den Weg
Haben Sie vergessen, wo Sie Ihr Auto geparkt haben?
Sobald Sie das Auto verlassen, speichert Ihr Smartphone die GPS Position
automatisch ab und kann Ihnen somit den Weg zurück zu Ihrem abgestellten Auto
Folgende Smartphones sind für den ariTag geeignet:

Apple Smartphone mit iOS 7 :- iPhone 4S- iPhone 5- iPhone 5C- iPhone 5SAndroid Smartphone 4.4 :- Samsung Galaxy S3 / mini.- andere Smartphones mit Bluetooth 4.0 sollten auch funktionieren, dies wurde aber noch nicht verifiziert.TechnologyPrototype ProductionApp's:Next StepsAfter building the development prototypes for ariTag, we need your help. In order to offer the ariTag for a reasonable price we need a high volume production.So the money raised during this funding is used to get all the tooling produced  for a nice casing and to build up the production line with test equipment. We also have to pass all the tests to get the needed certificates (CE, FCC, IC and Bluetooth SIG).FAQ'sWhat type of smart phones are supported?
- Samsung Galaxy S3 / mini.- any device with Bluetooth 4.0 might also work, but not tested.
How long will the battery of the ariTag last?Under normal circumstances and usage conditions, the battery will last for 3 years.
No, but for a small fee and shipping cost, we’ll change it for you. Due to vibrations and low current consumption, soldered batteries are much more reliable.
How much does the app cost?
The app is free and can be installed from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store.

World first one that brings magnetic wireless charging into a stereo space, which makes the charging in any suitable direction you like! 

What is Lotus. Qi?

Lotus. QI is the world first innovative kind of lazy holder, which perfectly combined the magnetic QI wireless charging technology with kinds of holder in one smart product. With the 360 degree rotation and the hight adjustment features, the metal hosepipe holder provides a comforable way of daily life for users. The magnetic Qi wireless charging makes the charge effortless and phone took and put conveniently. So, it offers a great solution for a comfortable and convenient life! To meet the different occasion’s needs, we totally designed four different types. Anywhere anytime with you!

Where you need Lotus. Qi?

Lotus. Qi – A Long Type

Lotus A Long Type, is designed for home entertainment use. With a length of 65cm, It can be used anywhere as long as a fixed places in home to watch movies and video chat. 

NEVER LET LOW BATTERY BOTHER YOU ANY MORE!

 Charging and watching at the same time by this hand-free mount!

Lotus. Qi  - B Short Type

With a length of 230mm, it can be affixed to any smooth objects, such as glass, Ceram and paint. Designed for home, office and car use, it is the most widely used type in Lotus. QI family.

 Lotus. Qi help you save time in the busy working day or a date!

Lotus. Qi – C Desk Type

The purpose is to guide you finish the power charge at any time. The holder design offers you a better sight when it is on the charging. 

Remembering to charge your phone in time and avoid a low battery once go out. Enjoy an easy life!

Also affix to car windshield.

Lotus. Qi – D Car Type

Inserted into the car air vent steadily, Car Type offers a safe way of driving. You can have a hand free navigation, while keep the phone on charging!

Support both horizontal and vertical orientation, Lotus Car Type offers a 360 degree rotation. The sphere type design with a stiff nut makes the direction adjustment easily.

Why you need Lotus. QI?

Compared with the traditional wireless charger, which is hard to be located, slow charge and easy to hot, Lotus family provide a better solution to resolve these problems. Magnetic affixed way can get an accurate positioning and offer an effortless solution for wireless charging technology. We use the closed electromagnetic field emition technology to avoid overheat of the smart phones. The average charge speed is to add 1% every 1 minute.

MORE THAN THREE MONTHES FOR TEMPERATURE AND CHARGE SPEED TEST! YES, WE DID IT. 

 Position and tension test.

Both Android &

column12:
showinfo=0"">

Stretched goals

Everyone can get the update version for free once the amount get its target! Thanks for all your effort and help to make it updated!

 If you like the update version, pls help us to spread to make them done! Your help will be greatly appreciated!

Reward

Schedule

Why we need your support?  

The first trial production are done, all the products you have seen in the campaign are real version. As the high cost, sll your pledges will be used for the package and the mass production. With your support, we can bring Lotus. Qi to you in an earlier time. To bring the convenient life to more friends! Thanks in advance for your support! 

Who we are?

We are a vibrant and enthusiastic team with a lot of innovative concepts. Established in 2014, we already got 18 patents. Our designers and engineers have more than ten years’ working experience so far. They had worked projects for Microsoft/TOSHIBA/HP/DELL/Acer/Lenovo/Huawei before. Their work style always pays more attention to details and they focus on making functional products with a more convenient design.

Contact us!

For business and media: business@lotusqi.cc

For product information: service@lotusqi.cc

                         THANK YOU!

Risks and challenges

The big problem in the develop process is the relationship between magnetic field and electric field. It affected the charge speed and temperature if there is no a better solution for them. We tested and optimized for many times, and got a special solution to resolve these problems. Reason for the slow charge and hot temperature of traditional wireless charging is that the electromagnetic field is emitted in the Circular sector way. Parts of unused electric energy transform into heat energy wasted. However, the positioning parts cannot make sure the full effective charge. Therefore, we adopt the closed electromagnetic field emition technology to transform the energy to realize the quick charge (1 min for 1%, equal the wired charge speed) and control the heat below 40 degree. Magnetic affix method helps to get the accurate position.

Now, the functional samples already tested for three months, and they have been testing very well so far. There is no big challenge in front of us. The first trail batch already made. We will design the package in October. The lead time of production is about 15-20 days, so we will try to send the items within one month after the campaign. Through our effort, we hope to provide our users a friendly device. To be one of the member to make the world more beautiful!

Hello, everyone here on indiegogo! My name is Jacob as always, but that's just how I introduce myself on my YouTube videos that I love to do for my fans on my YouTube channel, MrNintendoFanMan. Anyways, the videos have been going great, that is until my two year old laptop started having a lot of problems starting in September 2012. First off, the wireless adaptor broke in there, so instead of getting the entire mother board fixed, I just got a Wireless adapater, so that I still can access the internet. Besides that, the laptop can't hold charge for more than five minutes without automatically shutting down. This typically wouldn't be a problem, but with the port not working to keep the laptop charged (even with the charger in), it has become a problem. Lastly, it shuts off during rendering process because of the port problem, it doesn't help that all but one USB port doesn't work either. The plan was, to wait until late July, to get a new one, but I'd rather not wait 3 months to do videos again. Honestly, if it weren't for the fact I didn't make videos, I'd stick with this one until it literally died, but that isn't the case. The reason behind the campaign is because I have rent I have to pay as well as college expenses, too. I do make some money from YouTube, but it's really not too much. I'd be purchasing an Asus DESKTOP, too.

It is really all about you guys, the fans of my videos. I love making the videos so much for you all, and I love and appreciate you all more than you can ever imagine. You all are the reason, the soul behind my videos! I cannot thank you enough for just taking the time to read this. Anything you guys could donate would be wonderful, the rest  :]
I'm asking for $500 (only because that is the minium) and I'll be purchasing this:
Also, if you guys feel I should get anything better, just let me know, and I'll look into it.

As for incentives for donating, I don't know what you guys all would want, but I'm willing to give away my Xbox 360 120GB Elite for the first person who donates $100.00. Also, for those who donate $20.00, they will receive a game of their choice that I we play. Whether it be Super Smash Bros Brawl, a Pokemon battle or YuGiOh duel, it's your choice. I don't know what else I could give away, but this is the best I could come up with.

If you guys can't donate, I still thank you and love you all more than you can imagine! You all have been nothing but the best motivation for me over the course of the past couple years, so your guys help has truly been a blessing. Thank you all, I love you all and I look forward to making more videos very soon that you all have enjoyed.

InputStick Mod:

InputStick Mod allows you to use your Moto Z as a USB keyboard and mouse. Take out the wireless receiver and plug it into the USB port, or use a USB cable instead. In a few seconds you can use your Moto Z to:
• dictate text and type results in real time

(image above is a concept render)

 

Android apps (already on GooglePlay):
USB Remote (remote control, major update coming up!)
KP2A plugin (InputStick plugin for Keepass2Android password manager)
• ... and more apps by other developers
• compatible with all USB-enabled devices (PC, Raspberry Pi, game consoles, smart TV, DVRs, etc.)
• does not require installing any software or drivers on USB host (PC)
• no need to modify Android OS (no custom ROMs or rooting)
• super easy to use, just like physical USB devices

How does it work?

InputStick Mod hardware emulates USB HID keyboard &
column2:
mouse. USB host will not notice any difference between InputStick Mod and physical keyboard or mouse.

 

Get it right now (sort of):

The Mod is an enhancement to the InputStick Wireless USB Receiver. It will support all InputStick-compatible apps (remote control software, password managers and more) right from the start. InputStick is already used by thousands users all around the world.

The InputStick Mod is right now in concept phase, however this campaign gives you an excellent opportunity to get InputStick USB Receiver (presented below) at reduced price. Once the Mod becomes available, you'll be able get all the new, unique features (see section below).

For all the details about InputStick, visit inputstick.com

 

Why make Moto Mod version of InputStick?

If InputStick is already available, why turn it into Moto Mod? Because Moto Mods platform allows to offer unique features, which are not available for any other smartphone:

column1: • store the wireless USB receiver inside the Mod (instead of carrying it separately),
• hardware-based anti-loss feature (you won't accidentally leave it in USB port),
• option to use wired USB connection (when data security and connection stability are most important),
• no configuration is required (no need for Bluetooth pairing and settings security options),
• allows use of IR and Bluetooth HID interfaces (if 1st stretch goal is reached).

Stretch goals:

Bluetooth HID will additionally allow to use the Mod as Bluetooth keyboard &
column2:
mouse. IR blaster will let you control audio devices, TVs, air conditioning units etc. This will allow to turn InputStick Mod into universal remote that can be easily used to control vast majority of modern devices.

 

About this campaign:

This campaign was created so that you can help with creating InputStick Mod prototype and show your interest in this product. There is no guarantee that the Mod will become commercially available product, even once the prototype is successfully completed. Because of high cost of CE/FCC certification and setting up production, this next step will depend on demand for this product.

Estimated price for the Mod is 59 USD (it may change, depending on additional features: Bluetooth HID, IR).

 

Hardware details:

1) InputStick Mod:

column1: • hardware-based anti loss feature for wireless receiver (get notified if connection is lost and the receiver was not put back inside the Mod)
• compatible with: Moto Z, Z Force, Z Play, Droid

• instant compatibility with all existing InputStick apps (requires only modification of InputStickUtility app, other apps use it as a proxy and will not notice difference between InputStick and InputStickMod)

• supported keyboard layouts: Belgian (FR/NL), Canadian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (UK/US/international/Dvorak), Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (BR/PT), Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Swiss (FR/DE)
<li>use InputStick API in your own apps: send keyboard &amp
column2: mouse actions directly to USB host (PC): InputStickAPI on GitHub

column1:
Timeline for the project:

1) if stretch goals are reached

2) of there is enough demand

 

Risks and challenges:

Most of the hardware, firmware and Android software required by this Mod already exists. InputStick receiver is commercially available since 2014 and currently used by thousands of users. During that time, a lot of bugs and problems were solved. This eliminates a lot of potential risks.

Still, there are some challenges and potential roadblocks:
• mechanical design of enclosure for the Mod
• redesigning wireless receiver: there's always a chance of running into RF issues,
• potential firmware issues with switching to newer microcontroller (from older STM32F1 series to STM32F0 series)

However, I believe that experience gained from working on InputStick receiver will allow me to overcome all potential problems.

 

Perks and shipping:
• all perks which include InputStick USB receiver (BT4.0 version) will be shipped within next few days after such perk is claimed
• all prices include international shipping (via registered air mail)
• delivery time is usually between one (Europe) and two (rest of the world) weeks
• you are responsible for any local taxes and customs fees if applicable (although rather unlikely)
• please contact me first, before claiming Keyboard layout or App feature perk

Disclaimer:

InputStick Mod, a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones. Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. All trademarks, product names and logos are the property of their respective owners.

 

FAQ:

Q: Why is InputStick Mod not available in any of the perks?

A: At this moment it is still a concept and it is too early to give any details about when it might be commercially available.

 

Q: What is the difference between InputStick BT4.0 (currently available) and InputStick Mod (concept)?

A: InputStick BT4.0 comes in a form of a USB dongle. It communicates with smartphones (Android, iOS) using Bluetooth. InputStick Mod is a concept of more advanced versions exclusively for Moto Z series. It offers additional features, is easier to carry and use.

 

Q: Do stretch goals also apply to InputStick BT4.0?

A: No, only Mod version allows to add such features.

 

Q: If I get InputStick BT4.0 version now, and InputStick Mod at some point in the feature, what can I do with BT4.0 one then?

A: InputStickUtility app allows to easily use multiple devices. You can for example keep it plugged in one of your PCs (it won't be necessary to use USB cable/receiver for that machine)

 

Q: Where will I be able to find updates about InputStick Mod?

A: inputstick.com and blog.inputstick.com

super easy to use, just like physical USB devices

How does it work?InputStick Mod hardware emulates USB HID keyboard & mouse. USB host will not notice any difference between InputStick Mod and physical keyboard or mouse. Get it right now (sort of):The Mod is an enhancement to the InputStick Wireless USB Receiver. It will support all InputStick-compatible apps (remote control software, password managers and more) right from the start. InputStick is already used by thousands users all around the world.The InputStick Mod is right now in concept phase, however this campaign gives you an excellent opportunity to get InputStick USB Receiver (presented below) at reduced price. Once the Mod becomes available, you'll be able get all the new, unique features (see section below).For all the details about InputStick, visit inputstick.com Why make Moto Mod version of InputStick?If InputStick is already available, why turn it into Moto Mod? Because Moto Mods platform allows to offer unique features, which are not available for any other smartphone:
store the wireless USB receiver inside the Mod (instead of carrying it separately),
hardware-based anti-loss feature (you won't accidentally leave it in USB port),
option to use wired USB connection (when data security and connection stability are most important),
no configuration is required (no need for Bluetooth pairing and settings security options),
allows use of IR and Bluetooth HID interfaces (if 1st stretch goal is reached).

Stretch goals:Bluetooth HID will additionally allow to use the Mod as Bluetooth keyboard & mouse. IR blaster will let you control audio devices, TVs, air conditioning units etc. This will allow to turn InputStick Mod into universal remote that can be easily used to control vast majority of modern devices. About this campaign:This campaign was created so that you can help with creating InputStick Mod prototype and show your interest in this product. There is no guarantee that the Mod will become commercially available product, even once the prototype is successfully completed. Because of high cost of CE/FCC certification and setting up production, this next step will depend on demand for this product.Estimated price for the Mod is 59 USD (it may change, depending on additional features: Bluetooth HID, IR). Hardware details:1) InputStick Mod:
hardware-based anti loss feature for wireless receiver (get notified if connection is lost and the receiver was not put back inside the Mod)
compatible with: Moto Z, Z Force, Z Play, Droid
consumer control (system volume, media playback, power)

instant compatibility with all existing InputStick apps (requires only modification of InputStickUtility app, other apps use it as a proxy and will not notice difference between InputStick and InputStickMod)

supported keyboard layouts: Belgian (FR/NL), Canadian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (UK/US/international/Dvorak), Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (BR/PT), Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Swiss (FR/DE)
use InputStick API in your own apps: send keyboard & mouse actions directly to USB host (PC): InputStickAPI on GitHub

Timeline for the project:1) if stretch goals are reached2) of there is enough demand Risks and challenges:Most of the hardware, firmware and Android software required by this Mod already exists. InputStick receiver is commercially available since 2014 and currently used by thousands of users. During that time, a lot of bugs and problems were solved. This eliminates a lot of potential risks.Still, there are some challenges and potential roadblocks:
mechanical design of enclosure for the Mod
redesigning wireless receiver: there's always a chance of running into RF issues,
potential firmware issues with switching to newer microcontroller (from older STM32F1 series to STM32F0 series)
However, I believe that experience gained from working on InputStick receiver will allow me to overcome all potential problems. Perks and shipping:
all perks which include InputStick USB receiver (BT4.0 version) will be shipped within next few days after such perk is claimed
all prices include international shipping (via registered air mail)
delivery time is usually between one (Europe) and two (rest of the world) weeks
you are responsible for any local taxes and customs fees if applicable (although rather unlikely)
please contact me first, before claiming Keyboard layout or App feature perk

Disclaimer:InputStick Mod, a Moto ModsTM concept for Moto Z smartphones. Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. All trademarks, product names and logos are the property of their respective owners. FAQ:Q: Why is InputStick Mod not available in any of the perks?A: At this moment it is still a concept and it is too early to give any details about when it might be commercially available. Q: What is the difference between InputStick BT4.0 (currently available) and InputStick Mod (concept)?A: InputStick BT4.0 comes in a form of a USB dongle. It communicates with smartphones (Android, iOS) using Bluetooth. InputStick Mod is a concept of more advanced versions exclusively for Moto Z series. It offers additional features, is easier to carry and use. Q: Do stretch goals also apply to InputStick BT4.0?A: No, only Mod version allows to add such features. Q: If I get InputStick BT4.0 version now, and InputStick Mod at some point in the feature, what can I do with BT4.0 one then?A: InputStickUtility app allows to easily use multiple devices. You can for example keep it plugged in one of your PCs (it won't be necessary to use USB cable/receiver for that machine) Q: Where will I be able to find updates about InputStick Mod?A: inputstick.com and blog.inputstick.com",4.0,0,"2 Campaigns
The SmartHub is a simple device to marry all of your display technologies together in one central location – Controlled through your mobile device.

The SmartHub centrally connects your desktop computer, DVD player, tablet, laptop, projector, wireless microphone and speakers while giving you the ability to stream content wirelessly from iOS, Android, Windows, or Mac. The SmartHub also includes an Android operating system to create your own custom classroom experience.

Controlled completely from your tablet, the SmartHub app lets you power the projector on and off, switch between A/V inputs, raise and lower the volume, and control the built in Android operating system.

We believe that technology can be a key to unlocking the natural curiosity that drives both educators and students and fuels the desire to learn.  This key should be within reach of every school and district, not just the wealthy. We believe our teachers deserve better than hand-me-downs from the world of consumer electronics.  We approached the product design following these core principles:

Every teacher and every classroom is unique,  and they deserve a solution that easily adapts to each unique environment. To be truly adaptable a technology must also be simple enough for every teacher, not just the tech savvy.  Each piece of our system was designed with this quality in mind.

Natural curiosity is what drives us to explore possibilities, and we want to empower both students and educators to do the same.  We have created a product that embraces the unique environment of the classroom, and encourage curiosity that is fun, innovative, and beneficial.

We plan on using every dollar pledged to place a SmartHub into the hands of a teacher in our nationwide crowdfunded pilot program. Teachers across the nation are being encouraged to set up micro campaigns on our website and then use the power of the crowd to get their friends, family, and fellow educators to help fund their micro campaign. You too can donate to a teacher's micro campaign at www.golumos.com/fundateacher or you can simply pledge and we will apply your donation to a teacher who tried but was unable to reach the needed amount to get a SmartHub.
The number one perk you will receive is the warm fuzzy feeling you get from knowing you are helping a students education. But here's the tangible stuff you get also:

column7: >Insider: $10 You'll get the inside scoop on everything we do here at Lumos through Indiegogo and email updates. You'll get invites to the shows we attend, as well as be eligible for our random giveaways to our loyal followers.

column1: Since you ponied up more than our insider we are going to give you more. Not only will get what the insider does but you also get a sweet *top secret* bumper sticker to proudly show off. You may not get sneak peek now, but once you have it you'll know you did the right thing.

Next level donating means a next level item. Obviously you're all about the SmartHub so we are going to help you shout it from the roof tops with this awesome shirt! Lets be honest, you've never seen a shirt this sweet.

Hat's off to you! This will go a long way to help a teacher you may or may not know receive a SmartHub for their classroom. For showing the love you will also receive a top secret item, the Lumos hat.

We all know that teachers are the underpaid and unsung heroes of our education system. Your contribution will go a long way to help a teacher receive a SmartHub for their classroom. Don't worry though, we won't let you walk away empty handed, for your contribution you will also receive a Lumos T-Shirt, Hat, and Bumper Sticker!

You my friends are the early adopters! Always on the hunt for the latest and greatest that technology has to offer. Willing to sleep on a sidewalk for days for the opportunity to be among the first to get your hands on technology's best. For that, we salute you! Not only will you get a SmartHub for a ridiculously low pledge, we will also give you a limited edition SmartHub Replica signed by the Lumos team. Can we say ""Heirloom in the making""?

column7: >All The Rest Of The Perks: $500, $600 and $650

column1: You're getting a full blown SmartHub! But there are limited quantities at each price point so don't waste time get one while the gettin's good.
Now go ahead and contribute, don't leave teachers hanging with a headache from their current technology.
