column1: EZ-CHARGE is a portable device that will transform atmospheric energy into usable electricity. It will harvest, store and then provide the electricity which you can use to charge your cellphone without the need for main power, battery power, solar power or hand cranking. It basically  provides FREE electricity!

EZ-CHARGE is a Technology project with a clear end and a targeted completion date when EZ-CHARGE  will be produced and shipped. Where we are today with the working PROTOTYPE can be seen on the VIDEO above.   You can check out how the final design is envisioned  in Final Product Design below as compared to the existing prototype as shown in the video.
Untapped forces of nature provide us with the opportunity to change our world!
Benjamin Franklin 1752 Experiments with ways to capture electricity from the air
EZ-CHARGE is an energy harvesting device that will pump electricity from the air.  It goes wherever you go, whenever you go and will be  there when YOU need it.
Everyone with a cellphone will need this amazing product from:
• The businessman or woman on the go
<li><b><b>School kids who use up their batteries with texting &amp
• The more than 1 Billion people Worldwide without electricity

The video below demonstrates the actual working circuitry of EZ-CHARGE.   The 1.5 volt battery is temporary and replaces the third circuit which will be built with the funds raised from this campaign.  The 1.5 volt battery produces ONLY 1.5 - 1.6 volts and is not responsible in any way for the nearly 69 volts that you will see in this demonstration.   The 68.5 volts....70 volts less the input of 1.5 volts...is from the air that surrounds us.  Check out the demonstration!
• EZ-CHARGE will never need to be plugged into a wall outlet
• It won't need sunny weather to work
• Lightweight and portable it  attaches easily to your cellphone
• EZ-CHARGE is smaller than a credit card only thicker
""...Imagine never have to plug your cellphone into a wall outlet, use batteries to charge it or depend upon solar power ever again.""
With EZ-CHARGE you will  have electricity that goes where you go, whenever you go...even if you are hanging from a rock.
Power in your pocket when and where you need it!
""...Anyone who has done any research into transforming atmospheric energy into electricity knows how incredibly important this is to every aspect of our lives.""
• EZ-CHARGE  is portable and lightweight for ease in carrying in your hand and can be slipped into a pocket, handbag, briefcase or backpack.
""...people are going to love this product.""
EZ-CHARGE connects up easily to your cellphone

column4: >EZ-CHARGE is the Insurance Policy for your Communication needs!

column1: As an Engineer working on projects from super-sonic jets to satellite systems I started this project while living and working in Africa  to help deliver electricity to the more than 1 billion rural poor who have cellphones but no way to charge them.  I quickly found that addressing the global cellphone market with a way to charge their phones would benefit billions of people.  We’ve been working on EZ-CHARGE for almost 5 years and have reached significant milestones on our own.
This is revolutionary and will change the way electricity can be provided.
• The device consists of three electronic circuits that work in harmony
• Two of these circuits are completed, working and are already producing an output of electricity from the atmosphere.
• These two circuits have exceeded all expectations and the output is currently at nearly 70 volts.
• Check out the video above and see how the current EZ-CHARGE prototype is working and the voltage that it generates.
• For purposes of this first generation EZ-CHARGE for the cellphone  only 5 volts will be required.
• Once the third and final circuit is completed the energy will circulate within the device.
• The device will HARVEST, CONVERT AND STORE energy 24 hours a day and then will be available to charge your cellphone when attached.
• Once finalized the energy is stored within the unit and will release electricity recharging your cellphone in the same way as if it were plugged into a wall outlet.

EZ-CHARGE will not need to remain plugged into your cellphone all of the time.  But when you are not using your phone you will be able to just plug the USB cable in and EZ-CHARGE will be recharging your phone while in your pocket, purse, backpack or briefcase.
EZ-CHARGE will never need to be plugged into a wall outlet.  It won't need a battery or sunny weather for it to work.
EZ-CHARGE has a variety of slip-on cases to suit your lifestyle.  Some of these cases have already been designed but require tooling.
• The basic EZ-CHARGE will come in a brushed case of durable ABS which will look very much like the prototype you see in the video as well as the prototype in the picture.
• The prototype that is pictured and in the video contains the completed working circuits and the third and final circuit will be added to that existing case.
Just remember with or without a slip on case EZ-CHARGE is only the size of a credit card or hotel room key only thicker.
Dazzling color slip on case for EZ-CHARGE is smaller than a hotel room key
""...This will be a game changer!  More than just a cellphone charger it is an energy harvesting device with Global impact.""

Nikola Tesla, inventor of AC electricity,  worked with harvesting energy from the air  in the early 1900's and has patents in this area. We know this concept is very important which is why we decided to make a device that would charge a cellphone rather than attempting to provide electricity to houses or factories.  We believe that the companies and people that need this technology will embrace it.
You should get really excited about the potential of EZ-CHARGE!
We are now in the final stages of completing the third circuit, additional case designs and tooling for the commercial product and production.

There is a simplicity in the overall EZ-CHARGE design.  The basic case houses the circuitry which enables the unit to harvest and store electricity.  The final EZ-CHARGE is scheduled to look close to the basic brushed silver ABS unit pictured below with the exception of the addition of our EZ-CHARGE logo which will be imprinted on the front of the case.

There are numerous reasons behind our decision to maintain the simplicity, the number one being to enable us to keep the pricing low for all consumers including the 1.5 billion rural poor.  They need this product but may not be able to afford a case with  more embellished housing.

With this in mind we began developing slip-on cases to appeal to numerous lifestyles.  It is our intention to continue designing and developing interesting and exciting slip-on cases to suit different personalities.

The first step in this design process is to conceptualize the design, commit it to paper, create an early stage mock up followed by a final prototype.  Subsequent to the prototype tooling must be done for each design.  This is the stage that we are currently in for the above slip-on case designs.

Once funding is completed the Timeline is as follows:  The overall projection from finalizing the third circuit to early production of EZ-CHARGE for our backers is 6 - 9 months.  Several tasks will be going on at the same time and will overlap.  Below is an estimate of time for each stage but some stages are running concurrently not consecutively,
• Purchase necessary software and hardware to complete the third and final circuit.  Finalize testing      120 days
• Finalize injection mold for EZ-CHARGE basic casing  45 days
• Finalize mold designs for initial slip on cases. 45 days
• Initial pre-production  run and packaging for project backers  60 days following completion of above stages
• Shipping EZ-CHARGE to backers  Projected July 2014 or sooner

It is important to realize that the energy harvesting technology that will allow you to charge your cellphone without main power, battery power or solar could be extrapolated into providing electricity for many other uses.
This is a revolution and as backers you can be an integral part of it.
Once the early pre- production has been completed  we intend to market EZ-CHARGE globally using an extensive distribution network that will begin with the big box retailers.
Backers will get EZ-CHARGE before anyone else.  That could be YOU! Be a part of this exciting project!
EZ-CHARGE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN YOUR LIFE!
With your trust and support we can bring EZ-CHARGE into all of our lives and change the way we receive electricity.
YOU  LOVE IT...YOU  BACK IT ... YOU   HAVE IT...FIRST!

You will be able to customize your basic EZ-CHARGE with one of the variety of amazing slip-on cases we are currently developing.  These cases will give your EZ-CHARGE a unique personality and can suit your lifestyle.  You can have one or many just remember they are the size of your credit card only thicker.
Some initial Steampunk Me EZ-CHARGE slip-on cases

So take it up a notch and try these on for size...from Metallics to Patents...Rhinestone covered Bling Me Up designs to Limited Edition Out Of This World Creative Fantasy of Steampunk...you are going to love EZ-CHARGE.
More designs are in the works so you can have an EZ-CHARGE case for every occasion.
A few of early slip-on cases for EZ-CHARGE....smaller than a credit card!
Make it your own to suit your lifestyle
CHECK IT OUT...THE FIRST IN THE NEW BIKER SERIES... BIKER BONES...WHAT DO YOU THINK?
Slip on one of the cases or just leave it naked... it will work regardless...it's your choice!
Whatever you decide, just join us and be part of our Community of backers that receives their EZ-CHARGE before anyone else. Just make sure to be part of this Game-Changing Revolution!
We have come a long way over these past 5 years  but now we NEED YOU TO BACK  US SO WE CAN  GO THE DISTANCE!
Your involvement in the EZ-CHARGE Indiegogo Community will enable us to refine the final design and get the Commercial product ready for production faster!
With your backing we can complete the project and do a special pre-production run for all of our backers.
We can now see the finish line and with your  support as Backers we can leave this planet a far better place.
This is a Game Changer and you can change the rules in which the game is played.
Collectively we will be making a dent   in the Universe.
We have put together an amazing array of great perks to present to our Backers including being part of the pre-production and receiving an EZ-CHARGE before anyone else!
·From the exciting Slogan Tee to the Custom His Hers &
column2: Theirs Bling Me Up the perks will excite each and every Backer.

column1: First there will be the EZ-CHARGE basic unit and as backers you guys will get it FIRST...BEFORE ANYONE ELSE!   Then there are more fantastic ways to embellish your EZ-CHARGE  and other amazing stuff... check it out!
<ul><li>·<b><i> Fabulous DAZZLING COLORS slip on cases
• ·OUT-OF-THE-W0RLD CREATIVE FANTASY OF STEAMPUNK ME! all part of the initial case designs for your EZ-CHARGE!
• ·You could have the VIP Custom Designed One-Of-A-Kind Bling Me Up EZ-CHARGE and  have Dinner with the Inventor!
• ·There will even be an Out of this World GALA for VIP backers and their guests  that is sure to delight and excite everyone!
We have some really special surprises that will blow you away.  You just have to be there!
Whatever perk you choose just be sure to be a part of this revolution in technology and SUPPORT  US by BACKING EZ-CHARGE!
DON'T WAIT...JOIN US AND BE A PART OF THE EZ-CHARGE COMMUNITY TODAY!
The Insurance Policy for your continued Cellphone Communications!

Dazzling color slip on case for EZ-CHARGE is smaller than a hotel room key
...This will be a game changer!  More than just a cellphone charger it is an energy harvesting device with Global impact.""

Nikola Tesla, inventor of AC electricity,  worked with harvesting energy from the air  in the early 1900's and has patents in this area. We know this concept is very important which is why we decided to make a device that would charge a cellphone rather than attempting to provide electricity to houses or factories.  We believe that the companies and people that need this technology will embrace it.
You should get really excited about the potential of EZ-CHARGE!
We are now in the final stages of completing the third circuit, additional case designs and tooling for the commercial product and production.

There is a simplicity in the overall EZ-CHARGE design.  The basic case houses the circuitry which enables the unit to harvest and store electricity.  The final EZ-CHARGE is scheduled to look close to the basic brushed silver ABS unit pictured below with the exception of the addition of our EZ-CHARGE logo which will be imprinted on the front of the case.

There are numerous reasons behind our decision to maintain the simplicity, the number one being to enable us to keep the pricing low for all consumers including the 1.5 billion rural poor.  They need this product but may not be able to afford a case with  more embellished housing.

With this in mind we began developing slip-on cases to appeal to numerous lifestyles.  It is our intention to continue designing and developing interesting and exciting slip-on cases to suit different personalities.

The first step in this design process is to conceptualize the design, commit it to paper, create an early stage mock up followed by a final prototype.  Subsequent to the prototype tooling must be done for each design.  This is the stage that we are currently in for the above slip-on case designs.

Once funding is completed the Timeline is as follows:  The overall projection from finalizing the third circuit to early production of EZ-CHARGE for our backers is 6 - 9 months.  Several tasks will be going on at the same time and will overlap.  Below is an estimate of time for each stage but some stages are running concurrently not consecutively,
Purchase necessary software and hardware to complete the third and final circuit.  Finalize testing      120 days
Tooling designs for proprietary components    30 days
Finalize injection mold for EZ-CHARGE basic casing  45 days
Connector cables/adapters final design approval  30 days
Finalize mold designs for initial slip on cases. 45 days
Finalize packaging design for EZ-CHARGE    45 days
Initial pre-production  run and packaging for project backers  60 days following completion of above stages
Shipping EZ-CHARGE to backers  Projected July 2014 or sooner

It is important to realize that the energy harvesting technology that will allow you to charge your cellphone without main power, battery power or solar could be extrapolated into providing electricity for many other uses.
This is a revolution and as backers you can be an integral part of it.
Once the early pre- production has been completed  we intend to market EZ-CHARGE globally using an extensive distribution network that will begin with the big box retailers.
Backers will get EZ-CHARGE before anyone else.  That could be YOU! Be a part of this exciting project!
EZ-CHARGE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN YOUR LIFE!
With your trust and support we can bring EZ-CHARGE into all of our lives and change the way we receive electricity.
YOU  LOVE IT...YOU  BACK IT ... YOU   HAVE IT...FIRST!

You will be able to customize your basic EZ-CHARGE with one of the variety of amazing slip-on cases we are currently developing.  These cases will give your EZ-CHARGE a unique personality and can suit your lifestyle.  You can have one or many just remember they are the size of your credit card only thicker.
Some initial Steampunk Me EZ-CHARGE slip-on cases

So take it up a notch and try these on for size...from Metallics to Patents...Rhinestone covered Bling Me Up designs to Limited Edition Out Of This World Creative Fantasy of Steampunk...you are going to love EZ-CHARGE.
More designs are in the works so you can have an EZ-CHARGE case for every occasion.
A few of early slip-on cases for EZ-CHARGE....smaller than a credit card!
Make it your own to suit your lifestyle
CHECK IT OUT...THE FIRST IN THE NEW BIKER SERIES... BIKER BONES...WHAT DO YOU THINK?
Slip on one of the cases or just leave it naked... it will work regardless...it's your choice!
Whatever you decide, just join us and be part of our Community of backers that receives their EZ-CHARGE before anyone else. Just make sure to be part of this Game-Changing Revolution!
We have come a long way over these past 5 years  but now we NEED YOU TO BACK  US SO WE CAN  GO THE DISTANCE!
Your involvement in the EZ-CHARGE Indiegogo Community will enable us to refine the final design and get the Commercial product ready for production faster!
With your backing we can complete the project and do a special pre-production run for all of our backers.
We can now see the finish line and with your  support as Backers we can leave this planet a far better place.
This is a Game Changer and you can change the rules in which the game is played.
Collectively we will be making a dent   in the Universe.
Your contribution will  fund the       following:
We have put together an amazing array of great perks to present to our Backers including being part of the pre-production and receiving an EZ-CHARGE before anyone else!
·From the exciting Slogan Tee to the Custom His Hers & Theirs Bling Me Up the perks will excite each and every Backer.

First there will be the EZ-CHARGE basic unit and as backers you guys will get it FIRST...BEFORE ANYONE ELSE!   Then there are more fantastic ways to embellish your EZ-CHARGE  and other amazing stuff... check it out!
· Fabulous DAZZLING COLORS slip on cases
·OUT-OF-THE-W0RLD CREATIVE FANTASY OF STEAMPUNK ME! all part of the initial case designs for your EZ-CHARGE!
·You could have the VIP Custom Designed One-Of-A-Kind Bling Me Up EZ-CHARGE and  have Dinner with the Inventor!
·There will even be an Out of this World GALA for VIP backers and their guests  that is sure to delight and excite everyone!
We have some really special surprises that will blow you away.  You just have to be there!
Whatever perk you choose just be sure to be a part of this revolution in technology and SUPPORT  US by BACKING EZ-CHARGE!
DON'T WAIT...JOIN US AND BE A PART OF THE EZ-CHARGE COMMUNITY TODAY!
The Insurance Policy for your continued Cellphone Communications!",11.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: A device that holds the concentration of creativity, technological solutions search and prototype testing. Invented to help computer users to reduce discomfort of daily work and gaming.
Do you feel a discomfort or pain in your wrist, after long hours of computer work
or gaming? Does it cause you to lose concentration during these activities?
Couple years ago we faced the problem of the 21th century. The wrist pain and discomfort from prolong use of computer mouse or a keyboard. The
problem originated in the gaming world, where the mouse is mostly used.
problem, surveyed users and reached the conclusion that the problem is bigger
Every user had the same problem.
internet search on the subject generated millions of results.
Some of them were terrifying. In
some cases the problem was listed as the tunnel carpal syndrome (the
worse form of the problem, some had to have surgery to resolve it).
We started to  look for a solution.
were made from handy prototyping materials, with no coating, noisy and bulky designs.
increased the ergonomic comfort level. We were consultation from several orthopedists, whose inputs helped to shape the product.
We tried a vast variety of materials, shapes and coatings. Finally
we made a successful prototype with optimal form and most important – minimal
present our final product, which was created through the ingenuity of our team.
Moshotus ergonomic device makes working and gaming more comfortable.
Moshotus is compatible with all types of mice.
Moshotus facilitates hand movements, with minimal weight impact.
Moshotus has a perforated form that gives the wrist the ventilation to eliminate sweat.
different PC activities, such as CAD software use, engineering tools, coding,
You have some options to choose from:
Prices include free shipping to USA and Europe.
Bring 2 friends to get 50% off.Bring 5 friends and get your Moshotus for free.

You will get a special bag for your Moshotus.

give one dollar and know that an
Israeli soldier, on the battlefield, will receive tremendous inspiration
and spiritual strength from your small donation?
If you want to give inspiration, hope, and healing
to the brave soldiers keeping Israeli men, women and children safe, please read
Battle is a time of bravery, fear, and closeness to God,
a time in which every moment lasts forever. It’s easy to imagine how vulnerable
Recently, Israeli soldiers from in Gaza contacted Nucampaign,
a global community of Ambassadors for Israel, and asked if they could be sent pocket-sized
Known as the Complete Remedy in English, Tikkun Haklali
is a collection of ten Psalms specially chosen by Rebbe Nachman of Breslov for their
from a wide variety of backgrounds have heard of the power of these soul-stirring
Nucampaign contacted us, Breslov Research Institute, and we immediately printed and sent out 3000 Protective-Edge
Special-Edition of Tikkun Haklali which also contain inspiring quotes and other

prayers. The amazing people at Nucampaign generously paid for the printing costs and we published the books for free. 

When the soldiers received the
books, <i>5000 of their comrades asked if
There are literally thousands of additional IDF soldiers who could benefit from the chizuk,
spiritual strength, this gift could bring. And we want to send them copies—fast.
That’s why we’re asking you to make these spiritual benefits come true for the courageous young
We’re hoping we raise enough funds for 18,000 copies
the Protective-Edge Special- Edition of Tikkun Haklali</u>. But we don’t think
the soldiers should have to wait 30 days until our fundraising campaign ends.
That’s why, each time we reach the 5000 dollar donation
mark, we’ll immediately call our printer in Israel and he’ll do a rush job.
Nucampaign and Breslov Research Institute will make sure
the soldiers get the special edition pocket-sized books—right away.
only need to donate one dollar to give a soldier this soul-uplifting
edition. But if you are able to <b>answer
the plea of 10 soldiers with a $10 donation, or 50 soldiers with a $50
donation, we’ll be able to reach our goals and get more books out to them

Won’t you join us and send a spiritual edge to the brave Israelis serving in Protective Edge? 

UPDATE 8/4

We received word that soldiers are interested in receiving the Hebrew editions of The Gentle Weapon and The Empty Chair in addition to the Protective-Edge Special-Edition Tikkun Haklali, so we will be distributing these as well. Donations will go towards any of these tremendously inspiring books. 

Ceasefire Distribution Plan Update

Thank God the ceasefire in Israel seems to be holding and many of the reservists have returned home. We hope and pray for continued peace.

At the same time, there are still tens of thousands of soldiers near the border, and Israel may maintain a permanent self-defense buffer zone along the Gaza border. While we are still in the midst of printing and distributing booklets, the future movement of the soldiers is uncertain. We are therefore expanding our distribution efforts country-wide and offering IDF soldiers and possibly families adversely affected by the war, the opportunity to also benefit by receiving Tikkun Haklalis, and/or The Gentle Weapon and The Empty Chair booklets.

Should you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me: yossik@breslov.org or (732) 534-7263.

A personal note from Gil Bashe, Chair of the Breslov
Research Institute and Team Leader of the Send a Spiritual Protective Edge to IDF Soldiers campaign.
As a former IDF Staff Sargent and combat medic during the
first Lebanon War 1982-1985, I served in an IDF paratrooper unit in Lebanon six
times. I also participated in the battles of Sultan Yacob and Sidon.
When I hear about the bravery, faith, and sadly, the
losses, of the Israeli soldiers fighting in Gaza, today, I close my eyes and am
taken back to my service.  Although no
one can know what lies in the heart of another, the possible exception is a
Soldiers know that inspiration can be in short supply
when you’re facing mortal danger. And that Heavenly inspiration like that found
in Tikkun Haklali might mean the difference between despair and hope.
Thank you for joining me and sending our young men
faith—in the form of this inspiring edition of Tikkun Haklali and other
prayers. These young men might not know your name, but they will appreciate having
this book in their uniform pockets at all times, no matter where they might be.
Now, I am going to ask you a personal favor. Would you
consider giving a bit more? Your donation of 180, 360, or 500 dollars will help
us reach our first 5000 dollar goal, and the pockets of Israeli soldiers, more quickly.
Please see the perks for all the special thank you gifts you'll receive for your kindhearted donation.
It's so special to be part of this unique opportunity to give a spiritual gift to
those who are in need of it most—young soldiers on the battlefield.
I’m grateful that you—and I—are able to support the Send a Spiritual Protective

If you miss the campaign you can get latest version of Awesome PCB with 7 different type of packages 0402, 0603, 0805, 1206, SOT23, SOT223, SOT323 here.

What's This All About?

Awesome PCB makes it easy for you to place SMD components on your Bread Board.

Why SMD on your Bread Board?

There
are many reasons.  First, often there simply are no THT components
available to perform as you need - they do not make them. So, the only
way to get the component on your Bread Board is by using the SMD version
- there is no other.  Second, often it is important that your prototype
is as representative of the final product as possible - some SMD
components do not have an identical equivalent in a THT package - so,
again, you need the real thing - you need that particular SMD component

on your Bread Board.  So, Awesome PCB is the perfect link from SMD components to your Bread Board.

The puzzling  was how easily and efficiently make implement SMD components for a prototype made on Bread Board.

In such a way born Awesome PCB.
• The first so small and powerful PCB, with so many different packages.
Makes it easy to determine component value
• Easily identify the component on the circuit diagram
Component once used can be reused in future projects
Pins or sockets can be used depend of used platform
Directly connect to Arduino or other development board
Awesome PCB allowed to make wide variety of connections on PCB

column11:
/>


 ... others depend on your creativity!

What else is Awesome with Awesome PCB?

column1: everyone who has made a prototype using a Bread Board knows how quickly
their elegant circuit design can look like a tangled mess of wires and
unidentifiable components.  Awesome PCB can help reduce the clutter by
providing a foundation for small modules with some internal integration.  A few Awesome PCBs on your Bread Board, and suddenly it can look
And because you can write on Awesome PCBs, you will no
longer need to wonder what a component is - all can be clear.  If you
have a capacitor, inductor, LED or temperature sensor on an Awesome PCB,
you will no longer need to wonder at the value - you add the ID, and
every time you use it, you will not loose it!
• SMD footprint on the top of PCB - 0603, 0805, 1206, SOT23 and SOT223,
• Hole for 3 PIN connector with rast 0.1 inch [2.54 mm]
• Awesome PCB can be placed side by side in Bread Board
Just 3 simple steps are required to use Awesome PCB!
• Solder desired component in a housing 0603, 0805, 1206, SOT23 or SOT223.

Your opinion matters to me. Right now stage of the project is like was presented. Main formula of design will be kept, but some adjustment will be performed. Therefore I'm asking you what do you think? What can be done better? What can be improved?

Regarding risk, it is an unavoidable and an inescapable fact of each project. It is no different for this project, which is being carried out.

In case of this project the main source of the risk is reliable supplier of the PCB.
Through my professional work, I develop network reliable suppliers of the PCB, who are able to meet time and high quality standards. PCB will be performed by the European supplier.

Second type of risk is fulfil the time-line regarding delivery - mainly it depends on the interest. Nonetheless I am determinate to fit in the given time frame. All shipments will be insured.

Why I need your help?

Please help me spread an idea of the smart prototype with Awesome PCB.
Support this project and help bring it to a wider community of electronics.
Thank you for your help and support.

Perk


Stretch goals

# STAGE 1 - 1700$
Unlock additional 2 packages for all Founders:
column3:
/>

# STAGE 2 - 2200$

Unlock perk with Gold Plating PCB

Please visit our new website at:
iRemoteBluetooth.com
Have you ever walked away from your car then wondered if you have pressed the lock button?
Have you ever left home just to realize you forgot to close the garage door?
How many remotes do you have?  Two or more car remotes, garage remote, gate remote, but they are scattered throughout.
Do you have an existing device that needs to be upgraded or simply hard to reach?

iRemoteControl has the ability to automatically control your existing remotes and devices, at the same time combine all your remotes into the iPhone.  Also makes a great backup incase you lose your keys or Remote!

Hello, my name is Mike Lee. About 3 years ago, I had this idea to replace remote control car key fobs using the iPhone, but I sat on it waiting for someone else to do it. Someone did, but after about $150.00 in materials, and the need for a professional to install it (which probably cost hundreds too), I thought it was time for me to come up with a better solution.

My version would be simple, easy to install by ANYONE, and most of all, cheap considering the alternatives. While I was designing my prototype, I thought, why stop at car remotes? Wouldn't it be great to control anything that has a button: garage doors, home alarms, you name it! We could deploy this across any industry! Not only are you in control of anything, you can improve existing devices.

At it's heart, it's a Bluetooth Hub that connects to any iOS device using 4.0 BT standards.  This means, the latest iPhone4s and iPad can be used as the controller to control all your existing remotes and devices.
The second part is the Actuator.  The actuator can be attached to any existing remote then controlled with your iPhone!

First, the actuator is held to anything with industrial double-sided tape.  Just stick the actuator onto anything.  If you have 3 buttons on your car remote, you'll probably want to use 3 actuators and so on.

Second, download and install the app from the app store.  Take a picture of whatever device you are planning to control. Assign the virtual buttons on top of the picture you just took, and you are done!
Third, if you are controlling a car remote, hide your car remote in your car.

Our fully functioning prototype can have a maximum of four relays that can control the Actuator from each Bluetooth Hub.  You can control more Bluetooth Hubs with our Pro App.  The Free app only allows connection to one Bluetooth Hub.

Each Bluetooth Hub can be battery powered, car powered or home powered.  Because it's Bluetooth, you don't need to worry about configuring network settings.  It'll just connect.  It will be small and portable so you can take it with you.

The more Bluetooth Hubs you have, the more you can control: Just swipe between devices!  As you can imagine, you can have all your devices, once scattered about, all in your iPhone!  The possibilities are limitless!
Anyone in the family can control any device as long as they have an iPhone or iPad.

Magic button is optional.  For the Techies, all you need is the Bluetooth Hub and you can direct wire up to anything, such as cars, garage door remotes, gate openers, light-switches, etc.  Practically anything that can be controlled with a relay!

If you do use the Actuator, just peel off the backing to the sticky tape and adhere it to whatever you wish to push.  The top of the actuator is a button itself so you can manually push the top of the magic button as well.
What industries can this be used in?
• Limitless, door locks, automated window shades, alarms...
• Any item that is hard to reach by handicapped persons.
• Activating a water valve without getting out of tractor.
• Remotely take a picture with your SLR camera.
• and many more uses on existing devices...

I have invented a lot of stuff in the past, but the biggest pain is not knowing exactly what the market demand is.  I think Indiegogo is a GREAT place for this.  It accomplishes two things:  One, the more support I get, the more likely I know this is a great idea!  Second, it really does start this project right away so we can take this to production now!  The more support we get, the cheaper it will be and the more hands we can get this into.
• Schematic layout design, component identification, Bill of Materials for the new PCB board
• Tooling and an expert designer for the enclosure for the Bluetooth hub
• The ""Magic Button""  will be re-engineered to a smaller size.
• Assembly, testing and packaging cost money too.

Automation.  I'd really like to upgrade the current app to include additional features such as location awareness (imagine walking away from your car and having it automatically lock/unlock, or start?), security, and a bunch of other stuff.
• The more you pledge, the cheaper the final product price will be.

• If we don't make our goal, it will be a big disappointment.  However, if there are some contributions, we'll put the money towards whichever reward level gets the most funding.  Meaning if you put more funding towards the actuator then we'll fine tune the actuator more.  If more funding is towards the bluetooth Hub, then we'll put the remaining money on developing the bluetooth hub.  We need at least $50,000 for the bluetooth hub, while needing $19,000 for the actuator.  Keep in mind that because you need the Bluetooth board to do most of the control, the final decision will weigh towards developing the Bluetooth hub.  Anything less we'll put towards further app development.  You input also will sway our opinion on which to develop further first.
You pledge is not all we need!
1) There might be some applications we missed, so drop me a note!

2) Because we are pre production, we can use your input.  Let me know what you think the final product should look like.  I'd be happy to design this with you in mind.  And if you happen to be a designer out there, we'd be more than happy to hear from you too!
3) Tell your friends, tell the world!

German translation/Deutsche Übersetzung

It should be easy for everyone to have a private conversation when using a smartphone.

Unfortunately the currently available solutions are either too complicated for non-technical people. Or they are so badly implemented that every kid with a laptop can spy on the conversation. And some even require you do register yourself on a central server.

This project will offer an easy to use solution that uses properly implemented high grade cryptography.

I am a very experienced software developer doing cryptography for 25 years now. 20 years ago I and a fellow student have developed our first phone encryptor LC-1:

It was really not something you would want to carry around with you.
column2:
>Today it is possible to have an even higher level of security with nearly every available smartphone:

The usage is very easy: at the beginning of the phone call just ask if your conversation partner sees the same 3 words on their display. If this is the case, then you can be sure that this line is secure.

There is also no need to register on a central server, you only have to install it on both smartphones.

Right now the app does the encryption right but is not very user friendly. We need your help to turn it into a better product, that everyone can use. We want to make secure phone calls are as normal as unencrypted phone calls are today.
column7:
>What we will do after funding succeeds

We plan to extend the app significantly, so that it becomes easier to use and more stable:

column1: • improve the voice quality for bad connections
• make it easier to place a phone call, redial etc.
Also the security will be improved to protect the device against several attacks:

column4: > to protect against being forced to hand out the key

column2: >add perfect forward secrecy to protect against decryption after the device has been compromised
>add one time pads to provide the only mathematically proven ""unbreakable encryption"" for those who want to go the extra mile

column1:
The risk of failure is very low as the techniques are well established and only have to be implemented properly.

As a backer, you will get a copy (or more) of the Android app once it's done, that you can use to do encrypted phone calls.
column2: >If we exceed the goal, new features will be added. On the list are things like
>get the app audited by an accredited laboratory

column1: If you have a good idea what to add, please send it to us! If we don't reach the goal, we will still make the app, but it will take significantly longer to complete it.
column6:
>The result

The Snowden papers have showed that mass surveillance is not a dystopian fantasy but hard reality. Even lawyers cannot be sure that they are not wiretapped. The recent data scandals have showed again, that it is too often very easy to break into a private conversation with just a little efford.

But even if you ""don't have anything to hide"", there are people in other countries that face the death penalty for doing nothing more then placing a phone call. This project will give them means to protect them and make it harder for governments to oppress their people.
column11:
>If you want to help

Please share the link to this project with others. Educate them, that spying on a conversation is way too easy today. Tell them that secure and easy to use cryptography will be available soon and will only require a simple smartphone.

Thank you!

Updates

Update 1

The app does not rely on Android's ""SecureRandom"" alone. Instead if uses several sources of randomness to generate the encryption keys. I've uploaded a demo of the random number generator here:
http://www.huwig.de/phone.apk
If you are interested, you can get the source of the RNG on GitHub.

#Privacy Matters.

We believe that government and corporate snooping are the biggest threats to personal liberty and democracy that we’re facing.

And you’re right, we need political change. But do you trust politicians? 

We sure don’t.

COMMUNITY

column1:
CUBE is a technology that makes protecting your privacy easy.

Our device is a plug and play, open source, energy efficient server designed from the ground up with your security and privacy in mind. 

You can trust COMMUNITY CUBE, because all our hardware and software is open source and available for review.
column3: >one-time-payment product with no hidden or recurring fees
column4:
>.

Our one-to-all, all-to-one model provides an ideal platform which can provide any Internet service you might need, while eliminating the risk of being

column1: spied on by  government agencies, big corporations, hackers and malicious software.

The Internet is full of ""free"" services.

Most are offered by large corporations that work for the common good.
column16:
>Come on. You know better.

They are giving you something for “free” because they want something in return - your personal private information.

By burying the details in their terms and conditions page, they are in fact hiding their nefarious intentions.

We operate exactly the opposite.

Because

column1: we integrate into each COMMUNITY CUBE a carefully selected  security
audited services, you no longer need to depend on the good intentions of

these big corporations.

Each COMMUNITY CUBE comes with the following functionality:
• Cage OS, a secured open operating system
• A decentralized anonymous Search Engine with administrator rights.
• A filter-connector for your Social Networks in one single place.
• A secure Storage System with collaborative tools
• Transparent Email encryption for your actual email.
Ad-blocker, intrusion prevention system, anti-virus and anti-tracking technology for your web browsing.
development of COMMUNITY CUBE services offers independence from any
Internet authority, the cloud, corporation or government while educating
users actively about data security, privacy and data disaster.

The development of Community Cube services offers independence from any Internet authority, corporation or government agency while educating users about data security, privacy and data disaster survival.
column15:
s=ce3178685124f816f735a8ec28ea0144"" src="""" style=""""/>

Community Cube is built on open-source hardware, and its operating system and features are built on free and open-source software (FOSS). Community Cube uses the boards ODROID-XU3 Lite from Hardkernel, which is 99% open, and you can run any Linux based operating system on it. You can find the electronic schema and here our 3d design.
column22:
s=8cbfae8afc763a6fec58bac78bdced92"" src="""" style=""""/>

Open source hardware is constructed using design and development related information that is offered freely and publicly accessible, includes schematic diagrams, code, parts lists, construction parameters and documentation.

column1: If you don’t hack/root it, then you don’t own it.

s=32b27098e3f9cbaa058c23dbdb730f38"" src="""" style=""""/>

We build a decentralized distributed grid where Community Cube is the physical hardware layer. Users get a citizen-fueled infrastructure.

In technical words , to protect you, Community Cube does:

column1: • Filtering virus, exploits malware, ads , bad IP-sources and bad content.
• Decentralizing the services (doing impossible to apply big data to you )
• Open authentication (dissolve legal relation between user and name-ip), Dark-nets (anonymisation of IP)
• Forcing encryption for all communications and data storage and in rest.
• Filtering the data that expose you, like scripts,cookies, browser info,etc.

s=d7756c2ea3818bb8f16f469815cd4b28"" src="""" style=""""/>

COMMUNITY CUBE is designed to be robust and versatile.

You can connect your COMMUNITY CUBE to the network in the way that best suits you.

We support both cabled and wireless connections to your devices.

Each COMMUNITY CUBE comes with four network interfaces which are configured as follows: 2 Wireless and 2 Cabled Ethernets.

Are

column1: you outdoors? You can use our universal USB battery pack and any
outdoor Internet connection (like 3G) to continue securing your

communications.

The following diagram shows 2 different ways of connecting your COMMUNITY CUBE:

column8:

Once connected to the network, your data is always waiting for you.

Whether

column1: you are at home, in the office, or on the go, you can reach your data
and use decentralized services, with absolute control, total privacy and

column8:
s=fbf5b38e325988dcc65c9f1e18427f11"" src="""" style=""""/>

With COMMUNITY CUBE you effectively create a quarantine zone which

column1: constitutes an isolated sub-network that adds an additional layer of

security.

If you are running a publicly accessible web server this is especially important.
Operating System is a Linux brand made by Debian that has been
customized for optimal security. Some of the features that have been
added and modified the Linux kernel (core):
• Anti-exploitation modules high tuned for OS attacking resistance.
• Anti-forensic capabilities in the case of seizure by law enforcement.
<li>Cryptographically enhanced modules for file memory and access modes.
Boot and Full disk encryption and Cold Boot Attack patched.
<li>Isolation: Each service runs in an isolated environment, to prevent
security bugs that may affect the rest of the system and services.
• Optimization: Proper service configuration helps to avoid possible vector attacks of unused libraries.
• Backward/downward compatible: New security standards can receive, read, view or play older standards or formats.
There's a initial script to modify a Debian Wheezy and convert it into a CageOS:https://github.com/CommunityCube   You can read more in www.cageos.org

column15:
s=478a1230d139ec9d139fea2ee17acc8d"" src="""" style=""""/>

Imagine all the important information you have stored on the hard drive of your computer. You are just one hardware failure away from disaster.

Centralized models like cloud storage such as Drop box and Go0gle Drive or normal self hosting like a hard disk present a variety of risks for its users, including:

column1: • Data kidnapping: A real example was Mega. (FBI closed it in 2009).
• Disaster: Your external hard disks fail or stolen. (no disaster recovery)
• Privacy: You're at risk of having your data hacked and stolen if it’s not encrypted.

column8:
s=c47ee90b60ef6ceea8b73b0f5a382f47"" src="""" style=""""/>

COMMUNITY CUBE is much more powerful.

In our decentralized system your valuable information is encrypted three times:

1. Before it even leaves your computer, in the web browser

column1: 2. In the collaboration tool before the data goes to the hard disk

3. When backing up to the grid, the slices will also be encrypted. 

The
against Sybil attacks and upload Dodos) is a new way to make your data

indestructible. 

A grid splits your files up into little pieces,
encrypts them and spreads them out geographically, making it immune to

any disaster or service outage.

Consider the following diagram
column8:
s=d27262d6ec34343823c947ab169173c1"" src="""" style=""""/>

With COMMUNITY CUBE you control what you share with people and how you share it with other people and synchronize shared content and collaborated tools

column1:
automatically.

You can share not just single files through links,
but a complete set of folders, contacts, agendas, and collaboration
information with single or multiple cubes at one time then allowing
upgrades of the set of collaboration data in real time automatically and

anonymously.


You can also sync your home Community Cube with all of your portable devices to have the same files and receive the same alerts in real time.
column8:
s=1e9ed50f9e6caef8930f404ff50e20c4"" src="""" style=""""/>

If someone steals your cube or for some reason it is destroyed, you

column1: can simply buy a replacement COMMUNITY CUBE server and recover your lost

data automatically from the Grid. In minutes you’re up and running again!

The following diagram illustrates the different layers of data encryption that COMMUNITY CUBE provides:

We don’t mince words.

Centralized social networks like Facebo0k and Tw1tter are selling your information.

In
fact, not only do they sell your information but they process, analyze,
correlate and integrate your personal data with literally millions of
independent data points that they either capture or purchase. In many ways they know more about you than even you do!
column8:
s=0b73458d8886aad1e35e49eceae40884"" src="""" style=""""/>

COMMUNITY CUBE can act as a unified entry and outgoing point for all

column1: of your posts across social networks, as well as a filter for what is

important to you.

For example, do you hate cat videos? (Really? Can I get you some help?)

You can use Community Cube to filter them out when it automatically imports posts from Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest!

You
control your incoming and outgoing posts, and push your posts from a
single place to everywhere with no need to open each social network in a

separate tab.

We aren’t asking you to give up on social media.

Instead we offer you a way to be in the captain’s chair.
column8:
s=8cd9263199fbda12c440c49bedf3d5a6"" src="""" style=""""/>

Search engines are almost just as bad. Do you really want Google to keep a record of every whimsical search you make of the Internet?

Consider the following diagram:
column15:
s=589d4c06d80225150f6f028cdb917cbd"" src="""" style=""""/>

We fixed this.

With your COMMUNITY CUBE, you are in

column1: charge. Thanks to our open source search engine and control panel, you

can manage everything about your on-line searches.

You can configure almost anything to increase the quality of your results.

More importantly, forget ads, forget positioning, and forget leaving logs about what and from where you searched.
column8:
s=f71a3fbef2883a7e85ab6191b09a065f"" src="""" style=""""/>

Just like search engines, most on-line communication programs also represent serious privacy issues.

Consider the problems that entrusting everything to a corporate middleman can cause:

Centrally authenticated chats and voice calls are open to supervision and control.
column15:
s=036aabff0063664e82d4ff99a3983360"" src="""" style=""""/>

Once again your COMMUNITY CUBE saves the day!

In our video conference model, we support two methods: 

a)

column1: With federated XMPP servers for authentication but perfect for
discovering users outside the Community Cube network with security from

the normal web. 

b) Unauthenticated and decentralized web browser
video conferencing through anonymous links to create fast video
conference rooms without third parties or middlemen involved.
column8:
s=fda1a62c286bf0ddd21455c341e109ad"" src="""" style=""""/>

Did you know that all your emails are being read?

And it’s not ONLY the government. Your email provider is also reading and analyzing every email you send!   They

column1: log your location, the time and related Internet searches and are

constantly building an ever-more accurate profile of who you are.

This must be stopped.
column8:
s=b8faa6fbff1630ab4af8ea5ef27d3884"" src="""" style=""""/>

COMMUNITY CUBE solves this problem without causing you any inconvenience.

We encrypt emails transparently with the COMMUNITY CUBE web-mail front end.

You don’t even need to change your actual email address.

Our

column1: system uses a very simple but powerful integration with PGP which makes
the content of your emails unreadable by your email provider or anyone

else.

Also, the IP from which this email was sent is completely cloaked.

Security. Privacy. Ease of Use.

column36:
s=b9623c03c46ac1c3ca357224a57157bd"" src="""" style=""""/>

How can I back Community Cube?

·Log into your account, or create a new account. ·Click the green “Back This Project” button at the top of this page. ·Enter your pledge amount and select a reward tier. ·Submit your payment information and that’s it!

I can't get my payment to work. What should I do?

Email Customer Happiness at support@indiegogo.com. They can track your transaction and help with any issues.

Will my Community Cube receive Updates after Launching?

Of course! In a security oriented device, one of the most important aspects is updates. Another is the training in Privacy that we will provide.

What if you Fail to Reach the Funding Target?

We appreciate every bit of support we receive during this specific campaign, and every backer is welcomed into the community but we will continue selling the devices on our website. We have already invested in machinery to produce Community Cubes in small quantities.

What Warrants Applying for Community Cube?

A standard manufacturer’s warranty applies to the hardware so that means if the hardware fails, we have support and 3 years guarantee from Hardkernel. A permanent warranty applies to the software from our side with continuous upgrading.

What if my Question isn't Answered Here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have at team@communitycube.net ASAP.

Technical FAQ

1. If i currently own a Odroid XU3 (not the lite version) does your SD-card Pledge work for me?

column1: Yes will run, the difference is just a graphic connector.

2.Do you have a version that can work on a Rspi?

Raspberry PI do not have enough hardware resources to run all APPs.

3.Do you have a version

that can run on more powerful full fledged PC or Laptop Processors? 

We are working on Pledge  that is a Virtual Machine Version x86 or x64
we are based in Linux Debian flavor.
4. How many people can be connected to a single Cube at any one time?
Depends on the Bandwidth you have mainly for UP (upload) most of
the lines has asymmetric, we are working in deliver a demo over a
symmetric 2mb line we own. As soon is ready we can measure number of
5. Given that the XU3 has a HDMI port, Is there any software solution
where it connects to a /Projector or LCD display and displays remote
content from connected users or a simple dashboard (Think conference
The lite version has a micro-hdmi and definitively yes, you can
connect it to hdmi screen, we for example use a converter from

micro-hdmi to vga that cost 3$

6. How many % of the hard disc space is blocked by other users in the grid?

Easy answers: You share 600GB and you can  replicate 300gb to the grid. You share 1200GB and you can upload/replicate 600gb to the grid (version 2tb)
The server has 2 store unit SSD and Harddisk , the SSD contains the OS and configuration.
The hard disk contain also configuration and Storage, as well data from apps that are also replicated to the grid.

6.1 On limits on sharing as needed.

About the hard disk and the Operating system:
-We use disk quotas for the daemons.
About the hard disk and the Tahoe Lafs daemon:
We are going to improve TahoeLafs  because the actual official version of Tahoe Lafs do not have limitations on upload or download (sadly or utopically)

Risks and challenges

Opportunities: 
Increased concern about Privacy and Security 
Non trust alternatives and high speed Internet

Strengths: 
No IT knowledge is necessary to install and use Community Cube server. 
No service cost model 
Versatile Product that can run anything 
Low price, open, customizable

Threats: 
Funding is difficult
column3:
unrecognized name or trademark

Politics: 
Increased government intervention, intrusion, espionage or control
column4:
Global mass control corporation masked 
Countries cooperating in espionage

Economical: 
Private data becomes profitable (big data) 
Large corporations (e.g. Google) monopolize everything

Social: 
Human rights violations 
Social media exposing huge amounts of private data. 
Wikileaks, Snowden, AIWEIWEI, Superfish, Stunex derivatives

Legal: 
Law in favor of corporations 
International agreements to share users DB
column5:
Bypass situation of European personal data protection law 
Pre-democratic totalitarianism, roll back of human rights

Environment: 
Pollution coming from data centers energy consumption

Technological: 
Low cost home production chain 
3d production industrial accessibility 
Open source that is spy-proof and high quality

Competitors: 
No open source competitors

Rivalry: 
Marketing project not accomplished due internal problems

Substitute products: 
We are an open-source affordable replacement for any parts in open hardware.

Suppliers: 
High availability, many providers of the parts 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Special thanks to all open source contributors that allowed us to use their creations as a base for making our CocaCola recipe. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
ODROID XU3 LITE BOARD TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:

8 x Processors: Samsung Exynos5422 ARM® Cortex™-A15 Quad 1.8GHz / Cortex™-A7 Quad 1.3GHz 
Memory 2Gbyte LPDDR3 RAM PoP (933Mhz, 14.9GB/s memory bandwidth, 2x32bit bus) we are going to ask if over-funded for a 4Gb Version patch. 
3D Accelerator Mali™-T628 MP6 OpenGL ES 3.0 / 2.0 / 1.1 and OpenCL 1.1 Full profile (because GPL violation by default we don't use it to avoid counterfeiting, is disabled at kernel.) 
Audio On-board Audio codec / Standard 3.5mm headphone jack. HDMI Digital audio output. Optional SPDIF optical output (USB module) 
USB3.0 Host SuperSpeed USB standard A type connector x 1 port 
USB3.0 OTG SuperSpeed USB Micro A-B type connector x 1 port 
USB2.0 Host High Speed standard A type connector x 4 ports 
Display HDMI 
Storage (Option) eMMC module socket : eMMC 5.0 Flash Storage (up to 64GByte) 
MicroSD Card Slot (up to 64GByte) 
Fast Ethernet LAN 10/100Mbps Ethernet 
Gigabit Ethernet LAN (Option) 
USB3.0 to Gigabit Ethernet adapter (USB module)

column7: ","#Privacy Matters.We believe that government and corporate snooping are the biggest threats to personal liberty and democracy that we’re facing.And you’re right, we need political change. But do you trust politicians? We sure don’t.COMMUNITY

column1: CUBE is a technology that makes protecting your privacy easy.Our device is a plug and play, open source, energy efficient server designed from the ground up with your security and privacy in mind. You can trust COMMUNITY CUBE, because all our hardware and software is open source and available for review.This is a one-time-payment product with no hidden or recurring fees.Our one-to-all, all-to-one model provides an ideal platform which can provide any Internet service you might need, while eliminating the risk of being

spied on by  government agencies, big corporations, hackers and malicious software.The Internet is full of ""free"" services.Most are offered by large corporations that work for the common good. Right?Come on. You know better.They are giving you something for “free” because they want something in return - your personal private information. By burying the details in their terms and conditions page, they are in fact hiding their nefarious intentions.We operate exactly the opposite.Because
we integrate into each COMMUNITY CUBE a carefully selected  security
audited services, you no longer need to depend on the good intentions of
these big corporations.Each COMMUNITY CUBE comes with the following functionality:
Cage OS, a secured open operating system
A decentralized anonymous Search Engine with administrator rights.
A filter-connector for your Social Networks in one single place.
A secure Storage System with collaborative tools
Transparent Email encryption for your actual email.
Ad-blocker, intrusion prevention system, anti-virus and anti-tracking technology for your web browsing.
development of COMMUNITY CUBE services offers independence from any

users actively about data security, privacy and data disaster.34% of those who are aware of the surveillance programs have taken at least one step to shield their information from the government or hackers.Our goal is to integrate decentralized and collaborative open source tools with a focus on privacy and resilience. column1: is the only service on the market that lets you rent whatever phone you want,
for as long as you like.  It was created
by two engineering students at UC San Diego who wanted to share their passion for
the tech industry with everyone else.  Buying a phone for full price is expensive and being locked into a contract for one phone is no fun.  That’s why we created TechRent,
the first affordable subscription service that lets you choose a new phone every
month.  With your help, we hope to
revolutionize the smartphone industry by making more phones available to more

launching our service on Indiegogo because we need a large initial launch in order to cover the expensive initial investment necessary to create a wide variety of smartphones for you to choose from.  We are asking for $10,000 because we believe this will
provide us with enough capital needed to create this large library of phones for you to choose from.
from all the latest smartphones such as the Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge, iPhone
6s Plus, and the LG V10, all for just $49.99 a month!
smartphones that have been out for over a year, such as the Samsung Galaxy S6
and S6 Edge, iPhone 6, and the LG G3, all for just $29.99 a month!

How It Works

1. Sign-up for a basic or premium subscription.

2. Choose your phone.

3. We’ll ship it out to you within 5 days.

4. Your 30 day subscription begins when you get the phone.

5. You’ll have 3 weeks from that point to decide whether you want to keep the phone for another month or choose a new phone.
column4:
>After that, your decision will be locked in till the next month.

7. If you chose to get a new phone, we’ll get it to your doorstep by the 29th day.

8. On the 30th day, you must mail your old phone back.

9. Then the process repeats

column1: Once the site is fully up and running, users will also be able to buy a phone if they wish.  Every phone on our website can either be rented or bought.  Every month a phone gets rented, it either goes down in price by $30 for basic phones or $50 for premium phones.  In order for us to make money, prices start out a little higher than market prices, but decrease in price much faster than they regularly would.  For example, a new premium phone that starts out at $799 will go down in price by $50 each month it gets rented.  So in 6 months, the phone now costs just $499 to buy.
cleanliness and security, once we get a phone back, all data is wiped clean and
erased.  Also, the phone itself is
physically cleaned with antibacterial wipes and UV light.
- Covering our very large initial investment from building a large enough inventory of smartphones to create a wide variety for you to choose from.

is the only service on the market that lets you rent whatever phone you want,
for as long as you like.  It was created
by two engineering students at UC San Diego who wanted to share their passion for
the tech industry with everyone else.  Buying a phone for full price is expensive and being locked into a contract for one phone is no fun.  That’s why we created TechRent,
the first affordable subscription service that lets you choose a new phone every
month.  With your help, we hope to
revolutionize the smartphone industry by making more phones available to more
What We Need & What You Get

launching our service on Indiegogo because we need a large initial launch in order to cover the expensive initial investment necessary to create a wide variety of smartphones for you to choose from.  We are asking for $10,000 because we believe this will
provide us with enough capital needed to create this large library of phones for you to choose from.
The Premium Subscription lets you choose
from all the latest smartphones such as the Samsung Galaxy S7 and S7 Edge, iPhone
6s Plus, and the LG V10, all for just $49.99 a month!
The Basic Subscription lets you choose from
smartphones that have been out for over a year, such as the Samsung Galaxy S6
and S6 Edge, iPhone 6, and the LG G3, all for just $29.99 a month!

How It Works1. Sign-up for a basic or premium subscription.2. Choose your phone.3. We’ll ship it out to you within 5 days.4. Your 30 day subscription begins when you get the phone.5. You’ll have 3 weeks from that point to decide whether you want to keep the phone for another month or choose a new phone. After that, your decision will be locked in till the next month.7. If you chose to get a new phone, we’ll get it to your doorstep by the 29th day.8. On the 30th day, you must mail your old phone back.9. Then the process repeats

Once the site is fully up and running, users will also be able to buy a phone if they wish.  Every phone on our website can either be rented or bought.  Every month a phone gets rented, it either goes down in price by $30 for basic phones or $50 for premium phones.  In order for us to make money, prices start out a little higher than market prices, but decrease in price much faster than they regularly would.  For example, a new premium phone that starts out at $799 will go down in price by $50 each month it gets rented.  So in 6 months, the phone now costs just $499 to buy.
cleanliness and security, once we get a phone back, all data is wiped clean and
erased.  Also, the phone itself is
physically cleaned with antibacterial wipes and UV light.

- Covering our very large initial investment from building a large enough inventory of smartphones to create a wide variety for you to choose from.               - We are offering this service for the cheapest possible price.  As such, margins are very thin and leave little room for error on our part.             - This is our first

We believe that it is important to create leaders who are able
to think critically and have a mindset of fighting challenges
head on, equipped with the knowledge of Science and
Technology. As a team, we strive to engage every member of
the Walnut Valley Community in a STEM based program. We
value everyone’s unique opinions and ideas so each member
on the team will have an opportunity to express his/her
thoughts and interest in science, technology and business.
Walnut Valley Robotics is a nonprofit organization and
therefore relies upon donations from our generous sponsors
and various partners. As a community team, we encourage
anyone and everyone to join us as we learn the skills
necessary to build a competitive robot and manage a
successful FIRST Robotics Team. Whether your interest is in
we have a spot for you! In addition,
we are always looking for adults
who are willing to mentor our team
This past summer, members of the Walnut Valley Robotics
went to Ghana in hopes of inspiring students in nearby
villages to pursue an education in engineering. Team members
spent most of their time at the Avete-Anloga LA Basic School,
located in Anloga, Volta Region of Ghana. Though Walnut
Valley Robotics is a rookie team, many of the members have
previously been on First Lego League teams previously so
bringing LEGO Mindstorms to Ghana was an excellent way of
In the time that we were at the school, members instructed
students how to design, build, and program their own EV3
Robots. We also made it a priority to give teachers the
resources (Ev3 Kits) and instructions required to continue to
teach their students. In the time that we were in Africa, we
were able to establish relations with many nearby schools and

column1: A fun new device that you will enjoy with your family and friends.
is a High Definition LED projector that fits anywhere and has great battery
life, which makes it perfect for long trips. Take Zex anywhere, from campsites,
to house parties, to the pool with friends, or just make your own drive in
great lens displays amazing images of 100 inches from just 10 feet away.
your phone directly to Zex through the HDMI cable and start using it
Android and Windows devices via Miracast/Screen Mirroring and DLNA. Connect
Apple devices and any HDMI enabled devices (Blu-Ray, gaming devices, etc.)
directly to Zex via HDMI cable and Lighting Digital AV adapter
movies straight from your smart phones and other HDMI compatible devices.
Zex when you have a presentation at work, or school by easily putting all your
files on your device.
don’t have to huddle around to show everyone your photos from your trip. Just
use Zex and project it on a nearby wall.
Skype calls a lot more comfortable by not having to look at a small screen,
especially when having group calls.
great way to spend an evening with your significant other by putting Zex on
your car and linking to your cars stereo system, you have your own drive-in
fun at parties by hooking Zex to the audio system and watching music video
clips, or just different light effects while dancing.
team here at Zex is made up of friends with different backgrounds, from
designers to engineers and we think that it’s important that you know how we
came up with this projector idea. We were having a meeting once and half of our
team was abroad, so we needed to have a group call to let everyone in on the
meeting. This one meeting made us realize that we can design something that can
help solve this problem and also a great way to make presentations. After that
meeting we rounded up the team and got started straight away. We hope this
project becomes a reality and we thank you all for your support!
this Indiegogo campaign will help give birth to a new company and product.

forget to support us further by sharing the campaign via social media!

Take a first look at Zex's UI:
Does Zex work with all devices?
Yes, Zex can connect with all devices that can use a USB, or HDMI cable. The
list is long, starting from smart phones, tablets, laptops, media players.
Can I watch movies, series, TV shows on Zex?
Zex does not provide content, but rather gives you a new and easy way of
viewing it. What it does is make your screen way bigger and more fun to watch.
Zex will be shipped for free inside the USA
For all other countries a shipping fee will be applied.
What if I made a mistake while contributing to the campaign?
Just contact us via email and we will sort out the problem together with you.
This applies to wrong details, addresses, or anything else that might come up.
Does Zex need to be plugged in to a power outlet to work?
No, Zex has a built in battery that lets you use it anywhere, at any time.
Can I use more than one device on Zex?
No, you can only use one device at a time on Zex.
Yes, Zex is built in such a way to make it shock proof, just in case it is
Q:When will I receive the Zex device?

A: Indiegogo is not like Ebay, or Amazon where you purchase goods. We are a startup and your contributions will fund all of the steps like testing, app development, engeneering, manucaturing etc. The estimated shipping date is indicated in the timeline and perks section.
Q:How will I know the progress so far after the campaign ends?
A:Updates will be made on a monthly basis after the campaign ends

Q: What if I have changed my address before the perk was shipped?

A: No worries, you have the possibility to change the mailing address anytime, and we will ask everyone again via email before shipping anything out.
Throughout the campaign we will add the most frequently asked questions here!

by Dr. Bill Kent, CTO - Unmanned Aerial Systems, Inc.
At Unmanned Aerial Systems, Inc. over the last four years we have
succeeded in integrating advanced aerial photography into our UAV technology.
There have been many quality and reliability improvements in these
cameras as well as impressive reductions in size, weight and power requirements
for them.  Over the same time period, cell
phone manufacturers have produced amazing improvements in their products.  2014 is the year to merge these two impressive
What is planned is for UAS, Inc. aerial
cameras to uplink precision, geo-referenced imagery directly to its secure website.  When the system
is fully operational, customers will have the software application to view stored imagery on their desktops, laptops,
unmanned aerial vehicles in the U.S.
airspace begins in 2015, it is important to integrate the speed and convenience
of WiFi devices into the next
generation of commercial drone aircraft operations.  <b>Key
Strategy:  By making access to drone collected
imagery convenient and inexpensive by using the cell phone network and internet,
the operation of the drones can be provided by service companies that will be
able to focus on safety and privacy.
Commercial customers will only have to pay for the imagery they need,
making UAV use even more economical.
The first markets are expected to include precision agriculture, news
and entertainment productions, search/rescue and public safety, security

more information look at our Indiegogo link below:
is an Electrical Engineer with extensive experience in both communications
engineering [VP – Engineering Harris Corp. Radio Frequency Division] and
geo-referenced aerial imaging systems [Co-founder and VP Engineering –
Geospatial Systems, Inc. - a Leica Geosystems OEM].

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PRESS REPORTS:

New Technology: Bring Drone Imagery Straight to PC, Smartphone

                                                               -Unmanned Aerial Online - August 13, 2014

Link:    http://unmannedaerialonline.com/e107_plugins/content/content.php?content.487#.U_NJI8VdWxc
column4:
/>

Flight facility in Las Cruces, NM - 15,000 sq. miles restricted airspace for drones

We are Unmanned Aerial Systems, Incorporated.   In the last four years we have succeeded in integrating advanced aerial photography into our UAV technology.  As full integration of commercial unmanned air vehicles in US airspace begins we want to introduce you to the next generation of commercial drone aircraft and how we will communicate with them.

The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to provide  the funding for the development of a smart phone imaging application. 

Essentially the UAS, Inc. aircraft cameras will uplink precision imagery directly to its secure website.  Contributors will have received (for their contribution) the  software application to load on their desktops, laptops, tablets and smart phones. 

When the whole imaging system is complete, the contributors (who have loaded the software app) will be able to view drone missions (in part or in whole) on their own devices.  These will include samples of precision agriculture, search &
column5:
rescue, security and pipeline safety operations.

     Flight Test Center - New Mexico

As the system is refined in the coming year, the contributors will be able to view actual missions in near real time.

The contributors will be the market test, a funding source and some of the beta testers of the system.

What We Need 

We anticipate that $40,000 will be sufficient to write and test the drone downlink software
column6:
as well as the hardware adjustments that will be necessary.

What You Get

1st Perk:  $10 Contributor names will be placed on a UAS, Inc. website page as a supporter of commercial work drones that respect public safety and  privacy.  If the contributor provides an email address - they will receive the UAS, Inc. monthly Commercial UAV Update. 

2nd Perk: $100 Contributor receives the 1.0 version of the drone imaging  downlink software application.  Image quality will be affected by the device  screen size (better on desktop than smartphone).  Although user will have  ""zoom"" function and ""Latitude -Longitude"" regardless of the device utilized.

3rd Perk:  $500 Contributor will be placed on the supporter website, be sent the 1.0 version of the downlink software and receive a desktop model of the Nightwind II Hybrid Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.

Full Size Model Nightwind II - yours is smaller  

4th Perk: Technically savvy $1,000 Contributors will be asked to examine   functionality of the initial software. Opinions will be sought on clarity of   instructions, ease of use and any apparent glitches. An online or telephonic interview will be requested of each Beta Tester.

5th Perk: $10,000 Contributor receives a $20,000 discount on the purchase of a new Nightwind II Hybrid Drone.   UAS, Inc. is developing this new version of its two meter wingspan electric UAV. It will be powered by a new alcohol fuel cell with backup batteries. The new hybrid powerplant will  allow the drone to stay aloft for up to 12 hours. The additional electricity from the fuel cells will power an improved sensor suite on board the  aircraft.   Open to U.S. citizens only.

   Nightwind II 

The Impact

The commercial drone has been in use around the World for more than eight years (90% of Japan’s crop dusting is now done by drones). However, by 2015 the commercial UAV will begin common use in the U.S.A. The operational efficiency, cost savings and increased safety are eagerly anticipated by the people in many industries and public endeavors.

In the last five years the UAS, Inc. team members have developed very small form factor mapping cameras for use in small (6 ft wingspan) drones.    We have engaged in the development of two new powerplants for the same small UAVs
column7:
including multi-fuel internal combustion with Ricardo Engineering and the new fuel cell technology with MeOH Power of Latham, NY.

According to an AUVSI [Association for Unmanned Vehicle Systems International] study, in the ten years following 2015, the UAV industry will generate $82 Billion in economic impact and 100,000 new jobs nationwide.  People and companies who get involved now will have a tremendous advantage as the industry grows.  A careful company that makes public safety and privacy a prime concern will have an advantage in the years to come.

Please share your thoughts and concerns about commercial drone by using the Indiegogo share tools or emailing us at sales@uasnw.com.

Thank you for your support in this project!    

- the UAS, Inc. Team

Earlier version of electric Nightwind II Electric



Presentation Black Board


The Unmanned Aerial Systems, Inc. Team

 James M. McDonough, CEO/President

After service in the Marine Corps Jim worked for Fortune 500  companies and was a partner in a regional CPA firm.  He founded two service companies and a server computer builder before turning to aerial imagery and unmanned vehicles.

 Dr. William H. Kent, PhD - Chief Technology Officer

Dr. Kent began his engineering career at Bell Labs before moving to Harris Corp.  At Harris he led the design team for the FALCON radio.  He co-founded Geospatial Systems, Inc. a supplier (OEM) of aerial cameras to Leica
column8:
including 39 and 50 megapixel designs.

 Thomas W. McClelland, Vice President 

Mr. McClelland began his career as a Risk Analyst and Systems Safety Engineer in the energy industry.  He worked overseas for more than two decades before returning to the U.S.A. and investing in two aviation projects.  Tom guides the drone rotorcraft project for UAS, Inc.

 Jay R. Snyder, USAF (Ret.) Business Development

Mr. Snyder is an Air Force Academy graduate in Astronautical Engineering with  17 years experience as a Fighter Pilot/Mission Commander. After the service, he has worked for over 18 years as a contractor for defense systems.
