making UAV use even more economical.
The first markets are expected to include precision agriculture, news
and entertainment productions, search/rescue and public safety, security
When the WiFi downlink system is complete users will be able to view live drone missions on
more information look at our Indiegogo link below:
is an Electrical Engineer with extensive experience in both communications
engineering [VP – Engineering Harris Corp. Radio Frequency Division] and
geo-referenced aerial imaging systems [Co-founder and VP Engineering –
Geospatial Systems, Inc. - a Leica Geosystems OEM].

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------PRESS REPORTS:New Technology: Bring Drone Imagery Straight to PC, Smartphone                                                               -Unmanned Aerial Online - August 13, 2014Link:    http://unmannedaerialonline.com/e107_plugins/content/content.php?content.487#.U_NJI8VdWxcFlight facility in Las Cruces, NM - 15,000 sq. miles restricted airspace for dronesWe are Unmanned Aerial Systems, Incorporated.   In the last four years we have succeeded in integrating advanced aerial photography into our UAV technology.  As full integration of commercial unmanned air vehicles in US airspace begins we want to introduce you to the next generation of commercial drone aircraft and how we will communicate with them.The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to provide  the funding for the development of a smart phone imaging application. Essentially the UAS, Inc. aircraft cameras will uplink precision imagery directly to its secure website.  Contributors will have received (for their contribution) the  software application to load on their desktops, laptops, tablets and smart phones. When the whole imaging system is complete, the contributors (who have loaded the software app) will be able to view drone missions (in part or in whole) on their own devices.  These will include samples of precision agriculture, search & rescue, security and pipeline safety operations.     Flight Test Center - New MexicoAs the system is refined in the coming year, the contributors will be able to view actual missions in near real time.The contributors will be the market test, a funding source and some of the beta testers of the system.What We Need We anticipate that $40,000 will be sufficient to write and test the drone downlink software
column2: as well as the hardware adjustments that will be necessary.What You Get1st Perk:  $10 Contributor names will be placed on a UAS, Inc. website page as a supporter of commercial work drones that respect public safety and  privacy.  If the contributor provides an email address - they will receive the UAS, Inc. monthly Commercial UAV Update. 2nd Perk: $100 Contributor receives the 1.0 version of the drone imaging  downlink software application.  Image quality will be affected by the device  screen size (better on desktop than smartphone).  Although user will have  ""zoom"" function and ""Latitude -Longitude"" regardless of the device utilized.3rd Perk:  $500 Contributor will be placed on the supporter website, be sent the 1.0 version of the downlink software and receive a desktop model of the Nightwind II Hybrid Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.Full Size Model Nightwind II - yours is smaller  4th Perk: Technically savvy $1,000 Contributors will be asked to examine   functionality of the initial software. Opinions will be sought on clarity of   instructions, ease of use and any apparent glitches. An online or telephonic interview will be requested of each Beta Tester.5th Perk: $10,000 Contributor receives a $20,000 discount on the purchase of a new Nightwind II Hybrid Drone.   UAS, Inc. is developing this new version of its two meter wingspan electric UAV. It will be powered by a new alcohol fuel cell with backup batteries. The new hybrid powerplant will  allow the drone to stay aloft for up to 12 hours. The additional electricity from the fuel cells will power an improved sensor suite on board the  aircraft.   Open to U.S. citizens only.   Nightwind II The ImpactThe commercial drone has been in use around the World for more than eight years (90% of Japan’s crop dusting is now done by drones). However, by 2015 the commercial UAV will begin common use in the U.S.A. The operational efficiency, cost savings and increased safety are eagerly anticipated by the people in many industries and public endeavors.In the last five years the UAS, Inc. team members have developed very small form factor mapping cameras for use in small (6 ft wingspan) drones.    We have engaged in the development of two new powerplants for the same small UAVs
column3: including multi-fuel internal combustion with Ricardo Engineering and the new fuel cell technology with MeOH Power of Latham, NY.According to an AUVSI [Association for Unmanned Vehicle Systems International] study, in the ten years following 2015, the UAV industry will generate $82 Billion in economic impact and 100,000 new jobs nationwide.  People and companies who get involved now will have a tremendous advantage as the industry grows.  A careful company that makes public safety and privacy a prime concern will have an advantage in the years to come.Please share your thoughts and concerns about commercial drone by using the Indiegogo share tools or emailing us at sales@uasnw.com.Thank you for your support in this project!    - the UAS, Inc. column1: The device that brings your apps to your big screen TV.

The TinyStic is a USB-like device that turns your Android/iPhone/iPad into a desktop computer. 



The TinyStic device plugs into the HDMI port on your monitor or big screen TV.
column2:
>Connect a wireless Bluetooth keyboard and you have a complete desktop computer experience right from your Android/iPhone/iPad . 


TinyStic is great for streaming live television, movies and playing games from your Android/iPhone/iPad onto the big screen.  Check out our founder playing Grand Theft Auto using the TinyStic technology.



Tech Specs


Dual band technology - The TinyStic uses two (2) simultaneous network bandwidth features.  One at 2.4 GHz and one at 5 GHz.  This is designed to avoid interference and maximize throughput for smoother and faster video streaming and gaming.

Built-in Micro USB 2.0 Port - This port enables you to connect your TinyStic using a USB cable to your TV and provide power supply.

LED status indicator - This LED light indicates the current state of your TinyStic.

HDMI Connector - For hard to reach HDMI ports, the HDMI connector plugs into your monitor's or TV's HDMI port.

column7:
>

Our founder, Eric Hamilton, is a native Detroiter, MSU Computer Science graduate, ex-Netscape employee and ex-Yahoo! employee.  Eric is an internet, web analytics &
column8: search marketing veteran with over 25 years of technology work experience.
column14: >Eric is the founder of the Web Academy, an online web school which recently reached its 4000th enrollment.
column20: >Eric is the former CMO of Around The Way app and helped this app achieve over 30,000 downloads in less than 6 months.  Eric is passionate about technology and innovation.

column7: >Eric applauds the success of Dr. Dre for successfully making ""Beats by Dre"" a multi-billion-dollar brand.  With all of Dr. Dre's success, Eric believes that there is room for other consumer electronics success stories with African Americans at the helm.
column14:
What You Get

We need your support in the form of a purchase/donation.  For your purchase/donation, you get a TinyStic device.  Your contributions will be used as leverage when negotiating with partners and manufacturers to create the best product for you.


Risks &
column15:
Challenges

In order to scale our business and to protect our intellectual property, we need large numbers of pre-orders.

column7: >Our founder, Eric Hamilton is a Detroit native.  Our 12-month goal for the business is to build a successful warehousing and distribution center for The TinyStic in downtown Detroit, MI. We are asking the residents of Detroit, ex-Detroiters,  and the residents of southeast Michigan to give us extra love by  spreading the word and supporting our campaign by purchasing a TinyStic.  Your donation/purchase could potentially create jobs in Detroit and help revive a great city.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

We kindly ask you to share our campaign with your friends, family and associates via email, Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and Linkedin.


FAQ

Why do I need a TinyStic? Smartphones are great for checking email and running social media apps. But what about computing tasks that require a larger screen, keyboard and mouse? Today’s smartphones are 10X more powerful than the computers that we used to surf the web in 1999.  The TinyStic leverages the power that is already available on your smartphone and virtually eliminates the need for multiple computers.   If you are in your office working on a spreadsheet or a presentation on your laptop, then TinyStic provides for optimal portability by carrying a pocket sized device to continue your work at home.

Will the TinyStic work with my iPhone or iPad? Yes.  It works with iPhone, iPads, Android phones and Android tablets.

Why doesn’t The TinyStic work with Apple products?  Yes, iPhones and iPads

What's the difference between the TinyStic and Chromecast? Chromecast is great for streaming video to a monitor, but it does not allow for robust PC-like functionality. Chromecast will not convert your phone into a PC.

What’s the difference between the TinyStic and a VPN/Remote Server? a VPN app can be used to control a remote computer in a remote location. With the TinyStic, no computer is needed. Your smartphone is the computer.

What’s the difference between the TinyStic and Windows Surface? Windows Surface is a tablet that has PC functionality. The TinyStic converts your phone into a PC. 

Is the TinyStic a wired docking station from the phone to the monitor? No,the TinyStic uses wireless communications.

What’s the difference between the TinyStic and Ubuntu? Ubuntu requires some systems administrative skills to install. Ubuntu requires you to reformat of your smartphone’s hard drive with their operating system. It’s not an easy task and it’s not easy to restore your original factory installation. The TinyStic uses a few simple apps to convert your phone into a PC.

After I install the TinyStic app, how easy is it to uninstall? Uninstalling the TinyStic app is as easy as uninstalling any app on your phone.

What’s the difference between the TinyStic and Motorola’s Atrix Lap Dock? Motorola’s Atrix Lap Dock is a wired solution and only works with one specific phone. The TinyStic is wireless and works with more than 600 models of Android smartphones and tablets as well as iPhones and iPads.

Is TinyStic an external storage unit for files? No, files cannot be stored on the TinyStic.

Will my apps scale to new resolution settings once projected to my monitor? No, the aspect ratio will not be changed.

How can I see if my smartphone or tablet is compatible with the TinyStic? The TinyStic works with over 600 Miracast Wifi-Connect certified smartphones and tablets. You can see an up to date list of certified smartphones and tablets here.

Couldn't I just buy a Miracast device from China and do this myself? Yes, you could possibly assemble the parts yourself and write software that converts your smartphone into a PC.  We’ve done all of work for you. Everything you need is bundled and ready to go.

What's the difference between the TinyStic and Roku Streaming Stick? Roku Streaming Stick is great for streaming video to a monitor, but it does not allow for robust PC-like functionality. Roku Streaming Stick will not convert your phone into a PC.

What's the resolution for TinyStic? TinyStic displays in 1080 pixel resolution.

What Android version can I use with TinyStic? Version 4.2.X and higher.

What's the difference between Dell's Wyse Pocket Cloud PC and the TinyStic? Dell's Wyse Connect Pocket Cloud PC uses the internet to connect to your ""real computer"" in the cloud. Thus, an internet connection is required for usage. In addition, Wyse doesn't have a large variety of apps and games.

What's the difference between Splashtop  and theTinyStic. Splashtop is a remote control technology that allows you to access anything on your PC or Mac. TinyStic converts your smartphone into a desktop computer.

","Meet The TinyStic
The device that brings your apps to your big screen TV.

The TinyStic is a USB-like device that turns your Android/iPhone/iPad into a desktop computer. The TinyStic device plugs into the HDMI port on your monitor or big screen TV.Connect a wireless Bluetooth keyboard and you have a complete desktop computer experience right from your Android/iPhone/iPad . TinyStic is great for streaming live television, movies and playing games from your Android/iPhone/iPad onto the big screen.  Check out our founder playing Grand Theft Auto using the TinyStic technology.Tech SpecsDual band technology - The TinyStic uses two (2) simultaneous network bandwidth features.  One at 2.4 GHz and one at 5 GHz.  This is designed to avoid interference and maximize throughput for smoother and faster video streaming and gaming.Built-in Micro USB 2.0 Port - This port enables you to connect your TinyStic using a USB cable to your TV and provide power supply.LED status indicator - This LED light indicates the current state of your TinyStic.HDMI Connector - For hard to reach HDMI ports, the HDMI connector plugs into your monitor's or TV's HDMI port.

Our founder, Eric Hamilton, is a native Detroiter, MSU Computer Science graduate, ex-Netscape employee and ex-Yahoo! employee.  Eric is an internet, web analytics & search marketing veteran with over 25 years of technology work experience. Eric is the founder of the Web Academy, an online web school which recently reached its 4000th enrollment.  Eric is the former CMO of Around The Way app and helped this app achieve over 30,000 downloads in less than 6 months.  Eric is passionate about technology and innovation.

Eric applauds the success of Dr. Dre for successfully making ""Beats by Dre"" a multi-billion-dollar brand.  With all of Dr. Dre's success, Eric believes that there is room for other consumer electronics success stories with African Americans at the helm.     What We Need & What You Get We need your support in the form of a purchase/donation.  For your purchase/donation, you get a TinyStic device.  Your contributions will be used as leverage when negotiating with partners and manufacturers to create the best product for you.   Risks & ChallengesIn order to scale our business and to protect our intellectual property, we need large numbers of pre-orders.  The Impact

Our founder, Eric Hamilton is a Detroit native.  Our 12-month goal for the business is to build a successful warehousing and distribution center for The TinyStic in downtown Detroit, MI. We are asking the residents of Detroit, ex-Detroiters,  and the residents of southeast Michigan to give us extra love by  spreading the word and supporting our campaign by purchasing a TinyStic.  Your donation/purchase could potentially create jobs in Detroit and help revive a great city.

iStart is your desktop for chrome! Manage your chrome installed apps, insert own bookmarks/links. Its easy and awesome.
Stop wasting your time by searching for an chrome app or bookmark! Use the fast access bar:
Type some letters of your app, link/bookmark you like to visit and let iStart search them for you! Its awesome easy and fast, and way better than clicking and searching arround.

That was an short overview what iStart is and what it can be if you support this project!

Im Kay Schneider , i worked as software developer on different companys. Based on software for the web. From Online Games to internet agencys wich build websites for large world wide operation companys.
In the year 2011 i was one of the top submitter on the ""google developer contest - doodle your way to gdd"".
After these 8 years experience i tink that it is time for something new. It is time to build an awesome software product wich is shipped mostly for free to all the people over the world.

And after the success i had in the google contest, where i have developed a demo for html5 fetaures with javascript, i mostly programmed at my free time in javascript. And also on work i started focus on javascript.

After im getting unemployed at the end of 2012 i started develop some apps for the chrome webstore. And in January 2013 i had the dream of an innovative new tab page for chrome, wich gives the user an easy access to everything he needs.
installed Apps, Bookmarks/links, and information in realtime from everywhere - live tiles - cloud control -

Now i have developed ""iStart"" in an based Version wich gives the users an good userexperience. I released the Software at the end of january in 2013 after a week endless developing. After that, i released a few features so that it becomes more comfortable for the users. Im raising money to developing the features ""live tiles"", API, cloud control.
You can still see the base version in the chrome webstore

It was a success. Without all features. There are over 3000  active users. Awesome. And now I need the support of the users for developing awesome features for you! Please help and keep this project alive!
But to finished the work i need more time than i have. To ship iStart with all the features there is still need two months of hard work.
What we need and what you get?

I need still 15k to developing iStart ready with all features and spread it to the world. The money will be used that i, Kay Schneider, can spend a fulltime development on iStart without having troubles with the billings like yet.

This helps me, to stay focused on the users needs and the new core features for iStart, ""live tiles"" and the API. And i need a little bit time to travel to some developer meetings to speak about iStart and the API ( that needs time and money I have time, but no money )
The money will be completly spend covering expenses during that time, and to spend a little bit money to build extra graphics for iStart , as well as rewards for you, our supporters.
If I dont reached the goal I spent so long fulltime development on iStart, as the money will it allow. But than it will take longer to bringing these cool features to life :(
Look at the things you will become when supporting my project :)

live tiles combined with the open API are a big and great feature for the users. With live tiles you become realtime information about everything, when there is an extension for that. Example. Currently im working on an weather live tile for iStart. Wich shows you with an nice animation the weather current and the forecast for the next few days direct on an tile!
Planed are extensions for iStart with these ""live tiles"" support:
facebook feed, facebook pictures, instagram feed, twitter feed, news feed rss reader, mp3 NAT streaming information..... and much more
The API is an important feature for the live tiles. The live tiles are implemented by the API of iStart. Any of these cool and awesome live tile can be installed directly on the chrome webstore!
Thats really easy for the users. They search only for [istart] and see some extensions and apps that works for or with iStart.
The API allows also third party developers to integrate their own app or extension into iStart. So it become more relevant for the users, because they see the app everytime they opened a new tab!

Thats a great deal for other developers and for the users of iStart. With the API you can easy developing an live tile. Dont be scared about create an animation for the live tile. These features will be ready to use. Only provide your content and the rest will be done by iStart!
Its much more easyer as you think. If you have an working app or extension for chrome. You can add ""live tile"" support in 30minutes! ( If your app already using live data or using data by itself )
API for endusers, explanation: this feature allows other developers to create ""live tiles"" for you in a few minutes of time. So you will become more information on iStart for free!

Save all your settings in the cloud and that for free! Awesome and great feature. This will be shipped if i reached the goal at the end of 2013-04. This allows all users to save their settings on the cloud and sync it with all computers they use, ( i will love this feature also ).

Im a one man - javascript ninja - mini company! I developing, bugfixing, support the users 7 days a week for happy users all over the world! I have the vision to create the best ""new tab page"" ever seen. Im a javascript expert and i know what it means to bring an project ready to fits the users need. Im open for feedback for everyone! You can still send me an mail and i answer 100% the most time in 5h :)

If you can, donate! :) That will be great. If you cant, spread the world with the indieGoGo share tools! Share it with your friends and the world. Because iStart is an nice part of Software wich needs support by users, friends of free Software and all other people around over the world wich share the passion about an ""new tab page"" that fits your needs and gives you an awesome user experience you neve seen bevore ( when its feature complete )

Thanks for your support evey $ is needed to bring great features to life. I wont take money, but if i can pay with good user feedback my billings, this will be great ! :) Support iStart free aweseome software project

Stop wasting your time by searching for an chrome app or bookmark! Use the fast access bar:
Type some letters of your app, link/bookmark you like to visit and let iStart search them for you! Its awesome easy and fast, and way better than clicking and searching arround.
It`s like an desktop in metro style, for your chrome!
Watch the customers reviews of the beta version:
That was an short overview what iStart is and what it can be if you support this project!

Im Kay Schneider , i worked as software developer on different companys. Based on software for the web. From Online Games to internet agencys wich build websites for large world wide operation companys.
In the year 2011 i was one of the top submitter on the ""google developer contest - doodle your way to gdd"".
After these 8 years experience i tink that it is time for something new. It is time to build an awesome software product wich is shipped mostly for free to all the people over the world.

And after the success i had in the google contest, where i have developed a demo for html5 fetaures with javascript, i mostly programmed at my free time in javascript. And also on work i started focus on javascript.

After im getting unemployed at the end of 2012 i started develop some apps for the chrome webstore. And in January 2013 i had the dream of an innovative new tab page for chrome, wich gives the user an easy access to everything he needs.
installed Apps, Bookmarks/links, and information in realtime from everywhere - live tiles - cloud control -

Now i have developed ""iStart"" in an based Version wich gives the users an good userexperience. I released the Software at the end of january in 2013 after a week endless developing. After that, i released a few features so that it becomes more comfortable for the users. Im raising money to developing the features ""live tiles"", API, cloud control.
You can still see the base version in the chrome webstore

It was a success. Without all features. There are over 3000  active users. Awesome. And now I need the support of the users for developing awesome features for you! Please help and keep this project alive!
But to finished the work i need more time than i have. To ship iStart with all the features there is still need two months of hard work.
What we need and what you get?

I need still 15k to developing iStart ready with all features and spread it to the world. The money will be used that i, Kay Schneider, can spend a fulltime development on iStart without having troubles with the billings like yet.

This helps me, to stay focused on the users needs and the new core features for iStart, ""live tiles"" and the API. And i need a little bit time to travel to some developer meetings to speak about iStart and the API ( that needs time and money I have time, but no money )
The money will be completly spend covering expenses during that time, and to spend a little bit money to build extra graphics for iStart , as well as rewards for you, our supporters.
If I dont reached the goal I spent so long fulltime development on iStart, as the money will it allow. But than it will take longer to bringing these cool features to life :(
Look at the things you will become when supporting my project :)

live tiles combined with the open API are a big and great feature for the users. With live tiles you become realtime information about everything, when there is an extension for that. Example. Currently im working on an weather live tile for iStart. Wich shows you with an nice animation the weather current and the forecast for the next few days direct on an tile!
Planed are extensions for iStart with these ""live tiles"" support:
facebook feed, facebook pictures, instagram feed, twitter feed, news feed rss reader, mp3 NAT streaming information..... and much more
The API is an important feature for the live tiles. The live tiles are implemented by the API of iStart. Any of these cool and awesome live tile can be installed directly on the chrome webstore!
Thats really easy for the users. They search only for [istart] and see some extensions and apps that works for or with iStart.
The API allows also third party developers to integrate their own app or extension into iStart. So it become more relevant for the users, because they see the app everytime they opened a new tab!

Thats a great deal for other developers and for the users of iStart. With the API you can easy developing an live tile. Dont be scared about create an animation for the live tile. These features will be ready to use. Only provide your content and the rest will be done by iStart!
Its much more easyer as you think. If you have an working app or extension for chrome. You can add ""live tile"" support in 30minutes! ( If your app already using live data or using data by itself )
API for endusers, explanation: this feature allows other developers to create ""live tiles"" for you in a few minutes of time. So you will become more information on iStart for free!

Save all your settings in the cloud and that for free! Awesome and great feature. This will be shipped if i reached the goal at the end of 2013-04. This allows all users to save their settings on the cloud and sync it with all computers they use, ( i will love this feature also ).

Im a one man - javascript ninja - mini company! I developing, bugfixing, support the users 7 days a week for happy users all over the world! I have the vision to create the best ""new tab page"" ever seen. Im a javascript expert and i know what it means to bring an project ready to fits the users need. Im open for feedback for everyone! You can still send me an mail and i answer 100% the most time in 5h :)
What you can do to help?

If you can, donate! :) That will be great. If you cant, spread the world with the indieGoGo share tools! Share it with your friends and the world. Because iStart is an nice part of Software wich needs support by users, friends of free Software and all other people around over the world wich share the passion about an ""new tab page"" that fits your needs and gives you an awesome user experience you neve seen bevore ( when its feature complete )
Visit iStart [beta] on the chrome webstore:

Thanks for your support evey $ is needed to bring great features to life. I wont take money, but if i can pay with good user feedback my billings, this will be great ! :) Support iStart free aweseome software project
Supporters of iStart receive this awesome Shirt!

Unique Titanium-Alloy Screen Protector
Kyasi is a fast growing and emerging manufacturer offering our own
brand of top quality mobile accessories. In only a few years Kyasi has grown to
stock products in the USA, Canada, UK, France and Germany. Kyasi is a USA based
company but serves over 28 countries with 2-3 day ground shipping service and

no customs clearance problems.  Kyasi has shipped to over 100 countries worldwide and serves international customers regularly.


********THIS CAMPAIGN IS CONCLUDED. THANKS TO OUR SUPPORTERS!!***********

To stay up to date with the newest Kyasi products or to ask questions about this campaign please visit us at kyasi.com.
We are pleased to announce this campaign to
introduce the Gladiator Glass Curved collection - the world’s first &amp
curved screen protector for the iPhone 6 with a ballistic grade tempered glass

column1: were very thin sheets of film that, despite offering sufficient protection to
the phone screen, peeled and scratched easily and needed to be replaced often.
unique and different from any other screen protector that is currently
available in the market today. Rather than a thin, flimsy sheet of plastic to
protect your iPhone's screen, it utilizes a combination of fiber materials
including titanium alloy for the edges and is inset with specialized ballistic grade clear tempered glass. The back of the tempered glass is coated with a silicon adhesive making
installation easier and, when applied perfectly, will protect the screen
against fingerprints, dust and other particles that are hazardous to your
device. The surface offers an oleophobic coating to help minimize surface issues caused by finger prints.
a CURVED edge to edge design which is unique when compared to similar products currently on the
market. This new screen protector for the iPhone 6 or 6 Plus has these curved edges made of titanium alloy that are made to
coordinate with the 3 primary iPhone colors.

This is a unique protector that will not fade,
yellow, or peel away from the phone after time.

<li>The coordinating colors available add a stylish form of

expensive devices and it can be heartbreaking to find a huge scratch across
the screen of something so costly. A large scratch may even affect the
usability of a smartphone’s touchscreen. Cell phone and smartphone owners whose
devices spend a lot of time in pockets or purses should consider the benefits
simply adding the Gladiator Glass, the phone is instantly protected and therefore worth more in the

long run if you ever resell or trade it in. The screen is the biggest cost factor when it comes to replacement as well. Costs for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus can top $350.00USD to replace the screen in the event of breakage. This protector can be an inexpensive form of insurance.
Having Gladiator Glass on a phone can help protect it
up to 300% more from direct impact from drops than just having the screen alone and can be installed without any bubbles or
cloudiness to get in the way of the touch screen’s sensitivity or visibility.

column1: We are very excited to share this product with
the crowd fund community on Indiegogo. We have deep experience bringing other
successful products to market and we believe that the most sophisticated
audience of early adopters is on Indiegogo.  So we believe that our
level of success on Indiegogo will be a barometer of how the product may
perform in the future in the mainstream market.
We have already produced samples that are proof
of concept and now we are ready to send a large order to the factory. We are
seeking early adopters to help us get the
Gladiator Glass to the factory first it’s first major run in production. With your
help, we can make this product available for widespread distribution through retail
To our generous supporters, we are offering a
series of perks to thank you for becoming a part of our process! Contributors who
take advantage of our product perks in our Indiegogo campaign will be offered their choice of color of a 1st production Gladiator
Glass Curved Screen Protector, as well as the opportunity to be contacted with

information as new, exciting products are introduced.

For all supporters who join before we achieve 33% you get FREE shipping worldwide. After we reach 33% individual small shipping fees will be added. 

And for those that really want to celebrate like a boss you can join our CEO at the Playboy Halloween party in October 2015. This EPIC Hollywood party will give you the chance to rub elbows with celebrities, get treated like a VIP, check out the infamous Playboy Grotto and even Hef's Game Room and mini zoo. This is a bucket list item for many and is something we have really enjoyed taking customers to in the past. We invite those Kyasi supporters who would like to join by accessing this limited perk. All food and drink for the party is included and unlimited. You would be responsible for your own travel and accommodations for the event, but we can probably get you insider access to a pre-party and post-party event while you are in Hollywood as part of this exciting perk. We love to have fun and being in business with retailers, distributors and other partners around the world we really enjoy developing unique experiences to build long term relationships.

Social Proof:
Check out the review below from www.RunAroundTech.com in this video which includes an installation video.
Some Top Amazon reviewers have started to review some of our prototype samples. More reviews are ongoing.
While we personally feel the risks and challenges
for this particular product are incredibly low, it is our responsibility to be
upfront and clear about any challenges or potential setbacks that may
potentially come our way. These could include:
The product could fail in the long run. - This risk is limited in our opinion because we have
been producing tempered glass for a couple years. However, the
introduction of the curved edges and titanium alloy add a new potential

risk factor. In our testing the product has already held up for almost 3 months on 3 devices that we started testing at prototype phase. Consumers with tight fitting or enclosed cases may find that this glass is incompatible and therefore may not like it as an option.
Delays in production or shipping. - This risk is normal with any product that is gearing
up for a production run. The raw materials, production quality or other
factors could delay shipments. International shipping adds an extra
element of timing risk because clearing customs and other agencies can be
unpredictable. We believe we can manage this risk, because we have created
and imported/exported hundreds of products from concept to delivery prior

Playboy Mansion Launch Party - The Playboy Halloween party has become a big tradition at the Playboy Mansion. We have attended a number of events there. However, it is not scheduled yet therefore a potential risk is that it will not happen this year. If that is the case we will provide full refunds to those that select this launch party perk or access to an alternative Playboy event at the discretion of the Perk buyer. We will not leave you without either an epic experience or your money back. Playboy is not associated with Kyasi or any of our products.
If you unable to join this campaign at this time,
but still want to support our idea, you can still help us market our
product! Share our campaign information with your friends and family via social
media, email, and word of mouth. This is the best way to get a unique product

funded and ready for the rest of the world to see!

And for those that wish to join us at the Playboy Halloween Party for the official launch party get your perk today. Space is limited for this once in a lifetime experience. Check one item off your bucket list.

your support in whatever way you can help. We sincerely appreciate it.

We are at your service,

Kyasi Team Bravo

SOPA is a plastic support to hold the modem or
router in the wall socket, keeping the wire excess organized in both
sides. There is no need to drill the wall, stick SOPA to it or leave it
on a table where it takes up space and can bother.
Any kind of device can be stuck, and repositioned
if necessary, on SOPA thanks to the double-sided adhesive foams
if the device is going to be changed, stretching on its lifespan. In
addition, SOPA is a universal, long-lasting and sustainable product.
SOPA can be customized by a serigraph or manufacturing it on a specific color.

Dimensions: 30 x 26 x 0,3 cm

Join the future of charging - Qi wireless chargers are now in Starbuck's and Coffee Bean's even throughout JFK Airport. Our Wowhoo Qi chargers are the future of charger. Major phone manufactures are already adding wireless recievers built directly into the phones. See your phone below, All Packages are listed in the Perks Section.  Enjoy the simple charging life today, never plug a cord in your phone again.

Modern and Trendy Design QI Wireless Charger.
Wireless of the Future! Tiny Charger For Your Home, Office, Car, ect.

WowHoooooooooo!!! HOTTEST  Wireless Qi Phone Charger!

Our
Wowhoo wireless charger is a discrete and sleek portable charging
device. We designed and created the premier wireless charger at an
affordable price. Scoping our competition at the Consumer Electronic
Show (CES) in Vegas this January solidified the craftsmanship and
quality we have on other wireless chargers. We have produced the
smallest, thinnest, as well as leading quality Qi Wireless Charger. For

all of you wondering Qi is pronounced ""Chee"".

Our goals in
bringing our product to the market where as follows: 1) Modern and
trendy design 2) Extensive selection of colors 3) A unique design, not
the standard circle or square  4) A highly durable exterior, which can
stand-up to wear and tear  4) Small and very thin design with a powerful
charge. Having met all our goals, we are excited to offer a product
that ranks above the competition. We spent more money in materials and
production than much of our competition in order to produce the highest

quality charger.


When you open our modern and inviting packaging,
our product will leave you speechless due to its sleek and contemporary
style. Our team has worked very hard in making this product durable and
esthetically appealing. We even extended our launch date to ensure we
were offering the absolute best product by thoroughly testing and
analyzing its efficiency and durability. Having made our final change
and viewing in hand our final sample, we are excited to extend the

Kickstarter community with our Wowhoo Qi Charger.

Our Wowhoo
wireless charger measures about .47 inches tall with a 4.29 inch
diameter.  We have created an unique wireless charging device that
offers simplicity and style. The smallest Qi Charger we've seen on the
market. A true slide in the pocket size, being 50% thinner then most
wallets. The device is easily portable and can be used effortlessly in
your vehicle, dinner, table, office, as well as anywhere you may go. It

can even be carried in your back pocket!

 
#1 Questions - Does My Phone Work With Qi Chargers?  We are compatible with all phones below.

Iphone
Galaxy S3 (9300/9308), Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Note 2 (7100/7102),
Samsung Note 3, Blackberry Z30, HTC - One X, HTC - Butterfly, HTC –
Rzound, HTC – Droid DNA, Nokia – Lumia 820, Nokia – Lumia 920, Nokia –
Lumia 926, HTC – 8x Incredible 4G LTE, Google LG – Nexus 4, Google LG –
Nexus 5, Google LG – Nexus 7, LG – D1L, LG - LTE2, SAMSUNG –
920, SAMSUNG - 928, SHARP – SH-07D, SHARP – SH-04D, SHARP – SH-02D,

7 attractive colors to choose from! Pick your color, pick your style!

Our
initial Indiegogo campaign were offering 7 colors, we need your input
and ideas moving forward to narrow our product line down to 4 colors.
We're open to additional colors we have missed.  Any input will be
great.  Our final Wowhoo launch to the public we want only 4 colors,
possibly 5.  Help us and provide your favorites and any ideas or colors
Be one of the first to own a QI stylish Wowhoo wireless
charging device, which is just beginning to infiltrate the market.
Simplify your life with more charging capabilities and a shorter wait
time. It is as easy as placing your phone on the Qi while you go about
your day in the office, home, or commute. Never be fearful of a low

battery again with the Qi wireless charging device.

After numerous
samples, prototypes, size changes, charging speeds, we have finally
developed the Wowhoo, bringing the next level of technology to your

household or office. Enjoy the small design but very powerful charge.

Qi
wireless charging will soon be in every new vehicle, built into
furniture, lamps, night stands, and anywhere that simplifies life. Qi

wireless charging will change the way you use your mobile device.

  QI Wireless Chargers &
wireless phone carriers are adopting the Qi wireless charging
technology.  Additionally, many car manufactures are installing them in
their 2014 and 2015 models. Manufactures include, but are not limited to
the following: Jeep’s Cherokee, Toyota’s Avalon, Prius, Harrier,

Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Volkswagen, Audi, as well as Porsche.

Due to
improved design and usability, our initial launch date has been revised
from Jan 7th, to Feb 15th. We added approximately 8 mm in diameter to
allow for a better internal design. The small revision to the Qi Wowhoo
wireless charger yields a quicker charge and a more reliable product. We
have quickened the charging speed to be approximately 10% faster than a
stand-alone wall plug. That's a big jump considering were talking

wireless charging.

 
  Wowhoo Production Timeline


We
are estimating about 8 weeks max for development and shipping. We have
already knocked out 5 hard months of work on both our product and the
packaging.  So far we have got most the kinks out, time for funding and
the first full product production run.  We've very excited and hope all

About Qi Charging Background and Standard:

In
late 2008 a group of leading electronic companies created the Wireless
Power Consortium to establish QI as the interoperable global standard
for wireless power.  QI charging can be found in phones, vehicles,
furniture, vehicle parts as well as numerous other devices. Currently,
there are nearly 400 products that have hit the QI charging market. QI
products are global and can be found in North America, South America,

Asia, Europe, India, Africa, and Australia.

Join the wireless
charging technology of the future and simplify your life. Imagine saving
an extra 5-20 minutes a day. I know sometimes I'm hunting around for
chargers, cords, etc. Save the time and headaches. Take advantage of our
family packs and use our Wowhoo Charger in your home, office, car, or
on the go. The same QI technology demonstrated in Audi vehicles at the
CES 2014 in January is now available. QI charging is reinventing the
automotive industry's technology capabilities. As of January, 2014, QI
can be found in Jeep's Cherokee, Toyota's Avalon, Prius, as well as
Harrier.  After exhaustive safety and efficient testing, the CE4A made
QI their wireless charging choice for Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Volkswagen,

Audi, and Porsche. 

Qi is backed by over 200 leading powerful
companies of the WPC, including, but not limited to, ConvenientPower,
Energizer, HTC, LG, Motorola, Nokia, Panasonic, Samsung, Toshiba,

","Join the future of charging - Qi wireless chargers are now in Starbuck's and Coffee Bean's even throughout JFK Airport. Our Wowhoo Qi chargers are the future of charger. Major phone manufactures are already adding wireless recievers built directly into the phones. See your phone below, All Packages are listed in the Perks Section.  Enjoy the simple charging life today, never plug a cord in your phone again.Modern and Trendy Design QI Wireless Charger.
Wireless of the Future! Tiny Charger For Your Home, Office, Car, ect.
WowHoooooooooo!!! HOTTEST  Wireless Qi Phone Charger!Our
Wowhoo wireless charger is a discrete and sleek portable charging
device. We designed and created the premier wireless charger at an
affordable price. Scoping our competition at the Consumer Electronic
Show (CES) in Vegas this January solidified the craftsmanship and
quality we have on other wireless chargers. We have produced the
smallest, thinnest, as well as leading quality Qi Wireless Charger. For
all of you wondering Qi is pronounced ""Chee"". Our goals in
bringing our product to the market where as follows: 1) Modern and
trendy design 2) Extensive selection of colors 3) A unique design, not
the standard circle or square  4) A highly durable exterior, which can
stand-up to wear and tear  4) Small and very thin design with a powerful
charge. Having met all our goals, we are excited to offer a product
that ranks above the competition. We spent more money in materials and
production than much of our competition in order to produce the highest
quality charger. When you open our modern and inviting packaging,
our product will leave you speechless due to its sleek and contemporary
style. Our team has worked very hard in making this product durable and
esthetically appealing. We even extended our launch date to ensure we
were offering the absolute best product by thoroughly testing and
analyzing its efficiency and durability. Having made our final change
and viewing in hand our final sample, we are excited to extend the
Kickstarter community with our Wowhoo Qi Charger.Our Wowhoo
wireless charger measures about .47 inches tall with a 4.29 inch
diameter.  We have created an unique wireless charging device that
offers simplicity and style. The smallest Qi Charger we've seen on the
market. A true slide in the pocket size, being 50% thinner then most
wallets. The device is easily portable and can be used effortlessly in
your vehicle, dinner, table, office, as well as anywhere you may go. It
can even be carried in your back pocket!   #1 Questions - Does My Phone Work With Qi Chargers?  We are compatible with all phones below.Iphone
4 & 4s, Iphone 5, Iphone 5c & 5s, Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung
Galaxy S3 (9300/9308), Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Note 2 (7100/7102),
Samsung Note 3, Blackberry Z30, HTC - One X, HTC - Butterfly, HTC –
Rzound, HTC – Droid DNA, Nokia – Lumia 820, Nokia – Lumia 920, Nokia –
Lumia 926, HTC – 8x Incredible 4G LTE, Google LG – Nexus 4, Google LG –
Nexus 5, Google LG – Nexus 7, LG – D1L, LG - LTE2, SAMSUNG –
920, SAMSUNG - 928, SHARP – SH-07D, SHARP – SH-04D, SHARP – SH-02D,
7 attractive colors to choose from! Pick your color, pick your style!Our
initial Indiegogo campaign were offering 7 colors, we need your input
and ideas moving forward to narrow our product line down to 4 colors.
We're open to additional colors we have missed.  Any input will be
great.  Our final Wowhoo launch to the public we want only 4 colors,
possibly 5.  Help us and provide your favorites and any ideas or colors
Be one of the first to own a QI stylish Wowhoo wireless
charging device, which is just beginning to infiltrate the market.
Simplify your life with more charging capabilities and a shorter wait
time. It is as easy as placing your phone on the Qi while you go about
your day in the office, home, or commute. Never be fearful of a low
battery again with the Qi wireless charging device.After numerous
samples, prototypes, size changes, charging speeds, we have finally
developed the Wowhoo, bringing the next level of technology to your
household or office. Enjoy the small design but very powerful charge.Qi
wireless charging will soon be in every new vehicle, built into
furniture, lamps, night stands, and anywhere that simplifies life. Qi
wireless charging will change the way you use your mobile device.   QI Wireless Chargers & The Automotive IndustryMajor
wireless phone carriers are adopting the Qi wireless charging
technology.  Additionally, many car manufactures are installing them in
their 2014 and 2015 models. Manufactures include, but are not limited to
the following: Jeep’s Cherokee, Toyota’s Avalon, Prius, Harrier,
Mercedes-Benz, BMW, Volkswagen, Audi, as well as Porsche. Due to
improved design and usability, our initial launch date has been revised
from Jan 7th, to Feb 15th. We added approximately 8 mm in diameter to
allow for a better internal design. The small revision to the Qi Wowhoo
wireless charger yields a quicker charge and a more reliable product. We
have quickened the charging speed to be approximately 10% faster than a
stand-alone wall plug. That's a big jump considering were talking
are estimating about 8 weeks max for development and shipping. We have
already knocked out 5 hard months of work on both our product and the
packaging.  So far we have got most the kinks out, time for funding and
the first full product production run.  We've very excited and hope all
you backers are too. Our Wowhoo Qi charger is one of the few to hit the
market. In our eye one of the highest quality and most eye appealing
luxury charger on the market.  It will impress you, we assure that from
packaging, product quality, and charging time. Everyone wants a Wowhoo

Help Fund a Tablet Pc Charity Campaign

Our mission is simple. To make Tablet PCs simply affordable for Everyone young and old. In a technology crazed world where everything is revolving online, our plan is to enable people of all ages to own a personal tablet pc. 

Be it just games or educational purposes for the young or staying in touch with your love ones through skype and other messaging apps, photo viewing and movies. It is a simply must have for people on the go too to stay connected.

We have also arranged a Charity Campaign for childrenwithcancer.org.uk as 5% of proceeds from perks will be donated. A Thank you letter from the society will be sent after donation has been made after the campaign to all who participates.

We thank you in advance to those who participate or help spread the word on our campaign.

Our $69 USD Ainol Novo 7 Android 4.0 8GB Tablet PC comes with FREE Worldwide Delivery.

How do I pledge for extra units? 

You can purchase extra cable or connector. 

Each additional cable and adapter costs USD$6（HKD$47）, each additional connector costs USD$5（HKD$40） and you can also purchase additional cable set in early bird discount.

To pledge for extra cables, just select another perk, and add USD$6（HKD$47） for each additional cable, USD$5（HKD$40） for each additional connector and USD$13/16/22/39（HKD$112/126/180/300） for each additional cable set you would like to receive.

XPower Double Mag was launched as an imprint of XPower Int'l Trading Ltd in 2018. At XPower Double Mag, we dedicate to provide the latest and trendy product as well as satisfied service to customers. We specialize in external power bank, mobile chargers, travel charger, power strip, Bluetooth, mobile phone batteries, mobile phone accessories, as well as computer accessories.

XPOWER cables are finished Test &
column4:
Examination status and ready for production. We can control the mass production schedule. We aim to provide on-scheduled quality product to users.

Replacements 
We are always happy to replace defective or damaged cable and components. Just send us photos of the damage, and we will ship a replacement at no additional cost to you. If your item needs to be returned, we will cover the cost of the re-shipping. Replacement requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you. For replacement requests, please email to enquiry@xpower.com.hk.

Refunds 
If you'd like a refund before your item ships, you have until one week before the scheduled ship date to request one. We can offer you a 90% refund since indiegogo retains about 10% of your pledge for various fees. If there is something wrong with your item, we appreciate the opportunity to replace or exchange it. If a refund is preferred and there is no defect in the product, you'll be responsible for shipping it back to us. Upon receipt of the returned item, we'll issue you a 90% refund. Refund requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you. For more questions about refunds, please email to enquiry@xpower.com.hk.

Our campaigns have had some great reviews:

We wanted to bring the MiStand+ to the amazing Indiegogo community...

We didn't want to change things just for the sake of it. Every design decision has a functional purpose so that we could make a better product. We read through all of the feedback we received  since launching the original MiStand, and worked on improving it.

The base of MiStand+ has been carefully tapered to improve ergonomics and to reduce the weight of the design. A cable slot has been milled in to the back face of MiStand+ to allow any standard USB cable to pass through. This is great for users who like to place their MiStand+ on a desk or bedside cabinet and charge their tablet.

Compatible with...

Perfect for daily tasks...

Can be used as POS (the more pressure applied to MiStand+ the stronger the hold) 

Polyurethane

MiStand+ comes with polyurethane pads which work whether you use a tablet case or not! The material is non-adhesive yet sticky. It doesn't leave any residue on your fingers or device.

The pads are nearly 2 times thicker than the pads we used on our original product, making them a lot more durable and easier to maintain...just wipe with warm water and once dry they are fully restored!!

The same polyurethane material is used on the base, so MiStand+ is always stable (even when playing those frustrating games!) and works on most surfaces.

This means MiStand+ works with the majority of tablets on the market!

Works Great with cases...

Fluid 3D Rotation...with More Power!

When the original MiStand was launched the magnetic joint was designed to work with the majority of tablets. As time has passed, tablets have increased in size and weight so we needed to improve the magnetic joint. MiStand+ comes with a neodymium rare-earth magnet, which is 33% more powerful. This means that even the heaviest tablets work great with MiStand+.

Made to last through quality manufacturing...

We take great pride in the quality of our products and have gone to great lengths to ensure that MiStand+ maintains those high standards. The manufacturing company's experience with the our products will allow us to produce MiStand+ to the highest standards. We are proud to design and manufacture our products in Great Britain and are able to oversee production from design to delivery.

Colour Choices

After being machined each MiStand+ is glass-bead blasted, and then anodised, to give us two great colour choices: Silver and Black.

Special Indiegogo Prices!

MiStand+ is currently exclusively to our Indiegogo supporters with perks starting at £30 ($38 USD)!

Due to the success of our previous campaigns, we have been able to secure some great rates on shipping to the EU, Canada and the USA please look out for free and reduced shipping information on selected perks!

Quality...

We take great pride in the quality of our products and have gone to great lengths to ensure that MiStand+ maintains those high standards. The manufacturing company are constantly improving to produce MiStand+ to the highest standards. We are proud to design and manufacture our products in Great Britain and are able to oversee production from design to delivery.

Apple, Android, Galaxy, Surface, Windows, Kindle, Wacom are trademarks of their respective companies, no endorsement implied.

Rewards!

So back one of the rewards below to be some of the first people to use MiStand+!

Project Plan

No one likes delays, it is really important that our backers get their rewards shipped out on time and as agreed. We have worked with all of the suppliers closely and with your help are confident we can deliver a successful Indiegogo campaign. 

Please share with Family &
column2:
Friends...

Thank You... for taking the time to read our story we really appreciate you taking an interest in our product. We really hope you like what you see and would like you to help get MiStand+ into your hands.

Apple, Android, Galaxy, Surface, Windows, Kindle, Wacom are trademarks of their respective companies, no endorsement implied.

Risks and challenges

As with all projects there will be some risks and challenges ahead, we have tried to minimise these risks before we have approached everyone on Indiegogo.

We have already bought this product to life and have worked with the suppliers before in a previous campaign. 

Thank you.

It doesn't leave any residue on your fingers or device.The pads are nearly 2 times thicker than the pads we used on our original product, making them a lot more durable and easier to maintain...just wipe with warm water and once dry they are fully restored!!The same polyurethane material is used on the base, so MiStand+ is always stable (even when playing those frustrating games!) and works on most surfaces.This means MiStand+ works with the majority of tablets on the market!Works Great with cases...Fluid 3D Rotation...with More Power!When the original MiStand was launched the magnetic joint was designed to work with the majority of tablets. As time has passed, tablets have increased in size and weight so we needed to improve the magnetic joint. MiStand+ comes with a neodymium rare-earth magnet, which is 33% more powerful. This means that even the heaviest tablets work great with MiStand+.Made to last through quality manufacturing...We take great pride in the quality of our products and have gone to great lengths to ensure that MiStand+ maintains those high standards. The manufacturing company's experience with the our products will allow us to produce MiStand+ to the highest standards. We are proud to design and manufacture our products in Great Britain and are able to oversee production from design to delivery.Colour ChoicesAfter being machined each MiStand+ is glass-bead blasted, and then anodised, to give us two great colour choices: Silver and Black.Special Indiegogo Prices!MiStand+ is currently exclusively to our Indiegogo supporters with perks starting at £30 ($38 USD)!Due to the success of our previous campaigns, we have been able to secure some great rates on shipping to the EU, Canada and the USA please look out for free and reduced shipping information on selected perks!Quality...We take great pride in the quality of our products and have gone to great lengths to ensure that MiStand+ maintains those high standards. The manufacturing company are constantly improving to produce MiStand+ to the highest standards. We are proud to design and manufacture our products in Great Britain and are able to oversee production from design to delivery.Apple, Android, Galaxy, Surface, Windows, Kindle, Wacom are trademarks of their respective companies, no endorsement implied.Rewards!So back one of the rewards below to be some of the first people to use MiStand+!Project PlanNo one likes delays, it is really important that our backers get their rewards shipped out on time and as agreed. We have worked with all of the suppliers closely and with your help are confident we can deliver a successful Indiegogo campaign. Please share with Family & Friends...Thank You... for taking the time to read our story we really appreciate you taking an interest in our product. We really hope you like what you see and would like you to help get MiStand+ into your hands.Apple, Android, Galaxy, Surface, Windows, Kindle, Wacom are trademarks of their respective companies, no endorsement implied.Risks and challengesAs with all projects there will be some risks and challenges ahead, we have tried to minimise these risks before we have approached everyone on Indiegogo.We have already bought this product to life and have worked with the suppliers before in a previous campaign. Thank you.",30.0,0,"1 Campaign

column13: >Even for the iPhone 6/6S. Imagine power and protection. The lightest and thinnest battery charging case ever made for the iPhone. Imagine having 200% battery life (extra 2600mAh) on your iPhone. Charge your phone anytime, anywhere with the press of a button. It's so light and thin, you won't even notice it's there.

column1: No one like's a big bulky battery case. That's why we created ThinCharge.

column4: >ThinCharge is loaded with cutting edge, state of the art features. Never has protection and power come in such a small package.

column2: >It gives you twice the amount of power as your phone's built in battery. But it's way slicker of course.
>The iPhone 6/6S is a beautiful piece of hardware. It's also the lightest and thinnest ever made. At only half an inch thin and less than 3 ounces, you won't even notice ThinCharge is there.

column1: We're experts at crowdfunding and have a 100% ship rate across all of our previous campaigns. We've partnered with a world class factory, shipping &
column2: logistics team and crowdfunding experts to deliver ThinCharge. Early bird backers will receive our first production run. Pledge today and lock in savings of 50% off.

column1: See and feel the difference. Carrying around a big, bulky battery charging case just isn't practical. That's why we designed ThinCharge, the world's thinnest and lightest protective battery case for the iPhone. Compare us to the competition.

ThinCharge is made from a shock absorbing polymer material which is much better for drop protection compared to the aluminum bumper battery cases that the competition uses. It's soft to the touch and won't snag on your clothing when you pull it out of your pockets.

The ThinCharge battery case features pass-through charging, meaning it automatically charges your iPhone first, then it charges the battery case. Compared to other battery cases, you can use your existing Lightning charging cable.
We showed ThinCharge to thousands of people at CES 2015, the biggest technology stage in the world. The press and people loved it.

Follow this campaign and let us know in the comments section. At this time we chose to focus only on the iPhone 6 instead of the iPhone 6 Plus because it's the most popular model. If we receive enough interest for the iPhone 6 plus model, we will release it accordingly.

Your grandfather may have taken you camping, but your equipment doesn’t have to look like his. Or function like it!

We’ve combined the latest smart technology and cutting edge design to create a beautiful, rugged, outdoor camping lantern. You can control it from a distance, changing the brightness, choosing the color, or setting it to flash, all with a Bluetooth app on your smartphone. The lanterns also comes with weather sensors which can even alert you to possible changes in weather. It’s light years ahead!

A year ago a group of senior managers from the electronics, sourcing and marketing industries, who love the outdoors, got together. They were amazed at the old fashioned look and capabilities of outdoor equipment on the market, so they decided to create their own.
The first products are two new lanterns, the 200 Lumen and the 400 Lumen, that can be controlled by an app on your phone.

Lost your campsite in the evening light? No problem, pull out your Smartphone and switch your lantern to flash. Tired at the end of the day and don’t want to get out of the tent to turn off the lantern? Easy, just use your phone. Or want to heighten a romantic moment without breaking the spell - with a touch of your finger you can pick one of 16 million colors on your phone!

In addition to adjusting brightness, color and flash, the lantern has sensors to measure temperature, humidity and barometric pressure, again sending signals by Bluetooth straight to your phone app. It will even alert you to possible weather changes. And the lantern comes with a USB port to charge your mobile phone or other devices. The 200 Lumen is 10 inches or 25 cm tall and the 400 Lumen is just under 12 inches or 29 cm, powered by a rechargeable lithium ion power bank or 4 D cells, giving 8 nights at high power and up to 30 at low power. (Batteries sold separately.) The unit is strong but light and with batteries even the larger unit is only just over 3 pounds or 1.6 Kg.

Our Founder, Bernie Auyang,has already built and taken a tech company public on the stock exchange. As he explained, “Our aim at o2Tech is to produce a range of outdoor equipment that incorporates the latest IoT technology and also looks great. Beautiful. Connected. Powerful. And Rugged. That is the mantra for all our products. This is the first example, but there are more in the pipeline.”

All of the design, engineering and sourcing has been completed. All we need now is the seed money for tooling and initial production. Please help. You will not only be bringing a great product to market,but you will be getting the lanterns at 30 to 50 % off the retail price. Lanterns will be available during Q1 of the new year.
Please tell all your friends who love the outdoors too and support us.

column1: We understand how frustrating it is to break our phones. Phones have become such an importance in society and in our generation yet they are so fragile might as well protect them. A statistic shows that 2 in 3 smartphone users break their screens, we all know how it feels and are aware of the hassle to get the screen replaced.

The Armor-X case has a built-in mounting adaptor to make the case easily mountable to the accessories and X-mounts. Whatever your interests or lifestyle there is a mount for you. From the adrenaline junky to the housewife, we assure you that there is a mount for you. The design is very futuristic and with all the mounts makes you feel like batman with all his tools.

column6: >The Armor-X case has a built-in mounting adaptor to make the case easily mountable to the accessories and X-mounts. Whatever your interests or lifestyle there is a mount for you. From the adrenaline junky to the housewife, we assure you that there is a mount for you. The design is very futuristic and with all the mounts makes you feel like batman with all his tools.

column7: >The Armor-X Rugged Mount Case is equipped with the X-mount system that is built into the case. With a variety of more than 30 different mounts there is bound to be a mount for your lifestyle. Ranging from a suction cup mount to place on the dashboard of your car to be used s a GPS navigational device, to a helmet mount to film POV video skiing down a steep mountain. The X-mount is for everyone.

>The X-Mount System - One System. Endless Adventure.  this is the concept behind the brand. It allows Armor-X protected devices to be mounted interchangeably on bicycles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, and on marine vehicles such as jet skis, sailboats or speedboats. With Armor-X and the X-Mount System, devices become rugged GPS navigators, Action Cameras, and companions in extreme terrain or weather, and underwater.

column1: We have designed and developed the patent pending X-Mount System, a built-in mounting system that allows users to increase the utility of their mobile devices for use outdoors and during various sporting activities.

Once you brought a perk from us and then help us by sharing our story via social media or email. You can get an additional Tough Case for FREE if every three of your referrals purchases a Perk. There is no limit on how many FREE Tough Cases you can get!
How to participate in the referral program?
• Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
• Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
• Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the ""Link"" icon
• INDIEGOGO back end system will record all your reference and send us a details report for reference once the campaign is over.
• Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
• Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
• You will see the number of people you referred, the number who have purchased and the total dollar amount of their contributions.
• Once the campaign is over, Indiegogo will provide us with detailed information on how many peoples were purchased through your referrals and at what perk level.
• We will send you the additional tough case according to your referrals. We will send one additional tough case for every 3 referrals with purchase. There is no limitation.
Will you keep me updated with the progress if I contribute?
Yes! When you contribute to the Armor-X Tough Case Campaign. we will ensure that you receive all of the latest information about the project as it progresses.
Are shipping costs included in the Perk price?
For addresses within the USA, Hong Kong &
column2: China, shipping price is included. For any other international orders, please add $10 USD to your contribution once you have selected your perk.

column1: Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?

No. Contributors must pay any applicable taxes and duties for the designated country of delivery. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will email you to confirm your shipping address and will provide further instructions on handling VAT or other applicable fees.
Help! What do I do if I forgot to include international shipping?

No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $10. This will be added to your pledge amount. make sure to include the same shipping address that was on your original contribution.
I had problems making a contribution, please help?
If you had trouble making a contribution, please check Indiegogo's common contribution errors.
I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. Can I have my money back?
Indiegogo orders are concept pledges, not purchase transactions and therefore are non-refundable. If you require customer support, please email: info@armor-x.com
I asked for my Perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do?
We will be contacting all backers before shipping out the Perks to confirm your shipping address. When we do, please respond with the correct address.
When will you ship the Armor-X Rugged Mount Case?
We aim to ship the first Armor-X Rugged Mount Case pre-orders in end of Jan 2015.
When will I get to choose the color and iPhone model of Armor-X Rugged Mount Case?
Following the end of the campaign, all contributors will be contacted to confirm color and iPhone model choices.
Will the Armor-X Rugged Mount Case be available for general sale after the campaign ends?

Yes. all the Armor-X Rugged Mount Case will be available for purchase on www.armor-x.com and with our retail partners. These will be sold at the Suggested Retail Price (SRP). By ordering on Indiegogo, you can purchase at the lowest price and can guarantee the earliest delivery.
After contributing to the campaign, what happens next?

We will post frequent updates on the status of Armor-X Rugged Mount Case. Once we get close to our delivery date we will email you to confirm your shipping address and to find out what color case you would like to receive. In the meantime, you can connect with us on social media for some other behind the scenes looks at Armor-X Rugged Mount Case.

column2: >Remember to follow us on facebook, instagram and twitter to get updates with this INDIEGOGO campaign!

column4: > for a chance to win prizes each month!

Ranging from a suction cup mount to place on the dashboard of your car to be used s a GPS navigational device, to a helmet mount to film POV video skiing down a steep mountain. The X-mount is for everyone.

The X-Mount System - One System. Endless Adventure.  this is the concept behind the brand. It allows Armor-X protected devices to be mounted interchangeably on bicycles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, and on marine vehicles such as jet skis, sailboats or speedboats. With Armor-X and the X-Mount System, devices become rugged GPS navigators, Action Cameras, and companions in extreme terrain or weather, and underwater.

We've already started the development of product and started the tooling according to the 3D we have showed to you. We are very experienced in developing Armor Rugged cases and our X-mount system already launched around 2 years.

All we need is you guys to get this product into real production. We are planning on having the product produced and shipped before the end of January2015! Armor-X is all about creating a community, and you are all apart of it.

ARMOR-X  is a professional-grade, shockproof and waterproof case & mounting system manufacturer. A fresh new combination of ports.

2 USB-C 3.1

2 USB-A 3.1

1 USB-C PD Power (up to 100w)

1 HDMI Video Output (Nintendo Switch Max resolution: 1920x1080 pixels, MacBook/MacBook Pro Max resolution: 4096x2160 pixels)

 

 

C-FORCE replaces your Nintendo switch dock with far more portability and ease of use. Not to mention no more issues with overheating.

 

C-FORCE also supports Samsung S8/S8+, you can enjoy all your contents on the bigger screen.

 

 

It gives you many needed ports to the new MacBook/MacBook Pro and ChromeBook. The HDMI can be a life saver for video presentations and withe the USB-C hub you can connect far more devices. 

 

 

 

We have already started our pilot production run. Here you can see how low quantities production runs are painted.

We have partnered with a Chinese factory specialized in makings high end USB type C connectors.

 

 

 

 

$69 - 1 x C-FORCE

$135 - 2 x C-FORCE

$589 - 10 x C-FORCE (Retailer First to Market)  

$74 - 1 x C-FORCE + A HDMI Cable 

$88 - 1 x C-FORCE +A 45W PD Charger

 

C-FORCE team is a group of engineers that love the Nintendo Switch and developing new technology. It is our gole to make the best products we can to make the wold just a little bit better and trouble free. 

Risks and challenges

Every project has risks and challenges. Naturally we have worked very hard in an effort to minimize them. As you can see we have already started the pilot manufacturing. But we need your contribution to take it to the next level to help us achieve the economies scale needed to make this product cost low and available to the greater public. 
Every road has a turn or a bump so we’ll be sure to keep you, our backers up to date.

","A fresh new combination of ports.2 USB-C 3.12 USB-A 3.11 USB-C PD Power (up to 100w)1 HDMI Video Output (Nintendo Switch Max resolution: 1920x1080 pixels, MacBook/MacBook Pro Max resolution: 4096x2160 pixels)  C-FORCE replaces your Nintendo switch dock with far more portability and ease of use. Not to mention no more issues with overheating. C-FORCE also supports Samsung S8/S8+, you can enjoy all your contents on the bigger screen.  It gives you many needed ports to the new MacBook/MacBook Pro and ChromeBook. The HDMI can be a life saver for video presentations and withe the USB-C hub you can connect far more devices.    We have already started our pilot production run. Here you can see how low quantities production runs are painted.We have partnered with a Chinese factory specialized in makings high end USB type C connectors.    $69 - 1 x C-FORCE$135 - 2 x C-FORCE$589 - 10 x C-FORCE (Retailer First to Market)  $74 - 1 x C-FORCE + A HDMI Cable $88 - 1 x C-FORCE +A 45W PD Charger C-FORCE team is a group of engineers that love the Nintendo Switch and developing new technology. It is our gole to make the best products we can to make the wold just a little bit better and trouble free. Risks and challengesEvery project has risks and challenges. Naturally we have worked very hard in an effort to minimize them. As you can see we have already started the pilot manufacturing. But we need your contribution to take it to the next level to help us achieve the economies scale needed to make this product cost low and available to the greater public. Every road has a turn or a bump so we’ll be sure to keep you, our backers up to date.",15.0,0,"5 Campaigns
