Our main focus was to address and apply the constructive feedback we received through the first campaign. The LOOKSTAND is back with a sturdier but slimmer design to satisfy the needs of our backers, and a larger version, the LOOKSTAND MAX, is now available for tablets.

 

 

 

 

 

Love About Us 

 

 

Suggested 

 

 

 

 

 

The LOOKSTAND 2.0 has been enhanced in the inner design to for better strength and durability for long term usage. We changed the shaft at the base for stronger hold and also added an extra spring for firmer rotation, and fixed the bolts on hinges as well. The new Detach Mount is now slim and easy with only a base mount that the Lookstand can be directly attached/detached from with a simple slide-down functionality. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our patented stands have a sleek, compact design and can stay attached to the back of the phone/tablet- always ready-to-go. Both stands extend up to a height of a full 7-inches for the perfect, ergonomic viewing angle in both portrait and landscape modes to maximize comfort and productivity.
column2:
>Generic stand vs. LOOKSTAND

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Detach Mounts are specially designed for our stands to maximize the function of LOOKSTAND by enabling the detachment of the LOOKSTAND from your phone. It allows you to use existing wireless chargers or car chargers/holders. 

The detailed mechanism within the compact design of the LOOKSTAND holds much functionality. The LOOKSTAND is a multi-functional stand that transforms into a phonestand or tripod for your chosen device. 

 

It can even be used as a selfie-stick!

 

 

 

 

 

The LOOKSTAND can be used as a phone grip and can be flipped both horizontally and vertically as a kickstand. 

 

 

 

Through a glide out function, the length of the LOOKSTAND may be adjusted to the user's needs from 3.5 inches to 7.1 inches. The LOOKSTAND 2.0 for phone can be used as a holder or selfie-stick in this step. 

 

 

 

The LOOKSTAND transforms into a fully adjustable phonestand/tripod for your device. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Recent statistics show the average person spends an average of 4 hours a day on their phones. Fun fact: In an upright position the average human head weighs 12 lbs., but at a 60° angle (the usual angle when looking at your smartphone on your lap or at a desk) that weight increases to 60 lbs. That’s the weight of 4 bowling balls!

The LOOKSTAND helps take more than half the pressure off your neck and shoulders for the perfect ergonomic position while using your phone.

 

 

 

 

DESIGNED TO STAND STRONG. The two foldable legs give stability on any flat surface so your phone/tablet won't topple over or slip.

 

 

The LOOKSTAND 2.0 is compatible with all smartphones up to the weight of 9.9 ounces with the exception of folding phones. The LOOKSTAND MAX is compatible with all tablets up to 11 inches, heavier phones, and other devices up to 28 ounces. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WITH PATENTED DESIGN 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Lookstand is not only functional, but also stylish and trendy. Korean celebs and fashion influencers are using the Lookstand and finding new ways of transforming theirs, making it the new ""it"" gadget to have. 

#LOOKSTAND #CELEBRITY.STYLE #TRANSFORMING.STAND #BEST.GADGETS
column3: >* SHIPPING flat rate $5 within US, flat rate $7 rest of the world *
column4:
> 

 

 

 

 

 

The LOOKSTAND is made from high-quality, lightweight aluminum to guarantee durability. We have machine-tested and manually-tested our product to be pulled in-and-out 10,000 times. MANUFACTURED IN KOREA. Korea is one of the leading countries in the global mobile industry and our manufacturers have a concrete understanding of what an exceptional product needs to deliver.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

❝Mygazine is your personalized social media rich magazine that brings you daily updates on your favorite stories, features and videos from around the world to your iPad with a flick of a finger❞

Experience a new technology that hands over the reins to give you full editorial privileges to create your own personalized magazine for your iPad. From global politics to entertainment news, and sports updates to medical journals, the Mygazine App is perfect for anyone who wants to stay up to date with their own news interests. Mygazine Daily brings you fresh, updated news content in a user-friendly, magazine-style interface. With more than 2000 preloaded feeds organized in more than 30 categories, you can customize your own personal magazine that updates your favorite content daily. Gone are the days when you would need to subscribe to multiple news and entertainment publications. With the Mygazine Daily, with a flick of your finger, you are off to read fresh and engaging news content from your iPad. The Mygazine interface offers simplicity in its finest form to have you reading your favorite material in no time. Dive into your favorite news story with a single tap, and view a crisp and clear image of your article.
All new magazines are neatly arranged by date on a realistic looking bookshelf
Open a magazine and first thing you will see is a colorful table of content
Select a story and it will open a glossy and realistic magazine page. You can flip back and forth by sliding finger
This is a neat feature. See all stories and video nicely stacked in a news strip. Slide left and right to find what you want to read and then touch a picture to open it
You can check out more images at www.mygazineapp.com

Hello!  My name is Al and I'm the creator of Mygazine Daily an application for the ipad that allows you to take your favorite magazines with you - no matter where you are. Mygazine is a leader in changing the way you read news stories, features, and articles by syncing your favorite news sites into one App.

My dream of creating Mygazine Daily arose after travelling a few times in the days when the ipad first came out.  As I sat in the airplane playing mindless games on the ipad, I thought to myself - wouldn’t it be neat if I could have my favorite reading material with me to occupy my time?  I started looking into building an app whereby I could customize all the reading material of my choice in one place. Slowly the idea seemed to keep developing. What if it could arrange my material by categories and arrange it by date...
After two years of labor, I have launched the App very recently and it is getting rave reviews from users.
It's Great - Beautiful deign and great polish. Amazing app for anyone on the go that want's to read a magazine in their spare time!!!  Sep 25, 2012 by Jinator123

Great! - Initially, I downloaded this app to play it. As I went through options I started liking it. I can add different RRS feedback from sources as I want. Definitely I will upgrade this app and soon get back with my feed back (09/30/2012) Sep 29, 2012 by Foreword
Great Features - thousands of articles to choose from, beautiful colors, and many more great features. Sep 27, 2012 by Lucio Elvira
Mygazine Daily has been a labor of love and I am still working on ways to improve it.
I invite you to try the app for free – go to www.mygazineapp.com

In order to turn Mygazine Daily into an App store success in the long term, I now need a little support. I need money to continue enhancing the application and to promote it as widely as possible. I am competing in a market where developers of successful apps have millions to spend on marketing but some great apps don’t get a chance because they don’t have the backing of rich executives and millionaires. Unfortunately I am one of the later.  So far, I have paid everything out of my own savings. My personal resources are very, very limited, so I have hardly been able to advertise at all. 

So I am reaching out to you, for your support. My success in raising funds will not only allow me to develop the app further, but it will help in marketing the app on a global level.
Your contribution towards reaching this goal will help me to enhance this app and promote it at a global scale. Remember you can make this app number one.
I trust you can help me with as much as you can – whether it is $1 or $1,000, it will be extremely helpful and every cent will be put to good use.
Please help me to promote the App by sharing this campaign with others. Help me make as much noise as possible!
There are several share toolsbelow, which you can use to share this fundraising campaign with your contacts on Facebook, Google+, Twitter and via email.

Many, many thanks for your help! :)

Please help me to promote the App by sharing this campaign with others. Help me make as much noise as possible!
There are several share toolsbelow, which you can use to share this fundraising campaign with your contacts on Facebook, Google+, Twitter and via email.
Many, many thanks for your help! :)",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

What is InputStick?
column2:
>InputStick is a wireless USB receiver (similar to one that comes with wireless mouse), that can be paired with any Bluetooth-enabled Android device and controlled by applications. With InputStick your smartphone can become wireless USB mouse, keyboard, gamepad and so on. This allows apps to: type, move mouse pointer, click, scroll, control multimedia playback and games.

 

Why InputStick?
column3: >In many situations InputStick gives you many advantages over WiFi/3G/Bluetooth-HID based solutions:
column4: >1) InputStick is physically plugged into USB port, so it is compatible with ANY USB-enabled hardware:

column1: • PCs (Windows, Linux, Mac OS, any other USB-enabled OS).
2) Almost as easy to use as generic USB mouse or keyboard:
• USB host detects new hardware and if necessary installs generic drivers (if available). No action is required on your part. It usually takes no more than a few seconds.
• No need to install server application or configure network.
• No need to install custom drivers or modify any OS settings.
• Works even if there is no WiFi / 3G network coverage.
• No need to root your Android device.

Requirements and limitations:

To be able to use InputStick following requirements must be met:
• USB host must supply at least 100mW power.
• OS must allow to attach new USB devices.
• USB host must support given USB class. See examples:
• Generic HID keyboard, mouse - supported by most USB hosts.
• PC (Windows, Linux) - works out of the box.

column2: >InputStick acts as a proxy between your Android device and a USB host:
column3: >Depending on configuration obtained from Android application, it can present itself as almost any kind of USB device:
column4: >Since InputStick is physically plugged into USB port, host cannot tell the difference between real USB device (for example: a keyboard) and InputStick.
column5: >To use InputStick you will have to install InputStickUtility app on your Android device. It will guide you step-by-step through pairing process, allow to manage all your InputStick devices, upgrade firmware if necessary (via Bluetooth) and provide background service responsible for communication between apps and InputStick.
column8: >Once InputStick is released, following apps will be available (all free and without ads):

column1: • Remote Controller: turns your phone into wireless USB keyboard, mouse and multimedia remote.

• Password Manager: use InputStick to type URL, user name and password for you! Use long passwords, with special characters, different for each site and don't worry about memorizing them or making typos!
• Gamepad: use your phone as a wireless USB gamepad with 4 axes and 16 buttons. Supports multi-touch and accelerometer.
• Presentation remote: turns your phone into wireless USB presentation remote.
• Barcode Scanner: turns your smartphone into USB QR/bar-code scanner.

You can also use InputStick in your own Android application! See ""Developers"" section for more details.


Take it anywhere. Use more than one.

column2: >InputStick has a size of a USB flash drive, you can easily carry it everywhere you go. Put it in your pocket, attach to a keyring or even keep one it in your wallet. You can also use multiple InputStick devices: one at each location (home, office) or one for each device (PC, laptop, console). Applications can easily switch between different InputStick devices.
column3:
>


Technical data.

Size: 57 x 19 x 9 mm.
Weight: 8g.
Interface: USB 2.0 (full speed).
Wireless connectivity: Bluetooth 2.1.
Range: up to 10m.


Developers.
column4: >InputStick Android API will allow you to easily use InputStick in your own Android applications. Using standard USB devices is very easy and requires almost no USB related knowledge. Currently available USB device classes are:

column2: >You can also implement other USB devices, however that requires some experience with USB development. But don't worry, there will be tutorials and step by step guides available. Keep in mind that because of using Bluetooth to communicate with Android device, there are latency and data throughput limitations. It is not recommended to use InputStick as USB devices that require high data transfer rate (mass storage, audio, imaging etc.).
column4: >Current state of the project.
column5:
>InputStick has been under development for almost a year now. What you can see on the video and pictures is 100% working prototype, which is almost ready to go into production any day now. Because of that, this is a flexible funding campaign, so even in case when funding goal won't be reached, you'll get your InputStick device. Please keep in mind that there is always a small possibility of project being slightly delayed, because of certification or production issues.


Perks and shipment.
column6: >InputStick will be available in black and white enclosures. Devices will be shipped in March 2014, via registered priority

column1: air-mail. <b>International shipment and taxes (for EU customers) are
already included in the price of each perk. You are responsible for

any import fees which might apply according to local law.


Want to know more?

Visit inputstick.com for more details.


All trademarks, product names and logos are the property of their respective owners.

","What is InputStick?InputStick is a wireless USB receiver (similar to one that comes with wireless mouse), that can be paired with any Bluetooth-enabled Android device and controlled by applications. With InputStick your smartphone can become wireless USB mouse, keyboard, gamepad and so on. This allows apps to: type, move mouse pointer, click, scroll, control multimedia playback and games. Why InputStick?In many situations InputStick gives you many advantages over WiFi/3G/Bluetooth-HID based solutions:1) InputStick is physically plugged into USB port, so it is compatible with ANY USB-enabled hardware:
PCs (Windows, Linux, Mac OS, any other USB-enabled OS).
2) Almost as easy to use as generic USB mouse or keyboard:
USB host detects new hardware and if necessary installs generic drivers (if available). No action is required on your part. It usually takes no more than a few seconds.
No need to install server application or configure network.
No need to install custom drivers or modify any OS settings.
Works even if there is no WiFi / 3G network coverage.
No need to root your Android device.
Requirements and limitations:To be able to use InputStick following requirements must be met:
Android 2.3 or later, with Bluetooth radio.
At least one available USB port.
USB host must supply at least 100mW power.
OS must allow to attach new USB devices.
USB host must support given USB class. See examples:
Generic HID keyboard, mouse - supported by most USB hosts.
PC (Windows, Linux) - works out of the box.
PC (Mac OS) - requires USB Overdrive software.
Playstation3 - works only with some games.

How does it work?InputStick acts as a proxy between your Android device and a USB host: Depending on configuration obtained from Android application, it can present itself as almost any kind of USB device:Since InputStick is physically plugged into USB port, host cannot tell the difference between real USB device (for example: a keyboard) and InputStick.  To use InputStick you will have to install InputStickUtility app on your Android device. It will guide you step-by-step through pairing process, allow to manage all your InputStick devices, upgrade firmware if necessary (via Bluetooth) and provide background service responsible for communication between apps and InputStick. Android applications.Once InputStick is released, following apps will be available (all free and without ads):
Remote Controller: turns your phone into wireless USB keyboard, mouse and multimedia remote.

Password Manager: use InputStick to type URL, user name and password for you! Use long passwords, with special characters, different for each site and don't worry about memorizing them or making typos!
Gamepad: use your phone as a wireless USB gamepad with 4 axes and 16 buttons. Supports multi-touch and accelerometer.
Presentation remote: turns your phone into wireless USB presentation remote.
Barcode Scanner: turns your smartphone into USB QR/bar-code scanner.
You can also use InputStick in your own Android application! See ""Developers"" section for more details.Take it anywhere. Use more than one.

InputStick has a size of a USB flash drive, you can easily carry it everywhere you go. Put it in your pocket, attach to a keyring or even keep one it in your wallet. You can also use multiple InputStick devices: one at each location (home, office) or one for each device (PC, laptop, console). Applications can easily switch between different InputStick devices.Technical data.Size: 57 x 19 x 9 mm.Weight: 8g.Interface: USB 2.0 (full speed).Wireless connectivity: Bluetooth 2.1.Range: up to 10m.Developers.InputStick Android API will allow you to easily use InputStick in your own Android applications. Using standard USB devices is very easy and requires almost no USB related knowledge. Currently available USB device classes are:
USB Keyboard & Mouse & Consumer Control (volume control, media playback).

You can also implement other USB devices, however that requires some experience with USB development. But don't worry, there will be tutorials and step by step guides available. Keep in mind that because of using Bluetooth to communicate with Android device, there are latency and data throughput limitations. It is not recommended to use InputStick as USB devices that require high data transfer rate (mass storage, audio, imaging etc.).Current state of the project.InputStick has been under development for almost a year now. What you can see on the video and pictures is 100% working prototype, which is almost ready to go into production any day now. Because of that, this is a flexible funding campaign, so even in case when funding goal won't be reached, you'll get your InputStick device. Please keep in mind that there is always a small possibility of project being slightly delayed, because of certification or production issues.Perks and shipment.InputStick will be available in black and white enclosures. Devices will be shipped in March 2014, via registered priority
air-mail. International shipment and taxes (for EU customers) are
already included in the price of each perk. You are responsible for

any import fees which might apply according to local law.Want to know more?Visit inputstick.com for more details.All trademarks, product names and logos are the property of their respective owners.",7.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Hi, I'm Kyle Lantzy, a freelance graphic designer and desktop publisher. I have several years experience producing products for print and web, and I'm finally offering my services full time in hopes of making a career of it. I love this line of work, and feel that I offer a service that is valuable to small startups, freelancers, non-profits, and anyone who needs budget design services. I need your help to build my portfolio webpage, and in return I am offering my design services at very low cost.
• Cover my startup costs, such as software upgrades, design tools, colour manuals, website hosting and design, and various other costs.

• Create more products that I can display on my website's portfolio page, and possibly elsewhere. This is important to instill confidence in my future customers, and to give them an idea of my abilities.
What you will receive by funding my campaign

If you fund my campaign, you will receive a digital product for print or web use.  I will design the product according to your specifications. I can design brochures, flyers, greeting cards, business cards, and more. At the end of this campaign, I will send you a unique code that you will then use to redeem your product. You will be able to submit your project details on my website's order page and enter your unique code in the promotional code box.  The coupon will remain valid until January 1st, 2014, and it can only be used once.
Each perk covers the cost of a one page (

column1: I have invested a substantial fund of mine into this but now it is time for the real research start with real means.

This research has demonstrated already via my YouTube videos (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_hGvb-8ud8)   where I am.

What We Need &
column2:

column1: I have one cell that is a total success but creating more is only possible with resources.

Can you imagine flash lights that never dies? Home items that does not need to replace batteries?  If the research is really advanced and successful, can you image a phone that does not need to be recharged or change batteries?

No mobile accessory on the market today solves the two greatest needs of every smart phone user - more battery power and amplified sound - until now. Creating an immersive audio experience loud enough to fill any room, the PERI Duo also integrates a 2500mAh battery, providing more than a full charge to your smartphone.  Don't spend $300 for a battery charging case and a portable wireless speaker!  The Duo does it all at a fraction of the price! 


FEATURES

                          


HOW DOES IT SOUND?

Check out a few videos that offer you insight into the Duo's capabilities. Please note that the prototypes seen in all the videos are 3D printed.  The actual cases will look like the renderings shown in our campaign.

office has seen the PERI Duo in action, check out the feedback below.

WHAT COLORS ARE AVAILABLE?

We are planning on three primary color choices: Black/Silver, Red/Black, and White/Gold.  You will receive an email after the campaign is complete requesting your color choice.

We are honored to have the early support of Rhymesayers Entertainment. In collaboration, PERI and Rhymesayers Entertainment created this limited edition Rhymesayers-designed case and  customized rewards especially for Rhymesayers fans!
column12: >WHERE CAN YOU USE IT?

column1: detaches to become an independent wireless speaker that is with you at all
times! AirPlay<sup>®</sup> your music from your iPhone or stream music to your
case from your friend’s Android® phone.
column4:
/>

With the PERI Duo, you can stream

column1: your music to dozens of Duo cases more than 100 feet away simultaneously through
peer-to-peer Wi-Fi, meaning you can multi-cast without the need for a local
party where you can be the DJ and stream your music to anyone who has a PERI

Duo. 

Or, imagine being at the beach and
streaming your music to all your friends without a local wireless network - you
are the network!
column4:
>

With an integrated hi-def DAC (digital-to-analog converter) and fully programmable single-chip DSP, the PERI Duo offers true EQ (equalization) settings through the embedded DSP firmware using the PERI Audio App.

column1: No other product on the market offers the functionality and slim design offered by the PERI Duo. In comparison images below, you can see the size differences between the PERI Duo and other battery cases and Bluetooth/wireless speakers.
THE JOURNEY BEHIND THE PERI DUO

Over the past year, we’ve gone through an intense process to get to the design of the PERI Duo that we are offering today. Below you can see the evolution of the Duo, from our initial concept sketches to the various prototypes.
an innovative brand set on defining the way consumers view hi-definition audio
and mobile power accessories. The company is focused on creating mobile, portable, home,
and car audio products paired with the latest audio and networking
technologies. Through the integration of hardware, software and industrial

design, PERI provides an unparalleled product experience.  PERI has assembled a team with the full range of expertise required to ensure that the Duo is delivered to market and meets the highest quality standards.


FAQ

1.  How do I use the PERI Duo to charge my phone?

Connect
the PERI Duo to your phone to charge using the patent-pending “slide-guide”
attachment system. Press the charge button once to either turn on or off the

charging function

2. How do I use the PERI Duo to play music?

If the Duo is attached to your phone, simply push the power button to turn the speakers on. Any sound produced by your phone will play through the Duo's high-powered speakers. If you phone is separated from the Duo, simply locate the Duo device through your phone's WiFi or Bluetooth pairing functions to connect. Your friends can play their music through your Duo just like other portable Bluetooth speakers on the market.

3. How do I charge the PERI Duo?

The Duo can be charged with any micro-USB charger. The Duo can be separated from or attached to your phone while it's being charged.

4. How loud is it?

Let's put it this way. Your neighbors might not love how loud you can crank it. We have designed the Duo to be loud enough to bring the party anywhere you have your phone.

5. Can I use it as a stand-alone speaker?

Absolutely! We encourage it! With the Wi-Fi capabilities we incorporated into the PERI Duo, you can easily place the case up to 100ft away while still having full control of what's being played.

6. Will it protect my phone?

Will it save your phone from bumps and bruises? Yes. Will it save your phone from shattering if you run it over with your car? No. The PERI Duo is meant to provide protection from the regular day-to-day use your phone sees, but we don't recommend letting your pet elephant play with it.


RISKS &
to reduce the risks to our Indiegogo supporters. We have been working for a
year developing the PERI Duo, and we waited until it was ready for production
before bringing it to the Indiegogo community. While we still have some software development to do for our PERI App, we have already identified our contract
manufacturer and have begun the coordination process with them. We are fired up
and ready to go, but we also realize that life happens,
and you need to be prepared for anything. We have assembled a team of veterans
with expertise in design, engineering, and manufacturing to ensure that we
bring the Duo to market with the highest quality standard. We are 100 percent confident that we will deliver you an amazing
product that will change your audio listening experience on your phone forever.

and car audio products paired with the latest audio and networking
technologies. Through the integration of hardware, software and industrial

design, PERI provides an unparalleled product experience.  PERI has assembled a team with the full range of expertise required to ensure that the Duo is delivered to market and meets the highest quality standards.FAQ1.  How do I use the PERI Duo to charge my phone?Connect
the PERI Duo to your phone to charge using the patent-pending “slide-guide”
attachment system. Press the charge button once to either turn on or off the

charging function2. How do I use the PERI Duo to play music?If the Duo is attached to your phone, simply push the power button to turn the speakers on. Any sound produced by your phone will play through the Duo's high-powered speakers. If you phone is separated from the Duo, simply locate the Duo device through your phone's WiFi or Bluetooth pairing functions to connect. Your friends can play their music through your Duo just like other portable Bluetooth speakers on the market.
3. How do I charge the PERI Duo?The Duo can be charged with any micro-USB charger. The Duo can be separated from or attached to your phone while it's being charged.

4. How loud is it?Let's put it this way. Your neighbors might not love how loud you can crank it. We have designed the Duo to be loud enough to bring the party anywhere you have your phone.5. Can I use it as a stand-alone speaker?Absolutely! We encourage it! With the Wi-Fi capabilities we incorporated into the PERI Duo, you can easily place the case up to 100ft away while still having full control of what's being played.6. Will it protect my phone?Will it save your phone from bumps and bruises? Yes. Will it save your phone from shattering if you run it over with your car? No. The PERI Duo is meant to provide protection from the regular day-to-day use your phone sees, but we don't recommend letting your pet elephant play with it.RISKS & CHALLENGES
to reduce the risks to our Indiegogo supporters. We have been working for a
year developing the PERI Duo, and we waited until it was ready for production
before bringing it to the Indiegogo community. While we still have some software development to do for our PERI App, we have already identified our contract
manufacturer and have begun the coordination process with them. We are fired up
and ready to go, but we also realize that life happens,
and you need to be prepared for anything. We have assembled a team of veterans
with expertise in design, engineering, and manufacturing to ensure that we
bring the Duo to market with the highest quality standard. We are 100 percent confident that we will deliver you an amazing

product that will change your audio listening experience on your phone forever.iPhone and AirPlay are registered trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S., and other countries.",17.0,4,"1 Campaign

column1:
As adults, we know that nothing is more gratifying than setting a goal and through our own industriousness and persistence, achieving that goal. We know that accomplishments can boost self-confidence and morale to high highs. But how do we help our kids understand that?

At Pocket Change, our purpose is to help kids, in a positive and fun way, understand that accomplishments will boost their self-confidence. And give them the financial training and tools so that they will grow up to be successful, happy members of our society.

With that in mind, we've developed the Pocket Change Allowance Program. It is  banking for children. It is a software program with a mobile app that parents can use to easily pay allowance based on chores, good grades and good behavior. There is a VISA/Mastercard debit card attached to it so that kids can use their allowance to make purchases. It is designed for kids age 8 and up.

You can select which chores for your child to do and set the reminders. When they complete a chore, they hit ""Done"" and you immediately get a notification that the chore is done and can chose ""Pay"". If you're not at home, they can take a picture of the completed chore as proof. You can also select how much they get paid based on grades and good behavior.

Your child can set goals (Xbox, a new bike, an American Girl Doll, etc....) and can visually see that they are reaching their goals. With our easy to understand reporting system, your child will learn financial responsibility starting at a young age. 



You can feel secure about these features because all options are customizable. For example, you can use the app to pay allowance in the ""learn mode"" and when you feel your child is responsible enough, you can give them the VISA/MasterCard debit card attached to their Pocket Change account. You can monitor purchases and freedoms can be increased with increased responsibilities.

The Pocket Change Mobile App Has An ON/OFF Switch

From the mobile app, you can turn your child's allowance card ON or OFF instantly! If you choose, you can keep their card turned OFF. Or if your child loses their card, you can simply turn OFF the card and request a new one with a simple click of a button.
column3:
>Internet Security

If you or child ever needs to make a purchase online, you are protected by Pocket Change's SAFE Technology. With the push of a button, you can request a temporary CVV number for online purchases. Even if your computer was hacked when you made an online purchase and your card information was stolen, a hacker will never be able to use your card without the actual CVV number. Pocket Change's SAFE Technology offers the most secure armored layer of security available. And if this patented, security protocol isn’t enough to put your mind at ease, your Pocket Change accounts are 100 percent insured from loss by Visa, MasterCard, and the FDIC. :)
column6:
>What The Heck Is A CVV?

The CVV Number (""Card Verification Value"") on your credit card or debit card is a 3 digit number on VISA®, MasterCard® and Discover® branded credit and debit cards.  On your American Express® branded credit or debit card it is a 4 digit numeric code.

>How much does it cost to use Pocket Change?

We want to keep it FREE within the USA! With your help on this campaign, we can all enjoy:   

Click here to learn more about terms and conditions.
column9:
>When will Pocket Change be available?

All of the funding we receive goes directly towards developing Pocket Change

column1: for expected delivery in August 2014. <span><span><span><span><span><span>Our promise: we are working around the clock to bring this to

market, and as soon as it’s ready, you will be the first to know! :)

Where can my child use their allowance card?

Anywhere that accepts credit or debit cards. It's a real account and a real debit card.

Which devices will I be able to use the app on?

The Pocket Change app will be available for desktop, smartphones and tablets with iOS or Android.

How do I transfer funds to my child's Pocket Change account?

Very simple. From your backoffice, look for the ""Connect Account"" button. Enter the data and BAMM! It's done! You can pay the allowance through any existing bank account, credit card, or debit card.
column4:
>What If My Question Isn't Answered Here?

We're happy to respond to any other questions you might have about the Pocket Change software, the app, the allowance card, our Indiegogo campaign, or our company as a whole. There is a comment box below that we will be monitoring every other second. Or you can email us at info@pocketchangecard.com.

What About The Future?

As soon as we reach our initial goal, we're going to announce a whole bunch of new features, applications and partnerships. So Stay Tuned!!!

column1: We are close to achieving our goal of finalizing the software development. $334,145 will help us finish the development and launch. If we raise $675,438, we will be able to keep the monthly fee, load, transfer and signature swipe FREE!

Pocket Change Inc. is a start-up company founded by entrepreneur, Myles Binford. Father of 2 and one on the way, Myles is known and prides himself on being a playful and caring father. It’s only natural for him to see a problem that parents everywhere have and create a simple and useful system to help them AND empower and educate kids on finances in today’s world.

Our development team has more than 30 years of experience developing international security platforms for the banking and credit card processing industry. Our patent pending SAFE Technology offers the Most Fraud-Proof Transaction Authentication Solution in the World. :)
Your contributions will help us empower kids and teach them financial responsibility without EVER compromising your security.
We will be doing OUR BEST, using
all OUR RESOURCES, EFFORTS and ENERGY to deliver the best Pocket Change Allowance Program to you on time! :)

We would appreciate your support!  If you like our idea and project, please help spread the word.

P.S.
Watch this short video to see why Pocket Change is Turbo Charged. Our focus is on empowering children, but it's not just for kids. :)

To fund edgenet anonymously via BitCoin, use  13uZJDAyQC1Esho8yoQ9shrx2AoQLyH1iA

We built the Internet to be a space for freedom and opportunity. Instead it has become the greatest surveillance system ever. My name is Pieter Hintjens, CEO of iMatix, and I want you to help me fix that.

Without privacy and anonymity, we lose our freedom of speech. And without that, we become slaves to a narrative where the powerful run amok, without oversight or regulation. I truly believe we're facing the extinction of our digital freedoms, and then our real world freedoms.

column3: >By joining in this project and contributing, you help turn back the tide.

column1: The Internet is the problem. Central web services are too easy to tap. To demand data from. To seize and shutdown, even. And broadband internet connections are trivial to spy on. We can't trust any large firm to keep our secrets safe. Legally, they can't, if they get a National Security Letter from the NSA.
So the idea is to make it really expensive to spy on us. Instead of using thin clients talking over broadband to web services, I want to build mesh networks out of our smartphones and laptops.

People have tried mesh networks many times, so what's different now? The answer is we've got much better software, stuff like ZeroMQ and Zyre, two of the free software projects I've spent years on. Zyre makes it simple to get phones talking to each other in cells. A cell covers a small local area. Cells talk to cells, covering wider and wider areas, whole cities.

Making new software is just expensive, and without funding, Edge Net might still happen, or it might not. So we need your financial support. We set our funding goal at $1,000. Realistically we need a hundred times that to build final products ordinary people can download and run on their smartphones.

The budgets -- however much we raise -- will be handled by my company, iMatix, which has a long track record of making free software. We built ZeroMQ, CZMQ, Zyre, FileMQ, and many other free software projects. It'll let us switch from other projects to work only on edgenet. It'll let us hire designers, security specialists, and other people who can help make this happen.

column3: >Everything we build will be (as it already is) free software based on open protocols.
column5: >We don't want to make edgenet for ourselves, but for the whole world. We'll use the same copyright policy as we do for ZeroMQ: everyone owns their work, no-one owns the whole thing. It cannot be relicensed or easily killed.

column1: If you can't contribute, help us spread the word. Go out and make some noise. Explain to people how bad the loss of on-line privacy is, how much it affects our freedom of speech.

Let's fix this.

","To fund edgenet anonymously via BitCoin, use  13uZJDAyQC1Esho8yoQ9shrx2AoQLyH1iA

We built the Internet to be a space for freedom and opportunity. Instead it has become the greatest surveillance system ever. My name is Pieter Hintjens, CEO of iMatix, and I want you to help me fix that.

Without privacy and anonymity, we lose our freedom of speech. And without that, we become slaves to a narrative where the powerful run amok, without oversight or regulation. I truly believe we're facing the extinction of our digital freedoms, and then our real world freedoms.
By joining in this project and contributing, you help turn back the tide.

The Internet is the problem. Central web services are too easy to tap. To demand data from. To seize and shutdown, even. And broadband internet connections are trivial to spy on. We can't trust any large firm to keep our secrets safe. Legally, they can't, if they get a National Security Letter from the NSA.
So the idea is to make it really expensive to spy on us. Instead of using thin clients talking over broadband to web services, I want to build mesh networks out of our smartphones and laptops.

People have tried mesh networks many times, so what's different now? The answer is we've got much better software, stuff like ZeroMQ and Zyre, two of the free software projects I've spent years on. Zyre makes it simple to get phones talking to each other in cells. A cell covers a small local area. Cells talk to cells, covering wider and wider areas, whole cities.

Making new software is just expensive, and without funding, Edge Net might still happen, or it might not. So we need your financial support. We set our funding goal at $1,000. Realistically we need a hundred times that to build final products ordinary people can download and run on their smartphones.

The budgets -- however much we raise -- will be handled by my company, iMatix, which has a long track record of making free software. We built ZeroMQ, CZMQ, Zyre, FileMQ, and many other free software projects. It'll let us switch from other projects to work only on edgenet. It'll let us hire designers, security specialists, and other people who can help make this happen.

Everything we build will be (as it already is) free software based on open protocols. We don't want to make edgenet for ourselves, but for the whole world. We'll use the same copyright policy as we do for ZeroMQ: everyone owns their work, no-one owns the whole thing. It cannot be relicensed or easily killed.
If you can't contribute, help us spread the word. Go out and make some noise. Explain to people how bad the loss of on-line privacy is, how much it affects our freedom of speech.

column2:
>

Hayle will primarily target students aged 18-24 in Ottawa-Gatineau, Montreal, and Toronto. We believe students are going through a lot of transitions
column3:
finding new friends, new clubs, and communities, etc. can be difficult in an unfamiliar environment.  Hayle would be the ideal app to make this process a more comfortable and enjoyable experience. 

Tourists would also benefit from Hayle when traveling to another city. They would be able to find events, explore the new environment, and meet nearby individuals. Since the Newsfeed is customized for each user based on their interests, users can quickly find events directed towards them. This can help tourists and backpackers manage their time more efficiently.

 

Hayle is a mobile social-networking app that matches local users based on their mutual interests and hobbies.

However, unlike other mainstream apps, Hayle provides many features and tools that help build and develop these connections.

Hayle also provides the ability to discover new communities, opportunities, and events based on personal interests, passions and hobbies.

Hayle is a great app for users to quickly become more comfortable in a new environment and shows them new ways to explore the world.

Our open-beta will be released by mid-April to conduct social experiments. We will be focusing our efforts on growing the user-base in Ottawa. We hope to officially launch in August 2018, right before school starts and before summer ends.

We need $9,300 by March 16, 2018, to pay off our full-stack programmer. Without it, we won’t be able to conduct our social experiments.

 

Starting off, we will be launching across Toronto, Ottawa, and Montreal.  Due to our targetted audience, we will be focusing on post-secondary institutions. If the user-base is large enough, we’d like to expand across every major city in Canada and USA. Our end goal would be to release our app worldwide.

 

As a society, we’ve become increasingly reliant on our smartphones and often lack real-life interactions. This has led to our current culture of isolation. Nowadays, it’s difficult to find local individuals who really want to connect over mutual passions and hobbies. Have you ever wanted to go to a niche event with friends, and then ended up realizing that no one else in your circle was interested? We created Hayle to resolve these issues. 

Our proposed solution aims to differentiate itself from the competition by providing a platform uniquely focused on the user's interests and environment.

Hayle finds individuals beyond age and gender
column4:
it’s all about the mutual interest(s).

The matches you make on Hayle will always be with people that share a common ground, which should lead to stronger friendships and healthier relationships.

Though connecting with new individuals may not be for everyone. Hayle also offers a Newsfeed to help you find discussions, opportunities, and events that match your interests and hobbies.

We believe that bringing back human interaction and getting people involved in their own city will fill the void that social media creates.

 

How is Hayle different?

Here’s a list of our competitors:

1. Facebook

column1: • Utilized to record friends you made in the past
• Newsfeed is cluttered and not directed towards the user
• Matches are made by age, gender, and distance
• Doesn’t offer a way to make one on one connections
• No guarantee of making connections in these events.

5. Nextdoor

  • A private social network, connecting with people in your area. This is targeted for users who want to know their neighbors.

 

If you would like more info on other competitors, feel free to contact us.
column2: >

column1: • The “Connect” is a feature allows you to discover people nearby that share your interests.
• You can chat and meet with other users that you find on Connect.
• Connect offers a scroll and swipe mode to allow for more options and flexibility.
• Scroll (Left phone): Displays nearby users as a list.
• Swipe (Right phone): Displays nearby users one by one, by specific interest.
• A “Community” is a group of people that share a specific interest.
• The main purpose is to develop and maintain the relationships you make on “Connect”.
• Make your own private or public communities with your new friends.
• Find others nearby that also have the same interest or hobby.
• Find or create new events, discussions, and opportunities within.
<li>The ""Newsfeed"" allows you to discover what’s happening around you
column2: a great tool to quickly familiarize yourself with a new environment.

column1: • Everything on there will be based on your interests.
• Find new communities to join that are all in your own neighborhood.
Note that all descriptions are very brief. If you have any questions or want to know more about our features, please leave a comment or email us and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
column2:
>

How are we using the money?

Our tech team consists of 2 back-end programmers, a software engineer, a data-scientist, and a front-end programmer. We hired a friend who is a full-stack programmer for $11,300 to help us complete the app - He is working full-time. We put down $2,000 back in November to begin development.

In March, we will conduct social experiments on 3 campuses across Ottawa and in a neighborhood in Kanata. We will be signing a contract with a film crew to record results and stories to generate content. We’ve calculated that it would cost us $6,000 to hire the crew and to market the results we film.

We plan to raise $66,270 in outside capital from investors after the beta release. We need to demonstrate traction with the open-beta. We feel $15,300 is the most realistic goal we can reach. At the moment, we are participating in multiple startup competitions to help us achieve our goal.

Everyone on a team is also volunteering and will not be taking in a salary until the app starts generating a stable revenue

With your help, we can help pay off our contract with our full-stack programmer, commence our social experiments with a local film crew, and effectively begin marketing.

 

Why is the founding team volunteering their time?

Everyone on our team has been working really hard to make Hayle a reality. This is because we are all students that have experienced the difficulties of making strong connections with people in our own schools and communities. We believe that there is huge demand and need for Hayle right now, as other apps are do not meet our standards. We want to create something that will have a strong positive impact on our society.

 

How will we generate revenue?

Advertisements - They will be strategically placed in Connect and throughout the Newsfeed so it doesn’t interfere with your experience.

Subscriptions

$0.99/month for no Ads

$4.99/month for Hayle PLUS

column1: <li>Return to an automatically saved history of previous 3 sections of users
column2: Every user refreshed out becomes collected as history.

column1: <li>The ability to see the Newsfeed for different locations
• The ability to find a new batch of connections without limitations.

How is Hayle Pronounced?

We intended it to be pronounced like “Hail” but some people call it “Hay-lee”. Doesn’t matter to us how you say it!
column2:
>

www.hayle.ca

Email: info@hayle.ca

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/HayleInc/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hayleteam/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/hayleteam ​

Thank you for your support!

Connect offers a scroll and swipe mode to allow for more options and flexibility.
Scroll (Left phone): Displays nearby users as a list.
Swipe (Right phone): Displays nearby users one by one, by specific interest.
A “Community” is a group of people that share a specific interest.
The main purpose is to develop and maintain the relationships you make on “Connect”.
Make your own private or public communities with your new friends.
Find others nearby that also have the same interest or hobby.
Find or create new events, discussions, and opportunities within.
The ""Newsfeed"" allows you to discover what’s happening around you
column2: a great tool to quickly familiarize yourself with a new environment.

column1: Everything on there will be based on your interests.
Easily participate in events and discussions
Find new communities to join that are all in your own neighborhood.

Note that all descriptions are very brief. If you have any questions or want to know more about our features, please leave a comment or email us and we will get back to you as soon as possible.How are we using the money?Our tech team consists of 2 back-end programmers, a software engineer, a data-scientist, and a front-end programmer. We hired a friend who is a full-stack programmer for $11,300 to help us complete the app - He is working full-time. We put down $2,000 back in November to begin development.In March, we will conduct social experiments on 3 campuses across Ottawa and in a neighborhood in Kanata. We will be signing a contract with a film crew to record results and stories to generate content. We’ve calculated that it would cost us $6,000 to hire the crew and to market the results we film.We plan to raise $66,270 in outside capital from investors after the beta release. We need to demonstrate traction with the open-beta. We feel $15,300 is the most realistic goal we can reach. At the moment, we are participating in multiple startup competitions to help us achieve our goal.Everyone on a team is also volunteering and will not be taking in a salary until the app starts generating a stable revenueWith your help, we can help pay off our contract with our full-stack programmer, commence our social experiments with a local film crew, and effectively begin marketing. Why is the founding team volunteering their time?Everyone on our team has been working really hard to make Hayle a reality. This is because we are all students that have experienced the difficulties of making strong connections with people in our own schools and communities. We believe that there is huge demand and need for Hayle right now, as other apps are do not meet our standards. We want to create something that will have a strong positive impact on our society. How will we generate revenue?Advertisements - They will be strategically placed in Connect and throughout the Newsfeed so it doesn’t interfere with your experience.Subscriptions$0.99/month for no Ads$4.99/month for Hayle PLUS
Return to an automatically saved history of previous 3 sections of users
column2: Every user refreshed out becomes collected as history.

column1: The ability to see the Newsfeed for different locations
The ability to find a new batch of connections without limitations.
The ability to turn off Advertisements.

How is Hayle Pronounced?We intended it to be pronounced like “Hail” but some people call it “Hay-lee”. Doesn’t matter to us how you say it!www.hayle.caEmail: info@hayle.caFacebook:  https://www.facebook.com/HayleInc/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hayleteam/Twitter: https://twitter.com/hayleteam ​Thank you for your support!",17.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

The iPin Spatial Ruler Pro is the world's first laser ruler using smartphone camera to measure the distance, line and dimension, plus the height, width, and length (3-axis) of an object in one shot. It is the ultimate optical laser measuring tool designed to make your lives easier for those who need a handy tool that can quickly measure objects on a daily basis. We created the iPin Spatial Ruler Pro to get the measuring job done faster and without any hassle.

column3: >
column4:
>

Shoot

Take a photo using your smartphone camera.
column5:
>

 

Size 

The picture you took contains all the measurements you need. Adjust the width, length, width, height, and depth manually with your fingertips.
column6: >
column7:
>

In the past, high corner areas are difficult to reach and measure. Not anymore. With iPin Spatial Ruler Pro, we have created the 3-axis measuring an efficient and new approach to measuring high corner areas, delivering accurate results with confidence.

column2:
>

Hours of tedious hard work are spent organizing data and making drawings. And if you miss something, you have to go back to the work site and do the measurement all over again. With iPin Spatial Ruler Pro, after taking the photo and data, you can repeat the measuring process on any part of the photo whenever you need to.

>

 You can also use it alone as a laser range finder to measure distances.

>

Easily share photos with measurement data with family, friends, or colleagues via email or WeChat.

column1: • Two operation modes - Distance Measure and Photo Dimensioning
• Save Measuring Data With Photos on Mobile Phones

column3:
'/>

iPin Spatial Ruler Pro was first developed to resolve the inconvenience of the traditional way of measurement.

In the time consuming process of the traditional forms of measurement, you will need a tape measure, ladder, camera, paper records, and move around in the space every time you need a measurement. 

With your smartphone camera and the iPin Spatial Ruler together, you are free to move from the points to the location of the traditional way of measurement. No need to climb up the ladders or kneel down to touch the ground repeatedly, saving you time and energy through outstanding measuring efficiency.
column4:
>

Use your smartphone camera to take a photo and record all the measuring data you need and repeat the measuring process on any part of the photo you took whenever you need to with the app.

column7:
>

Conary Enterprise, founded in 1976, has been serving worldwide customers in the Opto-semiconductor industry for 41 years. Our expertise is in opto-semiconductor materials &
column11: D. Our customer base covers major technology R&amp
column12: D institutes and industrial customers in USA, Japan, and Europe. With our own brand, iPin, Conary is developing innovative products with laser applications for the mobile accessory market.

column2:
>

Can I use it with my Android phone?  

iPin Spatial Ruler Pro can be used with Apple iPhones and Android Phones.  

What is the minimum system requirement of this?  

Apple iOS 10 and later version. Android OS 7.0 Nougat and later version   

How distance accurate is this product can be?  

You can use it alone as a laser distance measurer. The Max. distance range is 40 meters and accuracy is ±3 mm.  

How accurate 3-axis measurement can be?  

The accuracy of 3-axis measurement is really depends on the photo quality. The better photo quality, the more accurate 3-axis measurement. We are still working on optimization to improve user experience now.

What version Bluetooth use? 

We uses Bluetooth LE 4.2 (LE stands for “low energy”). 

What is the warranty policy if I receive a defective set? 

We offer one year hardware warranty. If the problem is caused by material or manufacturer’s defect, we will replace it.

column1: The App offers both English and Metric units in centimeter, meter, inch, and foot.
We plan to start shipping in the beginning of August 2018.

Our team had accomplished the previous two crowdfunding campaigns – the iPin Laser Presenter and iPin Spatial Ruler in past years. We successfully delivered exceptional and innovative products beyond imagination to you.

Although we have a lot of manufacturing experience, we still could face unexpected delay of raw materials...etc. As the saying goes: Just do it! We have the confidence that we can deliver iPin Spatial Ruler Pro to you on time. We will continuously post our progress to you through emails and campaign updates.

Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at 
crowdfunding@ipinlaser.com anytime.

","The iPin Spatial Ruler Pro is the world's first laser ruler using smartphone camera to measure the distance, line and dimension, plus the height, width, and length (3-axis) of an object in one shot. It is the ultimate optical laser measuring tool designed to make your lives easier for those who need a handy tool that can quickly measure objects on a daily basis. We created the iPin Spatial Ruler Pro to get the measuring job done faster and without any hassle.

AimTurn on the iPin app and simply attach the iPin Spatial Ruler Pro on the back of your smartphone and aim it to the object you want to measure. ShootTake a photo using your smartphone camera. Size The picture you took contains all the measurements you need. Adjust the width, length, width, height, and depth manually with your fingertips. In the past, high corner areas are difficult to reach and measure. Not anymore. With iPin Spatial Ruler Pro, we have created the 3-axis measuring an efficient and new approach to measuring high corner areas, delivering accurate results with confidence.

Hours of tedious hard work are spent organizing data and making drawings. And if you miss something, you have to go back to the work site and do the measurement all over again. With iPin Spatial Ruler Pro, after taking the photo and data, you can repeat the measuring process on any part of the photo whenever you need to.
You can also use it alone as a laser range finder to measure distances.
Easily share photos with measurement data with family, friends, or colleagues via email or WeChat.  Other features include:
Two operation modes - Distance Measure and Photo Dimensioning
Self-Carried OLED Display and Rechargeable Battery
Save Measuring Data With Photos on Mobile Phones

iPin Spatial Ruler Pro was first developed to resolve the inconvenience of the traditional way of measurement.In the time consuming process of the traditional forms of measurement, you will need a tape measure, ladder, camera, paper records, and move around in the space every time you need a measurement. With your smartphone camera and the iPin Spatial Ruler together, you are free to move from the points to the location of the traditional way of measurement. No need to climb up the ladders or kneel down to touch the ground repeatedly, saving you time and energy through outstanding measuring efficiency. Use your smartphone camera to take a photo and record all the measuring data you need and repeat the measuring process on any part of the photo you took whenever you need to with the app.

Welcome to the new way to carry your MacBook Air and Ultrabook!
FlipCase is easy to use, lightweight, convenient and SMART!
For people on the go, who need to work on their computers while on the go, FlipCase is YOUR carrying case.

FlipCase does what NO OTHER case on the market does - it opens quickly and easily to allow you to work on your computer almost instantly!  Waiting for the bus? Finish that spreadsheet.  Flying on the plane and the person in front of you has their seat reclined so you can't use the tray? Use your FlipCase and work right out of the case.
You actually never have to take your computer out of the case - unless you want to.
Your laptop is ready to go when you're on the move and ready to use when you open the case.  So simple, so easy, and so SMART!

Funding from this campaign will go towards tooling/moulds and an initial quantity of FlipCase made right here in the United States.  We have the manufacturers lined up and ready to go.  We have interest from QVC, but we need to have enough product in the warehouse to be featured on their website.

Also, please know that you are helping to develop a small US business, FlipCase International, LLC, that has a global product to offer.  Our product can reach so many cities here in the US, but also so many cities in so many other countries across the globe!
Please check out our Perks and if you have any questions, recommendations, etc., please drop us an email.

The success of this campaign will allow us to make FlipCase and help folks who really need a better way to work and travel with their computers while on-the-go.  There are so many professions and so many commuters that could save so much time and money by using FlipCase to input data in real time!  No more paper to computer transfers - do it right out in the field, right in the moment!
FlipCase will be the standard in computer carrying cases!  Every case SHOULD be a FlipCase!
Please help us to spread the word about FlipCase and this campaign!  Any help that you can provide would be greatly, greatly appreciated!

iDOCK VERSATILE BASE FOR SMARTPHONES AND HANDHELD DEVICES

Finally, the most useful and possibly sought-after solution smartphone and handheld-device owners have been longing for is here! Not your typical mount, this portable and highly versatile, all-in-one holding platform, workbase and stabilizer securely props devices onto most any support structure or surface for hands-free movie watching, unimpeded ergonomic keyboard operation and stable video recording almost anywhere.
Holding Platform, Mount and Workbase: No more straining to hold onto or support device to watch videos, surf the web, type or shoot video. Ideal for use while sitting or doing other activities.
Multiple Uses: Great for the gym, in car or at the computer. Perfect for use at home, school, work, or on-the-go
Tripod Mount and Handheld Video Stabilizer: Securely attaches to most stationary objects or surfaces. Also accepts tripods, camera handgrips and other accessories for maximum utility
Protects: Provides a buffer from tabletop spills or poor surface conditions
Portable: Compact and lightweight, fits in pocket or purse
Universal: Works with most smartphones and handheld devices on the market, with or without existing protective case or cover

HOW IT BEGAN. Inspiration for my project came when I first acquired my first smartphone, the iPhone 4, back in June 2010. I had been working out at the gym several times a week and had been doing so for years. Given the numerous visits to the gym and the long duration of my workouts, especially on the cardio exercise machines, having my smartphone with me at all times was a necessity. Being able to to listen to music, surf the web, email, text message and watch streaming videos provided a modicum of sanity by helping to make those long, boring workouts productive, entertaining and easier to bear.

THE PROBLEM. The major challenge was finding a safe and convenient location to set my smartphone down. At first I would just hold the phone in my hands. However, this became quite unwieldy and eventually fatigue would set in and then it became outright unpleasant. I thought that if there were only a way to securely attach the phone in a landscape position to the control panel or some other stationary part of the gym or exercise equipment, it could be situated up and out of the way, with the display directly facing me. In this way, the phone would be firmly attached with the screen positioned at an optimum viewing or working angle—an essential position to be able to type, surf the web, text, email or watch movies, and without having to hold up or balance the phone in hand during exercise or other activity. I needed something that would allow me to do all of this virtually ""hands free"".

THE ANSWER. Desperate to find a solution, I searched high and low for a product that could solve my dilemma but found none. Given the lack of a solution, I was driven to find one on my own. Now, after many months and endless cycles of improving the design, revisions, refinements and adding additional features, I now have a solution in the iDock Versatile Base.

WHAT IS IT? Quite simply, the iDock is a multipurpose holder for smartphones. However, it is more than just a mount because it is so much more versatile. In fact, there really is nothing like it. It is a useful accessory to have on hand at all times and provides a practical solution to problems or needs that many smartphone owners currently face—all of this bundled up into one compact, portable and unique design. Finally, smartphone owners will be able to take full advantage of the capabilities of their devices, even while on-the-go, making owning a smartphone ever more worthwhile.

WHO WILL WANT IT? Possibly most every smartphone user out there—though some may not even know it yet. After all, there isn't quite anything like the iDock. Despite ever increasing features, more demanding applications and uses for smartphones, the current crop of accessories and solutions have not adequately addressed the needs, much less the desires of most users. It's as if the market hasn't come to the realization that smartphones are not just phones anymore, but full-fledged computers and media devices. Users need to be able to use them as such at all times, wherever they may be, during most any type of activity. Smartphone videographers will marvel at their ability to shoot stable video for extended periods of time without strain.The bottom line is that iDock is an accessory that is sorely needed and it has been for quite some time.

TAKING IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL. Having built a fully functional model, I've tested and put it through real-world applications and it has performed admirably. Those who have seen it in action have been thoroughly impressed by its unique features and functionality and cannot wait to have one of their own. It certainly has tremendous potential. Eventually, the same concept can be used to develop a base to accommodate larger tablets. For now though my focus is on the iDock for smartphones and your help brings me that much closer to making it a reality. Your support will fund product development to get it to market. My initial goal is to patent and and then hire a product design/consulting firm to design and build a prototype. Remainder of  funding will go toward manufacturing and marketing.
Thank you in advance for your generous support. I appreciate your interest in my project and hope that together, we can bring this revolutionary product to the world.

-Rick

column2:
> 

 

Nowadays, gadget is indispensable in our daily life. Running out of power is the most common issue that we will face. PD- The charging bracelet is the best fashionable and cool solution for all of you!

This new charging cable blends accessory, charging cable and date transfer function into a bracelet.

Have you ever got in the situation that you have found a charger but without correct cable for your phone?

Or when you take out your power bank just to realize you have left your charging cable home?

With PD Bracelet this won't happen again! 

 

 

 

Perfect for trendsetters, this bracelet combines modern tech with the elegance of traditional craftsmanship, caters both ergonomics and style. The strap is made of water-resistance leather and a carbon fiber buckle, blending fast-charging and data transfer function to match your daily needs.

 

A more rounded edge and skin-friendly designed case offers users a more comfortable charging cable that can be worn as a bracelet around your wrist. Moreover, the ergonomic design provides a better wear experience even when you are active.

 

To provide the best comfortable and ergonomic fit, we have built the bracelet prototype in dozens of materials and shapes, before settling on the best.
column3:
> 

Carbon Fiber is the latest material used for the high-end and cool products, It has found use from F1 racer to super car, NASA spacecraft to jetliner, yacht to competition-grade sporting goods and more. The ultra-lightweight and high strength features have lead to carbon fiber become a prefect material for the luxury performance products. We have transferred this unique material to our PD charging bracelet to maximize performance and style.

 

We specially designed a limited edition made of Carbon Fiber. The carbon fiber level-up the whole style. You will catch the attention around you when the carbon fiber bracelet is on your wrist!

 

 

 

We have a wide range of colors for your chose. You can get different colors of bracelets ready in your accessory cabinet to match your daily style. Other than color, we offer two styles of buckles and cables as well. You can choose the style as you like.
column4: >PD Single Bracelet (Carbon Fiber)  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark
column7: >​PD Single Bracelet  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark
column9: >PD Double Bracelet (Carbon Fiber)  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark
column11:
>PD Double Bracelet  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark

 

 

 

 

 

The bracelet is equipped with PD fast charging technology. This new technology offers a higher level of charging speed than normal charging. It provides about 5 times faster charge to your devices.

 

 

Other than charging function, PD bracelet can also transfer data. Just like other USB cables, you can transfer your photo, video and other files between phones and computers. 

 

 

 

 

PD charging bracelet allows you to charge a wide range of devices including smartphone, iPad, camera, GoPro and Switch. You can provide the power to all your devices with this single bracelet.

 

 

Don’t worry that water will damage the PD bracelet when washing your hand or in the middle of a storm. It is water-resistance - but you should still take it off when showering or swimming. Dry it by tissue or soft towel afterward.

 

Our specially designed connector/plug will make sure it stays connected tightly under all conditions. It will not loosen up even when you performing a great move.

 

 

PD charging bracelet comes in different connectors, including Apple Lightning, USB Type-C and Micro USB to suit most iOS and Android devices. You can choose the port that fits you the best.

 

 

 

 

Every PD Bracelet will be put into a stylish packaging box to keep your bracelet well

 

 

 

 

 

 

PD represents Power and Design - the core elements of our products.

Our mission is to create practical and functional accessories that look cool. There is a demand for a strong, lightweight yet handy charging cable from the trendsetters and sport lovers, we answer this by introducing the PD Bracelet featuring lightweight and strong carbon fiber material. Now you can recharge your phone and gadgets anywhere with this piece on your wrist!

PD bracelet design maximizes ergonomics. With next-generation material and latest charging technology, we introduce this next generation charging accessory to the world.

You can get different colors of bracelets ready in your accessory cabinet to match your daily style. Other than color, we offer two styles of buckles and cables as well. You can choose the style as you like.PD Single Bracelet (Carbon Fiber)  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark  ​PD Single Bracelet  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark  PD Double Bracelet (Carbon Fiber)  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark PD Double Bracelet  -  Red / Navy / Brown / Dark     The bracelet is equipped with PD fast charging technology. This new technology offers a higher level of charging speed than normal charging. It provides about 5 times faster charge to your devices.  Other than charging function, PD bracelet can also transfer data. Just like other USB cables, you can transfer your photo, video and other files between phones and computers.     PD charging bracelet allows you to charge a wide range of devices including smartphone, iPad, camera, GoPro and Switch. You can provide the power to all your devices with this single bracelet.  Don’t worry that water will damage the PD bracelet when washing your hand or in the middle of a storm. It is water-resistance - but you should still take it off when showering or swimming. Dry it by tissue or soft towel afterward. Our specially designed connector/plug will make sure it stays connected tightly under all conditions. It will not loosen up even when you performing a great move.  PD charging bracelet comes in different connectors, including Apple Lightning, USB Type-C and Micro USB to suit most iOS and Android devices. You can choose the port that fits you the best.    Every PD Bracelet will be put into a stylish packaging box to keep your bracelet well      PD represents Power and Design - the core elements of our products.Our mission is to create practical and functional accessories that look cool. There is a demand for a strong, lightweight yet handy charging cable from the trendsetters and sport lovers, we answer this by introducing the PD Bracelet featuring lightweight and strong carbon fiber material. Now you can recharge your phone and gadgets anywhere with this piece on your wrist!PD bracelet design maximizes ergonomics. With next-generation material and latest charging technology, we introduce this next generation charging accessory to the world.",51.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: This is a charge-and-sync cable that is hidden within a braided leather bracelet.
column2:
>

NILS is designed with a purpose to set your hands free from carrying any excess cords, which function as a charge-and-sync wearable cable. Nobody would notice what it really is, it can be your bracelet daily.

We believe that the humble yet smart design by showcasing practical and sophisticated combination to the market would be a new trend.

column1:
First of all, the traditional charging cables are not wearable. You store them either in your bags or pockets, the least you want is when your device flags in low battery, yet you couldn’t sort out your tangled cables. By the time you did, your phone is power off.

It is a bit annoying, isn’t it?

Let alone, traditional cables are less appealing, you can lose them by being picked up by someone else as they all look similar.
To share your pain, we are proud to present NILS to you. NILS is the first ever charging cable bracelet in the world that does not sacrifice the aesthetic for its functionality.

A great product is all about attitude and being relevant. Our innovation process not only included creativity, but also usability, accessibility, and functionality. A perfect balance between classy and quality, the matte finish on the metal case elevates the sleek look and retain a touch of design details.
NILS, a chic accessory-like charging cable can perfectly integrate into your lifestyle.

column1: NILS' simplistic yet groovy designs with the metal casing will give you the luxurious look and feel that no other phone accessory does.
We want to attract as many backers as we can in the early stage of the campaign to increase our exposure on Kickstarter, even though we can't make any profit from it.
We are not trying to make lots of profit from you, instead we would love to gather as many backers as possible to support us, to enjoy the product we create.
#3 We believe in the quality of our products.
We want our backers to be happy and support our products in the future.
We are a group of five with different backgrounds and experiences.
One day we came across an idea of transforming a cable into something else, something special.

We understand that charging cable is not rocket science.
What we need to do is to think out of the box, to implement the user-oriented design into a cable.
We want to create a phone accessory brand with a modern and luxurious design with reasonable and fair pricing.
And here we need your support to help us to bring this to the world.

column2: >
>
